Aloft Singapore Novena.review_content: I have stayed in many Aloft Marriott hotels all over the place from the Westcoast of the United States to East Asia. They are all great in their own ways, but by far the best experience I had was at this Aloft Singapore Novena. This hotel went through a huge remodeling/renovation in summer of 2023 with grand opening in Sept. It's gorgeous and only a 10 min drive to the heart of Singapore (Orchard Avenue). It's a perfect spot to come chill after visiting the busy city scenery. At check-in, I was greeted by the friendly front desk staff. The check-in process was incredibly smooth and fast. The hotel lobby is incredibly lively, clean and modern with nice music in the background. The WXYZ bar in the lobby is pretty attractive with a good selection. I will share my review of the bar further down in my review. The room is very modern and well maintained with comfortable mattress, pillows etc. Although I'm a frequent traveler and stay at hotels often, I rarely get used to the setup in any hotel environment and have a hard time adjusting/sleeping etc. but I had no issues during my 4 night stay here. The hotel restaurant Yue is another pleasant surprise with awesome great quality breakfast selection from western to asian. Staff Review: The staff, all the way from management to the floor staff, is always willing to help, always friendly, upbeat, smiling and make you feel right at home away from home. Jiven at the front office is super professional and helpful with a great personality. David, Zack, Barsilan and Sankary at the Yue hotel restaurant consistently demonstrate hospitality. Anyone who cross paths with these folks would end up with a smile on their face. Ask Barsilan for his yummy Thosai (Dossa) with Chatni. Last but not least, Zach and Thina at the WXYZ hotel bar are incredible hosts with great bartending skills. Ask Zach for his special Gin and Tonic infused with 'kafir' herb. It's dangerously delicious ;- ) The attentiveness of these two guys and their attention to gusts were a breadth of fresh air. The way the keep their bar shining clean at all times may not be noticeable by some, but I appreciated it heartily. These guys are Pros! Overall, I highly recommend Aloft Singapore Novena. I enjoyed my stay altogether and met incredibly kind and friendly people at this hotel. I am looking forward to going back in August!

Aloft Singapore Novena.review_title: My stay at Aloft West Wing was outstanding, largely due to the exceptional service provided by Jeffrey from reservation
Aloft Singapore Novena.review_content: My stay at Aloft West Wing was outstanding, largely due to the exceptional service provided by Jeffrey from reservation and Isha Ayumi from com centre. Their attention to detail, warm hospitality, and dedication to ensuring a positive guest experience made all the difference. I highly recommend Aloft for anyone seeking a luxurious and welcoming hotel stay.

I highly recommend this hotel for your stay in Singapore! It is beautiful, nice rooms, chic and great food at breakfast! Really quiet rooms too. Most importantly the service is fabulous! :) I wanted to give a special thank you to Lina from the front desk who helped me book tours and gave great service. Also Zack from the hotel restaurant who also gave excellent service - thank you and I'll be back!!

Aloft Singapore Novena.review_title: Great stay at the Aloft Novena!
Aloft Singapore Novena.review_content: Excellent breakfast and really nice swimming pool that was almost exclusively used by me. Most important, the staff was simply outstanding. They give you their full attention and their attitude shows how sincere they are in wanting to meet the customer's requests. The staff really made the stay very enjoyable. And the shuttle service to the MRT station is very frequent making it very convenient to connect to the rest of the city.

The hotel was clean and the colors were vibrant. Fast check-in service and location was perfectly near the Bus stop and the city area. The Guest Loyalty Executive Cha was also very attentive in handling my queries and requests. Thank you so much.I would recommend others to stay at Aloft!

Aloft Singapore Novena.review_title: Funda Commerce Event & Great Team from Hotel
Aloft Singapore Novena.review_content: Good feedback.Good environment staff are very friendly .Food was good ???? Coffe tea ?? is nice.Even food we having at Yue also goodThanks to all especially those name belowYou guys are awesomeNicholasNashIzwanMayWill repeat again on August..

Great experience from the hotel Reception staff, Lobby staff, House keeping, Concierge staff etc. From the first day of arrival, we were treated with great hospitality right up-to being helped through the Malaysian Borders by one of the staff (Shama) on her way back home - what a pleasurable stay....

Wonderful hotel with excellent service. Spent the night on a layover from Singapore to Bali. Easy to get to the hotel from the airport. Upon arrival the staff was so friendly and helpful, particularly the bell boy who helped me get my bags to my room. I enjoyed their buffet breakfast in the morning and was pleased with the selection and again, the service.

Aloft Singapore Novena.review_title: nice staff, nice room, nice venue
Aloft Singapore Novena.review_content: Worked with this hotel for a couple of events, really nice conference venue of suitable size with big windows. West wing rooms are new and nice. convienent location, only 25 minutes away from the airport. Really nice staff here, warm and responsive. would recommend for either business or family purpose.

Aloft Singapore Novena.review_title: Excellent place to visit, good service provided from the staff, appreciate their courtesy shown, and ensure everything r
Aloft Singapore Novena.review_content: All the staff is very friendly, they were very helpful, the ballroom looks grand, the food is also nice, the fish is fresh, the dessert is also good.The facilities provided is in good condition, no faulty issues, the washroom is clean, everything is in good condition.

Good and delicious food. Service are excellent. They are may tan, Nicole, nash. Great team and great service. The chicken, the fish, noodles and beer are fresh. Good and delicious food. Service are excellent. They are may tan, Nicole, nash. Great team and great service. The chicken, the fish, noodles and beer are fresh

Aloft Singapore Novena.review_title: Excellent service. May guided me to the venue when I was lost. Her smile lights up the place. As a manager she works wel
Aloft Singapore Novena.review_content: Excellent service by May Tan. She coordinates well with her colleagues. When I was lost May guided me to the correct venue. Excellent Excellent, excellent. Wishing May all the best. Great job to the team. Great. Great. Great. Great. Great. Great.

Banquet room was nice and comfortableble. Food served during lunch and tea break was delicious and in good amount. May tan and fung were helpful and provided all the necesary items we needed for our banquet. Sound and projector systems were fantastic.

Staff were great special credit to Lina ( concierge ) who is very patient in attending to any questions . Only issue rooms are very close so if you are a light sleeper and someone closes the door it will definitely interrupt your sleep so hope this can be rectified by installing door knobs which closes softly . Location is good as it is attached to a mall but nothing much happening when you step out of the hotel

The entire stay was very comfortable, thanks to the always helpful and polite staff. The hotel and room were clean, and I really enjoyed the breakfast, probably one of the best I've had in hotels. The location is convenient for accessing buses and the MRT.

Attended a wedding dinner at aloft. :) The food tasted great!! The place atmosphere was very nice and unique with an oriental feel. Service was good, esp Fung nash! Thank you so much for the memorable experience, believe that all the guests also enjoyed themselves.

Nice, modern and decent place for holding a wedding banquet. Food wise is also in a huge portion - hard to not get full. Staff here are super in sync to make sure the wedding goes well. One of the recommended hotel to consider staying / holding banquet.

Aloft Singapore Novena.review_title: Amazing people and service in Aloft SG
Aloft Singapore Novena.review_content: Super great service! They set up beautiful ballon setup for my daughters birthday! Very accommodating people in SG. Highly recommended and will definitely comeback. Thank you to Ms. Cha for all the advance coordination and taking care of our family!

The hotel atmosphere is beautiful and energetic. A hearty and hospitable reception as in I got a very warm welcome when we arrived. Room was comfortable and the hotel is clean and smell good. the breakfast was great with verity of food to choose from.

Aloft Singapore Novena.review_title: From the Welcome to the Goodby - a great place to spend a week!
Aloft Singapore Novena.review_content: The whole feeling of the Hotel, from the welcome from the staff ,to the comfortable room was great. The restaurant staff were exceptional. They remembered my name and called me by name every morning. Coffee just arrived at the table for me! I felt very spoiled.The food was exceptional as well. The front counter staff were great from ordering taxis, to directing me to the other West wing from where my bus went every day, to the greeting on my return from the Rotary Convention. Thank you all.

I stayed for a night only since there was an errand needed to attend nearby the hotel.The checked-in process is quick. I was staying at 4th floor. And love the pool vibes. Also, they give a free shuttle to novena subway.Actually not close to anywhere however, i love the room. It was neat and the staffs are helpful.

Excellent hotel, easily accessible and close to downtown. Rooms are extremely clean, they are cozy and have a nice large TV. Outstanding service and assistance by Mr Maga who was exceptional and outstanding in looking after us while there. His courtesy and his kind assistance were outstanding and made our stay fantastic.

Held my daughters first birthday and I really enjoyed the food and venue. Not forgetting to appreciate and thanks to Nash, Izwan,Emir and Fung. These guys went beyond for their awesome service and hospitality. Our guests were very happy. Thank you!

Aloft Singapore Novena.review_title: Good experience for the business trip and convenience place for shopping and food. Nearby have Dulian place.
Aloft Singapore Novena.review_content: Good hotel and it is very convenience for good. Nearby have super market. Breakfast is good but the seat is not much and most is round table. 2F meeting room zhongshan1 is excellent meeting room. Nice view and good. Air condition is little bit strong.

Aloft Singapore Novena.review_title: Aloft Novena is a great family hotel
Aloft Singapore Novena.review_content: We had a great visit to the Aloft. They were very family friendly and have an awesome breakfast. The staff was incredibly friendly and accommodating. Lot of restaurants all around the hotel. We already have another stay booked here on our return!

Great service by Mr Izwan and his crew to make our team event a success. The programme ran smoothly from start to finish. The hotel staff were attentive to every requests that we have.Facilities were great. Meeting room was nicely renovated, an excellent venue for any corporate function.

We were provided with very comfortable and clean rooms. The breakfast selection was outstanding and generous. All guest services were courteous and hospitable The billeting rates were reasonably priced. All staff members went above and beyond to insure our comfort and experience the attractions of Singapore.

Aloft Singapore Novena.review_title: Outstanding hotel, but far from the center
Aloft Singapore Novena.review_content: Large hotel with a few quirks. First of all the location is far from the center. They have a free shuttle bus to the MRT station, which otherwise is a ten minute walk. The subway will take you to the center or Marina Bay in ten to fifteen minutes. The hotel consists of two separate buildings and finding the entrance can be tricky, especially if you are arriving by foot. Our room was large and comfortable. Staff are numerous, friendly, and helpful. The pool is large and lovely. The breakfast is diverse and tasty, with Indian, Chinese, and Western offerings. The hotel is next to a small shopping center with a grocery and convenience store, and a food court, with a wide and delicious selection.

Excellent service with a smile. Brilliant attendance to all requests including my particular dietary requirements. Professional attentive service from all. Great food in the restaurant and the room was superb. The bed was great, the bath towels soft and fluffy.

Hosting our 3 days workshop in newly renovated Aloft Novena. We would like to compliment the event crew that support us throughout the whole event (May, Nesh and Izwan), they are very helpful and supportive staff.Aloft has good variety of food, our tea break and lunch buffet are very delicious, People who are looking for Chinese cuisine could consider Chinese restaurant Yue, they have so many choice of tasty food.Overall review: Im happy with my experience here

Aloft Singapore Novena.review_title: I will happily stay at the Aloft Singapore Novena any time I am in Singapore.
Aloft Singapore Novena.review_content: From the welcome I received at the front desk to the assistance getting a cab to the airport when I left a week later, every element of customer service was superb: maintenance of my room, service in the bar & restaurant, suggestions of what to eat, where to visit.I arrived very early and Jenny described my options for early check-in. She pointed out that if I waited until 8:00, I would be charged only half the rate for early check-in, and made sure that I got breakfast in the restaurant too. That level of helpfulness and attention to detail was my consistent experience.The only "Meh" in the whole week was the wine-by-the-glass in WXYZ; all the other drinks were much better. So was the wine in Yue, the hotel restaurant.It's a bit of a walk to the nearest MRT station (Novena), but the hotel runs a shuttle much of the day.If you're a runner or walker, be sure to go to the Park Connector nearby at Whampoa Park.

The experience in WXYZ was just awesome, my experience in WXYZ was a home away from home. Thanks to the awesomeness crew (Zack and Nicholas) who went the extra mile just to entertain me and accommodate my needs throughout the evening with my family. Zack took extra care of me by assisting me on recommending places of my interest which turn out to be a superb experience. Thank you Zack for the warm and care of hospitality service you had provided me and my family during our stay. Will definitely come back for my future trips!

I stayed here for 6 nights attending a convention from 24th - 30th May 2024. Everything about this hotel was excellent. Check in was smooth and quick. Room cleanliness, decor, layout and amenities top class. Breakfast was a large choice of many items both western and oriental. The staff were all friendly and helpful. In particular I would mrntion the concieges who were always ready to go the extra mile. I particularly enjoyed the dance put on by the staff in the lobby on Friday, a surprise and great entertainment. Would I stay here again, for sure with no hesitation.

Aloft Singapore Novena.review_title: Exceptional service by Aloft Novena colleagues
Aloft Singapore Novena.review_content: The service is simply exceptional. I was surprised every staff said good morning to me and most of them tried to engage a conversation for at least a couple of minutes. I feel warm and welcome. I would like to say a big thanks to Cha who is the guest loyalty executive there. She emailed me before I arrived and she also greeted me when I arrived. Room is modern and clean. The entire experience was great.

Room is Small,Swimming pool need to go to other building to use it.The Front office service is different from the hotel which have swimming pool and bar.Room Aircon is noisy.Call for room change and Fo inform need to go down to collect the room keyLocation far from city.

Excellent event coordinators as they were accomodating and very on the ball! Overall good experience at the hotel as facilities were nice and clean and food was decent too. Would recommend the hotel to host any events and parties. Thank you hotel staff!

Great hotel thats clean, modern, well priced and located in a central strategic location. The hotel provides shuttle bus very 20 minutes to get you to and back from Novena Station . I really like the modern decor and how friendly and helpful the staff are

Aloft Singapore Novena.review_title: A convenient and very clean Hotel with very friendly staff at Aloft Singapore
Aloft Singapore Novena.review_content: Nice, clean hotel, friendly and helpful staff, in a quiet area, convenient in every way. Good selection at breakfast, excellent buffet for lunch with a large selection of everything your heart desires. At the conference we had, the staff was super friendly, helpful and everything was more than perfect. We really enjoyed our stay and will definitely come back.

Zack the bartender is the best of the best in Singapore Marriott. So happy I stayed in this hotel. All the staff are nice and the hotel is conveniently located next to a bus stop, the mall, and a 7 eleven. The pool is also a delight. Thank you so much. I love Marriott hotels ??

The staff were amazing, from checking-in to checking-out! The cleaners were so cute, cleaning our clean room I even said they didn't need to because it wasn't dirty but it was refreshing coming back and everything was all tidy and in place. Conveniently next to a convenience store, and on the other side was a bus station that goes all around the main suburbs of Singapore, very easy to get around! Definitely recommend.

A great hotel with excellent service! This was our first time in Singapore and the staff was fantastic. Every morning at breakfast and every evening at the hotel lounge we were greeted warmly. I am a Marriott loyalist and will continue to be!

Aloft Singapore Novena.review_title: A very attractive and superbly presented hotel in every aspect with the friendly staff providing the icing on the cake
Aloft Singapore Novena.review_content: A lovely, elegant hotel with extremely friendly and professional staff. Spotlessly clean throughout with very eye-catching decor creating a pleasant ambience and warmth. Excellent facilities are there to be enjoyed, and the location suited our visit perfectly. All in all a very pleasant experience, and we will certainly be visiting again very soon.

Aloft Singapore Novena.review_title: Excellent hotel in a good location
Aloft Singapore Novena.review_content: The hotel is in a good location just outside the downtown area. The rooms are clean, the decoration is chic and modern. The hotel staff, maintenance are courteous and the free shuttle bus to Novena Station is a big plus that doesn't get mentioned. The pool could have used a jacuzzi tub as a bonus. The in room fridge could be a bit cooler or have adjustable temperatures. Highly recommended for travelers who don't want to pay premium price to stay at a downtown hotel.

Aloft Singapore Novena.review_title: Good environment, but need for improvement on service and food
Aloft Singapore Novena.review_content: The environment is really good, especially how the light enhances the atmosphere of the wedding. However, I feel that the service could be better improved as they did not respond as fast as we imagined. Also, the food were a slight disappointment.

Thanks to the team of Izwan, May Tan, Fung, Nusg, Nicholes, we had an exceptional service from there. Thank you for the dedicated service. We have been very well served as guests. They have made the wedding experience all the more better. Thank you once again.

Aloft Singapore Novena.review_title: Excellent stay! Will definitely come back
Aloft Singapore Novena.review_content: Staff were very friendly and kindly upgraded my room (without me asking). The room was very spacious and clean, shower pressure was decent (rain shower was a bit weak but cant complain) and overall experience was excellent. Location is great as it is integrated into a shopping mall, so all the essentials were nearby.

Aloft Singapore Novena.review_title: Rare servicio in singapore from mr zack
Aloft Singapore Novena.review_content: ?? Greetings aloft..I seldom leave any reviews in life.. but this w xyz bar services.. i came some time in March 2024 w xyz bar, China staff lady not sure promotions etc... but still deliver friendly services..Mr zack served me properly...with smiles and sincere friendliness .. it certainly impressed me even I ordered small items..Today may 17 2024 , he still remember me. He serve WITH warmth unpretentious smiles. Even short hair lady lead me to table was fabulous..He kindly explained all details about bonvoy points system...Rare in Singapore as mostly is obligatory services. Keep up consistency whole team.. ??

Kudos to the front office team especially Ganesan (Duty Manager) & Pugan, great hospitality, very helpful and always put a smiles on their face.Thanks for few others front office team for being very helpful.Keep up the great hospitality.

Maytan, Nash and Fung are amazing employees that are a true asset to the hotel. They are so helpful and went out of their way to help make our workshop a success. The meeting facilities, food and amenities were great too. The lunch buffet had so many options. The food was fresh and tasty.

We were in Singapore for the ColdPlay concert, and this hotel was the perfect place to stay. It's affordable, peaceful and comfortable. Check-in process was great, and we were able to check-in early without any extra payment or hassle. Staff service was incredible specially the housekeeping team :)

Concorde Hotel Singapore.review_title: One of the most accommodating hotels in Singapore!
Concorde Hotel Singapore.review_content: Booked the hotel, for my friends and family as our wedding venue was nearby. Requested for the rooms to be of the same floor, even though couldn't promise to such requests. They really went out of their way by putting the rooms next to each other which helped greatly during our wedding day! Thank you CHS it was indeed a pleasant stay!

A very comfortable room with excellent amenities. The bathroom was properly fitted and lovely to use. Good shower pressure and nice clean toilets and basin. The staff were exceptionally friendly and professional. The breakfasts were varied and tasty. The location of the hotel was perfect for getting to all parts of Singapore. It is located in Orchard Road which has an array of malls and a plethora of varied shops to eat at. It is also located at a bus stop and within 200m of the Metro Rail. A prefect place to stay at.

Concorde Hotel Singapore.review_title: Great location, room, cleanliness & helpfull sraff
Concorde Hotel Singapore.review_content: Great location, between Somerset & Dhoby Gout. Bus stop just in front of the hotel. Nearest MRT station is Somerset, just 500m from hotel. Room is spacious and clean. The service was great, my kid vomited on 3AM and staff help to clean up the bed. Will stay here again if I travel to Singapore again for sure.

We had a very good stay during the Rotary conference for 6 nights in this well located, clean hotel. The breakfasts were very nice. We especially want to thank Tim the manager who was very helpful in dealing with an illness. Unfortunately they could not meet our pillow requests. We would stay here again. Thank you !

We had our second stay in the Concorde Hotel Singapore for 3 nights in May 2024. During this time we found all the staff to be professional, friendly and helpful, especially Rahimah and Rita, in the restaurant. They were always happy to help.The room was spotless and the food exceptional.Margaret Cameron and John Lee

Concorde Hotel Singapore.review_title: good location, large room, good value for money
Concorde Hotel Singapore.review_content: Breakfast just okay, room is big, location is good, just facilities need improvement.Breakfast need improvement and more choices

Friendly staff, clean rooms, only cleaned every 2 days but fresh towels daily. Family friendly and Children enjoyed the great variety at breakfast. Central location for walking to Orchard Rd shops, restaurants with seven11 just one block down.

The conference centre below our room was used for an Indian wedding. Music lasted until 6am. No sleep whatsoever. Reception uninterested next morning and said it was a regular booking. Rooms were ok but a bit tired. Breakfast was a bun fight. Nice location but not for those who like to get a good nights sleep.

The hotel is located at the end of the Orchard street. The location was good and there were a lot of malls around the corner. The breakfast was full of various oriental and western tastes. The room was clean but ours was by the pool which was a bit noisy. Rooms on top floors seems to be better. The hotel had two access ways, one from the street behind and another from the Orchard street. The vans shall enter from the parking, accessway of which is at the back street.

Concorde Hotel Singapore.review_title: Lousy service at Concorde hotel Singapore
Concorde Hotel Singapore.review_content: This hotel is really bad. Right from check in to check out, staff not well trained and unprofessional.1) check in - served by a Filipino stuff. I upgraded to family room, but was initially given twin room. Have to remind her I upgraded. 2) toilet bowl flushing strength was not gd and choked in the night. Have to endure the choked toilet bowl till the next day morning to call for reception. Lousy for a 4* hotel.3) plumber came and unchoked. But was a mess and promised that room service will come to clear up. No one came.4) breakfast was not gd. The restaurant manager was in a hurry to clear plates together with the utensils as well. Have to get her to replace the utensils she cleared.5) check out - served by a male staff. Informed him that I need a parking coupon but will only exit as I have a lunch reservation at another place. Was told I could only have the coupon upon exiting as the coupon was limited to 1 per day and may not work if exit too late. He warned me that the hotel will not be liable if the coupon can't work if I exit too late. I asked him to explain what he meant, but he keeps quiet when I challenged him. No apologies from any staff wrt the choked flushing system at check out even though 1 of the staff know which room I was from. Sorry to say but this hotel really cmi. Staff can't even or not bothered to do basic service recovery. Never felt so bad after a staycation, really spoilt my whole family mood. Frankly speaking, they don't even deserved 1 star rating.

Excellent hotel in Orchard Road, really near to all the shops together with bus stops right outside and a short walk to the MRT (station). The staff were very helpful. Everything was really clean and well maintained. Great food in the restaurant too.

Concorde Hotel Singapore.review_title: 2/3 star dated & dirty hotel pretending to be 4 star
Concorde Hotel Singapore.review_content: Dear Concorde - you are simply a 2/3 star hotel pretending to be 4 star. Upon check-in, I immediately discovered a cockroach on my bathroom floor - in plain sight, wiggling and on its last breath. DISGUSTING! .When I brought this up to the front desk manager, instead of apologizing and doing his best to comp and diffused the situation, he said it was brought in by other hotel guests. What?! What kind of a lame excuse is that? Then it got worse...he said there's no way the cockroach can get to the 8th floor (where my room is), because the restaurant is on the 3rd. So I said "you mean to tell me hotel guests are not suppose to bring food into the room?". To which he responded "we don't recommend that "lah"." And I said "so you don't provide room service then - where you bring food into the room?". He didn't have a clever comeback. .Oh my gosh, you need to send your hotel managers back to hotel management school 101, Concorde. Shame on you. One can overlook the dated building, furnishing and decor (on Orchard road no less), if the customer service was deserving a 4 star. Again, SHAME!!! .Your manager should have handled the situation better.

Michael at reception was amazing. We arrived very early after flying from London, and he upgraded our room and gave us an early checkin.Lovely big room, with a gigantic bed and room service. Restaurant has great food, friendly and efficient staff.

Got no sleep at all. Unbeknown to us our room, like many others on the third floor was directly above a function room. The music started around midnight and went on until 6am. Even with earplugs in there was no prospect of sleeping through it. Complained at reception next morning and was told that this was a frequent occurrence and nothing could be done about it. Its a shame as the hotel is otherwise pretty good and well located. But if you want a good nights sleep try somewhere else

The room so big and spacious.. we really enjoyed our stayed there.. The room is clean too with unlimited tab water.. The room comes with bath tubAnd access to orchard is very easy.. the location is exceptional.. please keep the quality

My wife and myself enjoyed our stay at this hotel. We found the breakfast to be good with a good selection of foods over the full serving times. We found that the staff from the reception right thru to the cleaning staff were always pleasant and helpful even when asked probably some of the dumbest questions.

My first time staying in this hotel and I am so glad we did. Great location on Orchard Road close to shops, restaurants and supermarkets. Room was a good size and the walk in shower is always appreciated.

Concord hotel is very nice and I would stay here again. A bit difficult for a person with disability to climb the stairs to Orchard level. The location is very good and the rooms are large and comfortable.

A very hassle free stay, staff were very friendly and accommodating. The premier lounge was very appreciated and worth paying for the upgrade. Very much appreciated that I had access to my early after arriving from London at 6am.thanks once again.

Concorde Hotel Singapore.review_title: Recent stay in Singapore conorde Hotel. We enjoyed our stay very much. Spices Restaurant, amazing.
Concorde Hotel Singapore.review_content: Hotel was good although rooms may need a wee update. Common areas, including pool, gym and restaurant were fabulous. Location is great, on bus routes, near shops and landmarks. No complaints from us. Thanks.

Stayed at the Concorde Hotel January 30th for 3 nights with my daughter and niece, what a lovely hotel. KUDOS to the management. Highly recommended to all travelers.. close to everything.. I will be back..

Concorde Hotel Singapore.review_title: Concorde Hotel: An ideal stay for my December family holiday.
Concorde Hotel Singapore.review_content: I am pleased with the facilities and services provided by Concorde Hotel, and I am considering staying there with my small family for our holiday in December 2024. What I particularly appreciate about this hotel includes:1. The friendliness of the hotel staff2. Cleanliness throughout the premises3. The quite, calm and comfortable athmosphere4. The presence of a faucet in the toilet, which I find convenient5. There are 4 pillows on the bed, and I love it so much.6. Its proximity to a shopping mall on Orchard Road, which is within walking distance7. The convenience of a bus stop right in front of the hotel, and very close to the MRT station at the Somerset

Very comfortable. Comfy beds. Air con a bit noisy. Very centrally located. Staff incredibly helpful and attentive. The only thing being when guests and housekeeping leave rooms the doors slam loudly. Made for broken sleep. Not good at all. Not sure how this can improve. Restaurant four breakfast very good xx

Went to Concorde for a 2 day 1 night stay with our 3 children in the family room. Really enjoyed our stay. The kids were too comfortable and didn't want to leave the room . Hence, we enjoyed ourselves throughout our stay.

Concorde Hotel Singapore.review_title: Exactly as described, great location in Singapore
Concorde Hotel Singapore.review_content: I had a great experience at The Concorde Hotel. The staff were all very helpful and kind, they were able to provide local information and book transport. Check out being at 12 pm was fantastic. Facilities were nice, pool in particular was well used during my stay. I had a problem with my drain cover getting stuck and it was fixed within the hour.

Cant go wrong with this hotel. Great service. Clean and tidy. Also very handy to shops, malls and places like Clarke Quay. The room was very spacious and also had a massive balcony. Kids loved the bunk beds.

Concorde Hotel Singapore.review_title: Not at all what was expected
Concorde Hotel Singapore.review_content: Had a bad experience this time, I understand alternate day cleaning policy but when cleaning of room is done it has to be proper, unfortunately our room wasn't cleaned properly and we not only complained regarding this issue we checked out before completing the half booking period. Uncleaned glasses were kept in the washroom as it was.

Great location to choose during new year celebration. Plaza Singapura & Orchard is very near by walking distance. Very convenient. Great location. Nice view. Will come back soon. Thank you very much..

Very nice location and good amenities, also they provide with an amazing quality service. The facilities are very clean, you have an easy access to the metro line and also a lot of malls to go due to the fact that its located at Orchad road.

Concorde Hotel Singapore.review_title: New Year at Concord Hotel Singapore
Concorde Hotel Singapore.review_content: Amazing, amazing, amazing staff, services, food, and location. Stayed with family. Concord Hotel is at the central location to reach all places, bus stop right outside & both Somerset & Plaza Singapora stations at 300m on either side. Staff is super helpful & made our stay relaxed and enjoyable. Thankyou

Booked two rooms with club lounge access. Excellent service and facilities. Check in and check out were seamless. Breakfast in club lounge was plentiful and staff very attentive. I will continue to use The Concorde for all my future trips to SIngapore

If the staff can be more friendly will be must better. Improve the breakfast food selection. Any way the location is good, easy to travel in and out., if the hotel can provide more interesting programm will good for the guess.

Stay was great. Room service was also good. .Location of the property was also very convenient .However in the hotel complex there are shady night clubs. One of them called Rumours is particularly cheating their customers. These joints should be done away with from the Hotel complex. For details I have posted a google review on Rumours.Regards

Started out well with a room upgrade to the renovated rooms.Upon entering the room, we found the bathroom floor flooded as the bidet was leaking.Then then shower head holder came off as the fastening screw to the wall was rusty.The renovation issues continued on with a flimsy water filter sprout.Credit to the staff who fixed the issues promptly but these issues should not have been present on the first place. Its as if the rooms were not checked / inspected by house keeping or had not been used for a prolonged period?

Quiet and clean. Polite staff, functional facilities, great pool and gym. Comfortable bed. Awesome location. Would stay again in a heartbeat. Reminds me of old Singapore I used to visit often and enjoy every time.

We had stayed in luxurious hotels in Bali. Singapore was the tail end of our family vacation. We chose Concorde because of its location. We werent disappointed. Its on the quieter end of the Orchard Road. There is a cute Night Hawker Market right next to it. I had used it many many years ago before Concorde existed. And it has still remained the same. All the shopping centres are within walking distance. The facilities were excellent. Service was polite. The view from our 7th floor room was brilliant. Breakfast was well laid out. We enjoyed our stay. We shall come back.

The hotel if not tourist friendly nor friendly to families with 5 members. Though the booking was for 5 people (youngest child is 8 years), they only provided 4 beds and had no plan for either a sleeper couch or an extra bed. No extra blankets for us to make a make shift bed. At first they did not even provide lead in rooms, we had to fight for those. Then they dont clean the rooms everyday, only every 2nd day (they notified us of this on arrival). Even on the day that they do clean, they dont clean dirty dishes or cups or used drink bottles.

My annual staycation with my mum during Christmas season and stayed in Concorde Hotel. The location is good and surrounded with many shopping centres. I would like to compliment Ms Faridah and Ms Kimberly from Premium lounge with their beautiful smiles and greeting as well as the front lobby staff. Thank you all! Merry Christmas!

great location ,lovely clean and well presented ,easy to all transport ,staff very pleasant loved the breakfast ,made our short holiday great will recommened it to anybody ,if i had to stay again would gladly choose the same hotel and only would say on the menu please advice having nuts or mushrooms in a meal as my partner is alergic to mushrooms and it didnt say on menu .

Great location and great service. Near to a taxi stand, a bus stop and MRT station. Easy access to all modes of transportation. Friendly and helpful staff. Clean and spacious room. Generous hotel service.

I am very delighted to have my staycation over here. The checking in process was very smooth, the receptionists were very friendly and helpful, and the room was super clean. I would recommend this hotel to anyone who want to have a great staycation, as this place is also super close to all great shopping center in Orchard

Breakfast is very good. Facility also very good.The pool is goodIf Small slde is there. We will more fun......Location is very good.If Paper guide(bus. MRT and so on )is there, many foreigner is good(I Dont know singapore legal)

All is well; however, despite the aged appearance of the hotel's exterior, the interior of the room is remarkably refreshing and new. The presence of a clean, fresh water tap within the room is a definite advantage, and its location in the central area of Orchard adds to its appeal. The sole drawback is that there may be some noise disturbance from the lively crowd in the clubbing area behind the hotel.

Nice rooms with proper AC. Only one USB charger in the room worked but it was enough for me since I had an adapter with me. Breakfast was nice and changed a bit every day. Juice collection should have been better and a bit higher quality considering the level of the hotel

Excellent location for a stroll along Orchard district, and close to MRT station Dhoby GoutAlways our first choice when in Singapore.Pool Area however should undergo some refurbishment, looks somewhat less inviting, seemingly unchanged for years.

For numerous years, I chose to stay at this hotel whenever I participated in the Standard Chartered Singapore Marathon. The rooms are generously spacious. The hotel's strategic location allows for easy access to the MRT and is surrounded by various dining options, entertainment venues, and shopping facilities. Without a doubt, I plan to return to this hotel for future stays. I would like to express my heartfelt appreciation to the hotel staff for their exceptional kindness and assistance throughout my stay. The dedication of the hotel staff ensuring a positive experience has truly made my visit memorable. Thank you for your outstanding service and hospitality.

We had a lovely stay at Concorde Hotel. Staff was friendly and helpful. Room service cleaned everyday with fresh towels which was great. Excellent location to explore Orchard Road and beyond with two train stations close by.

Good selection for breakfast. Fried eggs, scramble eggs and baconThe staff was frendly and offered good service.Location was good, next to orchard roadBreakfast was cold.Room was not clean. Locked like it was cleaned in a hurry

Great location, big rooms and a nice pool. So close to all the shops on Orchard Rd. and 2 MRT stations very close. Just needs a little spruce up around the edges. Looks a little tired but overall very tidy and all staff were very friendly

I will never stay again its definitely not of standard I expected anymore Highly recommended it needs to do better for Families. The pool is just a waste of space or at least make it more fun Will not stay here anymore

Four Seasons Hotel Singapore.review_title: Nothing short of the word amazing
Four Seasons Hotel Singapore.review_content: I recently celebrated my birthday at the Four Seasons Hotel in Singapore, and it was nothing short of amazing. Every single member of the staff went above and beyond to make my stay unforgettable. From check in, to room service staff, bar staff, the cleaners, masseuses, bell boys, everyone made this experience amazing.The hotel itself is stunning, with luxurious amenities and beautiful decor. The bed was one of the comfiest Ive had the pleasure of sleeping in and I was blown away by the level of service constantly. I couldn't have wished for a better birthday away from home. Highly recommend! ??????????

Before beginning my review it is worth reflecting on the fact that I choose the Four Seasons because of the pricing point, a 40% increase over 3 1/2 years, rather than other options which have increased 100%. From the pick up at Changi to the good bye two days later on the forecourt I was constantly reminded of the quiet professionalism and charm of the property and its staff.I have always loved the view down through the Towers of the Boulevard Room. It really does tick all the boxes.Of special note, when I arrived at breakfast, instead of being ushered into the buffet, I was immediately, and without prompting, taken to the a la carte quiet bar area; that was impressive, as the hotel knows my preference for quiet reflective dining.The service and the food at one ninety for breakfast was superb both mornings.Like the breakfast experience I really appreciated the adults only pool environment and enjoyed a wonderful contemplative swim one morning, it is not just the amenities which are important but the ambience. Though why people need to sit and do their office work by the pool glued to their lap top is something of a puzzle to me, nevertheless on the occasion I swam they were not obtrusive.The maintenance of the room was timely and efficient and the maid provided some nice touches and left notes for which thank you.The Four Seasons is well placed for the Botanical Gardens on one side and Ion Orchard on the other.I also appreciated the flexible arrangements offered over the room retention on the final day with a flight deep into the evening.Thank you for another wonderfully straightforward no nonsense stay with one or two elevated food moments.

Weve been travelling to Singapore for quite some time now and this is our first time staying at Four Seasons Singapore and definitely not the last! Based on our recent experience, we can say that it was perfect and luxury at its finest! The attention to details, in our opinion, makes them stand out from rest. The staff are friendly and respectful which made our stay even more special. We would like to extend our appreciation to Clarisse of Guest Experience as she made our birthday celebrations absolutely memorable, means a lot, thank you! Lastly, we would like also to extend our thanks to Wendy from Chat Service, who went over and beyond in ensuring we will have an absolute blast celebrating birthday dinner at Nobu, thank you! :)

From the moment you step in, you feel the genuine welcoming warmth of the staff, the properly is gorgeous and always spotless, everything oozes quality and taste. The rooms are spacious with beautiful decor, big windows with a lot of natural daylight, the breakfast was a symphony of different delightful cuisines, both regional and international. The staff and quality of service is second to none.

This was one of my favorite hotel stays yet! I travel very frequently and the service, rooms, property, service, food and amenities are top notch. The location is so peaceful, central and much preferred over the busy Bay area. It's easy to access the Bay for evening activites if desired, and just a short walk to the beautiful Botanical Gardens.

Travelled to Singapore to meet my daughter who is currently travelling so I had a few days whereby I was a solo traveller. I booked into Four Seasons and so pleased that I did. The staff and teams that I encountered were all so attentive. I had a club rooms so was able to enjoy a delicious breakfast, afternoon tea and evening canaps in it own lounge area. A turn down service every evening and the bed was the most comfortable. So close to the MRT which made it so easy to get around to all of the sights

Four Seasons Hotel Singapore.review_title: 5 star team going above and beyond
Four Seasons Hotel Singapore.review_content: I was a guest at a wedding at the Four Seasons over the weekend. It was the first time I'd been to a wedding in Singapore. It was a beautiful venue, the set-up was spot-on, and the buffet spread was incredible. There was a minor hiccup, which was a tray of red wine ending up on the floor and all over the clothing of myself and another guest. However, this was quickly resolved by the staff who took our wine-stained items to dry-cleaning straight away. My cleaned jacket was delivered back to me at my hotel before 9am the next morning at no extra charge. The managers, Michelle, Rosnita and team were supportive and communicative throughout, and really went above and beyond to ensure this situation was resolved. It was fantastic service for someone who was just a guest at the wedding. I'm greatly appreciative - and well, I now have a clean jacket for my next destination! Thanks team!
It was one of the best hotel experience of me and my husband that we feel loved and being care while staying, I will definitely stay at Four Seasons hotel again the next time I visit Singapore.
We had an amazing stay here for our honeymoon! The staff were so attentive and helpful. I will be back

We came here for a pre honeymoon before our wedding and we completely fell in love with the hotel. The rooms are spacious, the bed so comfortable and the hotel facilities are great. We especially loved the breakfast, which was one of the best hotel buffets we have ever had worldwide. Big shoutout to Anna, the hostess at breakfast who was just so lovely to talk to, so accommodating and friendly. Also to our server who was a lady with black hair a bit on the older side whose name we never got but was so helpful and sweet. Also to Ewan the concierge who helped us every day with all our requests. And Wendy the general manager (we think) who we bumped into on our last day and chatted to for a while. All the staff here have been incredible, helpful, friendly and have made our stay unforgettable. We hope to come back soon!

It doesn't meet the expectations that one has in a Four Seasons hotel. It's a bit old-fashioned and the breakfast is missing something as important as fresh juices. The location is great. Service is professiona, attentive l and friendly. ?

Terrible 6 day stay....first I was shown an old, worn out room; when I rejected it, I stayed at a better room. However, the room was never cleaned until 16:00 each day due to not having cleaning personnel. Seems, the hotel is running on the "Four Seasons" brand, but lack the funds to maintain the property. Sad! It could use a serious update!

My stay at the hotel was incredible, surpassing all my expectations! The folks at the reception were not only efficient but also super friendly, making me feel right at home from the moment I stepped in. And get this I arrived early, and my room was already set up for me at 10 am! Talk about VIP treatment.When I walked into my room, I was blown away by how spacious and modern it was. The bathroom was like something out of a magazine, with marble floors and a fancy shower and tub combo. They even asked me about my mattress preference before I arrived, and they had a whole pillow menu ready for me talk about attention to detail!I decided to upgrade to the executive club, which came with breakfast totally worth it. The breakfast spread was delicious, and the staff in the club lounge were top-notch. They really went above and beyond to make sure I had a great start to my day.And let's not forget about the pool and spa they were both amazing. The lap pool on the 3rd floor was so peaceful, and the spa experience was out of this world. My massage therapist was incredible, and I left feeling like a whole new person.The dining experiences were fantastic too, especially at the Nobu restaurant onsite. Sure, there was a small hiccup with one of the bar staff, but overall, everyone was super helpful and friendly.All in all, the Four Seasons in Singapore has definitely become my go-to spot whenever I'm in town. The service, amenities, and overall experience were just unbeatable. Huge thanks to the Four Seasons team for making my stay so memorable!

The only upside for this stay was the comfort of the bed. Everything else was not giving Four Seasons. Both pool areas is very disappointing. My delivery was refused and disposed and I was not able to get my money back.

What a wonderful 10 day holiday we have had at Four Seasons Singapore. We stayed in an Executive suite which was really large and had amazing views. The housekeeping staff were lovely keeping our room tidy and providing us with fresh fruit daily. Small hitch in the middle of our stay which the hotel sorted out swiftly and kindly. Special mention for Tomas who was very helpful and kind.

Wonderful hotel, such attentive service and rooftop pool was a real bonus.Amazing choice at the breakfast buffet and food and service at dinner in the One Ninety and Jiang- Nan Chun restaurants were superb.

Fantastic Location, Service And Impeccable Concierge. Four Seasons never fails to deliver! Right from checking in to checking out and all the time in between our stay, the staff was readily available to assist.

During our recent stay at the hotel, which was specially chosen to celebrate our anniversary, we had high expectations based on our previous experiences with luxury accommodations, including those within the FSS chain in other cities like Bangkok. The hotel acknowledged our special occasion by arranging a thoughtful anniversary setup, a gesture we sincerely appreciated and which set a positive tone upon our arrival.However, despite this warm welcome, the overall service experience did not align with the high standards we anticipated. Upon arrival around 2 PM, we found our room was not yet ready. While we understand that delays can happen, the lack of communication and guidance on how we could comfortably wait was surprising. When inquiring about an alternative place to relax, the response from the staff was noticeably unclear, leading us to suggest the pool area ourselves. Even then, the absence of proactive hospitality, such as the offer of refreshments or a menu while we waited, was felt deeply.Furthermore, we observed what seemed to be selective attention where certain guests received preferential treatment while others, including ourselves, felt overlooked. This inconsistency in guest treatment is not only contrary to the principles of hospitality but also incredibly disheartening, as it suggests a disparity in service based on arbitrary distinctions.This encounter left us reflecting on the essence of luxury hospitality and how it is manifested through guest interactions. The service, which could be described as distant and unengaging, contrasted sharply with our delightful experiences at the Fullerton, where the service warmth and breakfast variety were remarkable.Given our latest experience, we have decided that for our future visits to Singapore, the FSS will not be our accommodation of choice. Our decision is influenced by not just the service discrepancies but also by our expectations of convenience for shopping at nearby locations like ION and Takashimaya, which, in hindsight, did not offset our overall hotel experience.In sharing our feedback, we hope it serves as constructive insight for the hotel to enhance its service quality, ensuring that all guests receive the warm, attentive, and personalized experience synonymous with luxury hospitality, without exceptions.

Attended a wedding dinner at Jiang-Nan Chun on 9March2024. Great ambience n sound system. But the night wont hv gone any better if not for GPS! Ms Goh Poh Siew served at our table. She went beyond her job scope of serving food n drinks. GPS took the time to tell us that the table gift was not perfume but was a room spray mist. We wouldnt have known that as it was indicated in very small letters on the box . A very thoughtful gift from Four seasons I must say! GPS also told us the the appetiser wasnt radish as we thought but pickled mango. Just when we were going to ask for more of the pickled mango, she appeared with extras served to us! Now that what I call a person who truly served from the heart! Well done GPS! You deserved a pat on the back!

Hotel room was extremely dusty even after requesting 3 air purifiers. The main filter most likely has not been changed so even if housekeeping cleans constantly dust comes out of the vents. For people with severe dust allergy, this is definitely not the place to be.

Booked this hotel thru AmEx Fine Hotels & Resorts . Checked in was smooth and we were upgraded to the next category room with 4.00 pm checkout benefit. Room is nice. Had breakfast & lunch @ One Ninety and the food was delicious. Breakfast Buffett had lots of options and they were all high quality items.

This is one of the finest and well run hotels we've ever stayed at, anywhere in the world! We were greeted upon our arrival by Vivien Lee, the Director of Guest Experience, and that was the start of the amazing hospitality and kindness provided by her and the entire hotel staff. From housekeeping, who tended to our very specific needs, to the very helpful front desk and concierge, to Anne at the world class breakfast buffet, our experience was one we will always remember. We will definitely be back!

We ( my wife and two small kids ) stayed at the hotel for 10 nights and it was all round a superb experience. Their attention to detail and warm hospitality made our holiday absolutely perfect! Love this hotel and would love to go back as soon as I can!!!!

We first stayed at Marina bay sands. Massive and not personal at all. This one is amazing in service. Room was great, spacious and all included. Two pools with amazing service (water for free, fruits, ice cream all for free during the day. Also breakfast is top! And of course the Japanese Nobu restaurant! Best in town!

Thank you for all, Staff, room, location, Breakfast, Are so nice ,and I say very very warm thanks to your so kind and intelligent operator (name is Yani) for help me , I offer this hotel to anybody which search for high class hotel

What makes a 5 star hotel is service above all else and the Four Seasons Singapore delivers. Breakfast and amenities are good as expected, but the service is what makes them stand shoulders above the others. I traveled with my 1 year old and the hotel set up my room with a diaper bin, baby lotions and shampoos (all-natural) and a pack of diaperswipes (also all-natural). This was done in anticipation rather than my request, which is the definition of excellent service.

We thoroughly enjoyed our stay at the Four Seasons during our travel to Singapore. The staff could not have been more helpful as we had several items that we needed help with that the concierge team was able to solve for us. In addition, we loved the lobby bar and spent several evenings enjoying the ambiance and the very helpful staff. The breakfast buffet was overwhelming, and I thoroughly enjoyed the way the chef was able to cater to the many cultures that frequent the hotel.

My husband and I have just had an amazing stay in this excellent hotel. We chose a Club Room and enjoyed the benefits of the Club Lounge where we were greeted with such warmth and hospitality. All the team in the Club Lounge, Xavier, Ridhwar, Sean, Owen, Sakina, Jai and Miku looked after us so very well. I hope we havent left anyone out. We enjoyed our time with them so much. The hotel itself is elegant and luxurious and well maintained. Our room was nicely appointed and serviced regularly and well. We enjoyed the adults only pool although there is a separate family pool available. The only fault we could find is that the pool is rather cold but I believe thats often the case in Singapore. We highly recommend this hotel to anyone visiting Singapore and look forward to coming back soon.

Four Seasons Hotel Singapore.review_title: One of the best in Singapore!
Four Seasons Hotel Singapore.review_content: Four Seasons at Orchard is definitely one of the best hotels Ive lived in. Not only are the rooms large in comparison to other city hotels, this hotel gives you an Uber luxurious experience in terms of the property and hospitality.As we were landing much earlier than regular check in timings, we had requested for an early check in, which we got about 20-25 minutes into our arrival to the hotel and they were accommodating for a late check out by an hour, which was much appreciated!The hotel has two pools and theyre both pretty amazing! The jacuzzi is great, except the water was really dirty so this is the only minus there was to this hotel.The location of the hotel is spot on with most things within a distance of ~15 minutes by cab, 20-25 minutes by MRT (orchard MRT station was a ~2 min walk) and everything you would want to shop for, available at walking distance.The bed was large, luxurious and the amenities in the room were top notch. The housekeeping staff were also amazing because we would come back to the room in perfect condition and theyve gone above and beyond for us, to organise our room or provide for the things we needed during our stay. Special mention to Jess from the housekeeping team, who was so thoughtful and kind!The staff at the bell desk were so kind and helpful and deserve a mention too! We didnt have any meals here so I wont be commenting much on that but I can say that the restaurants seemed very popular! If youre looking for a hotel in Singapore, look no further! Four Seasons at Orchard wont disappoint. Thank you for your amazing hospitality! We loved our stay with you and cant wait to be back again!

We travel to Singapore almost annually, but hadn't visited in a while due to covid and lockdowns etc. This was our first time at the Four Seasons (we have stayed at other hotels in the past), and we absolutely LOVED it! We arrived early, and were thrilled to be offered an early check-in by Gigi! She was super helpful and kind. Thank you Gigi! The rooms and bathrooms have been renovated, and have a fresh look. We loved the view from our room overlooking Orchard Blvd. The service was always fantastic. We enjoyed the pool and spa. The hotel is located a quick walk away from Orchard Road and have easy access to the Malls and Restaurants. We stayed during Christmas, and the hotel and Singapore in general have a lovely Christmassy atmosphere. We absolutely loved our stay here, and looking forward to returning!

We arrived in Singapore on a very early morning flight and got to the hotel for 8am. Our check in was not until 3pm. The staff however made us feel so welcome understanding that we had just got off a long flight. We were provided with complimentary coffee, water and pastries along with use of the guest room so that we could shower, take a sauna and freshen up. We were then able to use the pool and relax in this area until our room was ready.The hotel is very clean and every single member of staff went out of their way to make us feel welcome and comfortable on our 4 night stay.Would not stay anywhere else when in Singapore.

Friendly helpful staff, clean and very comfortable room and also quite spacious. All necessary room amenities to make it feel like a home away from home provided. Excellent facilities within the hotel. Amazing restaurant and in room dining. Close to local amenities and local transport as we as tourist spots. Highly recommended

I am breaking this into sections to give a fully detailed, honest and useful review of the Four Seasons Singapore.Overall my stay was amazing. This was my first trip to the hotel. I will continue to come back! I am considering booking with Four Season's exclusively moving forward given the the brands consistency across it's properties (looking forward to staying in their Koh Samui location next week!)Location: 5 star: The property is located in Singapore's Orchard district, located on Orchard Road, steps away from Singapores top shopping centers. You are moments away from any and all types of cuisines (Singapore, Thai, Chinese, Japanese, Indian, American, Italian, French you name it.) It is about a 25 minute taxi ride from Changi airport. The Orchard MRT station is also located right next door to the hotel, making all of Singapore conveniently accessible . Check in: 5 star: This was a memorable hotel check in. My wife and I were here for the first night of our honeymoon across Southeast Asia, and had just gotten of a 19 hour flight from NYC. We arrived to the hotel around 7am on a Friday morning (1/12), and our room was ready for us. The reservations desk had reached out to me a few days prior to arrival asking for our arrival details, and they went above and beyond to accommodate an early check in. Never in my life has a hotel checked us in this early without charge. The receptionist was warm and friendly, and the bellman promptly brought our luggage to the room within moments of us going upstairs. Note the hotel cannot guarantee an early check in, and we would not expect or demand one; this courtesy of Four Season's highlights the brand's excellence. The Room: 5 star:We booked the most basic, resort room for our stay. We were considering paying for an upgrade but nothing was available. In hindsight am glad we didn't upgrade since the basic room was already amazing enough! For a basic resort room at the Four Seasons, you are already outdoing most suites at other properties. It's aprox 500 square feet, with an incredibly comfortable bed, small living area with day bed/tables/chairs, flat screen television, and super large bathroom with tub, shower, dual vanity and separate toilette area. The Nespresso maker, smart lighting system and automatic curtains were nice touches.Spa: 5 star: We booked an appointment, amazing massage. The facilities are top notch. Steam room/sauna, showers, pool, and hot tub. I love how they only open the pool area to hotel guests to avoid overcrowding.Staff/ Service/activities : 5 star. The staff are what make the Four seasons special. Every employee is friendly, personable and well trained. They genuinely care for all guests. I have stayed in 5 star hotels where high rollers and suite holders are given preferential treatment, but even with a basic resort room I was given a premium service experience. The bellmen are helpful and prompt. Special shout out to the concierge who kindly helped

Excellent service as we expected and our Boulevarde View Rooms were large and well appointed. We travelled with our 17 year old daughter and enjoyed connecting rooms. Breakfast was particularly enjoyable and whilst we didn't eat in any of the restaurants, we did enjoy cocktails in the ground floor bar. With only two nights, we focused on getting out and about and the hotel is well located to Orchard Road and the shopping precinct. Offering two pool areas was a plus, a quiet 3rd floor pool offering for adults only and the rooftop pool area for all including families. This is something we appreciated as young families can make it hard to relax around a pool. Beds were not especially comfortable but the pillows and sheets were fabulous. Would certainly recommend for a brief stopover but for a longer term stay, the location has less to offer.

We had a 2-night stay here traveling with family. We had reserved two rooms and they were kind enough to assign us rooms next door to each other. That was very helpful as we were traveling with two older parents.I stayed here last in 2019 and they have made some substantial improvements to the fitness area. I really loved the new gym, it's a huge step up from the old gym that felt cramped and leftover. I still love the lap pool. It's quiet, surrounded by greenery and a lovely place to spend a bit of time. It's also one of the best lap pools of any hotel I've seen in Singapore and I appreciate it's separate from the family pool on the top floor.Rooms are the same as I remember - spacious, comfortable and excellent bathroom. I love the shower at this hotel as it's big and easy to get in/out. We had breakfast both mornings in the buffet. I might be mis-remembering, but I feel like the quality and variety of food offerings has declined since my last stay. I remember a more extensive buffet before that included a wider variety of fresh fruit, some local items like Kaya toast and Indian and Indonesian items. Now it's more limited and felt like a quality downgrade. Many of the hot items were served lukewarm, especially the yum cha (dim sum). It was enough to get the day started but we were not particularly excited about the spread.Service at this hotel is of course the best Four Seasons has to offer. Friendly, warm and personal without being fussy. I still think this hotel is a great option in Singapore, especially if you need to be on Orchard Road. It's quiet, comfortable and feels like a retreat from the business of Orchard.

10"s There was nothing lacking in the services provided.Location in walking distance to shopping.[ This is a good and bad. If wife is a shopper be prepared for the extra items to be packed.Strongly recommend the added cost to have access to the Executive Club.This is a quiet area. Pool area restricted for adults only.There is a separate pool for families on the roof.Hard to believe this is not rated # 1 in Singapore.

Four Seasons Hotel Singapore.review_title: Looking forward to coming back here again
Four Seasons Hotel Singapore.review_content: The most comfortable beds and luxurious bedding, such a stylish and gorgeous place full of lovely fixtures and amazing buffet breakfast. We felt so well-looked after and wouldn't hesitate to come back here next time we are in Singapore. It is central and well located.

Four Seasons Hotel Singapore.review_title: Christmas at the four seasons is magical. Excellent service by Muz, Jumain, Ronald and Ma wan.
Four Seasons Hotel Singapore.review_content: Perfect Christmas at The Four Seasons Singapore. Very festive decor and lively atmosphere at the hotel. I always stay here when I am in Singapore. As always, the service is excellent and top notch. Each staff greets me by name and welcomes me with so much heart. I feel very loved and pampered here. I must commend most especially Muz of the concierge who handled all my restaurant reservations at the top Michelin restaurants as early as five months before I arrived and who snagged me Burnt Ends. His knowledge of all the local hangouts and places to dine is incomparable. I must also commend Jumain for his service and hospitality. He welcomed me when my family arrived late on our first night and warmly greeted me and handled my requests everyday thereafter. I also commend Ronald at the pool who always welcomes me when I am here and takes care of my kids when they swim. He greets and takes time to talk to me in our native tongue Tagalog. Finally, our housekeeper Ma Wan was very efficient and friendly. She cleaned our two rooms very meticulously and thoroughly. She made sure my son had his tea bags and our favorite Nordac water and she replenished my sons bubble bath every night. This is my home away from home. Christmas at the four seasons is magical.

Enjoyed our stay at the Four Seasons. It is an older FS property - the service whilst good was not wow (although we just came from the Peninsula). The room was clean and nicely laid out - if not a little dark. Breakfast had a good variety and was actually where the best service was received. Would stay again, but there are a lot of great options in Singapore!

Four Seasons Hotel Singapore.review_title: Beautiful Hotel. Clean, quiet with great service
Four Seasons Hotel Singapore.review_content: Great stay. Rooms are beautiful, clean and quiet. Great location and really lovely helpful staff. Breakfast was really nice. Would definately stay here again. After a recent horrible stay at the Intercontinental Singapore - I will definately be coming back to the four seasons on future trips.

Four Seasons Hotel Singapore.review_title: Top notch personalized service at the Four Seasons Singapore
Four Seasons Hotel Singapore.review_content: We started our honeymoon in Singapore and the staff at the Four Seasons really exceeded our expectations. We booked a club level room as we value access to the executive lounge and it did not disappoint. The options available for Breakfast and afternoon tea were excellent, the staff was wonderful at accommodating my gluten allergy and gave wonderful recommendations for things to do while visiting Singapore. Thank you to Sean, Ridhwan, Hui Shan, and Chef Raj especially. We found our room to be spacious and well decorated, The bathroom was well laid out. We would be happy to stay here again on a future trip to Singapore

This is a return stay and I am still impressed and welcome the friendly and warm service of the staff. From the doorman to the bell boy, receptionists and housekeeping and restaurant staff. Unfortunately there was renovation work now and I didnt get to swim in the pool. Didnt feel like using the one on 20th floor.

Four Seasons Hotel Singapore.review_title: Unforgettable, Faultless and a Real Gem in Singapore
Four Seasons Hotel Singapore.review_content: We chose the Four Seasons Hotel to stay as it is situated close to Orchard Road MRT (TE14 exit via 11) Station on the newest MRT - Thomson East Coast Line which runs directly to the Gardens by the Bay and Marina Sands Bay. The MRT makes it easy to reach most of the main attractions you may want to visit and is simple to use.We were simply amazed and blown away by the efficiency and hospitality of all the staff we encountered during our stay. They are so professional, courteous and exceed our expectations Thank you so much.The facilities are top notch, rooms are elegant, luxurious and spacious. We thoroughly enjoyed our stay

Room very comfortable and with a lot of space. Staff exceptionally nice and friendly. Good position and area is calm. 200 m away from orchard street.Good choice of food and drinks. Gym well equipped and there are 2 swimming pools, family one and for people who want to swim and relax
Impeccable service and delicious food. Staff were very attentive at the Nobu Restaurant. The glass was never empty. :)The food was served in good time, and was very well done. Food quality top notch.

Four Seasons Hotel Singapore.review_title: A Symphony of Luxury and Convenience
Four Seasons Hotel Singapore.review_content: Hotel's staff is the epitome of professionalism and warmth, going above and beyond to ensure that every guest's needs are met with utmost care and attention.Stepping into your Four Seasons guest room is akin to entering a tranquil oasis. The rooms are generously sized, tastefully decorated, and meticulously maintained to provide an unparalleled level of comfort and relaxation.Hotel's location is second to none. Situated directly opposite a bus stop and tour bus terminal, the Four Seasons offers easy access to all that Singapore has to offer. Whether you're exploring the city's vibrant shopping malls, immersing yourself in its rich cultural attractions, or embarking on culinary adventures, the hotel serves as the perfect home base.The Four Seasons Hotel Singapore is not merely a hotel; it is an embodiment of luxury, impeccable service, and unparalleled hospitality. From its attentive staff and spacious accommodations to its convenient location and culinary delights, the Four Seasons redefines the standards of hospitality, ensuring an unforgettable stay for every guest.

This is an OUTSTANDING hotel with amazing food. Of note, my husband travels to Singapore between 4-6 times a year for work and we always stay here. In the past, I have not had the breakfast buffet, but this time we opted for it. Let me tell you, it is so well done. I have stayed at 20+ Four Seasons hotels around the world, Cheval Blanc, O&O, Airelles, Ritz, St. Regis, etc. and it is worth noting how good this breakfast buffet is. They try to incorporate the local foods in the back area of the breakfast buffet by the kitchen. It is not the type of buffet that has 1000s of different types of foods but it has a very well coordinated and is very well thought through selection of high quality foods. The jams are from France (I asked), the fruit is imported from Australia and other areas. My recommendation (if you are Western/from the Americas/UK/Australia)- pass by the front part of the buffet with the usual breads and cheeses and forgo the eggs and pancakes and go for the back to try the Asian foods. (I apologize to all the Asian people who read this review and roll their eyes- to be fair though, my husband is Asian and he eats mostly western foods and doesnt like to really explore food wise) They have a Chinese/Singaporean/Indian section with foods that rotate. I found this buffet particularly unique because I havent seen some of the selection of foods they offer at other places- so I asked and it turns out that they use recipes from the Chefs own families. I hate to say that I dont eat congee that often, but the Exec chef, Patrick helped me put together a very delicious bowl and I couldnt be happier. Also, stop by Chef Roslies place in the center of the breakfast buffet where he prepares his own Singaporean recipes from his family. The Mee Rebus was great and every day it changes.I will say that I love this hotel and the staff is always so kind and amazing to me and my husband (thank you, Cara, for your kind hospitality towards us). My husband plays tennis wherever we go around the world so we stay at this hotel vs. other hotels in Singapore (although I have stayed at the Mandarin and St. Regis in the past in Singapore) due to the access to the tennis courts and coaches. For me, I like to lap swim and the pool outside is perfect and has lanes. I appreciated that a lot. Nobu on site was excellent. I will say I have more limited comparisons for this Nobu vs. a lot of them in the US, and I will say that I preferred the Nobu here. It just opened a few years ago I think. It is great and easy choice for dinner one night. Overall, I dont particularly love to write these reviews but Chef Patrick, Chef Pierre, and the rest

Four Seasons Hotel Singapore.review_title: Ignore the corporate exterior, it's a great spot for a city break
Four Seasons Hotel Singapore.review_content: It's not much to look at from the outside, so I was expecting a bit of a classic corporate experience from Four Seasons. So it was unexpectedly delightful, when spending 4 days in Singapore with my husband on our first 'empty nest' holiday, to find that the Four Seasons offered great hospitality, nicely attentive service, good breakfast, excellent housekeeping. And two pools, including a lovely rooftop pool. And an amazing gym. On a city break, we wouldn't normally spend much time at the hotel, but the Four Seasons was so comfortable, that when we needed a couple of hours to rest between outings, we were very happy to just chill out in our room, which was a good size,, well furnished, with great bathroom. The concierge team and front of house 'meet & greet' deserve a particular mention, they are excellent, friendly and helpful. And a great location for the MRT and for shopping. Well done.

Stay in Four Seasons Hotel Singapore with my family for 2 nights. Hotels location is prefect its just 5-6 mins walk to shopping & dinning area. Hotel also provided different kind of restaurants for choosing and taste awesome! Excellent staffs with excellent services!

Four Seasons Hotel Singapore.review_title: One of the better hotels in Singapore
Four Seasons Hotel Singapore.review_content: Although the hotel feels a bit dated overall, the rooms are actually very nicely refurbished which made for a nice stay. I think this is one of the top picks in Singapore, which has plenty of five star hotel choices.On the dining front, the breakfast buffets was one of the better ones while the Chinese restaurant was a disappointment.

Furama RiverFront.review_title: Overall hotel is ok and staff is the best
Furama RiverFront.review_content: hotel is good for its price, but the best is the customer service especially in club members area. Appreciate all the efforts of the crew especially to Sir Iskanda who helped us in our daily breakfast needs, hes always there to attend to everyone and extends effort to greet us and have a quick chat to see if there is anything that we need. Thank you Sir and thank you Furama - guest from 1326 and 507

Did an early check-in, booked months ahead, for the executive club room, at a low price, room was good, amenities were good, able to bath bomb and bubble bath, the service personnel were great notable to Mr Iskander, breakfast was good, chilled and relaxed alot.
Cindy was wonderful. I had a couple of requests that she was able to fill. I am so happy with the service at Furama, I will be staying here again. Thank you

Great hotel for stay in Singapore. Price equals quality, and we got what we hoped for. The hotel is in a good location - near metro/underground and within walking distance from city centre. The breakfast buffet has both European breakfast (eggs, toast etc) and a lot of interesting local specialties including very delicious fresh fruit. The pool is clean and with enough sun beds for everyone. We would love to stay here again. At check in, Liza, Gopi, and Fadz made us all feel very welcome and the check in took very little time. And even though we arrived at 8 AM, we had our room immediately - I have never experienced that before. It was so terrific.

I had a fantastic experience thanks to Oscar! His attention to detail and dedication to ensuring everything was perfect really stood out. He was friendly, professional, and went above and beyond to make my visit enjoyable. Highly recommend!
Very polite and very kind staffs especially Mary Chen. Will come back again.Thank you so much for your hospitality and kindness. I had a great memory in singapore thanks to your effort.

Furama RiverFront.review_title: New Frap on Menu and Friendly Staff
