Furama RiverFront.review_content: I recently tried the Frappuccino at the Waterfall Lounge, and the blend of coffee and caramel flavors was just right. The lounge itself is cosy and welcoming, making it a great spot to work or hang out with friends. The staff, Crisna and Kelvin, were especially friendly and helpful. They made sure I had a great experience, and their service really stood out.Overall, the Waterfall Lounge is a wonderful place to visit.

Marry and Mei qun service very well , The hotel environment is good, the atmosphere is good, there are 711 below , Nearby is the subway station, travel is very convenient, there is a bank nearby to withdraw money is very convenient, the staff attitude is very friendly, this is a very good trip

Furama RiverFront.review_title: Little hotelier and work from hotel
Furama RiverFront.review_content: Went for a work from hotel experience and my child joining the little hotelier experience. Fun filled day for my child and the teachers took care of them. Very friendly and patient staff. Will recommend my friends to experience this and will come back again for the Waka waka playground

Mr Iskandar was kind and friendly. He make us feel welcomed when we came for our breakfast in the hotel. I was impressed by his commitment to going the extra mile, serving us food and drinks. Good job! Overall our stay was perfect in furama riverfront hotel!

Group tour - hotel stay. Gets extremely crowded. Breakfast can be challenging as its packed to its limit.Hotel staff, then opens up adjoining spaces; however breakfast still needs to be served frm main hall.Limited staff, so many additional challenges.Many things / eg. Toiletries / towels / are kinda swlf service

Stayed 3d2n at furama riverfront for June holiday staycation. The hotel staff were very friendly and helpful. The family room was decent, beds were comfortable, just a bit run down for the toilet (and wish there is a handheld showerhead). The breakfast spread was good, just that the breakfast area is quite small. The swimming pool is very family friendly, there is a kids' pool and a jacuzzi. My kids love the pool. Overall, our stay was a pleasant one!

Excellent check in, assisted by Natasha who was great and a credit to the hotel. Room and the hotel, including facilities, was superb for our needs on a 2 night stay. Near to Havelock MRT station and therefore accessible to many places quickly. I used the gym that was well equipped, and the fabulous pool as well. I was personally put off with the breakfast area, much too small for the size of the hotel! Food itself was good, it was just too busy in my opinion. Overall, a great hotel and worth staying, I would definitely use again

great hotel, clean and spacious rooms. staff all very helpful especially islander, Denise, kelvin and all the club staff. would highly recommend getting a room that has club members access as it made the stay comfortable and easy to navigate. nothing was too much of a problem

I had the pleasure of interacting with Navin at the hotel reception, and I was thoroughly impressed with his exemplary service. Navin was not only welcoming and friendly, but also incredibly helpful throughout my stay. He went above and beyond to ensure that all my needs were met and that my stay was as comfortable as possible. Its rare to encounter someone so dedicated and attentive to guest satisfaction. Thank you, Navin, for making my visit so memorable! I look forward to returning soon.

Natasha is a great front desk officer with a great smile, personality and is very much hospitable. If you ever get a chance to stay here at Furama Riverfront, please refer to Natasha as she perhaps embodies the perfect Singaporean hospitality! :)

Furama RiverFront.review_title: Excellent Stay at Furama River Front.
Furama RiverFront.review_content: Furama RiverFront was a great stay! The room was clean and comfortable, and the staff were all very friendly and helpful. Everyone I encountered was friendly and professional, Special thanks to Mary Chen for excellent services. Overall, a great experience!

Furama RiverFront.review_title: An ideal choice for family vacation
Furama RiverFront.review_content: Nice preparation for our family trip, catering all our requests with high floor, very nice view and bathtub, nice gifts to our honeymoon time. We also highly appreciated our Vietnamese housekeeper who went out of her way to take care of our room everyday. Thank you for all the effort. We would definitely come back when we have chance. Furama is on our top list of recommendation to our friends and relatives.

Cindy always greeted me with a clean and bright smile. I am grateful for her kindness.Friendly Cindy left a good impression on my trip to Singapore.Choosing to stay at Furama Hotel is the best choice for me.I want to give her a good grade, so I am writing this to her.

The food in the kintamani restaurant and waterfall lounge was very nice. The lobby was bright and there are a few stass that very welcoming and always smiling. Milla & danish from reception was very helpful arranging our pickup. Will come to this hotel again in the future.

Clean and comfortable room. Service personnel were friendly and helpful. Need an umbrella? Not a problem! Shout out to Istander! He made breakfast time a joy. Perfect spot to nearest MRT station. Only a couple of minutes walk to Havelock station and 11min ride to Gardens by the Bay, and 2 stops south of Orchard Road. Perfect location for anything you could want to do. Well definitely be back and this time, with our girls.

We stayed in May. The reception staff were great and fast check in and check out. We stayed with friends in the Executive Club Rooms which allowed us drinks and snacks at night. Wonderful experience. Staff were the best and especially Chrisna, Deva and Iskander. They were so friendly and made you feel so special. We were lucky then to have breakfast in a separate area to the normal hotel breakfast area which was so good as it was way too crowded in the other breakfast area.

Furama RiverFront.review_title: Well pleased with our stay at Furama RiverFront
Furama RiverFront.review_content: From check-in to check-out, we were very pleased with our stay.We were allocated a lovely room. Thank you, Navin!As "Executive Club" guests, we were treated to complimentary drinks and snacks in the Waterfall Lounge each evening. While all the staff in the lounge were great, we would like to mention Iskander and Chan in particular.Iskander was extremely pleasant and chatty and made sure we wanted for nothing.However, it was young Chan who impressed us greatly with his enthusiasm for his duties. Full of energy, hard working and a smile on his face at all times. Good luck in your hospitality studies, Chan. Thank you for looking after us so well.At the front desk, Lee Mei gave us helpful advice on a cultural matter. Kenji helped us with our luggage and Hershiel checked us out efficiently.We'd like to thank everyone. We hope to stay again next time we visit Singapore.

Everything at the Hotel was exemplary. Especially the staff ALL of which could not have been more helpful and courteous. We will strongly recommend this Hotel to friends and will definitely stay here again. Special thanks to Sufyan and Eddy.

Rooms not comfortable, service of Sara was very good... I really liked the way she did serve and food was not good to me as I didn't get South Indian food.... It was a mixed feelings overall anyways will give a total average rating due to the uncomforts I faced

Need to say a big Thanks for Miss Sara I came here because one of my friend recommended this waterfall lounge bar and he was early mentioned that Sara's Singapore sling was fantastic and her service. She was very good professional in food and beverage industry. I was spent my time very well here . .

Waterfall Sara is best in service. Very polite and humble and she have a cute smile. And also I was love with her Singapore sling . I will recommend my friends too. Good foods but foods was bit warm otherwise all was perfect . Special thanks to Sara who served and guide us very well

Our first option in Singapore, very accommodating, excellent service from all the staff.Clean and decent place and worth the money.Staff are approachable, nice place. Big thanks for all the staff for recommending good place to go and good food to try. Keep up the great job.

Stayed a night on the way to Europe. Was looked after very well, by Milla, upon my arrival at 2 am. She was caring and gave me a great top floor, quiet room. I had a wonderful sleep. Great place, good value and position for a quick stay. The Havelock MRT is just next door and quick to Orchard.

nice hotel clean and staff very approchable,nice tblo be here,thanks for amazing svc.i hope someday we will visit again here food are and accomadation staff very freindly nice place cool, clean all visitors looks happy and contented as they shown thier face

We came heret as a family of 6 to enjoy our holidays in Singapore.The hotel is really huge and clean . We wanted to Express our thanks you this 4 staff .Milla ,Navin ,Danish and Priya for yhe service given you us during the stay. We will deffinitely recommend the hotel to out friends

When we check in I was impressed the view of the room was very nice as we got city view. The staff at the reception was very helpful and entertaining. Thanks to Milla, Priya, Danish & Navin for this wonderful experience. The food in the restaurant also very nice and delicious. I will definitely back and stay in this hotel again in the future.

The room was really nice and big. All the staff were so friendly and charming.Big thankd to the staff name Priya,milla,danish and navin gor the best service durubg my stay in furama riverfrony .deffinitely will come bavk son ..............

I would say that I am very comfortable and relax on my short stay here in Furama Riverfront Singapore Hotel. There front desk staff is very accommodating and giving good service. Few to mention like Miss Danice , Priya, Milla, Danish, Navin who assisted me whatever queries and assistance I needed with a big smile. The hotel is highly recommended to friends who are wishing to visit Singapore

Furama RiverFront.review_title: Great Service from Kelvin and good food from Waterfall lounge.
Furama RiverFront.review_content: Revisited the Waterfall lounge in the evening and find that the environment and atmosphere was even better as compare to my last visit at noon.Meet Kelvin again and I was grateful that he still remember me of my last visit to the lounge for meal.He continue to show his great hospitality and serve with passion .He continue to recommend some good food from the menu which I find that the price was reasonable and the food taste great with good quality and big portion.Love this place and the food is awesome.Excellent service from Kelvin and really a satisfying experience,look forward for my next visit again.

We came only for awhile but the experience was very good. The food was nice and the reception staffs were very helpful. Shout out to Milla, Danish, navin & primary. We'll make sure that we'll be coming back soon. ...........................

Furama RiverFront.review_title: A very warm welcome to us!!!
Furama RiverFront.review_content: The receptionist Liza, are very accommodating, helpful and supporting what we need and all the staff we encounter are really courteous and very friendly. The room was bright with natural light, clean and spacious. In general we have a very nice experience in the hote.

Nice location and good facilities. Food service is excellent especially Mr. Iskander who is very friendly and hospitable. Room is clean and well maintained with fast internet connection. Registration at the counter is fast and convenient.

A lovely hotel close to the MRT for easy access to the city. Excellent outdoor pool with plenty of seating to cool off from the humidity. Staff friendly and helpful when ordering taxis. This was our second stay in here 2 years and this time we were in a superior room compared to a deluxe which was still spacious enough however it did seem like a few things could do with freshening up. We had a leak in our bathroom which was apparently fixed but it continued to leak throughout our stay. Would happily stay here again!

Very friendly and helpful, specially by Ms Milla. Room also very clean and nice. All things are working very well. Food also delicious and there are variety type of food to eat. Even in short period of time, I will come here again with my family next time.

The hotel is 500 minutes from the Havelock MRT just opposite holiday inn. The check in and check out process was smooth. The rooms are small but comfortable. The lobby staff is good. The one thing which I didnt like as there were ants in my room.

Furama RiverFront.review_title: Great value, excellent location, wonderful people.
Furama RiverFront.review_content: The room itself is a little dated but the bed and bathroom were great. Definitely worth what was paid.Location is also excellent. Very close to Havelock MRT which makes it easy to get to pretty much anywhere, which is not that unusual for Singapore.Tiong Bahru market is also close which is a big plus.I would like to give particular thanks to Crisna and Sara who both work in the Waterfall Lounge. The bar itself is a lovely place for a drink and perhaps some food, but the ladies made it so much better with their humour, friendliness and excellent service.I would definitely come back to this hotel.

Customer satisfued at fron receptionist,, milla,, good ang very approachable, i prefer to go back here on my next vacation here at singapore,, very nice place ang very good experience i would prefer my freinds here at furama, thank for your good accomodation

Furama RiverFront.review_title: Very nice and cozy place to stay in singapore center
Furama RiverFront.review_content: Very good internet and cold ac, huge rooms, nice bath tub with hot and cold shower, very nice and accomodating hotel staffs, they are friendly too

Furama RiverFront.review_title: Great stay, 2nd time at this hotel.
Furama RiverFront.review_content: Great hotel, value for money. Easy 3min walk to MRT. We had an executive suite which was huge. Staff were very welcoming and friendly. Enjoyed breakfast thanks to Deva and Michelle. Learnt a lot about the Singapore lifestyle from Iskander who was very friendly and caring, and happy to help with any questions we had. Excellent service, made us feel very welcome.
We travelling as a group and the check in process was really smooth. We really enjoying the hotel here . Thanks to Priya, Navin , Rajan and Rajesh for helping us out throughout our stay in furama.

All the staff have been friendly and helpful with our questions. On a meal in the Waterfall restaurant, we were particularly helped by Iskaudery, who explained what the strangely named food choices were, and gave recommendations and advice. The result was a great taste of Singaporean food. Would highly recommend.

I travel with a groups. The accommodation Was good. All the staff were friendly during the check in process. We really enjoyed staying in furama riverfront. We will definitely come back here very soon. Thanks to Priya, Navin, Jem, Affan and Rajan.

Furama RiverFront.review_title: Professional staff and good delicious foods
Furama RiverFront.review_content: It's a good experience here cause the staff is very approachable we even know their names, Liza, Milla, Danice, Affan. They accommodate us very well. The food we is eat are so delicious.

The is very delicious,fresh and clean. The hotel staffs Liza,Milla,affan and danice were nice and very hospitable..the hotel is clean and child friendly.The furama riverfront hotel also has very clean toilets and has a spacious lobby with comfy seats for the waiting guest..I would definitely check.in to this hotel next time I visit Singapore.

Genting Hotel Jurong.review_content: The hotel is good for a business trip to nearby industrial area. House keeping staff was good. Laundry was collected regularly and done properly. Su Su from house keeping really kept the room fresh daily. Breakfast had good options. Overall a good experience.

Genting Hotel Jurong.review_title: Super good value for money hotel
Genting Hotel Jurong.review_content: The staff are very helpful though room service did not show up once with creamer for my coffee. They more than made up for it later. I was overflowing with creamer the rest of my stay!The rooms are clean. I highly recommend the premier room. Real value for money. The breakfast is super good and they have free tourist shuttles. The hotel manager is truly courteous and attentive.

The staff were very friendly (especially Pop). Room was very clean and building scenery was really nice. Also, hotel location is nearby nice services and shops. However breakfast was below average, and the room size was very small, with some water pipe issue. Overall, it was ok.

Jaslyn and Zack have made our stay very comfortable. Our appreciation to Jaslyn for helping us arrange our stay & ensuring we are comfortable thru out. Zack was also very attentive and prompt in cleaning our room, and never hesitated to accommodate last min requests for housekeeping. Thank u to both for the warm hospitality & we look forward to returning again.

Genting Hotel Jurong.review_title: Ms Rung Thanks for the arrangement
Genting Hotel Jurong.review_content: A good stay and service. Recommend front reservation staff Rung. Very good and pleasant.Highly recommended to business and family stayFree upgrade Room is neatFree soft drinks and meal Very fast checking inThanks again to the team and Ms Rung
The services from front office very nice Would like mentioned staff name Rungvery helpful when i need help

Very nice staff always helped me. Very good manners. The breakfast was very good. Always greeted with smile very good gesture.Suzana helped me whenever I asked her. She helped me getting the cup a noodles.The restaurant food was tasty and the staff over there were very cautious.Room cleaning staff did the cleaning well and always greeted.

Genting Hotel Jurong.review_title: Staff is helpful and the service is very good
Genting Hotel Jurong.review_content: The bed was nice and the view from the window was good. Staff is also very helpful especially Reynaldo, he helped me 3-4 times in my 1 week of stay and available at all times. Delicious breakfast every morning with multiple choices you can choose what you want to eat and laundry service is also good no spots missing.

The hotel staff is extremely friendly and helpful. The room was kept very clean. It was also nice to see the commitment to sustainability by providing refillable water bottles in the room and water dispensers on each floor. The beds are also very comfy.

Beautiful and nice environment at the hotel.Food was very nice and affordable at sky lounge, the view is beautiful in the evening and staff Joanne was very friendly and attentive!Overall good hotel, near to shopping mall and train stations.

staff Reynaldo very friendly and helpful. registered for me with patient. Hotel lobby pretty good. Accomendation here just normal but still better than themost of hotels in Singapore. The only thing not perfect is hair dryer spoiled and heat my hand while I am using it.

The good thing our room is clean and freshly, no anything bad and we love this services. we recommend to other to stay at Genting hotel. I would like to know about genting hotel such like how to sentosa island from hotel took us for free ? and the breakfast is good and the People service good.

Great service from Reynaldo at the front desk! Quick and precise elaboration of floor and main services. Clean and quiet. Not so spacial but with everything you need. Environmental friendly. Comfortable temperature when entering. Nice!

Had a great stay at Genting Hotel Jurong. The location is very convenient near a park, 2 malls and MRT. Staff too were always on hand, polite and ready to assist.Good amenities at the hotel and Breakfast was elaborate enough to have everything you would want.Definitely recommend a stay here!

Good job in maintaining the cleanliness and neatness of the room.The beds are big and comfortable to lie down.There is enough space to move around.I Very much appreciated the replenished goodies.All the staff are friendly and accommodating.Kudos to housekeeper Maung Maung!

Genting Hotel Jurong.review_title: Fantastic Customer Service at Genting Hotel Jurong.
Genting Hotel Jurong.review_content: This is my regular hotel when I visit Singapore. Today I was served by the FOM and obliged for me to have an early check in, I was also given some snacks and drinks at the counter. This is very good. When I return I was served by Didi, she was very humble and smiled all throughout the conversation. As a guest this makes me happy and a reason why I keep returning to Genting hotel for my stay. Jega

Stay over this hotel so many times and it was wonderful. Last time checked in different hotel the condition was bad. Really love the smell of the body wash! The staff also very friendly and helpful. Thanks to Didi who are very helpful assisting me

Susu is a very dedicated person, who helps guests whenever requested, service and friendliness out of 1000...............................................................................................................

Lovely and amazing hotel. Great Location, great staff and most friendly and receptionist and staff. Breakfast was good and service was attentive and efficient. Room is clean and excellent room service by LUN. I was very pleased with my stay.

Genting Hotel Jurong.review_title: Good service so far. Keep it up
Genting Hotel Jurong.review_content: Zun Zar is friendly, approachable and professional in her work. She is flexible and able to advise if room is available at an earlier time. Appreciate her willingness to assist us. As we have two small children who were rather interruptive during the check in, she is very patient and attentive in our interaction.

Genting Hotel Jurong.review_title: Awesome Check in and Nice rooms
Genting Hotel Jurong.review_content: Extremely awesome check in and room experience. Zun Zar is very friendly and attentive to the guests needs, getting us our connecting rooms (subject to availability of course). The Superior rooms were very clean and newish. Housekeeping service was fast.

Genting Hotel Jurong.review_title: Pleasant experience at Genting Hotel Jurong East
Genting Hotel Jurong.review_content: It was a pleasant stay in Genting Hotel Jurong East. Good location and connectivity with the MRT. Very good and friendly desk staff and housekeeping staff thanks to DiDi for helping during check in and check out and informing all the hotel amenities .

Very nice place, good food and extremely nice people Good location and easy communication with public transport. Very friendly place to environment with lots of sustainable activities and actions implemented! Very helpful and szmato. Reception people, especially two great & kind ladies: Rung and Iuck

Genting Hotel Jurong.review_title: A Stellar Experience with Exceptional Hospitality
Genting Hotel Jurong.review_content: I am currently staying at here for an indefinite period, and I must say, it has been an outstanding experience from the second week onwards. One of the standout aspects of my stay is the exceptional hospitality provided by the hotel manager, Jesslyn Chong.From the second week of our stay, Jesslyn Chong has gone above and beyond to ensure our comfort and satisfaction. Her professionalism is evident in every interaction, always greeting us with a warm smile and a genuine interest in how our stay is going. She has taken the time to understand our needs and preferences, making personalized recommendations that have greatly enhanced our experience.The hotel itself is immaculate, with well-appointed rooms and amenities. However, it is the little touches and the personal attention from Jesslyn that truly make our stay memorable. She ensure that any special requests are promptly attended to, Jesslyn demonstrates an unwavering commitment to providing top-notch service.One particular instance that stands out was when there was a gap in our booking dates that had not been updated. This oversight could have left my husband without a room for the day. However, Jesslyn personally stepped in to help. She promptly reset the access card and personally escorted my husband to ensure he would not be roomless for the day. This thoughtful and efficient handling of the situation made us feel incredibly valued as guests and highlighted Jesslyn's dedication to creating memorable experiences.Throughout our stay, we have experienced a few blackouts and several instances where the television was not working. On one occasion, a technician was sent to check the issue but could not determine the reason for the malfunction or repair it. Jesslyn then personally called us to offer a change to another room, ensuring we wouldn't be inconvenienced further. The new room was perfect, and everything worked great, showcasing her commitment to guest satisfaction.Additionally, while the breakfast buffet offers a variety of items, we found that the majority of the dishes were quite salty. This was a bit disappointing as it limited our options, especially for a prolonged stay. We hope that the kitchen staff can adjust the seasoning to cater to a wider range of tastes.On several occasions, I called in to request items like an extra blanket, and the hotel staff attended to my requests promptly and professionally. This level of service significantly contributed to the overall comfort and satisfaction of our stay.In summary, my indefinite stay at Genting Hotel Jurong has been exceptional, thanks to the exemplary hospitality of Jesslyn Chong from the second week onwards. Her professionalism, attentiveness, and genuine care for guests set a high standard that other hotels should aspire to. I highly recommend this hotel for anyone seeking a comfortable and memorable stay, and I extend my deepest gratitude to Jesslyn Chong for making our time here so enjoyable.Thank you, Jesslyn, and the entire team at Genting Hotel Jurong, for an unforgettable experience. We look forward to continuing our stay.

Genting Hotel Jurong.review_title: Genting Hotel Jurong will always my first choice when travelling to Singapore.
Genting Hotel Jurong.review_content: My room and toilet always being cleaned and replaced with new towels, bedsheet and etc. The room also free of dust.Even Saturday and Sunday, my room also being cleaned without disturbing my rest.Special thanks to Sitt and Mayya to make my room clean and dustless.I feel very comfortable each time back to room.

Genting Hotel Jurong.review_title: First time coming to this hotel
Genting Hotel Jurong.review_content: It was a phenomenal experience the Receptionist (POP) was really welcoming she communicated to us in Thai, which was our comfort language. It was a lot easier to communicate. She recommended us around the area of the hotel how to move around the city, which was truly helpful and we adapted to use so.

I had a great stay at this hotel! The amenities were top-notch, particularly the ice machine and the water heater. The ice machine was always well-stocked, making it easy to keep our drinks cold throughout our stay. The water heater was excellent, providing hot water instantly, which made showers incredibly enjoyable. Overall, a fantastic experience and I highly recommend this hotel.

Genting Hotel Jurong.review_title: My experience is extremely good in this hotel, the bedrooms are good I sleep good. Also late check out was not a proble.
Genting Hotel Jurong.review_content: It is a nice hotel and clean, the breakfast is good and the people are very friendly and helpful. The hotel has a pool and a gym. The location is closest to the MRT and a shopping mall. It is also closed to tuas specially for business at tuas. I like it.

Genting Hotel Jurong.review_title: Pleasant staff service and amazing hotel
Genting Hotel Jurong.review_content: The lady staff named Didi was really friendly and helpful towards our family, presenting a pleasant smile on her face and attended to our queries with patience and professionalism. The hotel is clean and spacious, making us look forward to the stay! We are also delighted to find out that the Maggi Mee and drinks in the fridge are complimentary

Reynaldo and Shamala helped me get the items I had left behind after check-out. Reynaldo had specifically asked me if I got all of my personal items out of the room. Very friendly and helpful staff. Very clean hotel. Love the balconies and rooftop view. Thank you very much for kind and helpful service!

Although I arrived much earlier than check in time, your stuff, Ms. Sunari, Ms. Suzanne and Ms. Nami prepared room.It is very helpful for me, because I was very tired due to long night flight. And their service is very kind and friendly, I had good feeling.

The staff gave a good service to us. The housekeeping staff took care of our rooms in tip top condition. My husband was recovering from illness. Our room is always clean and pristine. House keeping Ms SuSu had make sure that we always comfortable.

Very clean and very nice daily work of house keeping. Friendly housekeepers. Drinking water dispensers and ice makers available on every floor. The second floor has a nice little garden, self- service laundry and a swimming pool, which made my two-week stay very meaningful. Also, the front desk has been very helpful and full of service mind.

Great hospitality by River and Wei Keong!After a long flight and sleepiness night, these guys just made my day. So kind and so friendly! You guys are the best! Tq. Nice clean room! Ideal location. Friendly staff! What more needed! Highly recommended!

The hotel closed with bus terminal and MRT. The room is generally clean and bed comfortable. The hotel staff were very professional, friendly and extremely helpful especially Nedu and Zun Zar, thanks for upgrading my room for the second booking.

Iam a guest of your's. I am very happy here.I sing highly of your service. First of all, the hotel is so beautiful. It looks like a garden. I enjoy it.Luck is very nice and pleasant, service is very good. Demonstrates a high sense of responsibility and maintains a strong work ethic.thanks for her help.

Great and clean , Thai staff (K Luck) is so nice and friendly Good bus to casino and Sentosa resort world I came here for 3 times and got the good experience with all 3 time. Thank u for upsize queen bed to king bed .Hope to come back and stay here again

We spent a night there for staycation and it was excellent. Though room is a bit small, it is comfortable. More suitable for businesses trip. The staffs, especially Zun Zar was very helpful during our stay. I believe it is the best hotel if you are looking for a hotel in Jurong area.
Zun Zar provided Good service,she very polite and very helpful.She even give my baby boy a toy,my boy was so happywill recommend to my friend . The room is clean and tidy !.

Nice, clean hotel. Also have a free shuttle bus to international business park so it is quite convenient. Walking distance to the mall for food. Rung at the reception is lovely and helpful. Breakfast selection is ok..No restaurant on site.

Genting Hotel Jurong.review_title: Good value for money, clean rooms and close to transportation
Genting Hotel Jurong.review_content: Great value for money! The staff was very nice; Didi at the front desk was very welcoming and professional. Clean rooms and building close to transportation, which was helpful considering we arrived from the airport and left the next day to travel to Malaysia. Would recommend!

The Checkin and check out was smooth Ms Didi was doesn't an excellent and efficient job during checkin. The swimming pool was ok, not crowded just my family swimming. Not noisy, the hotel provided ice and water dispenser along the corridor. The stay was wonderfull for us. No complaints from us.

I really enjoyed my stay here. I was impressed by room service provided. My room was cleaned by Syah. He is very efficient, hardworking and helpful. He's also very polite and friendly. I'm impressed by the level of service provided by him. Excellent job.

Genting Hotel Jurong.review_title: Very nice experience with great staff members
Genting Hotel Jurong.review_content: The personnel at the hotel were incredibly kind and accommodating throughout the booking process. Their assistance made the experience seamless. Additionally, being able to leave my bags at the entry allowed me to enjoy a leisurely stroll before checking in, which I greatly appreciated.

Very good house keeping!!I stayed over 1 month here, feel comfortable because super clean.Cleaning my clothes also very good.Hot water is also enough for bath.Water pressure is no so much but it's enough to bath.Many thx for house keeper team.

Genting Hotel Jurong.review_title: Pleasent experience and great service at the front desk.
Genting Hotel Jurong.review_content: A very polite and kind lady receptionist name Luck. She helped me to register my name with a smile and friendly gesture. Her efficient service enhances the guest experience in the front desk. Nice and clean room I get. Overall its a nice place to relax and chill.

Genting Hotel Jurong.review_title: Very good experience. Like it so much
Genting Hotel Jurong.review_content: Service is good. Very nice room even though is quick small. Easier to do everything while you on bed. Will stay here again soon

Very helpful workers, super nice and friendly. Lots of help from them with the rooms and where to go and eat. Nice rooms and CLEAN. The sustainability things that the hotel is doing is impressive. Very happy with the experiences with the hotel. Especially with Khine, Nutchaya Reynaldo. Would rate it 9/10, good enough experience.

Wonderful customer service. The front desk clerk, Didi, was exceptional. Khine also went above and beyond. The room was more compact than expected. But it was comfortable and clean. The location was ideal for what we needed. I wish that a more accurate depiction of the room would have been provided.

Genting Hotel Jurong.review_title: Excellent hotel close to business park
Genting Hotel Jurong.review_content: Good hotel for business tripsShuttle service to business parkStaffs very helpfulMs Didi at reception extended our check out until 0400 pm to match our flight. .

Grand Park City Hall.review_content: It is a good hotel I lived in SG this time. Good environment, good facilities. And Syahir helps us pick luggage^_^

We had an awesome stay at the Grand Park City Hall Hotel. Just 10-15mins walking distance to the very famous Singapore merlion. Hotel is really nearby every where. And the best part about my stay is that the manager on duty Mr. Sufri is very helpful and attentive to details. Gave us a beautiful connecting room too. Will definitely come back here to stay again should I ever visit Singapore.

Dear Safura/Satura & Allysha and other staff, Thank you for helping me with a smooth check in. I felt welcome & thank you for being so friendly. I love how you communicate & explain everything in details. Appreciate everything! Despite the long queue during check in & also despite handling many guests before it was my turn. They still cater to their guest needs professionally. Thank you for being a frontliner! Takecare & stay safe, to other staff of Grand Park City Hall thank you for the warm welcome. Kuddos to everyone!!! :) Will definitely come again. Regards, Syakirin Jeff

Grand Park City Hall.review_title: Gem of Grand Park City Hall Hotel
Grand Park City Hall.review_content: I would like to commend Thomas of Crystal Club Lounge.He is very accommodating, welcoming and very amicable.Thomas is definitely a gem of Grand Park City Hall Hotel. Service is a top notch, 5 star!Crystal Club lounge is worth it for everyone.

Went there for wifes bday and anniversary. Lounge is very good. Mr thomas very helpful make sure we eat and drink enough. Even the kids enjoy the food. Thank you mr thomas and grand park city. Hope to visit again when wife birthday and our anniversary. Really enjoyed our time there.

We were stranded by our flight and Allysha behind reception made us feel less stressed and was so helpful. The hotel itself is wonderful and close to the old town (Raffles). As we were only there for a day we did t get to experience everything but saw the roof top pool which looks fabulous I would definitely choose to stay here if/when we come back to Singapore

Happy to be back to Singapore for the third time. First stay at this hotel and the room is beautiful. Very modern and well equipped with technology. I particularly like the magic lamp that you can switch on and off with a touch. Food is decent. More western. The salad and pasta are decent. Great chat with Mr. Louis friendly guy. Stephanie and Dylan who served me at Tablescape are good too. Overall good stay

Short time spent at this hotel and the room is very nice. Surprisingly I had a good sleep as the pillow is very comfortable. Breakfast is good as well. I am a vegetarian and they have a decent selection. Stephanie at the morning breakfast is helpful. I had an issue with my flight ticket and the reception staff Louis, Ikmal and Yun Yun went their way to assist.

Grand Park City Hall.review_title: An excellent experience at a centrally located hotel that is very good value for money.
Grand Park City Hall.review_content: This is a really excellent hotel. It is centrally located with transport available nearby. Staff are helpful and efficient. An issue with my room was widely with. I must particularly commend Louis who went out of his way to assist. Rooms are large, comfortable and well - appointed. Very good value for money. Breakfasts are substantial and also good value. This is my third stay here and I will happily return.

Location of the hotel is great, but service staff is even better. Booked for 2 nights and extended another as it was too comfortable. Warm and professional service from everyone we met.. concierge, front desk, housekeeping and esp Crystal Club. Gladys is a star! Super attentive and helpful. Highly recommend staying at Grand Park City Hall.

My 2nd staycation here and its because Grand Park City Hall is conveniently located in town and near to the MRT. Love the rooms and the service our family received from Gladys, Loy and Krupa from the Crystal Club. They were very accommodating and attentive to us. Also I would like thank house keeping Ms Raziah who carried out our requests in details. And finally to Audrey Ee who helped make sure our stay was comfortable. Will come back for my 3rd staycation!

Great hotel at a central location. So easy to get in and out off. Also, the staff and service was awesome. Special thanks to Ismail, Nazri and Adam at the entrance lobby. Their smile and amazing attitude set the tone for the day stepping out or welcomed us coming back in. Highly recommend this hotel.

Grand Park City Hall.review_title: Splendid service at the lounge, reception and bar counter
Grand Park City Hall.review_content: The service staff are extremely polite and put in the extra effort to ensure customer satisfaction. Thomas in particular was very meticulous and ensured that we were well served during breakfast and during a quick work session at the lounge.

First night stay here, already very satisfied with the staff service The have very friendly officer Kudos to Lois , sakti, Jun qiang. Super nice breakfast. And very comfy environment in the room. Definitely will come back support this Hotel.Again, thanks a lot Grand park city hall

Grand Park City Hall.review_title: Good location, great service, best value
Grand Park City Hall.review_content: we had a 2 night staycation at the Club Premier Room. The hotel is situated in a location that was central to most tourist attractions in Singapore. I would say it's a great place for tourists who are here for ultimate food, shopping and cultural experience. It was indeed a delightful experience for us even though we reside in Singapore. The room was beautifully decorated in black and white hues and had a smart control panel for the room's lights and air-conditioning. The reading light by the side of the bed was touch-sensored so it was really convenient and thoughtful!The bed was soft and comfy. Pillows were slim pillows but we were shocked that they gave us a good sleep nonetheless! Bathtub was big enough and removing the blinds allowed one to watch TV from the comfort of the bath tub. There was also a ceiling fan in the room. The closet can be opened from the bathroom side as well which made it really convenient! However one drawback was there was no vanity table or area for hair drying or makeup purposes. Service at the crystal club lounge was fantastic. We especially enjoyed the evening cocktail; the beef stew and the mushroom penne was amazing. Commendable service from a lady staff (Kriya, hope I didn't spell her name wrongly) and Thomas. They took time to engage with guests making them feel at home. Concierge staff were also always polite and on hand to assist too. All in, it was a fantastic experience.

Grand Park City Hall.review_title: Amazing place to stay for a family
Grand Park City Hall.review_content: We had an amazing stay and the reception staff, Atikah and Allysha sorted out our check in and check out smoothly. The pool was perfect for our toddler and it was a memorable stay for us. The room was very clean and we had a good sleep, including our kid.

This is the most comfortable hotel I have ever stayed in. It is very clean and the environment is beautiful. The buffets for breakfast and dinner are so delicious. Then there is a very good staff who I must mention because he responded immediately to any problems we encountered. Helped us solve the problem. If I remember correctly, his name is tan kher xian ,is a handsome boy haha and He is at the reception there haha. He is very friendly and helpful . Actually all the staff also very nice .then I want to say that this hotel is really perfect for me. Highly recommended.

Grand Park City Hall.review_title: First time in South East Asia. trip with my family
Grand Park City Hall.review_content: My kids wanted to come to Singapore for Universal Studio en route to Bali. We decided to stay in city centre instead of Sentosa. Louis supported us during check in and showed us the in room technology. I can control the lighting and the fan and AC using QR code. He also gave us some recommendations about the surrounding area. Joseph at the restaurant supports us during our two nights stay. Adam sent our luggage to our room promptly. Our next stop is Bali and I look forward to visiting again. Thank you.

Another great stay with club lounge access and as always the staffs are very friendly especially Mr. Sakthivel at the concierge and Mr. Tomas at the crystal club. A short walking distance to Merlion, Marina bay, Clarke Quay, Fort Canning Park and Bugis. Bus stops, MRT, shops and restaurants are just nearby. Really recommend this hotel and love to stay there again.

A magnificent hotel in the business district of Singapore. Great staff,so helpful. The Tablescape restaurant is amazing. A special shout out to Joseph, our Maitre,D and chef Kokwah for a truly awesome meal. We would definitely stay again.

The location is wonderful, easy access to everything! Sakthi at the concierge welcomed us right away when we got to the lobby last Friday and his help made us feel home already. Sakthi is awesome! He is always attentive and help all the way he could to make sure our stay was comfortable:)We stayed for one week and had breakfast in the hotel every morning. It offers a good selection Dylan, Meihua and Joseph are very kind and helpful! Our family enjoyed dining here and chatting with them.The young gentleman at the front desk is very customer centric. He went above and beyond to help my mom who doesnt speak English when she wanted to navigate the city center and it worked out great. Much appreciate!Will stay here again when we come back in July.

So much of my experience is created by the moment I check in and how the team at the front desk makes me feel. This was the first time I stayed at the Grand Park and it was exquisite!Atikah and Kher Xian at the front desk were amazing! Their energy shines through their smiles, and their genuine care for the guests was apparent the moment I stepped out of the elevator. They made the check-in so easy and gave me a wonderful room! I loved the room and the location. Being genuinely kind and appreciative of the hotel team goes such a long way!Unfortunately, I forgot the manager's name of the bellmen, but he and all the other bellmen were fantastic! Also, Ally, who was my housekeeper, was so nice and always had a really great attitude and smile! I loved seeing her in the hallway whenever I was coming or going. You can walk to Boat Quay, Clarke Quay or Marina Bay within minutes. Great shopping and plenty of places to eat! If you want to jump on the MRT, it's just a few short minutes away.Loved it so much, I just booked a room again, this time with Club Lounge access.The Club has a nice selection of food and drinks and a really nice outdoor deck to relax and catch a view of the area. Definitely recommend going to the Singapore National Archives across the street.

Grand Park City Hall.review_title: Holiday with my wife. Very good.
Grand Park City Hall.review_content: This is a very good hotel. The receptionist Louis is very patient with our requests during check in. Were looking for a place to eat and tried the hotel restaurant and he gave us some suggestions. Very helpful. My wife had nasi goreng and I had local friend hokkien noodle. They were delicious. We get 20% discount as in house guests! Brilliant!

Grand Park City Hall.review_title: Exceptional Service at Grand Park City Hall Hotel
Grand Park City Hall.review_content: The exceptional service at the Grand Park City Hall Hotel made my recent stay there unforgettable. The friendliness and professionalism of the staff were outstanding from the moment I arrived. The front desk personnel went above and beyond to make me feel welcome and knowledgeable about the hotel's amenities. The check-in procedure was quick and easy. Throughout my visit, Kirpa and her team JQ, KX, Loy, Jia En, and Thomeswere incredibly helpful.
The food was delicious and the service was great!Above all, Allysha's consideration is the best! I will definitely come again.

I came here on a businesd trip. the location of the room I receivrd was calm and quiet. Breakfast could be improved in halal option, I only had fruits and boiled eggs. I think it will be a good addition to your hotel. staff service is very good and cooperative especially Louis. He knows my business meeting will not end until 1pm and he was thoughtful and helped me with late check out. very much appreciated and thank you.

The best experience, room is so clean, breakfast is great, the selection was aplenty. good accommodation and easy to access in mall I bought a headset there very convenient, foods and money exchange. When I come here again, I will book this hotel again.

Went for a stayca just to have a relaxing time. Kripa with her efficient work, managed to get things done for us on time. She went an extra mile as well. Took some effort to get the names of the crystal club staff who did well during my stay. Very well mannered. JQ, KX, Loy,Jia En, Thomas. Thank you Kripa and team for the pleasant stay. Enjoyed the club benefits.

We missed our connection home due to a late arrival to Singapore. So Lufthansa put our family up at the Grand Park Hotel for the night. A little tough with an 18-month old and an 3.5 year old and no luggage!Excellent hotel, amazing staff, in particular Ms. Allysha Atikah. Thank you for helping us as you did so kindly and professionally.

Grand Park City Hall.review_title: Excellent Service 5/5 stars of Kher Xian. You be happy staying here.
Grand Park City Hall.review_content: Excellent service by Kher Xian (front counter staff)!. Rate 10/10 stars for excellence service. Valuable employee for Grand Park City' Hall. Kher Xian is patient , kind and polite. Able to explain important details upon check in. Able to explain to guests the important things we need to know. Thank you so much .

Grand park hotel City hall 2nights. Kripa, aini crewGreat service ..Hotel inGood spot.Atmosphere fresh.Early check in available. singapore trip Near to raffles hotelAnd shopping centerVery nice room condition clean and Good scent

Grand Park City Hall.review_title: I will tell everyone can to live here
Grand Park City Hall.review_content: Everything very good and I loveAnd the Counter service staff very nice to help us. We are looking forward to the room now. And we came here with our friends good

The front desk service is so good! And we got early check in at 11:30. We got free drink to join a member. Its so gooodwe came here with friends and feeling chill. We are looking forward to the room now!

Grand Park City Hall.review_title: Great choice for first time travelers to Singapore
Grand Park City Hall.review_content: Great place in downtown, beautiful installations, food is delicious and the staff is super friendly. I arrived early and the staff allowed me to take breakfast and provided me with a room quickly without questions askedWould recommend anytime!

Kripa was really great doing everything she could to get us checked in early with our baby. Really sweet lady and understanding of the fact we had been on a plane for 16 hours. Had breakfast while waiting for the room and writing this review :).

Grand Park City Hall.review_title: Superb location and service. Made our trip in Singapore memorable.
Grand Park City Hall.review_content: Stayed for 6 nights. From arrival, we were greeted by the smiling Syahir. Very helpful. Check in was quick. Location was very good. Right across Funan Mall where we were able to get groceries and food. Grocery store at B1, big food court at B2.Hotel room atmosphere very good. Sound proof. We rested well. Service was good and fast when we requested for extra towel.Ismail and Syahir at the Concierge were very helpful.. always smiling and gave us the feeling that they were ready to help anytime and this was very assuring to us being from other country.Will definitely recommend this hotel to others.

Grand Park City Hall.review_title: Truly Rare Gem in the bustling city
Grand Park City Hall.review_content: Foods are unarguably tasty! Grilled octopus is a must try item. If you fancy a healthy protein option, go for the barramundi and chicken. Decent portion for the barramundi and generous portion for the chicken. Heaven-like taste. Beside the nice food, the staffs are genuinely nice and down to earth, special shoutouts to Nisha and JunWei, they even prepared the birthday cake to surprise my friend as it is her birthday.

Located in the hart of the city, Grand Park City Hotel makes a wonderful base to explore Singapore. We found the staff here provide a very high level of customer service and enjoyed our stay.Close to Clarke Quay and Fort Canning Park an easy walk away. Be sure to pack your swimmers as the pool here is amazing.

Leisure trip with friends for 1 night from Sarawak as a transit. Room is nice and pillow is nice. It's high but the softness just nice. Nice to meet fellow Malaysians like Louis and Kher Xian who are friendly here in this hotel. We learned that the hotel was renovated some time ago. Hope to see you all again.

Grand Park City Hall.review_title: Decent hotel in Singapore with good value
Grand Park City Hall.review_content: I'm very satisfied with the room and food- breakfast has good selection. Asian Indian Western but one suggestion- l prefer my food more spicy. Most Indians prefer more spicy food. Please take this into consideration. Stephanie who serve me at restaurant is good. Louis at reception is fast with check out and friendly. I will recommended my friends and family to visit the hotel

Overall the hotel was excellent.. The hotel staff were very polite and the dinning was nice... The room overall was good with all necessary amenities provided.. Except I recommend if the hotel could provide a flip flops since the floor was concrete. But I do recommend whether be a long or a short stay, please visit grand Park city Hall

Grand Park City Hall.review_title: My stay was made special due to a staff member
Grand Park City Hall.review_content: I loved the location , the room and the food. However what made it a really special stay for me was because of one of their concierge staff ismail. From the first time I met him he was so attentive and helpful it made me feel right at home . He was always there to assist with any information needed and was the most pleasant person I met during my entire stay here. If I visit this hotel again , one main reason would be because of him , as I already consider him a friend . Rajiv from Sri Lanka

Grand Park City Hall.review_title: What simple 5 star hotel should be
Grand Park City Hall.review_content: I always believe hotel amenities and services should be elegant yet straight to the point especially 5 star hotel. This hotel does not look like a 5 star hotel but the hotel pool is one of the best I have seen, not overly big but pretty. Cute lobby too. This hotel has complicated wall panel system. Took me some time to figure out how to work it. Great staff service especially bellman Ismail and reception Louis and Cuma. Nothing too difficult for them- well I am a simple man. There is a private lounge in the hotel- maybe I will try it next time.

Checked in for 1 night with my friend for business trip. Lobby was busy but the bellman was Quick to help. Arrival at the reception was quite fast. My first impression of the room was good but I was given a room very far from the lift. Maybe next time give a room nearer to the lift. Staf is helpful Louis and Tiffany when speaking to them. Hotel is close to major shopping malls so I had plenty to do.

The hotel location is good and the room is a good size with a really comfortable bed. The service and support had been been and I have no complaints at all! Worth the bucket and the food and drinks are good too. I would recommend the hotel to anyone!

The service was impeccable and timly during our stay in the hotel. Special mention to kripa and loy for assisting us with our requests. Would recommend anyone to stay in the hotel given the service and location. It's great location with malls and attaction. If u looking for Rolex watches the 2nd hand store is right beside the hotel.

Good location. Staff good. Conceirage good and helpful. Lornie and Syahir very good and informative. Hotel located centrally to all amenities. Visited many sites. Tip for visitors, buy a a travel card to travel by tram, bus and Trains. Very have and good value

On a private chartered flight and a quick layover in this hotel. I had a good experience. The staffs are so helpful. Hema and Louis are good. The rooms were nice and comfortable. The swimming pool is the best. One thing I missed a businesses center. Overall my experience in this hotel was quite interesting.

Grand Park City Hall.review_title: Good but problem too small to host guests and weddings/events at the same time
Grand Park City Hall.review_content: Hotel staff are very food and the rooms are fine. Breakfast is good too. Problem is that for both Friday and Saturday they had wedding parties that meant the restaurant and bar area were closed to regular guests.

Grand Park City Hall.review_title: We would come back in a heartbeat
Grand Park City Hall.review_content: Amazing location, stay, food and service.In the city, near garden by the bay, shopping malls next door, 7-11 next door. Easy to get around. Breakfast was good. Concierge was the best. Adam, Syahir and Lorine were all world class. Room was comfortable. Beds were comfortable. Water pressure in shower was on the lower side. Overall it was amazing.

Holiday Inn Singapore Orchard City Centr.hotel_name: Holiday Inn Singapore Orchard City Centre
Holiday Inn Singapore Orchard City Centr.review_title: A great place with delicious food
Holiday Inn Singapore Orchard City Centr.review_content: I would like to express my appreciation for the outstanding service provided by Mr. Sasi during my visit. He was attentive, courteous, and ensured that every aspect of our dining experience was perfect. I would also like to extend my heartfelt thanks to the chef for the delicious food; each dish was flavorful and beautifully presented, making our meal truly memorable .

Holiday Inn Singapore Orchard City Centr.hotel_name: Holiday Inn Singapore Orchard City Centre
Holiday Inn Singapore Orchard City Centr.review_title: Convenient in the heart of Orchard
Holiday Inn Singapore Orchard City Centr.review_content: Firstly a big thank you to Mr Raven who took my call at IHG hotline on 2nd June evening to secure a stay cation from 4th to 7th June for my family. Initially, I tried to book online but had some questions and decided to call in. His patience and professionalism enable me to book a stay cation for my family.Reception upon checked in was very friendly. Pleasant and everything was perfect for us. Less than 5 minutes walk to Centre point and Orchard Central. A good 10 minutes walk to Plaza Singapura. Convenient !!A Big shout out to Ms Lisa of housekeeping. Very cheerful and hardworking!! Ms Mina, a very sweet young lady at dinning for dinner . Definitely recommendable was their Pan Fried Salmon and Nasi Lemak ( chilli was fiery hot )My boys had a splendid time at the poolside. No poolside dinning was a letdown to them. Kids usually liked to have a quick bite and popped back to pool.Checking out was smooth and fast. As usual the warmth hospitality at the front desk marked the end of our stay cation, a very happy and memorable one.Thank you to all the staff!!From the Siew Family Room 529

Holiday Inn Singapore Orchard City Centr.hotel_name: Holiday Inn Singapore Orchard City Centre
Holiday Inn Singapore Orchard City Centr.review_title: Great food and ambience, and very friendly staff
Holiday Inn Singapore Orchard City Centr.review_content: The food was really good and delicious, and the ambience was very relaxing. The staff were also really friendly and accommodating, especially Mr Sasi Reddy. It was overall a memorable experience, and we will definitely come here again! Good place

Holiday Inn Singapore Orchard City Centr.hotel_name: Holiday Inn Singapore Orchard City Centre
Holiday Inn Singapore Orchard City Centr.review_content: The restaurant had impeccable service and quality. The food was delicious and there was several options to choose from. There was both vegetarian and non vegetarian. Sasi Reddy was extremely professional and reliable and made sure to tend to our wishes.

Holiday Inn Singapore Orchard City Centr.hotel_name: Holiday Inn Singapore Orchard City Centre
Holiday Inn Singapore Orchard City Centr.review_title: Cosy rooms with best Indian restaurant
Holiday Inn Singapore Orchard City Centr.review_content: Rooms are very big as compared to other similar hotels in Singapore.Best part is their Indian restaurant Tandoor. Food is good but the best part is the service. Team of Nitin, Sasi Reddy and Balbeer were very polite and taken very good care of my family. A very big thank you to the team and best wishes.

Holiday Inn Singapore Orchard City Centr.hotel_name: Holiday Inn Singapore Orchard City Centre
Holiday Inn Singapore Orchard City Centr.review_content: Sasi reddy is too good. Excellent service by him. Extremely good at catering to the needs of the customer service. Overall very much satisfied with food, services of sasi reddy. Very very Happy. Awesome food. Tasted delicious. Great experience

Holiday Inn Singapore Orchard City Centr.hotel_name: Holiday Inn Singapore Orchard City Centre
Holiday Inn Singapore Orchard City Centr.review_content: Sasi Redyy Service was excellent & food test also authentic indian style..good to be here will be back whenever I'll visit singapore.Specially masala chass was good and atmosphere of place amazing .Thanks for delicious food & hospitality.

Holiday Inn Singapore Orchard City Centr.hotel_name: Holiday Inn Singapore Orchard City Centre
Holiday Inn Singapore Orchard City Centr.review_content: Great service and very delicous food. Special thanks to Sassi Reddy for being kind and helpful to choose the best options. The restaurant is in Holiday Inn and the ambiance food and service is much netter then a standard hotel restaurant..

Holiday Inn Singapore Orchard City Centr.hotel_name: Holiday Inn Singapore Orchard City Centre
Holiday Inn Singapore Orchard City Centr.review_title: Just OK ... Nothing bad Nothing great !!!
Holiday Inn Singapore Orchard City Centr.review_content: The location is excellent at Orchard and close to the shopping district.The breakfast and the longe/club menu was pretty much on point .The concierge was also pretty good.The major issue i had is with the room with its low ceiling and smallish bed ... aint no way the 2 doubles bed was anyting more than an oversized twin bed.The other thing was we requested an early check in and was informed that the same wasnt possible due to unavailability of the rooms... Infact was told earest would be 1.00PM.Paid extra to get into a holding room and miraculously the originally booked room BECAME available at 10.45 Am. Well that could have been handled a bit better.OK if you are looking to stay at Orchard, however, will look elsewhere next time.

Holiday Inn Singapore Orchard City Centr.hotel_name: Holiday Inn Singapore Orchard City Centre
Holiday Inn Singapore Orchard City Centr.review_content: Go to Tandoor restaurant. The food is great and tasty. The service is also wonderful specially for Waiter name Sasi who has been serving us well. Will come again for the next time. We have ordered chicken dum briyani, butter chicken, dal and garlic naan. All taste great

Holiday Inn Singapore Orchard City Centr.hotel_name: Holiday Inn Singapore Orchard City Centre
Holiday Inn Singapore Orchard City Centr.review_content: A nice place to stay, but, our check in was terrible, the hotel has a policy that you have to pay SGD 100 if you want to use your room earlier than check in time, no exemption Well, its my policy as frequent traveler to stay in guest oriented and welcoming hotels only

Holiday Inn Singapore Orchard City Centr.hotel_name: Holiday Inn Singapore Orchard City Centre
Holiday Inn Singapore Orchard City Centr.review_content: Food was good.Staff was the best.Mr Sasi Reddy, who was service us was amazing. The menu had wide variety of options. The manager was very good as well. The ambience of the restaurant was a blend of modern and traditional. Overall, the whole experience was awesome.

Holiday Inn Singapore Orchard City Centr.hotel_name: Holiday Inn Singapore Orchard City Centre
Holiday Inn Singapore Orchard City Centr.review_content: Nice food, especially because we can get all Indian food here with Northindian taste, which is the plus point.Ambience is good especially Sasi Reddy and other staffs are helpful.They specifically prepared baby food for my baby.Definitely go for it.

Holiday Inn Singapore Orchard City Centr.hotel_name: Holiday Inn Singapore Orchard City Centre
Holiday Inn Singapore Orchard City Centr.review_title: Spacious rooms at a good location
Holiday Inn Singapore Orchard City Centr.review_content: This hotel truly lives up to IHG and holiday inn brand name. The room size is quite big as compared to singapore standards. It was a double standard room which had sufficient space to store big luggage as well as comfortable for 2 adults+2 kids.The room was quite well maintained with all needed amenities. The location of the hotel is also a plus point considering the presence of many shopping malls, department stores and accessibility to the 2 mrt stations which are less than 10 min walk from the hotel. The main advantage of the hotel is the good breakfast spread which also includes a live counter. It had good number of of options for vegetarians as well. We stayed for 3 nights and only on one day we had to wait for about 8 minutes to get seated which was still ok considering the weekend crowd. The staff in the restaurant were also quite courteous and helpful. The pool at the terrace was also very well maintained with hygiene. Overall i would rate the hotel a very good value for the money and would recommend it for all families visiting Singapore.

Holiday Inn Singapore Orchard City Centr.hotel_name: Holiday Inn Singapore Orchard City Centre
Holiday Inn Singapore Orchard City Centr.review_title: One of the best stays of my life!!!
Holiday Inn Singapore Orchard City Centr.review_content: Good location: Lots of shopping malls, supermarket, restaurants nearby. Also just a walking distance to Fort Cunning Park. Good service: Ms Ain and her team from Executive Lounge deliver really good service. She is a really fun person, always taking care of guests, smiling and speaking to them. Food at the lounge is really healthy, I personally liked the fresh fruits and vegetables very much. Gym and swimming pool: Located on top floor. Gym is small, hot, yet really cozy. Outdoor swimming pool is clean and nice. All staff there are very friendly, and ready to help. Guest room is very clean, quiet. Breakfast is great: good coffee, fresh fruits, delicious scrambled eggs and so on .... Tasted the freshly baked pancakes, delicious! Highly recommend!One of the best stays in my life, indeed!

Holiday Inn Singapore Orchard City Centr.hotel_name: Holiday Inn Singapore Orchard City Centre
Holiday Inn Singapore Orchard City Centr.review_content: Had our wedding banquet here. All was good. The banquet manager Vik n sales Jasmine help us alot thru out. Food was good as reviewed by all our guest. The service by the banquet servers were all good and all our guests were happy. The bridal room suite is cosy and good as well. They surprise us with complimentary dessert of a mousse cake, wine and a pair of wedding bear

Holiday Inn Singapore Orchard City Centr.hotel_name: Holiday Inn Singapore Orchard City Centre
Holiday Inn Singapore Orchard City Centr.review_content: I've been coming to this hotel for 12 years. Never know what you going to get. This time its very noticeable that the quality of food, service, value and standards have dropped. Some key staff have left and new staff are young and not so good with customer care and ethos. Particularly, the Executive Lounge is becoming a kindergarten for family and kids. I mean, come on kids in there PJs in an Executive Lounge!Hotel decor outdated but holds some class still. Food quality dropped and supplemented with cheaper types of food. Executive Lounge serves cheap quality labelled wines and spirits. My crew and I will relocate to a higher quality hotel that maintains standards for business types and contractors. This hotel is going 3 star to appease more families.

Holiday Inn Singapore Orchard City Centr.hotel_name: Holiday Inn Singapore Orchard City Centre
Holiday Inn Singapore Orchard City Centr.review_content: Recently I had a short stay at the Holiday Inn orchard center and I couldn't be more pleased with the experience. The lounge was cozy and inviting, and the service especially by Fiona, she was incredibly attentive and went above and beyond to ensure we were comfortable, also offer us a good Singapore sling.We also enjoyed a delicious dinner at the Indian Tandoor restaurant. The food was absolutely yummy, totally different from okinawa, my girlfriend and I completely satisfied and the service provided by Sasi and Nitin was impeccable. Both of them were attentive, friendly, and made our dining experience truly memorable.Overall, a 5-star experience. Highly recommend!

Holiday Inn Singapore Orchard City Centr.hotel_name: Holiday Inn Singapore Orchard City Centre
Holiday Inn Singapore Orchard City Centr.review_title: Fabulous hotel, great staff and location in Singapore
Holiday Inn Singapore Orchard City Centr.review_content: Excellent hotel. We chose a superior room with executive lounge access and were looked after wonderfully by Miss Ain and her team. We had breakfast, snacks, drinks and dinner as part of the lounge access - brilliant value for families with lots of choice and excellent food. The rooms are a generous size for a family of four with two double beds and a large bathroom.Hotel location is perfect for Orchard Road, shopping and MRT station. We would return just for the fabulous hospitality and welcome by Miss Ain! She makes the executive lounge the best experience

Holiday Inn Singapore Orchard City Centr.hotel_name: Holiday Inn Singapore Orchard City Centre
Holiday Inn Singapore Orchard City Centr.review_title: Best stay at Holiday Inn, Orchard Road
Holiday Inn Singapore Orchard City Centr.review_content: Holiday Inn provided prepared, comfortable rooms for my family and I to have an enjoyable, relaxing time in. The housekeeping was wonderful special mention to Tony who gave us extra water bottles without us even asking. We ate at the executive lounge each day which was an amazing experience. Another special mention to the waitresses Florence, Dyn and Ain who created a lovely environment by having conversations and getting to know us better. It was great to learn about where they were from and their many experiences. Overall Holiday Inn was an incredible place to stay and enjoy Singapore.

Holiday Inn Singapore Orchard City Centr.hotel_name: Holiday Inn Singapore Orchard City Centre
Holiday Inn Singapore Orchard City Centr.review_content: First of all we have a hard time to find halal resturant and unfurtanetly most of them not good food .. but here mr sasi and mr sudheer was so frindly to answer all our questions .. and very welcoming .. and help us to choose the food . And here comes the sheff mr dahran and bbhaldev they make for us the best food we had in singapore .. thank u so much we really enjoyed it it worth each seconde we spent and each dollar we pay .. thanks alot

Holiday Inn Singapore Orchard City Centr.hotel_name: Holiday Inn Singapore Orchard City Centre
Holiday Inn Singapore Orchard City Centr.review_title: Going Extra Mile Service on Our Silver Wedding Anniversary
Holiday Inn Singapore Orchard City Centr.review_content: It was a wonderful experience staying in the bridal suite at Holiday Inn. The staffs enthusiasm made our stay a pleasant one by providing us with GEMS going extra mile services for our convenience. The food room dine-in service was also incredibly efficient and delicious as well. In addition, the banquet event provided for our Silver Milestone Wedding Anniversarys reception was exceptional! The staff present were incredibly kind and ensured all the guests were contented. Having this being said , I would like to thank Banquet Manager Mr Anand and team (Banquet) as well as Ms Jasmine Ang (Sales Manager in charge) for ensuring the celebration was a Moment of a lifetime to Remember. Thank you Ms Jasmine for the flexibility & for smooth flow as the event was made perfectly more than our expectation. From the selection of Wedding Theme, to food tasting & so with Wedding favours, & even to the chair covers,& even providing the guests holding area, & so with Audio visual are perfectly in good condition. The event was outstanding and Im thrilled to have had our celebration at Holiday Inn. Its a thumbs up for both Ms Jasmine & Mr Anand & Team & to logistics & hotel crew & even to hotel service staffs! My hubby & I are thankful that we were given a right people, the right place & right time to our once in a lifetime: We Still Do-Renewal of our Wedding Vows on Our 25 years Wedding Anniversary!!! Thank you so much! Keep it up

Holiday Inn Singapore Orchard City Centr.hotel_name: Holiday Inn Singapore Orchard City Centre
Holiday Inn Singapore Orchard City Centr.review_content: Held our wedding there and everything went smoothly on that day! Special thanks to the Banquet Manager incharge: Anand & Team as well as the Sales Manager incharge: Jasmine Ang!! They were very friendly and nice! Had many enquiries and we did not know what to do but they guided us throughout and handled all our queries promptly! The food, venue and room was amazing as well! We had a smooth check in thanks to Nazri from the front desk too who provided great service! Thanks for creating a memorable wedding for us!

Holiday Inn Singapore Orchard City Centr.hotel_name: Holiday Inn Singapore Orchard City Centre
Holiday Inn Singapore Orchard City Centr.review_title: Friendly staff, good rooms, clean & unique.
Holiday Inn Singapore Orchard City Centr.review_content: Great location, beautiful surrounding atmosphere, great staff. Most friendly and helpful staff ever. Fridaus, Fiona and Dyn are lovely and made great impression of the hotel and the food offered in the executive club lounge is amazing. Everything about the hotel was exceptional. It was clean, stylish, and roomy. Great value for money and service was attentive and efficient. Room itself was well equipped and comfortable. I was very pleased with my stay. I hope to be back for a longer visit in the future.

Holiday Inn Singapore Orchard City Centr.hotel_name: Holiday Inn Singapore Orchard City Centre
Holiday Inn Singapore Orchard City Centr.review_content: Today have a great time with friend. Surprisingly the food is very very very nice. Convenient location, friendly staff, yummy seafood buffet! Would like to recommend to all my friends and family. If they are able to upkeep the food at warm stage, would be an adding point.

Holiday Inn Singapore Orchard City Centr.hotel_name: Holiday Inn Singapore Orchard City Centre
Holiday Inn Singapore Orchard City Centr.review_title: Window On The Park Crab Buffet
Holiday Inn Singapore Orchard City Centr.review_content: Cozy restaurant, great food and great staff. Definitely worth to come again! Special thanks to Chef Wei Chung, Chef Ashrul and his team. Shout out to F&B Team, Osveen, Aaron and Rames! Crab buffet was great, all the food items are fresh and buffet line is always replenished!

Holiday Inn Singapore Orchard City Centr.hotel_name: Holiday Inn Singapore Orchard City Centre
Holiday Inn Singapore Orchard City Centr.review_title: best service from firdaus dyn and daud during evening cock tail
Holiday Inn Singapore Orchard City Centr.review_content: the best hotel and service i ever had. thanks to firdaus, dyn and daud for the best service ever during evening cock tail. very friendly, nice and talkative. the best service ever. i want to stay at this hotel again. thank you so much

Holiday Inn Singapore Orchard City Centr.hotel_name: Holiday Inn Singapore Orchard City Centre
Holiday Inn Singapore Orchard City Centr.review_content: Quick checkin, spacious room, pillow options, very clean and most importantly great staff made my first stay a rewarding experience. Would love to return!

Holiday Inn Singapore Orchard City Centr.hotel_name: Holiday Inn Singapore Orchard City Centre
Holiday Inn Singapore Orchard City Centr.review_title: Very nice break in an excellent location
Holiday Inn Singapore Orchard City Centr.review_content: Excellently located on walking distance of main shopping malls in Orchard Road. Hotel and facilities are nice. Staff is excellent and super friendly and helpful. Nothing asked is too much. Our booking contained access to the Club Lounge and we really enjoyed our time there very much. Cocktails snacks are excellent and breakfast is complete. A special remark to Fiona who is doing far more than expected

Holiday Inn Singapore Orchard City Centr.hotel_name: Holiday Inn Singapore Orchard City Centre
Holiday Inn Singapore Orchard City Centr.review_content: Dyn is extremely friendly and provided the best service during my stay at this location. She is always smiling and has great attitude. Dyn really makes you feel at home even though you are traveling. She is an asset to this establishment and I look forward to seeing her when I visit again.

Holiday Inn Singapore Orchard City Centr.hotel_name: Holiday Inn Singapore Orchard City Centre
Holiday Inn Singapore Orchard City Centr.review_title: Be careful, this hotel will steal your money
Holiday Inn Singapore Orchard City Centr.review_content: If you're not paying attentionTheir POS will charge up to 5.5% for DCC I found this out when I checked out, So ask them to VOLD, But they refunded me $220 lessIt's too bad, it's robberyNever seen a hotel with such poor service!To make money by any means possible

Holiday Inn Singapore Orchard City Centr.hotel_name: Holiday Inn Singapore Orchard City Centre
Holiday Inn Singapore Orchard City Centr.review_content: Very affordable considering the wide range of delicious foods (e.g. sushi, salad area, Asian cuisines, western cuisines, desserts etc.), great service and ambiance. Only complaint is that the place is a little squeezy but otherwise, 100% would recommend to food lovers!

Holiday Inn Singapore Orchard City Centr.hotel_name: Holiday Inn Singapore Orchard City Centre
Holiday Inn Singapore Orchard City Centr.review_content: Waiting time for breakfast is 1 hr. We were a family of 4 people, there was a huge queue when we reached the restaurant at 9:30. We had to wait for more than 1 hour to get a table. If they dont have enough seating capacity, they should fix it instead of letting the issue prevail. Such low standards are not expected from Holiday Inn properties..

Holiday Inn Singapore Orchard City Centr.hotel_name: Holiday Inn Singapore Orchard City Centre
Holiday Inn Singapore Orchard City Centr.review_content: The food are very good and tasty. Importantly, food are warm and nann, roti are freshly made and hot. Butter chicken, Paneer, Crab curry are fantastic..Ambience is good, service staff Nitin was attentive, my company of friends very funny.

Holiday Inn Singapore Orchard City Centr.hotel_name: Holiday Inn Singapore Orchard City Centre
Holiday Inn Singapore Orchard City Centr.review_content: Rooms: I've been staying here since Jan'23 . Such a great experience and very good hospitality.I would like to thanks Bryan who took care of us very well.Food & drinks: Great service from the Executive lounge, The choice of foods are good and they have the food choices with healthy options . Great thanks for the Manager Fiona & staffs Firdus, Dyn & Dhuan for the friendly & kind service . Staying here since Jan'23never disappointed with their services .

Holiday Inn Singapore Orchard City Centr.hotel_name: Holiday Inn Singapore Orchard City Centre
Holiday Inn Singapore Orchard City Centr.review_title: A must stay for business trip and leisure
Holiday Inn Singapore Orchard City Centr.review_content: A good choice for either business or leisure stay with pleasant and great staff that always there to assist you whenever you have need support from them . The room are spacious , clean and hygiene .The great things about this hotel is the Executive lounge where they serve varieties of food and drinks. Shout out to the manager Ms Fiona and her team for the great hospitality and support.Will definitely come back again .

Holiday Inn Singapore Orchard City Centr.hotel_name: Holiday Inn Singapore Orchard City Centre
Holiday Inn Singapore Orchard City Centr.review_content: The attentiveness of staff and going the extra mile especially Firdaus and Dyn from the executive lounge which make our stay a surprising and memorable one.
