Making the double effort to surprise us with first birthday surprise for my wife and the second surprise on separate occasion for our wedding anniversary. Both surprises makes the entire family with kids felt special. Thanks and kudos to the company for having 2 great staff that really demonstrate a world class customer service! Thanks again to Firdaus and Dyn from Executive lounge!

Holiday Inn Singapore Orchard City Centr.hotel_name: Holiday Inn Singapore Orchard City Centre
Holiday Inn Singapore Orchard City Centr.review_content: Excellent service from Ramesh, Siri and Mina. Thank you for the team. The food spread was fabulous, but some of the food was cold. I love both hot and dessert buffets. I love the Rendang, durian pengat, durian pengat, and bread butter pudding.

Holiday Inn Singapore Orchard City Centr.hotel_name: Holiday Inn Singapore Orchard City Centre
Holiday Inn Singapore Orchard City Centr.review_title: Tandoor restaurant excellent traditional Indian cuisine.
Holiday Inn Singapore Orchard City Centr.review_content: Visited Holiday Inn Orchard Road to meet up with friends to have a meal in Tandoor Indian restaurant there. Quality traditional Indian cuisine served along with excellent customer service offered by Bala and Sasi. Recommend tandoori chicken, butter chicken and yummy garlic naan bread along with side dishes of lady fingers - okra and spicey cauliflower and potato. Reccomend a visit and you won't be disappointed!

Holiday Inn Singapore Orchard City Centr.hotel_name: Holiday Inn Singapore Orchard City Centre
Holiday Inn Singapore Orchard City Centr.review_content: People are ok and very friendly especially those who are at the lounge area. They are very attentive and patient. The area is also very clean and tidy. Selection of food is also nice and there are a lot of wine during the happy hour. Its worth the extra money were paying for the availment of the area

Holiday Inn Singapore Orchard City Centr.hotel_name: Holiday Inn Singapore Orchard City Centre
Holiday Inn Singapore Orchard City Centr.review_content: Holiday inn orchard center. Really good hotel. Very clean and well run all staff very helpful. The hotel bar man Robin made sure we felt at home and made sure we had drinks and food. Great location for every thing. Would recommend this hotel.Hope to stay again.

Holiday Inn Singapore Orchard City Centr.hotel_name: Holiday Inn Singapore Orchard City Centre
Holiday Inn Singapore Orchard City Centr.review_content: Beautiful hotel. The staff is the best I've ever seen. Executive Suite food was delicious . A very special thank you to Firdaus. He was so kind, friendly and helpful. He attire was always professional and handsome. He is awesome! We will be back again for sure.

Holiday Inn Singapore Orchard City Centr.hotel_name: Holiday Inn Singapore Orchard City Centre
Holiday Inn Singapore Orchard City Centr.review_title: A Gem of a Hotel, with Outstanding Staff!
Holiday Inn Singapore Orchard City Centr.review_content: We arrived early morning at this hotel after getting off a cruise ship in Singapore and stayed for four days. With our early arrival, it was no surprise we were not able to get into our room immediately. The lovely young woman at check-in who assured us that we would be able to get into the room within a couple of hours, suggested we go and explore Orchard Rd and that as soon as the room was available, our luggage would be put into our room. Taking her suggestion, we did exactly this. Orchard Rd. is only a block away and so we took advantage of the time and did some exploring.Upon returning to the hotel about 90 minutes later, we were greeted by the same young lady at check-in, who advised that our room was ready, and had been upgraded to a better view, overlooking the Prime Minister's residence's grounds and that our luggage had been taken to the room. We had purchased a Premium Room as we knew that it had lounge access, but didn't know exactly what this entailed. The room was spacious, with a lovely view and had all of the usual amenities. What we discovered, from the lovely woman at check-in, is this meant it offered a private lounge for breakfast and happy hour. The breakfast was fulsome, with a great selection of North American and Asian offerings. The happy hour offered an amazing selections of foods and plenty of drinks, both alcoholic and non-alcoholic. However, what made this so special, was the kind and considerate staff - Dyn, Jack, Fiona and all of the others who supported this lounge. They just took amazing care of us each morning and each evening! By the time we left after our four day stay, we felt like family. The hotel's pool was delightful, set on the hotel roof, sheltered with a large umbrella and very comfy chairs/ottomans and loungers. The pool was refreshing after a long day of exploring Singapore. To be honest, this wasn't our first choice of hotel in Singapore. However, due to increasing hotel room costs, it was the one that we selected. I am so grateful that our chosen hotel raised their room rates and we found this gem! From the time that we entered the hotel, until the time of departure, with the concierge taking care of arranging our taxi to the airport, we felt pampered and welcomed by their amazing staff! Thanks you for your wonderful hospitality!!

Holiday Inn Singapore Orchard City Centr.hotel_name: Holiday Inn Singapore Orchard City Centre
Holiday Inn Singapore Orchard City Centr.review_content: Family of four stayed here for 4 nights on vacation.. hotel was well appointed and service very good. Location is very good, lots of estuaries, plazas, malls nearby, east walking distances. Two MRT stations are nearby and easy to walk to.. one on Orchard road only 5 minutes and has interchange to three lines.. Our room cost included buffet breakfast for all four of us. Truly one of the best breakfasts anywhere! Great service, chef doing eggs/omelettes and pancakes/waffles to order.. large assortments of hot dishes, breads, pastries, cold dishes, cereals. Really impressive! We also used room service option from in house restaurant on 2nd floor. Ordered and I actually picked food up, very convenient. Great food and very reasonably priced! Front desk staff and concierge very helpful and accommodating. They organized cab pick up for 0430 on day we left and it worked perfectly! Our stay on 7th floor was very quiet, room very clean and comfortable. Wed definitely stay here again when visiting Singapore..

Holiday Inn Singapore Orchard City Centr.hotel_name: Holiday Inn Singapore Orchard City Centre
Holiday Inn Singapore Orchard City Centr.review_content: I had a very good experience overall. My room was beautiful & comfortable. 2 types of pillows were provided (soft & hard). Service was great: check-in/check-out processes, room service & cleaning, breakfast at Window on the Park, & service at the Executive Lounge. The spread at the restaurant & lounge was fantastic. Appreciate also the hours allowed at the lounge, with access to drinks till 10pm! Special thanks to Helena from the restaurant - she gave very good service & extend warm friendship to me & many other guests. Im very grateful to her. I would also like to thank lounge staff - they were all so warm & hospitable, especially the tall Malay guy whose service, like Helenas, was super good. Thank you! I enjoyed myself very much. Will be back, god willing.

Holiday Inn Singapore Orchard City Centr.hotel_name: Holiday Inn Singapore Orchard City Centre
Holiday Inn Singapore Orchard City Centr.review_content: Housekeeping is very clean and satisfactoryService is excellent and quick responseAll the staff answer questions or inquiries politely with very good serviceThe hotel location is great nearby mrt station and shopping center at Orchard road

Holiday Inn Singapore Orchard City Centr.hotel_name: Holiday Inn Singapore Orchard City Centre
Holiday Inn Singapore Orchard City Centr.review_content: Nice hotel with excellent free breakfast and rooftop pool. A highlight of my stay was spending a little time at the lobby bar. With floor to ceiling glass windows the atmosphere at this bar is very light and relaxing. Our bartender was Robin,a very conscientious and friendly guy who could prepare anything from your favorite cocktail to a delicious fresh ground cappuccino. His friendliness and great service really was the icing on the cake for our stay here.

Holiday Inn Singapore Orchard City Centr.hotel_name: Holiday Inn Singapore Orchard City Centre
Holiday Inn Singapore Orchard City Centr.review_title: Very good place to stay in Singapore
Holiday Inn Singapore Orchard City Centr.review_content: Very nice staff- especially in Executive Lounge! Rooms very clean and comfortable. Breakfasts and evening meals delicious!Swimming pool on the roof clean and available all day.Thank you Holiday Inn Singapore Orchard City Centre Team for your hospitality!

Holiday Inn Singapore Orchard City Centr.hotel_name: Holiday Inn Singapore Orchard City Centre
Holiday Inn Singapore Orchard City Centr.review_title: Best place to stay in Singapore
Holiday Inn Singapore Orchard City Centr.review_content: Great place. Very nice people working there. They go out of their way to please the customer. The rooms and property are extremly clean . Robin was our favorite bartender. Executive lounge and staff rates 10 out of 10. The food was excellent. The pool was beautiful. I wish Holiday Inn in USA were like this. Cant wait to come back again.

Holiday Inn Singapore Orchard City Centr.hotel_name: Holiday Inn Singapore Orchard City Centre
Holiday Inn Singapore Orchard City Centr.review_content: Me and my giril friend was served by Mr Robin. He was friendly, courteous, commendable and the Hi tea session was very pleasant and warm. The tarts, marocons served was good and the pricing for the Hi tea was reasonable. The environment was cool. Holiday inn should continue to have good Hi tea promotion such as 1 for 1 and the management should continue to have such friendly employee provide food sercice.

Hotel Indigo Singapore Katong.review_title: The best hotel in Katong area
Hotel Indigo Singapore Katong.review_content: This is one of the best hotels I have stayed in ( and I am lucky enough to have stayed in many across Asia). From the moment we checked in to the friendly and efficient service at Baba Chews ( shout out to Marivel, Mei Wen, Verna and Joan - so attentive and ready with great suggestions for my 5 yo), we have been made to feel special. The room is stunning, so many special touches and such consideration in the decor, it really is a special hotel. The location is perfect, everything in front of you, mall next door with a god supermarket and the rooftop pool- better than th photos! We will be back!

Hotel Indigo Singapore Katong.review_title: Cool Katong getaway with amazing pool
Hotel Indigo Singapore Katong.review_content: This is a great little hotel and I'll go so far as to say, a hidden gem in Singapore. For under $300 a night (a steal compared to most of the 'big name' hotels) you get quirky heritage design with still a whole load of comfort, a unique location on the doorstep of Joo Chiat and Katong, and an outstanding rooftop pool and bar with a view. It's not high luxury, but we've stayed at most of the 5-star hotels in the city and this is our second time back here for a staycation night away to check out this very cool neighborhood. Facilities in the room were excellent including the Illy espresso machine. Very friendly staff on check-in. We didn't eat or drink here, but In Bad Company next door for a cocktail is a must!

Brought our dog for pet staycay and its fabulous! Front Desk people to the housekeeping was super friendly and nice! The hotel is clean and the room are spacious. Good variety if breakfast and the fish soup was good! Thanks to Marivel, Meg,Simin,Venna, Alex for the hospitality! I will definitely recommend to anyone!

We had a pleasant holiday at Hotel Indigo Singapore Katong. The hotel's service is very good. The rooms are very unique and neat and clean. You can relax. The breakfast attached to the hotel is delicious and has many styles. You can have a theme. Again, the staff, Marivel Nathan and Christiaan Venna, are very helpful and have good service.

We've stayed at this hotel multiple times, and once again, our experience was sensational. Whether you're here for business or pleasure, the hotel, staff, and location are exceptional.A standout feature is the breakfast spot, Baba Chews, located right in front of the hotel. The entire team is dedicated to providing the best breakfast experience possible. Special thanks to Nathan, Tuan, Marivel, Mei Wen, and the rest of the crew for making our mornings truly outstanding. Can't wait to come back soon.

Had high tea at Baba Chews and it was a delight! They had the samples of the peranakan kuehs mixed with the western canapes. Ambience was cosy and relaxing. Service was warm and friendly! Thanks to Maribel and Thivyu! Will come back for more!The reception team at the front of the hotel was welcoming too! Overall, a great place to chill out.

This hotel's strengths and weaknesses were more or less as I expected from the reviews and location. Having been to Singapore several times already, we wanted someplace that was not a typical Western hotel in a typical tourist location, and this fit the bill. The neighborhood is fun to wander around in, with plenty of restaurants and local shops with interesting and colorful architecture That being said, it is not very central, and it took a slow $30 SGD Grab ride to get to the Gardens by the Bay area, which was too crowded to enjoy anyway so next time we'll skip it.The hotel itself was a nicely designed conversion of a local building, with plenty of character and ambience. Rooms are not huge, though ours had a nice interior balcony and spacious shower. Wish they had more rooms with bathtub available. Nice little box of chocolate as a welcome gift, maybe due to IHG status. Bed was comfy and most importantly the AC worked well but overall it is not a super high end room, but design touches were quite.Breakfast at Baba Chew's was pretty good but on the modest side; a very small buffet with limited choices for vegetarians though they did offer a nice a la carte paratha and dal dish that was not on the menu. Just don't expect a big five star buffet like you will get in the larger hotels.Front desk was friendly and helpful with any requests. Overall this is an interesting place to stay in an interesting neighborhood; just understand what you're signing up for. If uniqueness and character (as well as pretty good value) are more important than luxury for you then this place fits the bill.

Hotel Indigo Singapore Katong.review_title: Great hotel, good location for dining and shopping
Hotel Indigo Singapore Katong.review_content: Awesome bfast, speedy friendly service.Marivel was super welcoming and extremely helpful, remembered us from the previous day and helped answer all questions about the local area and how to get around Singapore.Rooftop pool area is lovely, great for a relax within the hustle and bustle of town.

Hole very friendly and helpful Very well welcome every morning from the breakfast team! Very food food excellent quality of the food .Nice hotel with comfortable rooms and a very nice roof top pool.In Katong you have a lot of good opportunities for dinner and you are in the middle of Singapore!Thx to all!

Stayed in room 913 from 9/6/24 to 11/6/24. Very pleased with the room which had a good view, it was also clean, spacious and everything was in good working condition.Breakfast at Baba Chew was satisfying; staff were attentive and efficient (from setting up the table, turning on the air cooler and taking our orders).Staff at the front office were polite, friendly and knowledgeable especially Mr Andy who checked-in for us and attended to us till our room was ready.The staycation at Indigo had been awesome. The only gripe I have is the smokers corner at the pet-friendly dining area of Baba Chew. On both days when we had our breakfast, we had to put up with the smoke and smell of cigarette and cigar smokers albeit for a short while. In fact, is smoking allowed at such close proximity of other diners?

Great hotel, in a very nice local neighborhood with stunning rooftop infinity pool and very nice decorative rooms, also great breakfast with good a la carte options and amazing staff in the breakfast restaurant (Marcel, Mei Wen, Faizal, Nathan, Amy)

I love this hotel and use it for all my trips to SG. Well located in the beautiful and vibrant Katong district, the service here is exceptional. The team in the breakfast area is special and will go above and beyond to make your start of the day the best. Highly recommend.

The bed is super comfortable. We already knew how pretty the room looked like but it looked so much better in real life! The interior design and layout was unique and while decorative did not feel messy or overwhelming. Everything was well thought out for both humans annd pets and there was nothing lacking in the room. Marive, Nathan, Venna and Faijal were very welcoming and helpful during our stay and the service made us feel very comfortable and taken care of. 10/10 recommend!

The hotel was clean, the staff friendly and the restaurant very good. Christian and Mariel went above and beyond to help and meet our needs. Located near good local restaurants and shops. We appreciated a water station in the lobby to fill our water bottles.

Having visited Singapore several times this is my favourite hotel. Nice location, lovely room and the breakfast is great. The hotel staff are all lovely as are Christian and all the staff in Baba Chews where we had breakfast. All very friendly and efficient. Would highly recommend staying here.

Hotel Indigo Singapore Katong.review_title: Exceptional Service and Quality at Hotel Indigo Singapore Katong!!
Hotel Indigo Singapore Katong.review_content: Mei Wen, Christian, and Marivel at Hotel Indigo Singapore Katong were absolutely wonderful. I'm very grateful to them because they made my dining experience very special every day! For instance, today I was hesitant to try Prata, an Indian dish, but they encouraged me, and it absolutely expanded my horizons Loved it so much that I went back for seconds! The food isn't just delicious and beautifully presented; it's also incredibly adventurous. I thoroughly enjoyed it. I even met the chef, who is fantastic. I highly recommend Hotel Indigo Singapore Katong to everyone. Their breakfast is amazing, and the rooftop is peaceful and beautiful. If you're looking for an authentic, peaceful, clean, upscale place for rest and relaxation, you should try Hotel Indigo. As someone in the travel industry, I give them an excellent rating.

Had my breakfast, during my stay in indigo . Thr service was amazing and thanks to Marivel, Christian, Amy and Mei when.The selections are good , try any of the egg dishes as well as the fresh orange juice.Choice of Asian and western is available

Hotel Indigo Singapore Katong.review_title: Well decorated comfortable hotel in a nice location
Hotel Indigo Singapore Katong.review_content: Very nicely decorated hotel and rooms in a part of Singapore we have not stayed before. While it is not in the centre of Singapore, it was only a $15 taxi fare (15 mins) to Orchard Rd shopping, and the area had a lot of character. The staff were generally excellent. The rooms were nice. The beds and pillows were very comfortable. The shower and other room facilities were very good - lots of room. The area was nice with a shopping mall adjacent and many good restaurants in the street outside. The infinity pool on the room and the roof terrace were both good. We were very comfortable at this hotel.

Great and fast service from Marivel, super friendly staff.I got the room upgraded and the view is super nice! Whenever i will be on business trip, this hotel will be my first choice, in terms of location, price, quality, especially cleanliness.

Came in for 3 day business trip and stayed at this hotel in Katong. Friendly and smiling staff, beautiful room, walking distance to a lot of shops, amenities. Breakfast was alright, decent spread (do ask for the menu) but I enjoyed the in room dining options a lot more.

There was a time when if you werent staying around Orchard Road in Singapore, you were nowhere. Times are changing.Indigo at Kalang, just 13 ks from Changi, a $25 cab ride is located out in the new Singapore. Its surrounded by an infinite range of eateries and fantastic cuisines at Kalang, not Orchard Road prices.Funky colourful and engaging decor, and a bathroom and shower with a glass wall and a view for blocks...both ways. Great breakfast.Take a walk over to the bay, count the ships I gave up at 87. Live the real Singaporean life for a short time. Its still as humid as ever, by the way.

Although we have reviewed this hotel before, we felt it is worth reviewing again since the standard has been maintained and we have had another lovely stay! The front desk staff and the staff in the morning at Baba Chews for breakfast are unfailingly courteous and helpful. The room is quiet and clean. The pool area is well maintained. Breakfast is delicious. We will definitely be back!

Enjoyed the stay together with our pet. Was served by their friendly customer service . Not sure whats his name but he was very professional . He even walk us up to the lift and explains all the Amenties in details Was served by Marivel , Mei wen and Faisal . they are very friendly and constantly checked on us. Thumb up for their professional and excellent service ??

Hotel Indigo Singapore Katong.review_title: Nice clean hotel on East Coast
Hotel Indigo Singapore Katong.review_content: Pet friendly hotel. Hotel room is clean. Bathroom is clean. corridor is clean no smells of pets in corridor or bedrooms. Friendly staffs. Thanks to Marivel, Venna, Christian, Amy, Mei Wen, Chet, Jade for servicing us at every breakfast. Will come and stay here again.

Hotel is perfect. Service is good and I like the breakfast., lots of varieties and you always find what you like..The gym and swimming pool are clean. The waitress very nice and friendly especially Marivel ?very friendly. Will come back with friends and family.

Good hotel to enjoy life. The Pool at the rooftop was super nice and there are a lot of food options right next to the hotel. To get to the City Center you currently have to take a bus, but I think singapore is currently working on a train station close to the hotel.

Highlights of the Stay:- Welcome pet amenities including sample kibbles, treats, a pee pad, a plushie, and more.- Two breakfasts and a $50 dining credit.- The staff were incredibly pet-friendly.- FnB staff are attentive and friendly to my furkid. Kudos and TY!Whisky (my furkid), had a fantastic time. The hotel is conveniently located within walking distance to East Coast Park (ECP), which has plenty of great dog-friendly F&B options. There's also a nearby dog run, perfect for some off-leash training.Overall, it was a wonderful weekend getaway. Will be back again soon.

Great service, comfortable rooms and good value for money. Great breakfast service and worth to mention Marivel and the rest of the team. The buffet beautifully display with wide variety to choose from. Freshly squeezed orange juice is a must try.

Marvel and Aeron were amazing! The drinks and service were exceptional. Visiting from the United States and I have been to several countries, but the way these two performed was the highest caliber of customer service I have ever seen. They talked to me, made me laugh, and gave me very helpful information on the IHG membership benefits. If you are looking for good conversation and amazing service, look no further!

Hotel Indigo Singapore Katong.review_title: This feels like a Quiet staycation in Singapore
Hotel Indigo Singapore Katong.review_content: The stay was great! Quite a nice getaway from the city and within Singapore! Havent been to Katong area for the longest time and felt like a tourist in out own city. Special mention to the breakfast at Baba Chews, to Marivel, Mei Wen, Nathan and Venna, who went above and beyond to check if everything is to our liking. They were very friendly and did their best.

I just got back from a stay at the Hotel Indigo Katong in Singapore. I really loved this hotel. It is impeccably decorated, both in the common spaces and inside the rooms. The care and attention to detail was obvious. The staff was polite and attentive, responding to every request with a smile. Breakfast at Baba Chews was delightful, including Christian who waited on us every day. We've already recommended the hotel to friends and family. I look forward to staying again!

The rooms were the cutest ever! Peranakan tile, the art on the wall, the mahjong table, all gave a distinctly Singaporean vibe. I loved the little details of the room. The staff was lovely. Walkable to restaurants and hawker center. I just wish we had more time.

The hotel room was amazing art decors,we was in the real singapore experienced. Breakfast staffs are friendly too. Clean,friendly and accomodating staffs. Thanks to Marivel, Mei Wen, Christian,Alex and Amy for being a nice hospitable to us.

Hotel Indigo Singapore Katong.review_title: My experience Igor staying in this hotel is one of the best??
Hotel Indigo Singapore Katong.review_content: The room design is unique and I love it, all the staff are very friendly specially those who are in the restaurant called baba chew, special thanks to the staff named Maribel and Faizal, they make my stay more pleasant, the pool is very nice and the gym too everything have an easy access to bus and it made my stay more meaningful. I highly recommend this hotel. Thank you

The breakfast at the hotel was fantastic! Marivel, Mei Qen, Amy, Cheistian, and Faizal provided outstanding service, ensuring our experience was exceptional. Their attention to detail and friendly demeanor made our stays delightful.

I had a delightful stay at this hotel, thanks to the wonderful staff who made every moment special. Each morning began with warm and friendly smiles, setting a positive tone for the day. I extend my heartfelt gratitude to Marivel, Mei Wen, Christian, Amy, and Faizal for their exceptional service. Their attentiveness and genuine kindness truly stood out, making my experience memorable. From accommodating my requests promptly to offering helpful local tips, they went above and beyond to ensure my comfort. The overall atmosphere was welcoming, and the hospitality was second to none. I highly recommend this hotel for anyone seeking a pleasant and enjoyable stay.

Loved my stay at Hotel Indigo. Immaculate rooms, superb service, and delicious food. Perfect location and incredibly friendly staff. Highly recommend for a luxurious and welcoming experience!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!

Hotel Indigo Singapore Katong.review_title: Awesome place with super friendly staffs
Hotel Indigo Singapore Katong.review_content: Had a very lovely stay here and all the staff are very friendly Especially the crew from their breakfast like Marivel, Mei Wen, Amy, Christian and FaizalThey made the whole experience very lovely and would definitely come back here again!!

The restaurant is great. Marvel Amy and Mei Wen Christicis Faiza gave me excellent service and attention. Xxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxx

My wife and I went to Baba Chews for lunch and was super well taken care of by Marivel, Christian and Venna. The food was super yummy as well, compliments to the chef. Marivel provided warm and attentive service, always going the extra mile to ensure my wife and I had a great time. She even introduced us to the other promotions like the high tea and facilities like the roof top pool. My wife and I was super impressed with Marivel. She is a great asset to the hotel.

Hotel Indigo Singapore Katong.review_title: fantastic hotel in a beautiful part of singapore
Hotel Indigo Singapore Katong.review_content: stayed here for 4 nights in April 2024. hotel is in a lovely part of singapore slightly away from the skyscraper hotels but only 10 mins or so in a taxi (we used grab which was was very reasonable). room was very comfortable with excellent air con. breakfast at baba chews was great - loads of options - we especially liked the squeeze your own orange juice station! rooftop pool was fabulous with shadedarea available- the water a perfect temperature and amazing views over singapore. overall a great hotel slightly different to the usual corporate style but in a good way!

Hotel Indigo Singapore Katong.review_title: This hotel is a welcoming work of art with so much charm
Hotel Indigo Singapore Katong.review_content: Beautiful hotel located in an area of town with character and charm. The Hotel Indigo Team are very professional, diligent and welcoming.Marvel is especially friendly and is a great host for breakfast at the hotels restaurant. If only she would say by real name :)

Service amazing Mageisha and Aeron , Excellent food . Cocktail made by aeron so good and recommended to try Nyonya margarita. Food potion is small. Will come try another cocktail. Restaurant air condition is very poor should need to improve
Very nice room with a Fine view about the Heritage of Katong. Especially we had a good experience with Marivel from the breakfast team. We could talk a little bit in German. Thank you

Excellent location, courteous staff. Amazing stay I had with the Hotel Indigo, The staff was very helpful especiallyy Ms Marivel Mei Wen & Amy Christian of Baba ChewsRestaurantt where i went daily for my breakfast. A big thanks for making my stay comfortable.

My sister and I visited SG last month and this April glad to see familiar faces such as Marivel, Christian and Amy are a star and a great asset to your team. Very friendly and nice people; the food are so good. Baba Chews and Hotel Katong is definitely a must place to visit if you come and visit Singapore.

We enjoyed a wonderful stay at this hotel. Special mention to the team at the hotel and restaurant.Marvel Christian Faisal was a stand out host at the restaurant. Her cheerful, friendly and helpful manner is to be commended and thanked very much

I have stayed at Hotel Indigo twice on a solo staycay and it has never disappoint. The smell, the aesthetics, the service - all top notch. A special thank you to Jamie & Nadelyn for the smooth check-in and out. All staff were friendly & courteous. Room was clean & spacious. Loved that they use refillable bottles as water bottles & offered a water refilling station near the lobby. Hotel Indigo is highly recommended.

Hotel Indigo Singapore Katong.review_title: nice and a very accommodating staff
Hotel Indigo Singapore Katong.review_content: went for 1 night staycation for my wife birthday, had a room upgrade and a birthday cake surprise, such a wonderful present.We enjoy our breakfast at BABA Chew special mention to Marivel, Christian. Merry & Faisal for a wonderful service.Thank you so much.

We had a free upgrade to our surprise, great start! Very polite and accommodating staff upon arrival and greeted us while walking in and out the lobby. The rooftop pool is amazing, had some splashing at night all to ourselves. The room was perfect, beautifully decorated, the shower room is placed very creatively in overlooking view, spectacular! The breakfast was sumptuous, we are very satisfied. Freshly squeezed orange juice is a must have. Thanks to very friendly and hospitable staff Marivel, Christian, Merry, Faizal! Great job you guys! Very highly recommend hotel!

Intercontinental Singapore, An Ihg Hotel.review_content: The hotel was excellent. The breakfast buffet was truly the best I have ever experienced anywhere in the world. Special shout out to the Concierge Miss Lynn Razak. She was super helpful and fun to work with - a rare gem!She was able to find things in the city that I just couldnt find. Its easy to make reservations but locating difficult to find items takes intent and hard work. Very much appreciated!!

My wife, 4 year old son had a blast at Intercon Singapore. Their hospitality is fantastic from the moment you walk in. The hotel is beautiful and is one of the oldest buildings. The lounge is fantastic and we thoroughly enjoyed the high tea and evening drinks. One of the amazing things was when their head butler, Mr. shrish saw my son coloring his PJ mask and then next day he did a beautiful sketch. My son loved the gift and these small things and the efforts do matter. Their breakfast is amazing as well. Overall, excellent stay and amazing service.

This was our first stay at the intercontinental and I absolutely loved it. The staff were incredible and couldnt do enough for us. The club lounge was comfortable with great facilities and again the staff was impeccable. I will certainly book again on my next visit.

My favourite were the arancini balls and the halibut fish. All the dishes were very aesthetically presented and tasted good! A very calming ambience. Presentation was good but abit lengthy. Overall was a pleasant experience. Staff were very polite and well presented too.

Wonderful experience at the hotel. We really enjoyed our stay with our family. Special thanks to Jenny and Elaine at Luce restaurant every morning who were so caring to our family. We will remember you and your caring service. Food was great too.

Intercontinental Singapore, An Ihg Hotel.review_title: A delightfully different and excellent hotel
Intercontinental Singapore, An Ihg Hotel.review_content: We stayed in the Intercontinental Singapore on our way to Europe in late April for three days and on our way home for three days in late June. There are hundreds of hotels in Singapore and I have stayed in many of them including the Hilton, Four Seasons, St Regis and Marriott. All are good but we found to our surprise that the Intercontinental was wonderful. First a hotel is its people and we found everyone friendly and more than expert in their roles and they seemed to genuinely care we were there which for a big chain hotel is surprising. Then the Hotel itself is so different from most hotels. The decor is Peranakan (Singaporean) in keeping with its location in the historic district of Singapore. The halls and Lobby are not the normal boring beige and browns of most hotels but stylishly colonial with cabinets displaying antique Peranakan ceramics and the picture collection likewise reflected Singapore culture. The upstairs corridors were beautiful with an enfilade of pillars as you looked down the corridor. And the rooms were large with nice big bathrooms, the rooms were all well appointed with a comfortable bed, loads of storage space and beautiful well maintained furniture. There are I think 6 restaurants in the Hotel and we dined in two of them the food portions were very large and the choices huge. The food was delicious and not too expensive. If you get bored with dining options at the Hotel or of you need something from a chemists or a supermarket the hotel is connected by a door off the lobby to the Bugis Junction Shopping Centre so you do not have to leave the air-conditioning to shop.My recommendation is to book rooms with access to the lounge. Not only is this one of the most beautiful lounges I have ever seen but the staff are highly attentive and always remember you with a friendly hello. The lounge offers a breakfast, afternoon tea and evening drinks. There is a small buffet at each but with each offering there is a menu so at breakfast you can order a variety of freshly cooked hot foods, at afternoon tea usually some kind of treat and in the evening hot canapes again freshly cooked and always a delicious bowl of nourishing soup! The drinks available in the evening were extensive too. The hotel is one block from Raffles, close to Clerk Quay and the historic district and no more than a $10 cab fare from either Orchard Rd or Marina Bay Sands. It was an ideal base from which to explore Singapore. We all agreed it was one of the nicest hotels we had stayed in on our trip and so different for a large chain hotel in that it was beautifully decorated and the staff always made you feel like you just belonged there, We will be back.

Overall the hotel was very good. The staff were very welcoming, friendly and helpful. The room was great as was the location. Would have rated a five had there been a better range of wine and/or beer from Australia or New Zealand at the restaurants.Also some cold water in the fridge on arrival wouldve been appreciated.

Absolutely flawless service and beautiful facilities. Stayed in the King Junior Suit with club room access where we enjoyed daily breakfast, afternoon tea and canaps with drinks in the evening. Zin was exceptional as were the entire club team, Anna, Kit and Kim. We felt welcomed by their warm and attentive hospitality. Would highly recommend and will certainly come back on future visits to Singapore.

Hotel: InterContinental Bugis, SingaporeDate: June 16 to 18, 2024One of the best InterContinental Hotel ive been through over my travels. Amazing well designed facilities for better living experience from lobby area, lobby lounge, rooms and specially the lounge. Great food selections in the club lounge specially breakfast and dinner. Superb services from the club lounge instantly recognized your food preferences specially for me im in low sodium diet. Room upgrade to highest floor with amazing view of Bugis area and indeed it has spacious place compared to those othe hotels I had in Singapore and very comfortable bed.Location are perfect for shoppers hotel directly connected to Bugis Junction shopping center and also for food lovers it has plenty of restaurants options all over the places in Bugis area. My main concern was the way the staff communicated their Ambassadors Guest. Ive been receiving daily emails asking hows my stay while I was still in the hotel. I would suggest to let their staff be more physically engaged during stay with their guest rather than sending regular emails. Club lounge was best place to meet and have short talk.Overall this hotel can give you the very best five star experience during stay in Singapore. Definitely a place to consider always to return during my next visit.

I just finished my second stay at this hotel in 10 years so I was long overdue for another visit. My experience here was even better than the last time. The room was lovely, the lounge and restaurant served extremely tasty food and, above all, the service was just flawless. Every staff person I interacted with was helpful, friendly and professional. My hat is off to the management of the IC Singappore--they are definitely at the top of their game!

The hospitality at the Club Lounge is beyond the call of duty. The manager Anna is not only knowledgeable but extremely accommodating, pleasant and efficient. I was very surprised and mentioned that there were no outlets by my bed to charge my phone and more importantly my CPAP machine. When I returned at the end of that day I found not only an extension cord but a side table arranged and a towel covering the extension line so I wouldnt trip. Help was also extended to my daughter who wanted to visit all the sites that were filmed in the movie Crazy Rich Asians. She helped arranged for a driver to visit a few of the places that were not within walking distance. Many thanks for your wonderful service?

I had an excellent redemption stay at this property, I was assigned a Junior Suite which is lovely to say the least and it come with Club Lounge access.The room is adequately sized with a spacious bathroom, however the shower stall is rather small.The Club Lounge is fantastic, shout out to the staff there especially Kamlesh for his excellent services.I love the decor of the hotel, there are strong Peranakan influences all over.

Lovely service. Very gracious and hospitable. Friendly and accommodating. They pay attention to the details. Anna, Kim, Zin, and Tony have been incredibly kind and attentive. We have spent 5 days in exceptionally good hands. Our 3 generation family of 5 felt very welcome and looked after in the Club.

Intercontinental Singapore, An Ihg Hotel.review_title: Wedding solemnisation ceremony at The Library
Intercontinental Singapore, An Ihg Hotel.review_content: We conducted our marriage solemnisation at the Intercontinental and are very glad we did, because the event was as close to perfect as humanly possible. From the outset we worked with the Events Coordinator Stefanie Heng, whose outstanding planning skills included taking care of all the fine details, scheduling and accounting for our preferences over the course of several meetings and WhatsApp chats. The actual event went flawlessly. The food (a 7 course Chinese banquet prepared by Chinese Chef Orlando and his team) was absolutely sublime, with matching wines. The room and table decor was exquisitely prepared with the specified floral arrangements, crockery. Special thanks to Jun Yi for helping set the sound and television equipment for our band. The serving staff (Boon Wee, Mugilan & Nazri) were discreet and professional in promptly delivering the plates to our guests (ably orchestrated by Andry the banquet manager) and ensuring glasses of wine and soft drink were filled. The wedding cake was skilfully created by Pastry Chef Jason according to our specification and was delicious, with delicate spongecake layers (vanilla and chocolate), buttercream icing and decorated with gold shavings. The entire event was our dream come true.

An amazing variety of food. It was an amazing experience as well as caters to food restrictions. Each dish was unexpected and definitely need to get a wine bottle to experience the whole journey fully. Definitely a filling meal. Timothy, jay and Anthony were amazing

Intercontinental Singapore, An Ihg Hotel.review_title: Unforgettable Wedding Banquet! An even more amazing crew
Intercontinental Singapore, An Ihg Hotel.review_content: My wife and I chose Intercontinental Singapore for our wedding banquet. The manager in charge, Stefanie, and the banquet in charge, Boon Wee and his team were nothing short of amazing!!! They were super re-assuring in helping us with the event flow and making sure our guests were comfortable and served timely. Our stay later with Intercontinental was lovely as well because the staff were attentive and timely in assisting us with room service and the room was super spacious and clean! I would highly recommend Intercontinental and would love to visit again! Thank u once again Intercontinental, Stefanie, Boon Wee and everyone in the team, it was because of u guys that my wedding was throughly unforgettable! Cheers!

We had the pleasure of staying here for four nights and loved every minute of it. The property is beautiful and the staff are incredibly friendly, the type that make you feel welcome no matter who you are. The location is perfect for anyone wanting to explore Singapore as its linked to Bugis Junction/station. Will definitely stay the next time I am in Singapore.

Very comfortable and spacious for a pet staycation. Room temperature is well monitored for furry pet. The bed and sofa is great, furry pet loves to stay put. It will be better the hotel can include dine in meals with pets in the selected restaurant rather in room.

Lobby Lounge - Peranakan, Birdbest High Tea. Great service by Hayden. Peranakan High Tea spread is a must try. The lobster sandwich, spicy, yummy.Bird nest High tea has great spread. Bird nest is tasty, sweetness level is good.We enjoyed ourselves, thank you.

We had a great day for our ROM, thanks to the friendly and supportive team that assisted us throughout ! During our initial phase, we had a tough time finding the right place, due to the date, timing and the right ambience and location for it.We are glad that we managed to find InterContinental for our ROM day!The food was great and we really enjoyed it!Special thanks to Stefanie the organiser and her team of colleagues and chefs that helped us made this event a success.

Being IHG Elite member and enjoying the Club lounge facilities, the stay has been impeccable to celebrate wedding anniversary, birthday and the youngest addition to the family. Thank you for the entire staff team at Intercontinental Singapore to make this stay memorable :)

Intercontinental Singapore, An Ihg Hotel.review_title: InterContinental Hotel - Compliment to staff Damien
Intercontinental Singapore, An Ihg Hotel.review_content: Dear InterContinental Hotel Management,I am writing to commend the exceptional service provided by your staff member, Damien, during our breakfast at your hotel in Singapore on 16 June 2024. On the occasion of our anniversary, Damien went above and beyond his duties to enhance our experience. His initiative to volunteer and create a delightful atmosphere was truly remarkable. Not only did he ensure our meal was perfect, but he also took the time to capture a beautiful photograph of my wife and me, creating a lasting memory of our special day. His attention to detail and genuine care for guests exemplify the high standards of hospitality that the InterContinental is known for.Warm regards,Lee

Intercontinental Singapore, An Ihg Hotel.review_title: Thank you for the AV support for wedding banquet event on 15/06/2024
Intercontinental Singapore, An Ihg Hotel.review_content: AV Jun Yi was the most helpful in setting up and testing audio and visual for the marriage banquet. On the fly requests and audio testing especially for the last min export of the morning gatecrash highlights were prompt and quick. Appreciate the help to make the event flow seamless and professional.

Intercontinental Singapore, An Ihg Hotel.review_title: The perfect 'soft landing' after 8 weeks' travel overseas.
Intercontinental Singapore, An Ihg Hotel.review_content: We were spoiled silly throughout our stay at the Intercontinental, in an environment that was quite beautiful, with both a buzzing atmosphere and a quiet stateliness depending on what we wanted and where in the hotel we settled. As Club members, we felt especially well looked after - every attention was provided by charming, highly professional members of staff. Decor, room, facilities, menu and drinks were all top class. We didn't want to leave!

Intercontinental Singapore, An Ihg Hotel.review_title: High tea at The Lobby Lounge
Intercontinental Singapore, An Ihg Hotel.review_content: Lovely ambience and high tea set. The food was delicious with free flow ice cream. The service was top notched. Special mention to John, Faez and Hayden for their warm, attentive service and introduction to the food. They also provided an extra cake for my friend's birthday celebration, which was really appreciated.

Intercontinental Singapore, An Ihg Hotel.review_title: A Delightful Stay at InterContinental Singapore: Don't Miss the Exquisite Menu!
Intercontinental Singapore, An Ihg Hotel.review_content: 1. The reservation team was very helpful. I booked the rooms through an agent and was unsure whether the reservation was valid. They promptly replied to my reservation verification email, which reassured me.2. The room service was excellent. I requested additional drinking water on the first day, and for the rest of my stay, I received four or more bottles of water each day after room cleaning. Thank you for the thoughtful service!3. The food was delicious. I tried the "late night snacks" menu and was pleasantly surprised by the tasty noodles, which were much better than those in the malls. The breakfast was very satisfying, especially the noodles.

We were only in Singapore for 1 night. What an amazing experience . The room in the Heritage wing was beautiful . We had access to the Club lounge . Kamlesh and his staff , Zin, Anna , Tony and Qiao Fei were outstanding . Their attentiveness and willingness to make our stay the best possible was wonderful . During cocktail hour my husband asked for a cocktail (Manhattan ) not in the menu and Kamlesh delivered .Thanks to all for making our stay fabulous even though short .See you next time .

John, Fariz and Hayden were attentive and helpful. Great ambience and fantastic food. Interesting food items inspired by birds nest. Really enjoyed our experience at the lobby lounge with friends. Looking forward to new theme for Hi Tea again.

Got a great service by Kamlesh at Club Intercontinental. Very attentive and always response to my request. He always serve me with a nice smile. The whole ambience and environment is very exclusive. A very pleasant experience for me in Club Intercontinental.

Intercontinental Singapore, An Ihg Hotel.review_title: Excellent hightea at the lobby Lounge
Intercontinental Singapore, An Ihg Hotel.review_content: Had a fantastic birthday hightea for mom and daughter at The Lobby Lounge.John served us and he was very patient, he also explained on how we should start the hightea set. He also helped to take fantastic group photos! Thank you John for going for the extra mile in making our hightea a memorable one.

Intercontinental Singapore, An Ihg Hotel.review_title: Superb service at The Lobby Lounge
Intercontinental Singapore, An Ihg Hotel.review_content: John has been very helpful and attentive when we had our hightea at The Lobby Lounge at Intercon! He ensured my kids are occupied by bringing coloring materials for them! Definitely great service! It made the experience even better when they brought out a birthday cake for my mum! Wonderful dining experience!

My wife and I held our solemnisation and wedding dinner at Intercontinental Hotel Singapore (80 Middle Road) in June 2024. We were truly amazed by the experience weve had on our special day. From the food, to the service and the beautiful solemnisation foyer, everything was excellent. All of our guests had a wonderful time!Special thanks to our Wedding Coordinator, Hui San, for the wonderful experience and assistance she has given to us from the moment we started planning for our wedding, all the way to the end of our stay. We truly appreciate it!Also, special thanks to our Banquet Manager, Mugi, for making sure everything was smooth during the dinner and everything was well prepared, especially our last minute adjustments to one of the tables. We cant wait to be back again for another stay at Intercontinental Hotel Singapore.

Kamlesh, Zin Waikit,Kim and Tony were very pleasant and helpful with local food recommendations. Club lounge Service was top notch with lovely fresh food . Thank you for all of your help Staff went above and beyond with service and couldnt have been more helpful.

Hotel Intercontinental Singapore Bugis is always my first choice when I am in Singapore. The rooms are well appointed, and the location is superb. What makes the hotel stand out, however, is its people. I have always had nothing but excellent service. This stay, I needed to host a colleague with specific dietary preferences and got great advice for vegetarian food options in the area. All the staff made my stay a really lovely one and I look forward to being back.

There are so many hotels to choose from in Singapore and having transited through the airport and stayed there many times we needed to decide on a city hotel for our two days en route from NZ to London. We loved the more traditional feel of the intercontinental but also the familiar modern touches and smells from our other intercontinental stays elsewhere. As many have said the welcome was warm from the delightful doormen to the reception team and the breakfast room staff. We arrived very early and after a coffee in the breakfast room our room was ready at 9am for which we were very grateful. The bed was extremely comfortable the room was spacious. We used the gym, the rooftop pool and had a drink in the peaceful lobby lounge. The breakfast buffet was excellent, so many choices and delicious food. Great location- we walked easily to Marina Bay, got the MRT to and from the Bugis station - the hotel is connected to the mall. We left planning to come back and would definitely stay again.

Intercontinental Singapore, An Ihg Hotel.review_title: Nur Aisyah And staff more than delighted!!!
Intercontinental Singapore, An Ihg Hotel.review_content: The stay didnt get off to a great start However, This is where service takes over and the training of the staff separates the adults from the children in this industry.. Nur Aisyah And staff not only reacted, but made me feel confident that they Cared about my relationship with IHG and sincerely wanted to ensure my business stay at this property, but my expectations plus. The property itself is one of the unique buildings that intercontinental has around the world. My usual go to New York is the Barclay. The property in New York very familiar given their care for restoration and traditional service. The room was lovely.

Stayed in about 20 singapore hotels so far and first time here. Well located in bugis area next to bugis mallHotel is old and i assume they renovated maybe 10 years back. Lobby has traditional look but ageing. They upgraded with an extra cost since im diomond ambassadorThe suite is junior thus smallish. Room doesnt have the most modern set up like electronic blinds or ipad controls. The bathroom is windowless and only 1 sink. The water temperature goes from cold to hot to coldBreakfast ok and i wrote a seperate reviewDidnt try the gym nor pool as i was too busyConference facilities good

Jeff was the first staff to greet us and he was the most helpful concierge staff. He showed us the meal locations and delivered our luggage. We were delighted to note the special decorations in our room and he helped us took photos for our anniversary stay at the hotel.

The Service was excellent. The check in was fast and courteous. The room was perfect & big. Soft bed and a big bathroom. The Lobby Lounge have a nice atmosphere and good cocktails and cakes. The room was always clean and the housekeeping very friendly. The hotel have a very good location. Everything is near - like the subway and a shopping mall. You have directly access as a hotel guest to the mall. Every person in this hotel is friendly and courteous. I booked a surprise for my fianc with Ballons,cake and flowers. Everything look perfect and it was a special surprise.

We will very warmly received at the lobby by the concierge and given good advice on our choice of perks. The twin room was splendid . What we needed were there . Food served at The Luce and Man Fu Yuan was tasty . The Luce pizza was delicious and the service at Man Fu Yuan was warm and genuine . We will visit again, definitely

Excellent service and location. Great access to MRT blue and green line. Staff was very attentive with every needs or requests. Great location minimal walk to raffles and Chimes. Will certainly stay here on the return trip.Several food courts in the area are within walking distance.

We had an enjoyable stay with Exec Lounge access. The lounge was nice, relaxing and food and drinks were great too. The room was on high floors and have a fantastic view. Nice touch with welcome back pastry and did not forget my birthday with a very nice pastry. Thank you. Will certainly recommend Intercontinental Singapore and will come back.

Intercontinental Singapore, An Ihg Hotel.review_title: Very Memorable and Awesome Stay at the Intercontinental Hotel (Bugis)
Intercontinental Singapore, An Ihg Hotel.review_content: the hotel was great especially the location. the hotel intercontinental club lounge was awesome with its great food and great service. kudos and thank you to Kamlesh, Ayisha, Zia, Kim and Tony for making our whole family feel right at home every day of our stay. Our family enjoyed every moment in the lounge and they have requested we stay at this samehotel and get the club lounge access again during our next stay in Singapore. thank you again!

Intercontinental Singapore, An Ihg Hotel.review_title: It's the staff the make it
Intercontinental Singapore, An Ihg Hotel.review_content: Thank you to the breakfast staff at the Intercontinental Singapore. We enjoyed the different food offerings that were provided daily. However, it was the staff who greeted us, brought our coffee or cleaned up after us who made our mornings and made us feel welcome. Sadly, I cannot remember everyones name, for those I do remember, a special thanks to Jenny, Neo, Shiela and Nanda and the rest of the team that worked with them in May thank you.Thanks also to Jeff and the others on the front door. We were always welcomed, offered water and they took great interest in what we were doing for the day. We thoroughly enjoyed these interactions and felt very welcomed.

The room is spacious and the bed and pillows are supper comfortable. The breakfast, afternoon tea and cocktails at the club are very substantial and scrumptious. The service staff Zin, Qiao Fei and Jenn were all very friendly and courteous and hard-working.

Dear InterContinental Team,Thank you for the support the team had rendered for our artiste group. The artiste has expressed their gratitude to the effort the hotel has put in and made the stay comfortable.Ronnie from concierge, Shimin from front office, thank you for making the check in process smooth and assisting the team to have their baggage stored at the concierge. Lending a umbrella and assisting in all the request weve made.Cheryl, Judy (hyeonju) & John from Lobby Lounge providing excellent service to the media team.Philip from Man Fu Yuan who helped us to prepare our last minute food order swiftly!And of course Carrie from Sales for arranging all the rooms next to each other making the planning process a lot more easier for the team! Could not have done it without the team from InterContinental!Heilo & KR Team is grateful and excited to come back when we have the chance again!

We always stay here when in Singapore. The staff are so courteous and the rooms are perfect. Our cases were collected and delivered to our room to coincide with our check in. We were allocated a quiet room away from the elevators as requested. The pool is great and excellent service was given to us for refreshments at the pool area.

We had our wedding celebration at the Grand Ballroom and it was everything we wished for! Staff were extremely reliable, from Stefanie hand holding us through the process in the lead up, to Fiona orchestrating the banquet with efficiency. The banquet team also handled the requests of the guests extremely well, and consulted us in a timely fashion if any changes were to be made. Overall, we loved the experience and will definitely return for future celebrations!

Our family trip first time in Singapore! Thank you so much for your hospitality, especially the housekeeping staff girl who cleaned up our room, breakfast was served nicely and very enjoyable. I would like to compliment Nadda - who was at the front door breakfast always welcomed us with a warm smile and immaculate hospitality

I had a great time at the Intercontinental in Singapore. I especially enjoyed a good night's rest during the three nights I was there. Travelling a lot, I have learned to appreciate the delights of a good hotel--a soft bed, wonderful pillows, TWG tea in the room. My checkout went smoothly, thanks in large part to Reda, who speaks 6 languages. He even loaned me his glasses when I couldn't find mine. Seriously, over and beyond!

JW Marriott Hotel Singapore South Beach.hotel_name: JW Marriott Hotel Singapore South Beach
JW Marriott Hotel Singapore South Beach.review_title: Beautiful hotel in a great location with staff who are extremely friendly and helpful!
JW Marriott Hotel Singapore South Beach.review_content: We stayed at this hotel as we planned to visit Universal Studios and other attractions in the area. On our first day, I noticed I had lost my phone; the staff went above and beyond all expectations to help me find my phone. They reviewed hotel security footage and even contacted the taxi company for me. Although they were unsuccessful in finding my phone, their efforts were greatly appreciated. Because of their efforts, I knew my phone could have only been one other place....the airport. Luckily, my phone was turned-in to lost-and-found at the airport and I was able to collect my phone a few days later. The staff's actions represent the hotel and Singapore in a very positive light. Thank you Marriott staff!!!!

JW Marriott Hotel Singapore South Beach.hotel_name: JW Marriott Hotel Singapore South Beach
JW Marriott Hotel Singapore South Beach.review_title: JW Marriott South Beach - The best choice to stay at.
JW Marriott Hotel Singapore South Beach.review_content: Returned for a 2 nights stay at the JW Marriott this year again. It was a wonderful and memorable stay as usual. Was checked in by Gabriel, with his most amicable and heartwarming hospitality services. He gave detailed information and was extremely helpfully throughout the stay. Manager Khazlynn and Rebecca were also very outstanding and customer service oriented. Thanks to them for the well elite recognition provided and the room arrangement made.The entire stay was perfect. Clean spacious room assigned, the Executive lounge was another key highlight too. The service provided by Renz was excellent, along with a good variety of drinks and servings. Highly recommended to stay here when you're in Singapore.

JW Marriott Hotel Singapore South Beach.hotel_name: JW Marriott Hotel Singapore South Beach
JW Marriott Hotel Singapore South Beach.review_content: My wife and I stayed at the South Beach Marriott Hotel where we celebrated our wedding anniversary (40th). We could not have been made more welcome. Everyone went above and beyond to make us feel comfortable and we had a fabulous time. The front desk people were great, the concierge made fabulous arrangements for us. The Fish Pool and Syrena, was a real treat and with food to match. Jeini and Freddie in the lounge made us feel as though we were staying with family. Ebb and Flow are surely some of the most luxurious pools anywhere in the World. I simply cant praise the hotel and its staff highly enough.

JW Marriott Hotel Singapore South Beach.hotel_name: JW Marriott Hotel Singapore South Beach
JW Marriott Hotel Singapore South Beach.review_content: A superb property, well appointed with easy access to the best of Singapore. My short visit was met with efficient, friendly and professional staff - it started with being met by the Lobby Ambassador - Andrew Wee. Fortuitously for me, Andrew was also on duty on my departure. He is a wonderful example of hospitality and servitude. He is an asset to the JW and made our stay that much easier. My now favourite Singapore hotel.

JW Marriott Hotel Singapore South Beach.hotel_name: JW Marriott Hotel Singapore South Beach
JW Marriott Hotel Singapore South Beach.review_title: Perfect location for business or leisure. Over the top executive lounge!
JW Marriott Hotel Singapore South Beach.review_content: Terrific location close to convention centers that can be accessed via underground mall systems, so perfect if its raining or too hot to walk outside. The rooms are small but well appointed with great views from high floors.Executive lounge is world class with generous breakfast, tea and longest happy hour Ive experienced 5:30-930 pm. You can basically eat all your meals here, but dont do it! Food in around the area and at Hawker markets is amazing.Hospitality was superb. Adil at checkin was so kind and able to get us both an early check in and upgrade. Nick at the lounge bar was super friendly and sweet.The gym and pool facilities were also amazing. Full workout equipment and weights to burn off all the amazing food. Cant think of if a better place for a business and leisure stay.

JW Marriott Hotel Singapore South Beach.hotel_name: JW Marriott Hotel Singapore South Beach
JW Marriott Hotel Singapore South Beach.review_content: Great service, great location, great view, great hotel. The concierge is very welcome to serve. The breakfast is really good there are too many menus. - Great service, great location, great view, great hotel. The concierge is very welcome to serve. The breakfast is really good there are too many menus.

JW Marriott Hotel Singapore South Beach.hotel_name: JW Marriott Hotel Singapore South Beach
JW Marriott Hotel Singapore South Beach.review_title: JW Marriott South Beach 5 Star Experience
JW Marriott Hotel Singapore South Beach.review_content: We had a wonderful experience at JW Marriott South Beach.Great welcome and staff were seamless throughout our stay.The Executive Club Lounge was amazing.Joanna and Jane ensured our needs were taken care of every time. Very impressive service, Thank you.Highly recommend Madame Fan ?? for an epic Singapore Chilli Mud Crab.Spa services, pools and sauna are epic.Suntec Shopping Cetrre and Raffles across the road.Easy walk to Clarke Quay.Great Stay. 5 Stars.Highly recommend ?

JW Marriott Hotel Singapore South Beach.hotel_name: JW Marriott Hotel Singapore South Beach
JW Marriott Hotel Singapore South Beach.review_content: JW Marriott South Beach is the best hotel in Singapore. Their service is super. We stay to celebrate my wife birthday and they set up the best decoration ever in our room.At first night the hotel is full, but the second night we got upgraded. Thank you for all the staff at JW Marriott south beach for making our stay memorable and made my family extremely happy.

JW Marriott Hotel Singapore South Beach.hotel_name: JW Marriott Hotel Singapore South Beach
JW Marriott Hotel Singapore South Beach.review_content: Fantastic hotel and service! As always it never disappoints and my second stay during last couple of years! I accidentally left a valuable item behind which I realised once I got to the airport. Called the hotel , they found the item and swiftly called me back and shipped it to New York . Food is fantastic and so is the hotel staff! Will be absolutely staying back in my next trip!

JW Marriott Hotel Singapore South Beach.hotel_name: JW Marriott Hotel Singapore South Beach
JW Marriott Hotel Singapore South Beach.review_content: Did a short staycay at JW and had a great time. Was checked in by Leong San who was so friendly and explained everything in detail. The bed was also really soft and comfortable. We were kept occupied throughout the day from all the facilities especially the ping pong table and the distance to suntec made it so convenient. Would definitely staycay here again!

JW Marriott Hotel Singapore South Beach.hotel_name: JW Marriott Hotel Singapore South Beach
JW Marriott Hotel Singapore South Beach.review_title: Top Tier Team and Property - Definitely Stay Here
JW Marriott Hotel Singapore South Beach.review_content: This was one of the best Marriott's I've ever stayed at. The location was perfect and the metro station under the hotel made for easy transportation around Singapore. Additionally a few key team members that made my experience were: Wilbur in the Concierge who had some great recommendations, Joshua in the Executive Lounge for the attentive and top notch service, and Talgat in the front of the house. Talgat clearly had experience in the industry (I'd guess Ritz Carlton based on the 'my pleasure') and the entire team overall was top tier. When I come back to Singapore, this will be my go to hotel. Thank you JW Marriott SG Team!

JW Marriott Hotel Singapore South Beach.hotel_name: JW Marriott Hotel Singapore South Beach
JW Marriott Hotel Singapore South Beach.review_content: Its our first time staying at JW Marriott Singapore. We loved the location, very close to Marina Bay Sands, Raffles Hotel and the MRT system. The view from the 18th floor swimming pool was breathtaking. Being a Platinum member allowed access to the lounge, which was simply amazing! We had wonderful breakfast and afternoon tea in the executive lounge. Our room was very clean, quiet and a complimentary rollaway bed came in very handy.

JW Marriott Hotel Singapore South Beach.hotel_name: JW Marriott Hotel Singapore South Beach
JW Marriott Hotel Singapore South Beach.review_content: This hotel had excellent staff - from the front desk to housekeeping. The room was immaculate and well attended. The front desk always gave a warm welcome whenever you walked through the door. The concierge desk was also very helpful for any sightseeing questions. The hotel was also in an excellent location. it was easy to catch public transportation, eat at a variety of nearby cafes, and shop in nearby malls. Would definitely stay here again.

JW Marriott Hotel Singapore South Beach.hotel_name: JW Marriott Hotel Singapore South Beach
JW Marriott Hotel Singapore South Beach.review_title: Platinum member stay in Singapore for leisure.
JW Marriott Hotel Singapore South Beach.review_content: Great location , fabulous staff giving a honest advice and providing superb service. Room maybe small but bathroom, especially the toilet special. It would be great if hotel have rooms with more storage space for guests staying longer , especially twin rooms , they are not eligible for an upgrade. Club food is fresh with hot and cold food available and staff are just exceptional . Nothing too much trouble. Jeini Vemal ( very beautiful lady ) is very professional, kind and helpful. Thank you

JW Marriott Hotel Singapore South Beach.hotel_name: JW Marriott Hotel Singapore South Beach
JW Marriott Hotel Singapore South Beach.review_title: Great overall lounge and pleasant experience.
JW Marriott Hotel Singapore South Beach.review_content: Lounge was abundant with food items for breakfast. Service was great and everything was clean. Was very satisfied with experience and made our stay at JW very pleasant. Wish we couldve stayed longer. Vemal Moorthy the manager personally stopped by to introduce himself and see how we were doing.

JW Marriott Hotel Singapore South Beach.hotel_name: JW Marriott Hotel Singapore South Beach
JW Marriott Hotel Singapore South Beach.review_content: Very helpful staff and welcoming environment. The hotel is well situated and offers a lot of amenities. My reason for 4 not 5 stars include: 1. No safe in the room, 2. the ability to designate do not disturb is electronic and malfunctions, and the lighting in the bathroom is good but not bright.

JW Marriott Hotel Singapore South Beach.hotel_name: JW Marriott Hotel Singapore South Beach
JW Marriott Hotel Singapore South Beach.review_content: Terrific hotel, impeccable service, great rooms. I would give special recognition for the outstanding staff at the Executive Lounge, including Jeini and Vemal. Early check in without a hassle, service was efficient and courteous. A five star stay, for sure!

JW Marriott Hotel Singapore South Beach.hotel_name: JW Marriott Hotel Singapore South Beach
JW Marriott Hotel Singapore South Beach.review_content: I absolutely love the JW Marriott South Beach. I've visited several times for work and brought the entire family this summer. The hotel's location is unbeatable. Right next to multiple malls, three MRT lines, and most major sites. Yet, it's surprisingly tranquila perfect place to relax and recover in Singapore.The hotel itself is stunning and modern, with a zen vibe typical of JWs. Jeini in the executive lounge is fantastic. She's treated us so well every trip. Vemal is equally amazing and always so helpful.Breakfast at Beach Road Restaurant is extraordinary. A delightful start to the day. The pool is beautifully situated on the 18th floor, perfect for a relaxing swim with an amazing view.

JW Marriott Hotel Singapore South Beach.hotel_name: JW Marriott Hotel Singapore South Beach
JW Marriott Hotel Singapore South Beach.review_content: Had our wedding here in May 2024. Venue was amazing and the staff were all very professional and organized. Shout out to Nutthee (Banquet in-charge), Thana, Eugene AV. Guests loved the food prepared by Chef Raymond and his team, only complain was that they couldn't finish everything!

JW Marriott Hotel Singapore South Beach.hotel_name: JW Marriott Hotel Singapore South Beach
JW Marriott Hotel Singapore South Beach.review_content: We celebrated our anniversary in this hotel and it did not disappoint! Communication was excellent and the service was top tier! The housekeepers left a note every time she cleaned and we could not have been more happy. I ordered balloons 3rd party to be delivered at this hotel and our concierge also arranged a cake and personal letter during my surprise. The best thing in this hotel is the executive lounge. Food was available throughout the day and the 2 hour cocktail hour had the biggest choices of alcohol. Breakfast was very delicious as well. Available for Platinum members and above. We truly felt special staying at this hotel.Shoutout to Jeini the VIP executive at the lounge for taking care of us and engaging/socializing with us.There is so much to do within the area within walking distance and grab/taxi was very affordable as well. Thank you again JW Marriott Singapore team and we cannot wait to visit again!

JW Marriott Hotel Singapore South Beach.hotel_name: JW Marriott Hotel Singapore South Beach
JW Marriott Hotel Singapore South Beach.review_title: Lovely hotel will definitely recommend it
JW Marriott Hotel Singapore South Beach.review_content: Beautiful hotel located centrally with easy access to all the tourist attractions. The property is well maintained and the views from my room were spectacular. The staff are very friendly and always ready to help with any questions l had especially Andrew at reception who was very informative. I had the privilege to use the executive lounge on the second floor for breakfast and dinner. The warm welcome when you arrived by Jeini and all the friendly waiters, the food was delicious and the cocktails were amazing will definitely recommend visiting the lounge for their delicious food.

JW Marriott Hotel Singapore South Beach.hotel_name: JW Marriott Hotel Singapore South Beach
JW Marriott Hotel Singapore South Beach.review_content: Lovely experience with the family. The hotel location is very good with good links to the metro system. Breakfast in the executive lounge very convenient and the staff are very friendly especially Jeini. Overall a very lovely experience at this hotel.

JW Marriott Hotel Singapore South Beach.hotel_name: JW Marriott Hotel Singapore South Beach
JW Marriott Hotel Singapore South Beach.review_content: Had a wonderful wedding banquet in the Grand ballroom. It was a dream wedding and we had great help from the staff during the entire evening, leaving us stress free to enjoy every moment with our friends and family.Thank you JW team, especially Angela who took special care of the brides every need!

JW Marriott Hotel Singapore South Beach.hotel_name: JW Marriott Hotel Singapore South Beach
JW Marriott Hotel Singapore South Beach.review_title: Amazing hotel with even more spectacular service.
JW Marriott Hotel Singapore South Beach.review_content: Spectacular service by staff. While the hotels location, room and amenities are outstanding, it is the level of service that makes this hotel amazing. Shout out to Andrew Wee, lobby ambassador, for giving his all in making our stay a pleasant one with his impeccable service.

JW Marriott Hotel Singapore South Beach.hotel_name: JW Marriott Hotel Singapore South Beach
JW Marriott Hotel Singapore South Beach.review_content: From the moment we arrived at the JW South Beach, we received top notch service. The front staff was welcoming, professional and accommodating. They upgraded us to a beautiful premier room on the 17th floor with lovely views of Marina Bay. The executive lounge was phenomenal with a very attentive and friendly staff. The food quality was superb with so many options and stations to choose from. This was the best experience that we have had at any Marriott hotel in the world. Special kudos to the concierges team and the staff in the executive lounge for making our stay so memorable!

JW Marriott Hotel Singapore South Beach.hotel_name: JW Marriott Hotel Singapore South Beach
JW Marriott Hotel Singapore South Beach.review_content: My wife and I had an awesome experience. We celebrated a belated anniversary milestone and were treated to a special experience.The hotel upgraded our room for our special occasion and the guest relations team ( Natasa & Kelly) did some special decorations to our room to make our stay something very special and memorable.The staff is very friendly and went out of there way to make sure were being taken care of. The concierge desk was helpful and very knowledgeable of the local places to eat. Wilbur took the time to find out what foods we Iiked and made an extensive list of places to eat.If you have elite status and have access to the executive lounge, it is tremendous. The food is top restaurant quality. The service is high-end restuarant quality. The staff is super friendly and attentive to all your needs. This is by far the best executive lounge I've experienced.From the front deck to house-kepping the staff is friendly and professional. They work really hard to ensure you have a great experience at their hotel.I would highly recommend this hotel.

JW Marriott Hotel Singapore South Beach.hotel_name: JW Marriott Hotel Singapore South Beach
JW Marriott Hotel Singapore South Beach.review_content: We stayed at the JW South Beach and celebrated our daughter's 8th Birthday in Singapore. Helen and the team arranged for a beautiful and delicious cake, balloons and card for our girl which was a lovely and personalised touch to her day. Hotel is beautiful and clean. Their buffet breakfast was delicious, Aliff provided excellent and professional service.Their pool on 18th floor has incredible views of the whole city and a connecting bar and their pool on 6th floor in East Tower is beautiful and naturally warmed. My daughter taught herself to swim here, so it's great to have this memory in such a special place.Kelvin the pool attendant is a gentleman! He lent our daughters some floaties which made their pool experience even more special.Location is beautiful, close to shops and attractions of SG!We will return for sure!

JW Marriott Hotel Singapore South Beach.hotel_name: JW Marriott Hotel Singapore South Beach
JW Marriott Hotel Singapore South Beach.review_title: Memorable Wedding night @ JW Marriot South Beach
JW Marriott Hotel Singapore South Beach.review_content: Had my wedding at JW Marriot South Beach and it was the most memorable night for my wife and I! Chanel Tan was our event manager and she was helpful throughout the process (from signing of contract till end of event). On the wedding night, the crew behind the scene, mainly Eshan (Banquet in-charge), Maran (2nd in-charge), Eugene (AV), Chef Raymond and his kitchen team were exceptional and kept the show running like clockwork. As our irresponsible wedding planner (The Wedding Concepteur) quit on us 2 months before our wedding, we had to coordinate everything by ourselves. Eshan was extremely helpful briefed us thoroughly and made sure that the banquet went smoothly and assisted us throughout the evening. He also checked on us and kept us calm before the march-in, reassuring that everything will go smoothly as everything was quite hectic.
