The guests all complimented how good the food were - we were glad that Chef Raymond and team maintained the consistency. What we had during the food tasting was what was delivered on the very day. It became one of the most memorable evenings of our lives and the efforts were all worth it. The hotel stay was also very pleasant for us and our guests who came overseas.Thank you very much to the JW Marriot crew for the great experience! Calvin & Samantha 18 May 2024

JW Marriott Hotel Singapore South Beach.hotel_name: JW Marriott Hotel Singapore South Beach
JW Marriott Hotel Singapore South Beach.review_content: The hotel delivers what it sells. Great location, good service, beautiful view from the infinity pool at the top floor, etc.The executive lounge makes everything better/easier in the sense that you don't need to leave the hotel if you don't want to for any reason. Selection of food and beverages are among the best I've seen in this kind of hotel lounge.All the staff, especially Mr Vemal Moorthy, we're very helpful throughout my 4 days stay. Intend to come back.The only minutes in this hotel is the lobby area. It's narrow and, although I like the style, it's not very welcoming. It has a rather business look. But then, it's in the business area anyway...

JW Marriott Hotel Singapore South Beach.hotel_name: JW Marriott Hotel Singapore South Beach
JW Marriott Hotel Singapore South Beach.review_content: The Executive Lounge at JW Mariott South Beach is simply excellent. The cozy seating, food selection, and cocktails couple well to create a great vibe. Great spot to work or just relax. Staff are amazing especially Vemal, Jeini, and Freddy.

JW Marriott Hotel Singapore South Beach.hotel_name: JW Marriott Hotel Singapore South Beach
JW Marriott Hotel Singapore South Beach.review_title: Great place to celebrate our wedding anniversary!
JW Marriott Hotel Singapore South Beach.review_content: We had a fantastic experience at the JW Marriott Singapore South Beach. My wife and I celebrated a wedding anniversary while we were here, and thanks to Kelly and the rest of the Guest Relations team, this was a special stay to remember. In particular, Kelly was very helpful and responsive to prepare the room in advance of our arrival, including helping to receive a floral delivery and ensuring it was placed in the room ahead of time. The property is superb, including our daily breakfasts at the Executive Lounge. Location is good as well as its walking distance to 3 different MRT lines (with only about 2-3 minutes of the walk outside with the rest inside). Thanks again to everyone at JW Marriott for helping to make our stay incredible!

JW Marriott Hotel Singapore South Beach.hotel_name: JW Marriott Hotel Singapore South Beach
JW Marriott Hotel Singapore South Beach.review_content: I am absolutely amazed by the service at JW Marriott Singapore! Special thanks to Mr. Andrew Wee from the lobby ambassador team. He was incredibly helpful every time I needed assistance. When I asked for directions to the Armenian Church, he went above and beyond by walking with us to show the way. This was especially helpful as I was navigating the city with two toddlers. His support made our stay feel like home.Additionally, I want to extend my gratitude to Mrs. Jun Na from Housekeeping. Her attention to detail is unparalleled. Despite our extensive travel experience, I have never encountered someone so meticulous. She noticed I wear glasses and thoughtfully left special cleaning towels for them. She took exceptional care of everything during our stay.A special mention also goes to Sous-chef Daniel Teo. My kids loved him, and he took such good care of us, making our dining experiences enjoyable and stress-free.Thank you very much for the wonderful experience. I look forward to coming back soon!

JW Marriott Hotel Singapore South Beach.hotel_name: JW Marriott Hotel Singapore South Beach
JW Marriott Hotel Singapore South Beach.review_content: I really enjoyed my stay, the hotel it self is beautiful - The suite was very spacious with great amenities.Walking distance from the botanical gardens and close to all the tourist spots.Including the executive lounge in your stay is an absolute must, Jeini provided top tier service and was lovely to chat too. The manager Vemal leads a great team and is also on the floor attending to any of your needs.Would recommend to anyone travelling to Singapore, Ill be back in 6 months thanks so much for a lovely stay.

JW Marriott Hotel Singapore South Beach.hotel_name: JW Marriott Hotel Singapore South Beach
JW Marriott Hotel Singapore South Beach.review_title: Lasting Memories for a Special Celebration
JW Marriott Hotel Singapore South Beach.review_content: I had the most exceptional experience at this hotel for my mother-in-law's 80th birthday, my niece and my brother-in-laws birthdays! The three rooms were decorated magnificently, striking a perfect balance between simplicity and sophistication. The window view was breathtaking, overlooking the iconic Marina Bay Sands and the serene Singapore River. The cleanliness of the rooms was impeccable, and the little touches made the celebration truly unforgettable. To top it off, there was champagne waiting for my mother-in-law and wine for my brother-in-law. The presence of cakes, balloons, and personalized greeting cards for each celebrant added a special touch to the occasion.The attention to detail and thoughtful gestures from the hotel staff made our stay truly memorable. I would highly recommend this hotel to anyone looking to create lasting memories for a special celebration. Thank you for making this milestone birthday celebration so magical! Special mention to Donan and Nat from Guest Relations Team and Felicia from At Your Service Team.

JW Marriott Hotel Singapore South Beach.hotel_name: JW Marriott Hotel Singapore South Beach
JW Marriott Hotel Singapore South Beach.review_title: Pleasant stay in the city centre
JW Marriott Hotel Singapore South Beach.review_content: The hotel locates within a composite development with residential, office and retail. Very convinence with direct linkage between the hotel and MRT Station - Esplanade. Luxury guest rooms with very good amenities including spa facilities. Just not to stay in those rooms facing the courtyard as the sound proof is not so good, music from the bars during night time is quite annoying. Luckily, the hotel able to change another room for me on the other side of the tower and things went better. Spacious Spa with very relaxing environment, no other guest using the Spa at noon during the weekday in my stay, free to use other facilities in the spa such as the jacuzzi after my massage treatment.Two swimming pools in the hotel and I prefer the one in the lower tower with better seatings along the pool.Could try one of the restaurants in the hotel - Arika Back. Japanese fusion food with bit of Korean taste, bit spicy. Better to ask for recommendation from the staff and think they can offer the best to suit your taste. Personally like "AB Wagyu Tacos" and "Perfect Storm"Generally a pleasant stay.

JW Marriott Hotel Singapore South Beach.hotel_name: JW Marriott Hotel Singapore South Beach
JW Marriott Hotel Singapore South Beach.review_content: Fabulous stay at this property. One of the best Executive Lounges that I have ever been to with top notch customer service and attention. I want to personally thank Jeini, Vemal, Nichil, Freddy, Saw, and Christina as they are true examples of excellence.

JW Marriott Hotel Singapore South Beach.hotel_name: JW Marriott Hotel Singapore South Beach
JW Marriott Hotel Singapore South Beach.review_content: Ambassador service is outstanding Andrew wee was above and beyond in attitude and attention to detail Will recommend this place to my work colleagues The amenities are over the topI recommend the eating outlets as well Transport is easy to get and drivers are friendly

JW Marriott Hotel Singapore South Beach.hotel_name: JW Marriott Hotel Singapore South Beach
JW Marriott Hotel Singapore South Beach.review_content: Wedding - My sister held her wedding here in April and it was excellent. The ballroom was grand and impressive. The services provided during the wedding were great and I would like to thank Noah (Banquet Manager) for assisting me in the wedding. He helped in ensuring that the wedding went smoothly with minimal hiccups. After the wedding, he ensured that our things were brought back safely to our hotel rooms. Staycation - A shoutout to the front desk - Khazlynn for making our check-in smooth and pleasant. The rooms were clean and had good amenities. Breakfast was awesome with the variety of spread. Overall, the staff were polite and welcoming. This whole experience was enjoyable and satisfying. Thank you to all those who had interacted with me and my family.

JW Marriott Hotel Singapore South Beach.hotel_name: JW Marriott Hotel Singapore South Beach
JW Marriott Hotel Singapore South Beach.review_title: At the high-end of a high-end hotel
JW Marriott Hotel Singapore South Beach.review_content: We normally don't write reviews for the major chain hotels unless one strikes us as particularly good or bad. This Singapore Marriott South Beach was very, very good. Numerous touches add up to a well-above-average experience: post-check-out access to a lounge; beautiful carpets and chandeliers throughout; great restaurants (Akira for dinner; most expansive breakfast buffet imaginable); complementary shoe shines; colour-changing elevator (first time have ever commented on an elevator); comfortable, spacious rooms with ample closet space; and fantastic staff that go out of their way to make everything work seamlessly.

JW Marriott Hotel Singapore South Beach.hotel_name: JW Marriott Hotel Singapore South Beach
JW Marriott Hotel Singapore South Beach.review_title: The Best Value Executive Club Lounge & So much to enjoy at the hotel!
JW Marriott Hotel Singapore South Beach.review_content: Before I visited the JW Marriott, I explained that I am 99% blind and will require some assistance at breakfast and whilst in the executive lounge. I also like quite a specific breakfast and asked if they can arrange this for me with this advance notice. The hotel has 2 towers. Tain tower and East Tower. The East Tower mainly has studio rooms and the remaining room categories including suites are in the Main Tower. There are a total of 634 rooms with about 47 suites. Marriott Bonvoy Elite members (Platinum, Titanium and Ambassadors) can access the club lounge. Elite members will need to have their breakfast in the lounge otherwise they will need to pay a surcharge if they want to eat at the main restaurant. Normally the cost is $45++ for adults, children aged 6-12 pay half price and elite members get a small discount and pay $35++ (this may vary as it is a promotion). On arrival, I was checked in by Sabrina Lau who was thorough and very accommodating to my needs (being registered blind). I should mention that I am an Marriott Bonvoy Ambassador Elite member and received a complimentary upgrade to a beautiful corner Suite! Take a look on YouTube at love flying and hotels. I was also offered a late check out but declined as I had a special flight booked from Singapore to London in Singapore Airlines First Class Suites at 09:00am and you can also check this out on YouTube soon. I was also offered a welcome gift, local snacks or 1,000 bonus points. I chose points. My room was 796 square feet or 74 square metres. It really was stunning. I then explored the hotel starting off with the executive lounge. This lounge is probably the best lounge in the world in terms of value for money and also had excellent service! The reason why I say it is the best lounge is because they serve breakfast, afternoon tea and evening cocktails and light bites. This may seem familiar with other lounges BUT, there is far more variety and the premium items. For example, at breakfast they had blueberries and at evening cocktails they had Makers Mark (bourbon), Chivas Regal and normally they serve Tiger beer but despite running out of this, they served Peroni! They could have just said they are out of beer although this wouldnt go down very well!There are 2 towers and 2 pools! This is nice in case one pool was too busy! They were also games like ping pong, pool and table football. There are a number of upscale restaurants and bars, live music, mermaid show and more, so you will have plenty to do for a good few days! I would definitely revisit and I recommend a try!

JW Marriott Hotel Singapore South Beach.hotel_name: JW Marriott Hotel Singapore South Beach
JW Marriott Hotel Singapore South Beach.review_content: I am new to Singapore ???? and the JW Marriot South Beach. I truly enjoyed experiencing the culture of the country, and the wonderful employees at the hotel. I enjoy workingout outside, but do to the concentration of rain daily, I decided to visit the gym. Upon my arrival Mr. Andrew, who works in the gym area took time to ensured to make all of the guest feel welcomed, as he shared his expertise on health and fitness. His delightful and kind spirit radiated as we conversed not only about workout plans, but the popular places people visit in Singapore????. Thank you so much Andrew for your excellent customer service, and I hope you can one day visit the Kingdom of Bahrain ????.

JW Marriott Hotel Singapore South Beach.hotel_name: JW Marriott Hotel Singapore South Beach
JW Marriott Hotel Singapore South Beach.review_content: Such a lovely hotel , staff were really lovely couldnt do enough for you,We were lucky enough to have executive lounge access which was very pleasant Rooms were very clean beds and pillows were very comfortable Very close to mrt so we could get around easily

JW Marriott Hotel Singapore South Beach.hotel_name: JW Marriott Hotel Singapore South Beach
JW Marriott Hotel Singapore South Beach.review_title: Heavenly living experience at JW Marriott Hotel Singapore South beach
JW Marriott Hotel Singapore South Beach.review_content: I was at the Hotel from May 1 to May 6, 2024 during which period I used the Gym. I must say that my stay at the Hotel has been my best Hotel experience ever! The staff are generally over professional, caring, and ready to go any length to provide clients with more customised and personalised needs. The Gym instructor (called Malcom) on duty took his time to sit me down to give me lectures on appropriate exercise routines to meet my needs. He actually provided me with notes on these, and by the time I returned for my next Gym visit, he had already mentioned me and my needs to his colleagues at the Gym to assist me on that day, and other days he will not be at work. On one of such visits, I had a terrible stomach upset during my work out and vomited just at the entrance to the Gym. Honestly, I was expecting angry staff approaching me on what I did, but to my surprise, the Recreational Centre Supervisor himself (Andrew Lau), Rose and a Security Officer on duty came to help me up on my feet as I was lying on the floor. They constantly asked me if I was okay and needed to be taken to a medical officer. I insisted that I was fine, and they cleaned up the place and took me to my room to see me settle in. The next day, I was served a letter by the Hotel Manager, to check on my well-being and to ask me to either call the front desk and come over to see the staff just so that they can see me physically and confirm that I was okay. In addition to this, a large pan of assorted fruits and coconut drink was served to my room (free of charge) to help me recover. This experience, plus the conduciveness of the Hotel, make my stay there heavingly!

JW Marriott Hotel Singapore South Beach.hotel_name: JW Marriott Hotel Singapore South Beach
JW Marriott Hotel Singapore South Beach.review_content: I stayed on mid of April to celebrate my birthday. They prepared nice cake with lovely decoration :) Kudos to Front desk team (Talgat, Khazlynn, Vemal, Leong San, Sunny, Jerry, Cindy, Janna and Christine) for smooth check in and check out ! Thanks for bright smile which made my days! Also, the pool on 18 floor has an AMAZING view with some activities! I want to come back to celebrate more occasion in the future!

JW Marriott Hotel Singapore South Beach.hotel_name: JW Marriott Hotel Singapore South Beach
JW Marriott Hotel Singapore South Beach.review_content: I recently stayed in JW Marriott Singapore and my experience was exceptional!Greeted by Front Office Team and they showed us what an excellent service we are supposed to be expecting in a luxury hotel.I would like to extend my appreciation to the team members behind the phone calls. They have been amazing during my entire stay!Magnificent service team! Will definitely be coming back!

JW Marriott Hotel Singapore South Beach.hotel_name: JW Marriott Hotel Singapore South Beach
JW Marriott Hotel Singapore South Beach.review_title: This was a business visit, I came to attend the conference in Singapore. This was my first time in Singapore however it was amaz
JW Marriott Hotel Singapore South Beach.review_content: I had the best experience. They have very good customer care. The staff are so friendly and welcoming.They give you directions of what you need to know. They help you with whatever you need, everyone would smile. There is this staff member named Andrew, who is very helpful.

JW Marriott Hotel Singapore South Beach.hotel_name: JW Marriott Hotel Singapore South Beach
JW Marriott Hotel Singapore South Beach.review_title: If you are visiting Singapore you got to stay at JW Marriott Singapore South Beach!
JW Marriott Hotel Singapore South Beach.review_content: An exceptional stay! The JW Marriott boasts an unbeatable location, impeccable staff, and top-notch service. Having previously lodged at The Marina Bay Sands, I can confidently say that JW Marriott is a standout choice. Access to the Executive Lounge surpassed all expectations, making it the pinnacle of lounge experiences worldwide. For optimum indulgence, opt for a room with Bay View and Club access. The accommodations are exquisitely comfortable, complete with luxurious bathrooms featuring bathtubs. A stay here promises nothing short of perfection. C UNAL

JW Marriott Hotel Singapore South Beach.hotel_name: JW Marriott Hotel Singapore South Beach
JW Marriott Hotel Singapore South Beach.review_content: One of the best hotels in singapore and probably our top choice, and weve stayed in >15 five stars here over the yearsThe location is very good next to the raffles city mallThe suites have large windows including the bathroom so its bright during the dayWrote a seperate review for the breakfast restaurant. The lounge is also large and good for breakfast though all the kids and babies are allowed in as well, but no tank topsSmall pool and gymGood service throughout9/10

JW Marriott Hotel Singapore South Beach.hotel_name: JW Marriott Hotel Singapore South Beach
JW Marriott Hotel Singapore South Beach.review_content: Nice comfortable suite, great amenities, excellent breakfast - the blue pea nasi lemak is a must have. Would definitely recommend

JW Marriott Hotel Singapore South Beach.hotel_name: JW Marriott Hotel Singapore South Beach
JW Marriott Hotel Singapore South Beach.review_title: The best Marriott Ive stayed at.
JW Marriott Hotel Singapore South Beach.review_content: I have stayed here twice now. If and when I return to Singapore, I will stay here. The staff is service oriented, highly professional, respectful and capable.The location is walking distance to many fun things to do in the main downtown area.5 star.

Marina Bay Sands.review_content: I have stayed in many hotels in different parts of the world. However, this hotel is wonderful with its top quality performance, front office attention, service attention, restaurants and pool. I couldn't find anything to criticize about anything. Yes, it's a little expensive, but it's worth it

Marina Bay Sands.review_title: Impressive Service and Facilities! A Once-in-a-Lifetime Experience!
Marina Bay Sands.review_content: My Uncle & I visited Singapore on a 2-day stop-over, on our way to Siem Reap, Cambodia. My Uncle hasn't been to Singapore in over 30 years, so I decided to stay splurge and stay for 2 nights at the most iconic hotel in Singapore. We arrived at the hotel by taxi from Changi airport at around 11.30am. The doormen helped us to take our luggage from the trunk of our taxi the minute our taxi pulled up at the front entrance of Tower 1. We were then escorted to the check-in counter and there wasn't any queue at all that morning! While we were in the process of checking in, a friendly staff member came around to offer all the arriving guests complimentary bottles of drinking water and Chuppa-chupps lollipops(a popular candy in Asia)! I have traveled around the world, never before has any hotel or resort ever offered their new guests Chuppa-chupps candy!!! As per our booking, we were allocated a twin-bed room on a high floor with a view of the Gardens by the Bay. The check-in process was completed in 7-minutes and our room was ready right away! No need to wait until 3pm like some other previous guests had lamented.The room was magnificent, clean, comfortable and spacious, with all the amenities you would expect from a 5-star hotel, plus breathtaking views from the ENORMOUS balcony! This was the first time that we have seen a sofa set(a 3-seater & 2 single seaters) on a hotel room balcony!!! The room also included complimentary mini bar drinks and snacks, which will be replenished once a day during the housekeeping service. We could also request for additional bottles of drinking water, which we did, because we spent a fair bit of time walking around Singapore and the weather here is hot & humid.The world-famous infinity edge swimming pool is as spectacular as all the photos on social media has portrayed! We were fortunate that on the day we took a dip in the iconic swimming pool, it wasn't overcrowded and we managed to get some great photos from this facility. Guests will be given 2 pool towels & a bottle of drinking water upon registering to enter the pool. IMPORTANT NOTE: Each guest has to hold 1 individual key card which was issued by the check-in counter upon checking into the hotel, in order to be allowed to enter and use the swimming pool. If you are a couple who are traveling together, both of you have to produce an in-house hotel room key card each, in order to enter the pool. The management has to be very stringent with everyone who wants to enter the swimming pool because in the past, some outsiders have tried various ways to sneak into the iconic swimming pool. The famous botanical garden called Gardens By the Bay is connected to this hotel. We took a stroll to the Super Tree Grove to take some photos but we didn't enter the Cloud

The hotel room was nice and spacious. We had booked a Gardens by the Bay view, but upon checkin we were "upgraded". However we could not see what the benefit of the upgrade was and the view was from the opposite side of the hotel from a low floor which left us with an undesirable view of the valet area for the shopping centre. That aside, the room was comfortable, the staff were polite and the amenities were great. I recommend using the infinity pools at sunrise as the space is next empty and the views are phenomenal. If I were to stay here again, I would confirm where the upgraded room was.

One of the best hotels in the world. Period. The urban views, their service and the amenities are second to none. When there, a visit to the Banyan Tree spa is a must. Pure relaxation and beauty. And Jeab gave the best Thai massage you could imagine.

The gym has great facilities and very clean. Staff are friendly and provided great service. Roselyn has a great personality and is very friendly.The only thing is it is quite fa from the hotel.Overall great experience and I will come again.

I'm absolutely thrilled with the wellness classes and the serene venue where they take place. The atmosphere alone enhances the experience, making each session truly rejuvenating. I wanted to share my enthusiasm and also suggest an idea: it would be fantastic to include sessions tailored for kids, and perhaps even some parent-child bonding activities. This could create a wonderful opportunity for families to enjoy wellness together, fostering both health and stronger relationships. Thank you so much for considering this suggestion. I eagerly anticipate the possibility of these new offerings. Every time I return, I notice how diligently you implement improvements, which speaks volumes about your commitment to excellence. It's truly refreshing to see such dedication and innovation.

Excellent service hotel very warmly and very nice view .I am stay at Marina Bay Sand in Singapore. Very clean my room everyday.Ms. Poe Ei Phyu is very excellent service for me .She is very warmly and very hopeful. I am great recommend for her. All staff is excellent service . Two days I am stay between she is warmly family like that . My mind is very wonderful and surprise . Thank you so much Marina Bay Sand. Next time I am come to Singapore I will be staying this hotel

Marina Bay Sands.review_title: A wonderful beginning of your day!
Marina Bay Sands.review_content: It was an amazing experience of sunrise yoga on the 56 floor! Highly recommended to all who loves yoga/ morning/ sports vibes I loved the atmosphere. Very quiet, not too many people, very peaceful. I will definitely visit the class when Im back in town.

Highly recommend Marina Bay Sands Singapore for everyone who is looking for a comfortable stay in Singapore.Me and my family stayed at the Suites in MBS Singapore for one night in June. Not only the luxuriousness and tidiness impressed us, this 5-star hotel should also be credited to its staff who provide visitors with professional service. I would like to give my special thanks to Jevic Navidad, the Ambassador of the hotel. He is awesome, very helpful and provided us with many valuable information travelling Singapore; kind and patient to our kids, making us an amazing trip!

We stayed in a Premier Suite with the City View. The view from the room was perfect as we could see the light show at night, and also we got to enjoy the fireworks on Saturday right in front of us. The Premier service was overwhelmingly incredible, personal welcome from a dedicated person, in-suite check-in, transfer to and from the airport, and a person at the airport to help us with the luggage and also show us around. They really thought of everything and the service was impeccable. The room was so beautiful and spacious. It was my birthday week so they sent up a beautiful and delicious cake and also a bottle of champagne! We will definitely visit again. Thank you, April!

Marina Bay Sands.review_title: The end of a happy journey.
Marina Bay Sands.review_content: With the morning sunrise, sound meditation became the driving force of the day, and it remained a meaningful memory, making it a happier journey.The sunrise seen at Sand Sky Desk was so beautiful and I highly recommend it as a very satisfying experience.Thank you for making unforgettable memories on NBS.

This place looks amazing from the outside but it is also a first class experience if you are a guest.We pre- registered as requested so no queues for check in. We were met by Favid Fernandez who showed to our rooms which were fantastic.He was also so helpful at various times with bookings and general advice.A superb stay in a superb hotel

Honeymoon Heaven at Banyan Tree SpaCelebrating our honeymoon at Banyan Tree Spa was the perfect choice. The luxurious ambiance and attentive staff instantly put us at ease. We opted for the Deep Tissue Massage, hoping to release travel-induced tension.The skilled therapist worked their magic, targeting our knots and tight muscles with expert precision. The pressure was firm yet soothing, melting away our stress with each stroke. We both felt incredibly relaxed and rejuvenated afterwards.Beyond the massage, the spa's facilities were equally impressive. The tranquil relaxation area, complete with plush loungers and soothing music, was the perfect place to unwind before and after our treatments.Overall, our Banyan Tree Spa experience was an unforgettable part of our honeymoon. The combination of exceptional service, skilled therapists, and luxurious facilities made it a true oasis of tranquility. We highly recommend it for any couple seeking a romantic and rejuvenating escape.

Lovely session with Mr Karu who took care of everyone wonderfully with his healing presence. Accompanied by his sound healing instruments. Beautiful views. My friend and I are lucky with good weather on this morning. Thank you very much, I hope others continue to benefit from this.

Roselyn Was very nice and kind, the service is wonderfull and the structure very goodThe academy is NiceThe amenitys are good. Fantastic!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!

This review is for the Marina Bay Sands gym. Firstly, I must say wow! The service they provide is genuinely first-class. The gym is a good-sized hotel gym with ample cardio equipment, machines, and free weights. It is spacious, clean, and well-equipped with towels and disinfectants. The bathroom and changing area is cleaner than my own bathroom (which is saying something). They offer complimentary amenities to freshen up. Lastly, the staff were incredibly helpful and attentive throughout my visit. They offered to get me water, make me coffee, and even provided a mat for me. A big thank you to Oddie, Uma, and Lucy for making this trip to the gym so memorable. For those staying at Marina Bay Sands, free classes are available on the observation deck in the mornings. Marina Bay Sands

The masseuse is very well trained and execute the massage very professionally. Good environment and view for you to enjoy. Facilities are all well equipped. They even provide a best photographer to help us take photos! Love the experience

The price is not the cheapest but it is definitely the best massage experience. Worth the price. Therapist, Sheryl is really skillful. Anita the service staff is also very friendly and helpful. If you would like to spend some money and really pamper your self, its the place to go!
Excellent service! Good massage and the masseuse very friendly. Highly recommended to everyone!

This spectacular structure was an amazing hotel to stay in. The staff are friendly and I want to give a special shout out to Madarai who was a guest service agent. He was very helpful and friendly. All in all the staff around the hotel were excellent. It is a massive hotel/ shopping mall which has the infamous infinity pool ( a must do whatever the weather). The Gardens by the Bay were spectacular, although one night the lights were not dancing to music- technical glitch, but you may not know that of it's your first time there! The Banyan Tree SPA is luxurious and Ce LA ViE rooftop is magic. Definitely go there! A heads up, you have to be a guest staying at the hotel to access the infinity pool and sky bats:)

We stayed here a long time ago, this is a delayed review. We booked 2 rooms, one family room and one deluxe. I treated my parents for their 50th wedding anniversary reminiscing their memories many many years ago. They used to live and had their wedding in Singapore. My father was not keen on height so my mother stayed in their rooms when we went to the infinity pool and enjoyed the fantastic panoramic view of Singapore from the roof top. Quite blowy at night so gave a bit or relieve to the hot temperature (30ish Celsius)

Marina Bay Sands.review_title: One of the best experiences of your life
Marina Bay Sands.review_content: This is a once in a lifetime experience - I mean, I've done it more than once - but this place is so surreal, that it needs to be on your bucket list. From the immaculate check-in experience, to the beauty of walking into your room 40+ stories high.... the Infinity Pool is a moment, setting up on a deckchair, ordering cocktails and food... enjoying the pool itself. Can also highly recommend Lavo - amazing seafood buffet. Also - as it was honeymoon they gifted us cake and champagne. Impeccable.

Marina Bay Sands.review_title: Exemplary service- truly a bucket list experience!
Marina Bay Sands.review_content: The experience we had staying at the Marina Bay Sands was like no other experience we have ever had. The team truly do go above and beyond to make your stay as memorable as possible. We received a message from the Premium Service Team on the morning of check-in. They arranged a complimentary pick-up service, and upon check-in we were told that we had been upgraded. As it was our honeymoon the team had left a bouquet of flowers, balloons, a cake and bottle of wine in our room to celebrate! They made the stay feel so incredibly special and we cant thank the team (especially Eunice) enough for helping make our stay so memorable.Aside from the exemplary service, the room was spacious and packed with amenities that just made us feel at home. Finally the pool is soo incredibly special. The views are stunning and we happily spent most of the day soaking in the sights and relaxing.The Marina Bay Sands is iconic and staying exceeded all our expectations.

Great service, beautiful views, lovely morning yoga class at skypark. Near to gardens by the bay, lots to do there - flowers, night rhapsody, borealis. Would love to be back again . ..................................................

The entire experience was really great Both the receptionist, May, and the spa therapist, Crystal, are nice and helpful, taking care of me through the entire spa journey. It was so relaxing and refreshing. Snacks are provided after the spa.Greatly appreciate it and definitely worth a visit!

Marina Bay Sands.review_title: An experience not to be missed
Marina Bay Sands.review_content: Highly recommend staying at MBS, even if its just once in your life for the experience. It is truly amazing 5 star destination. The infinity rooftop pool is a pinch yourself moment. Recommend Pilates & body flow class on the observation deck watching the sun rise.

It is my first time staying with MBS and Im celebrating my girlfriends birthday. Honestly, it is the best experience I have ever had. From the booking to the actual stay at the hotel, the staff from premium services team are first class, they help me with all my requests and is very very helpful with my questions. Special shout out to Eunice from Premium Services Team, she is the best. My girlfriend and I really appreciate everything she does from picking us up at our limousine service to escorting us to our room, she explain and showed us around the room with great spirit and wonderful energy. Honestly, there is nothing negative about the overall experience even the in-room dining timing are accurate. It is first class hospitality and I will definitely return back to celebrate another special occasion. Thank you team MBS for everything and Thank you so much Eunice from Premium Services Team.

There was a waiter/assistant named Shirley at the poolside. She was absolutely great and made my day! The service was perfect, and when I needed to move to a better place (covered), she organized that in a minute. This place is amazing with the amazing service

Wonderful experience! My massage was curated to my exact needs by Piya. Exactly what I needed after a long plane ride! Rest of the staff was also professional and accommodating to make the overall visit great. I would revisit again during my next visit to Singapore.

I was hesitant if I should go or not at first but 100% worth it! It was such a lovely way to start the day! It was the most beautiful view and such a relaxing class and I felt so good afterwards. Ida was our instructor for the morning and she was really calm and understood what we needed the first thing in the morning. Highly recommend!

love the gym ambience, staff was really helpful & friendly! special shout out for Lucy as I get to meet her few times during my stay. Workout was tiring but with her I felt better & encouraging! overall the mbs has been friendly & make the guests felt warm & homely!

Marina Bay Sands.review_title: Many nice places in Singapore with great service but this is just better
Marina Bay Sands.review_content: Spectacular place to visit. We have stayed at other venues in Singapore that have great venues and service and I struggle to fault them. However Marina Bay Sands just seems to do it even better. Classy rooms, great pool, awesome personal service. I cant wait to come back (i have actually changed my next holiday to stay here again on my next holiday in 2024).Consider upgrading to a better room/suite and getting free breakfast, afternoon tea (2pm 4pm) and canapes/drinks (5pm 7pm).Thank you Marina Bay staff for making our stay so enjoyable and enabling our family to celebrate a special milestone at such an enjoyable location. We look forward to returning one day soon

Had a great stay here for our honeymoon. In the beginning our keycards did not work which was a bit annoying but overal the stay was good Want to give a special thanks to Guna and Mark they assisted us very well at the pool and made our stay very pleasant!

Excellent service from the premium services teamChecking in was a breeze Cleanliness was exceptional The team was responsive in helping us with booking the restaurants, spa and facilities Wide variety of choices for breakfast and also the lounge access gave us a perfect place for business discussions

I had such comfort and ease while my stay at the hotel. I was assisted very well by the staff esp Apriel for her gesture and her guidance. It was an amazing experience. Thank you for upgrading us for our room to the suite, it was a beautiful surprise.

Marina Bay Sand Premier Room is stunning with very great attention to details, thanks to May Zin - my room stylist. She did a great job with the turn down service. I also had a great time at infinity pool located on the 57 floor, the fitness instructor whose do the afternoon pool activities was really energetic and passionate. In room dinning menu is quite basic and the food I would have to rate it 4/5. Overall, my 2 nights staying at MBS is full of care and joy!

June 2024What a fantastix experience in here, mbs , with so sweet staff. Especially, Uma who is in fitness centre, thanks to her i can stay more comfortable She show me how to use this fitness center facility, even how to use tea machine. Clean and good place ever

Great morning sound bath up on the deck. Super peaceful. But I was astonished that this world leading hotel - surely one of the priciest and richest in Asia - provided tiny plastic water bottles rather than a sustainable alternative. Seriously?

Marina Bay Sands.review_title: Really great hotel and helpful staff here
Marina Bay Sands.review_content: Just come back from Singapore past few days ago, been stayed in Marina Bay Sands. It is a very nice hotel that I ever stayed at. Every staff here was so polite and helpful.It is a very big hotel that I always lost to going somewhere. The staff here was so helpful to show me the way to my desired location whenever I am lostI was stayed in Paisa suite during the stay. The room is so comfortable and luxury!!! The view there is really wonderful. Been to the Sky Residence that told by my butler. It was a newly renovated Lounge for my room type. Had my breakfast and the evening cocktail there at that few day. I would like to give the compliment to KoKo, Jac, Anthony for the great service during my meal at the Sky Residence. Hopefully I didn't spell your name wrongly. Thank you for taking care me and my family. We are very happy to have you to take care us. Your attentive and care in details make us very comfortable. I personally owned a restaurant in my hometown, and I really hope that my restaurant would have the staff like you to take care of my guest. I feel very proud and lucky for your manager to have such as great team here.Overall, I love Marina Bay Sans and Singapore. I will definitely come back again with my family. Thank you Marina Bay Sands for making my family trip that wonderful!!s

Marina Bay Sands.review_title: Sound Meditation Session At SkyPark Observation Deck
Marina Bay Sands.review_content: I attended Karus sound healing meditation session at the sky park observation deck. Everything was set up so nicely, with attention to detail and quality. The instruments were of such high quality and the sound session took me through a journey of deep relaxation. I love how Karu ends with a message and thought to walk away with. The view up there is amazing and such a nice spot to practice at!

Marina Bay Sands.review_title: Experience the sound of a rising sun
Marina Bay Sands.review_content: Have you ever experienced grounding sound of yourself aligned with the sound of raising sun? And all of it on t he roof of Singapore?It is a beautiful experience - the sounds helps you connect to your inner self and takes you through inner healing journey.

We have just left this hotel. I would truly recommend this hotel to anyone looking to stay in Singapore - it is beautiful and has lots of amenities close by, however, is very busy!We were very lucky to have met two of the service hotel managers, Pohleena and Xaviar. They were very helpful and amazing! Pohleena especially went above and beyond to make our experience at the Marina Bay Sands a memorable one. We stayed in a beautiful 2 bedroom suite it felt like home from home. The suite was very very modern and the views were spectacular!We will certainly be re-visiting very soon!

Gym was maintained in tip top condition. Fantastic service by Uma as well! Had a great session here :)Theres a mini pantry station with complimentary tea and coffee, and refreshing lemon and cucumber water. Highly recommend to pay the gym a visit!

Uma provided the most excellent service. We enjoyed our session with the utmost service. Thank you Uma! We will love to come back again, this is an experience we shall never forget. We were served our preferred drink of Latte Machiatto and even provided cold lemon grass scented towels! What an awesome experience!!

Serene Ng Serene Ng from Airport Meet and Greet has delivered excellent service during my Stay in MarinaBay Sands. We look forward to coming here again and we will recommend our friends to stay in this hotel.

Lucy and Roselyn. Both are incredibly knowledgeable, professional, and dedicated to their clients' success.Lucy brings a wealth of experience and an infectious energy to every session. Her ability to tailor workouts to individual needs and goals is outstanding. Shes always encouraging, pushing you to reach new limits while ensuring proper form and technique.Roselyn, on the other hand, is a powerhouse of motivation and positivity. Her enthusiasm is contagious, and she has a unique talent for making even the toughest workouts enjoyable. Her expertise in various fitness disciplines has helped me diversify my routine and achieve a well-rounded fitness regimen.Together, Lucy and Roselyn create a welcoming and supportive environment that makes every visit to the gym a pleasure. Their dedication to their clients is evident in every interaction, and their passion for fitness is truly inspiring. I highly recommend both of them to anyone looking to improve their health and fitness.

To celebrate this year's anniversary, I visited Marina Bay Sands again with my children during my honeymoonThe staff members were kind and humorous, so I had funMost of all, the children loved it so much~During their stay at the hotel, the children enjoyed themselves saying they were happy and did not regret revisitingIf I visit Singapore again, I will visit again without worryingThank you to the staff for allowing me to make happy and enjoyable memories on my children's first trip. ^^

Marina Bay Sands.review_title: Amazing views from roof top pool
Marina Bay Sands.review_content: A very big hotel, we chose a room overlooking the city, probably overlooking the bay may have been more spectacular, but the amount of time spent in the room, it doesn't really matter.The roof top bar and infinity pool is amazing, high prices for food and drink, but if your looking to book here, you will know it's not the cheapest of hotels. The pool is only available to hotel guests.Big queues at the roof top bar.The evening sunset is unforgettable.Clean and tidy.Within easy walking distance of the main city, great views of the F1 track.We did a pedal bike guided tour, worth every penny as they take you through the back streets.Would stay again.

The yoga on the observation deck outside was a special experience. Gail was a great yoga teacher, very patient and incisive offering different options for all people. The view was lovely. It was worth getting up early for this experience..

Marina Bay Sands.review_title: Great way to start the day
Marina Bay Sands.review_content: Was a really good Hatha yoga session first thing in the morning at 730am on observation deck at MBS.She did a really good session, calming, gave different level options. Only reason for not 5 stars is because the sun got too hot by 8am. If recommend to do class earlier just so the sun isn't too hot on our face. Or maybe suggest for class to turn around away from the sun would be helpful. But apart from that is was a lovely session. Thank you

One Farrer Hotel.review_content: The overall condition of the hotel was so good. And I booked a mint room and it was upgraded to a much better room, so I was able to enjoy a comfortable trip. And the employees were so kind. It will be such a memorable trip. And I'm willing to revisit. I want to recommend it to my friends

My son Chris and I recently spent nearly 2 weeks at One Farrer Hotel on Level 18 in a Mint Skyline Room, which gave us direct daily access to the Skyline Club lounge. We were very impressed by the quality of food served in the lounge especially the pastries/desserts which equal those made in Paris. Most impressive was the incredible service provided by Mr Malek, Joni and his most attentive & capable staff. They were so polite and welcoming and addressed all of our daily needs efficiently and with a huge smile. The very humble Mr Malek is truly the heart of the hotel as he provided us with a heartfelt card of appreciation when we left. He truly puts himself in the guests shoes to give the best service possible. The rest of the hotel staff were efficient & attentive too, especially the concierge team who helped us to order our taxis & help us with excess luggage requirements. It was a most pleasant stay, and we would thoroughly recommend staying at this hotel on the Skyline lounge level. We will definitely return as soon as we can! Thank you One Farrer Hotel!

Coming back to Singapore after 7 years. I remembered well that I stayed at One Farrer Hotel last time - and it was a good decision to book it again. All hotels in Singapore are expensive, but at One Farrer you get much value for your money. A very big thank you to Ms Joo at reception: we arrived at Changi airport very early in the morning and therefore were at the hotel a long time before official check-in time. After leaving our luggage at the reception we went out to Gardens by the Bay and returned still early. Ms Joo found a way to give us a room - and even a very nice one at floor 18. A service far beyond what one could expect!If ever coming back to Singapore, I know what hotel to book

Naren and Dana explained the hotel rules in detail, and they responded kindly. They also provided early check-in and room upgrade services. Thanks to you, I stayed comfortable without any problems during my stay. I will definitely come back here next time I visit Singapore. Thank you.

Ms syamila and the one that served us are very accommodating and met up to my expectations. Thank u so much for your time and efforts. Updated me from time to time on the arrangements I made. Really appreciate it! Will definitely come back some other time! Till the very end , I was very satisfied.

One Farrer Hotel.review_title: A warm welcome, super hi tech room, perfect location close to Little India. Wish I could stay longer!
One Farrer Hotel.review_content: Thank you Suman for the warm welcome and room upgrade to an amazing suite with a panoramic view. You've literally thought of everything! The location is perfect, close to Little India and many restaurants, and the staff have been so helpful and super efficient.

During our concluded trip to Singapore (20 June to 25 June), we stayed at One Farrer Hotel. Must mention that right from enquiring about the room to checking out from the Hotel, the experience was simply Outstanding. Everyone with whom we interacted with during our stay was simply awesome. The r Skyline Studio Family Room (No. 1832) was a huge 50 Sq mts, well enough for three adults and a child aged 6 year. The two-queen sized double beds were comfortable. The large glass window provided a fantastic view of Singapore. Our flight was delayed and by the time we checked in the hotel, it was well past 8pm. But having access to the Skyline Lounge, which is open till 10:30pm, we could get some refreshing tea and cookies. Post that we unpacked, freshened up and went for dinner. As we had gone to celebrate our daughters Birthday, Ms. Emily very kindly arranged for a Black Forest cake for her.Mr. Malek, managing the Sky Lounge was extremely courteous and went steps ahead to make the stay memorable. I also warmly acknowledge our interactions with Emily, Melivn, Nancy, Maytee, Vasan and all others (whose names I do not remember). Before I miss, the housekeeping too was impeccable. Overall, I must say that we thoroughly enjoyed our stay at One Farrer. It is one of the Best Hotels, that we have stayed during our stay overseas. Sincere Thanks to everyone at One Farrer, for having made our stay Memorable.

One Farrer Hotel.review_title: 3D2N stay in the mint premier room
One Farrer Hotel.review_content: Overall it was a relatively pleasant stay. Other than having to wait an hour to check in but was provided with a free upgrade from the mint room to the mint premier room by the receptionist Narelp and Parma. However, one main issue was the amount of flies in the room, there were a couple of them on the blinds and a few around the room which was rather unsightly, hopefully the hotel will be able to improve with that. Paid for the room with breakfast included and even though the Escape restaurant was packed when we reached there at 9am, we were escorted to the Premier Lounge to have our breakfast instead and was greeted by the very friendly staff, Malek. Malek was very attentive and served us with beverage while we waited for a table to be available. My partner and I had a good time at the breakfast service on the both days we stayed and highly recommend Malek as a great staff!

One Farrer Hotel.review_title: Thanks to the hotel, it was a fun trip
One Farrer Hotel.review_content: The staff was so kind that we were comfortable during our stay at the hotel. Especially, the staff with 'Suman' name took good care of us. The room was clean and the atmosphere was nice. They always gave us enough towels and water so we could stay relaxed.

I was guided very well by Mr. Naren and Ms. suman.They were very cordial. I must compliment them for their utmost good behaviour.Overall the location of the property is very good. Its right next to the farrer station and 5mins walk to the Mustafa centre.

One Farrer Hotel.review_title: The People of One Farrer are the best!
One Farrer Hotel.review_content: Naren of Front Desk; Malek, Joni, Jerrick of Skyline Lounge are the best parts of staying at One Farrer. Their enthusiasm, authenticity and eagerness to provide the best customer experience is by far the best I have encountered. They are the assets of the company and I would gladly stay here again if this is the same level of service that they will provide every time.

One Farrer Hotel.review_title: Very friendly staff and the room is very clean, stunning views.
One Farrer Hotel.review_content: I was delighted to meet the very friendly Dana and her colleague Suman. And she recommended transportation options essential for my travels. The room was exceptionally clean and in great condition, with a fantastic view. The pool was also very spacious and clean. My friend is on their second visit, and if I come to Singapore again, I will definitely visit again!

Our company held a conference at the end of May for 200 pax at One Farrer Hotel and we had a fantastic experience! I worked with Emilda, Sheila, Elis, Sharan and many more who were extremely helpful and hospitable. Any hiccups experienced were resolved quickly and they tried their utmost best to meet our every need. Thank you all! I would not hesitate to recommend this venue for future events.

Had a wonderful stay at One Farrer Hotel! The rooms were spacious, modern, and very clean. The bed was super comfortable, and we had a fantastic view of the city. The amenities were top-notch, especially the pool and fitness center, which were well-maintained and never too crowded. The staff were friendly and helpful, making our stay even more enjoyable.

Really beautiful landscape. Definitely a place to book if you are visiting Singapore and having very destinations to explore for your trip during time here. It was very demanding, so a certain level of fitness is required. Experience that I highly recommend.

I have been to this hotel many times . Each time it leaves me with memorable stays here. I have been upgraded to better rooms twice because I have 2 kids . Mr Eugene especially thoughtful and considerate. Very helpful and polite gentleman . He is one of the staffs in the front desk . The room has been always clean and tidy . The swimming pool is huge and there are also a few hot water pools to soak in . I love this hotel

One Farrer Hotel.review_title: One Farrer the epitome of hospitality!
One Farrer Hotel.review_content: We really enjoyed our stay here!Param who checked in us was very helpful and swift with the check in process. Eugene the manager helped us to arrange vegetarian breakfast was really helpful Satheesh was efficient to handle our luggage upon arrival and departure. He even offered us drinking water!Naren helped us to book taxi and got our missed charger from room before we left to airport.Entire experience was flawless and will definitely recommend this place to all my friends and family. Thank you for your hospitality One Farrer Team, we will back in future .

One Farrer Hotel.review_title: Great Stay at One Farrer Hotel
One Farrer Hotel.review_content: Naren, Param, Satheesh and Eugene were very attentive. Thank you so much for the early check in and comp upgrade. This trip was fantastic. Very nice pool at level 6. Additional thanks to Vasan for the great recommendations around Little India.

One Farrer Hotel.review_title: Memories that one Farrer created for me
One Farrer Hotel.review_content: Its our anniversary and our trip has started off on a surprising note already! Mr. Naren was very sweet to offer an upgrade for the room we booked and helped and guided us with the same. Within 10 minutes of completing check in.. Wan brought luggage to the room. Super fast & helpful the staff is! Thankyou for being a part of our anniversary celebration

Staff are friendly and food is good. We have been dining here for the past two days at Escape Restaurant. The outdoor seating was so nice especially during the sunset.Had our events in the morning. Staff are courteous, prompt with requests, accommodating.I will recommend this to anyone.

One Farrer Hotel.review_title: Heartfelt Gratitude for an Exceptional Stay
One Farrer Hotel.review_content: I am writing to express my heartfelt gratitude for the exceptional hospitality my family and I experienced during our stay at One Farrer Hotel from June 1st to June 4th, 2024. Our stay was incredibly enjoyable and comfortable, thanks to the warm welcome by the hotel team.We were especially touched by the special birthday cake arranged for my daughter's 9th birthday. It was a delightful surprise and made her day extra special. Additionally, the complimentary late check-out was greatly appreciated and allowed us to enjoy our stay a little longer without any rush.The warmth and hospitality we received at the Skyline Lounge were equally impressive. The staff's attentiveness and genuine care made us feel truly valued and added to the overall excellence of our experience.These thoughtful gestures made our stay truly memorable, and we will fondly remember our time at our favourite hotel. Thank you once again for the exceptional service! We look forward to returning later this year.

Fantastic hotel with great staff and facilities. Special thanks to Param and Kelsie in the reception area for their warm welcome.Rooms are modern and clean. Breakfast has lots of options, we ate early in the mornings and there was never any crowds. Pool is huge, so nice to have a swim after a day of exploring in the heat.The hotel has a MRT station tight next door so it's so easy to stay here and explore all the sights. Would highly recommend this hotel.

One Farrer Hotel.review_title: Very supportive staff, nice location near station and department store
One Farrer Hotel.review_content: I requested the double bed room and the room is not available at the Mint room type so I got upgraded to the higher type. The room that I got is really big, nice view and cozy. The front staff (Dana, Sumah, Param) are very supportive and friendly. I would stay at this hotel again,

Before coming over, I informed the hotel that my girlfriend and I are having a celebration and they gave us a cake and even gave us a high floor with a nice view! The hotel was comfortable, clean and quiet. The hotel restaurant, Escape, also has a great steak. Would love to come again.Thank u Joo, Sumani and Dana for the welcome :)

One Farrer Hotel.review_title: Private Dining @ Nest at One Farrer
One Farrer Hotel.review_content: We visited the Nest at One Farrer for a Fathers Day celebration and tried the Executive Set Dinner. The meal was exquisite and delightful in a private room setting, and we had undivided attention from Syamala and Saravanan. As Nest at One Farrer is not operating like a restaurant, thus the food and beverage options may be limited but overall, it was still a refreshing and memorable dining experience for my family.

One Farrer Hotel.review_title: Clean room, aromatic hotel, near to Mrt, warm hospitality.
One Farrer Hotel.review_content: Dona and Joo received us warmly at the reception counter. The check in process is fast, and Dona and Joo are helpful in providing the information we need. We booked the Mint room and had a wonderful 2-day stay. The hotel smells very nice, is clean, and spacious. We appreciate the gesture of refilling the bottled water in the room in the afternoon. The huge windows in our room overlook the surrounding areas. It is near to Farrer Park MRT.

Recently stayed in this hotel for 2 nights in June 2024...Had booked two mint rooms,was traveling with family...Centrally located hotel but peaceful,neat and relaxing..Even breakfast spread was decent... Swimming pool is quite long,clean and climate controlled,open to sky...very soothing..Staff was very helpful especially Joo at reception and Vishnu at concierge.Joo not only gave us an early check-in,which I was least expecting and also gave top floor interconnected rooms with lovely view...Staff at reception was also helpful and ready answer our repeated questions too...In all,if ever I am again in Singapore.... One Farrer Hotel will be my home away from home...My only suggestion is to have more Indian vegetarian varieties in breakfast buffet,especially to have an Indian cook,not Chinese cook,to supervise the breakfast combos...Like on day 1 (7th June 2024) there was Dal Makhani,but no vegetarian rice... I almost took rice with duck... Also there was potato sabzi but no chapattis/naan... Ate potato with bread.. On day 2 (8th June 2024) there were Indian breads/naan but no Indian vegetarian sabzi/Dal... Ate naan with hash brownies...These are small lapses can be corrected easily if an Indian cook sets the menu... I will definitely give 5 star ratings..

Dana and param has been really kind. Wonderful experience. I would like to thank the reception staff especially for being so cooperative. They were really helpful. Hotel is pretty near to the metro station and to little india. One of the best location for the ones who wish to explore the city and the food as well

Wasnt expecting the best 01 - dish Chinese meal Ive ever had to be from Escape at One Farrer !! And the team here is so attentive , kind & friendly . Its not my 1st time here ( ate other dishes previous times ) , & Ill certainly be back . What a super dealgreat lunch experience !!!!!!!

Excellent hospitality by Mr. Naren and the staff is very helpful . The hotel is near to MRT station and very convenient for Mustafa shopping centre . The rooms size is comfortable enough for a family of 3 members. Once again thank you for the staff for a warm welcome.

One Farrer Hotel.review_title: Great hotel near Little India. Our room was upgraded for free.
One Farrer Hotel.review_content: Stayed 4 nights with my wife:1. We arrived around 11am at the hotel.2. Check-in time was 3pm. The room was still not available so we left our luggage first to go around the area.3. We came back at around 2pm. We were able to check-in already.4. We were happily suprised that they upgraded our room from mint room to skyline studio. We truly appreciate their kind gesture.5. The location is good. About 3 minute walk from hotel lobby to Farrer Park MRT station (North East Line). This station can get you to all best spots in the City. Very easy to transfer to other MRT lines as well.6. Walking distance to shops and restaurants around Little India. 7. 5 minute walk to Mustafa Centre and City Square Mall.8. 7-Eleven is just beside the hotel.9. The skyline studio room is very spacious. 10. Our room was cleaned daily. They replenish the toiletries and bottled water daily.11. Bed and pillows were very comfortable.12. Automatic curtain and blinds.13. TV was available with few channels and also a bluetooth speaker/radio.14. Wifi worked well.15. Bath robes and towels were fresh.16. Toilet has a water sprinkler bidet type which is okay. Our only issue with the toilet was its height. It is too high so when you sit on it, your feet are a bit hanging and not flat on the ground. I'm 5'8ft but only my toes were touching the floor.17. Hair blower, kettle, coffee maker, and fridge were all available in the room.18. Gym and pool at the 6th floor were huge.19. Security personnel were always present.20. All hotel staff were very helpful and friendly. Special thanks to Joo, Dana, and Param.21. We did not try their food so no comment on that.22. There's a bank behind the lobby with ATMs. 23. Easy to book Grab in the area. We enjoyed our stay at the hotel. It was extra nice since our room was upgraded. We will book here again when we go back to Singapore. Thank you so much!

The room is Clean and bedding is comfortable.And all the staffs are very kindI especially thank to front staff Dana, Joo, Param ! I felt very comfortable and nice, even if it was my first time to visit Singapore. Thanks front staffs for starting the travel very nice!

Very helpful staff, and considering I stayed with an elderly, everything was flexible for both her and me which meets exceptional hospitality standards. She will choose the same hotel to stay in the next time she visits, which says a lot about her satisfaction! Thanks to all!

the best accommodation in my life.Above all, the view was so good.The big window overwhelmed me, and I was happy because I liked the view from the high floor.And the room was big and the bathroom was big and cleanThank you so much !!

Mr Suresh & miss Joo and other representative are very cooperative and cordial thanks food is also very delicious and cleanness mentioned.its highly recommended whenever you visit Singaporewe are satisfied and will come back soon..

I choose One Farrel Hotel to stay with my friend's recommendation. This choice was perfect they gave me early check-in and room upgrade! I really appreciate Dana & Params sincere consideration. Thank u so much I highly recommend to stay here when u visit Singapore

We had booked a 2D1N stay to host our best friends bachelorette party and the two staff at the front desk, Naren and Parameswaran were exceptionally helpful and provided us with an unexpected upgrade to a suite that everyone was absolutely blown away by! Everything turned out even better than how we envisioned thanks to the spacious room they provided us with. It was more than we imagined. All the staff were also exceptionally helpful in helping us execute our plans (i.e. reception staff storing our cupcakes, housekeeping helped us make swans, front desk called us back to inform us about our helium balloons that we left behind)! We couldnt have done it without the amazing service by the team at One Farrer. Will absolutely recommend anyone to book a stay with One Farrer without a doubt!! Ill definitely come back to celebrate so many more occasions in the future. I cant thank the team enough!

Once my family and I reached the hotel, we were served by Naren at the check-in counter. He was friendly and helpful and he even gave further help to speed up the check-in process. Room is better than expected. Location is walking distance to MRT station. Recommended.

Great room, cleaning, host reception and everything! Thank you for sally & Marsh..? (?) Who worked on 30 May night! Many good restaurant near the hotel, nice mall, everything was near. Swimming pool was nice and warm(on 6th floor). Elevator was fast!

On arrival we got a free upgrade to a suite. It is a beautiful room with great views across the city and harbour in the distance. Great bed, great shower, great location, close to MRR and Little India shops.And great customer service, thank you Haren.

One Farrer Hotel.review_title: Quality Hotel with excellent staff and facilities.
One Farrer Hotel.review_content: Great hotel. Wonderful service from all the staff. Located in one of the more characterful parts of Singapore. Thoroughly recommend a stay there.The club lounge on the 18th floor has attentive staff, good quality food and wine.Much of it down to the Managing Director Gilbert Manhavans leadership.

One Farrer Hotel.review_title: First time stay and will comeBack
One Farrer Hotel.review_content: Fully recommended, the room is really awsome, definitely will come back for next trip, keep up, I was being helped by a staff named Suman, she is such an experience nice lady, know how to treat international customer after long flight, thank you

I visited the One Parlor Hotel for my honeymoon. It was our honeymoon, so we upgraded our room and had a great start to our trip to Singapore thanks to the kind response of the staff. I also enjoyed the chocolate cake you gave me as a souvenir of our honeymoon. If I come to Singapore again, I would like to visit the One Parlor Hotel again. Thank you

One Farrer Hotel.review_title: Had an amazing stay at one farrer hotel ..
One Farrer Hotel.review_content: Had an amazing experience.. i wanted to express my heartfelt gratitude for the exceptional services especially Ms Suman and Ms Dana Who made us stay very comfortable as we were travelling with our 1 and half year old she accommodated everything accordingly.. thanks for a memorable experience

Joo and the team at One Farrer were so welcoming and extremely accommodating after a very long flight, we had a wonderful experience and always stay at this hotel while in Singapore, location is perfect, rooms are always exceptional - staff are amazing.

We had a fabulous time at One Farrer hotel, we booked a club room and everything was beautiful. The staff are amazing so polite and helpful but especially in the executive lounge. Malek took care of us so well, hes extremely helpful, friendly and polite. I hope the hotel management appreciates all his hard work.We cannot wait to return to Singapore and we will definitely stay at this beautiful hotel again.Thanks to all the staff and especially Malek.

One Farrer Hotel.review_title: Stay at Hotel Farrer was amazing
One Farrer Hotel.review_content: We were upgraded to such a beautiful, clean and spacious room. Really cannot fault this hotel at all, friendly staff especially Sumah, Dana and Sella at the reception who were welcoming, friendly and efficient at their role. Lovely amenities, great location right next shops, mall, hospital, and MRT. Easy commute into central. Stay at this hotel!

I celebrated my besties birthday at One Farrer Hotel, and it was my first time booking a suite. I chose this option because it included exclusive access to the Skyline Lounge on level 18, which I was eager to try. Upon entering the room, I was immediately greeted by automatically switched-on lights and curtains. The room was immaculately clean and well-stocked with amenities. There was a coffee machine, a mini bar with drinks, and TWG tea in the drawer. I was pleasantly surprised to find two separate toiletsone in the bedroom and one in the living room. The room also featured several paintings, adding to its charm. The view was breathtaking, with windows stretching across the entire room, offering stunning day and night views.A sidenote for One Farrer Hotel: the online photos dont do this room justice. It is truly stunning. Moreover, the service was outstanding. The receptionist quickly answered all our inquiries, even helping us with the coffee machine early in the morning. The staff, Malek at the Skyline Lounge were incredibly attentive, engaging with guests and ensuring our needs were met. We arranged vegetarian meals with him for both lunch and dinner, and the food was amazing. (Thank you, Malek!) Our entire stay was extremely pleasant and memorable. Thank you to the team for making it a special occasion that is unforgettable.

Very friendly and courteous staff . They also allowed for an early check in and late checkout . The hotel is very clean and beautiful. I would like to thank especially the front desk staff suman , ibana and sella for their cooperation and care .

This was my second time staying at One Farrer Hotel, during a stopover en route to Australia. We got a room upgrade during check-in and the staff - from the nice gentleman at the Escape restaurant during breakfast to the housekeeping - were wonderful.The room was large and comfortable with a nice view of the Singapore skyline. And of course, having the MRT station under the hotel meant it was remarkably easy to get around Singapore and the 7-11 was great when we needed a midnightThere have been some changes since the last time I stayed (pre-COVID): the breakfast wasn't as extensive as last time (but still more than adequate) and there was no free minibar, but these are minor grumbles. All in all, a wonderful stay and highly recommended!

PARKROYAL COLLECTION Marina Bay, Singapo.review_content: SK arifin was a see see gentleman who helped us with our lost luggage. Would recommend park royal very helpful security especially Mr SK Arifin was an amazing person would recommend this hotel to anyone whos planning to stay in this hotel. Amazing experience

We enjoyed our Staycation and were delighted to catch a glimpse of the Pre-National Day Rehearsal in across the skyline.The room was spacious and clean; with balcony to catch some fresh air. The coffee machine was a darling for each perk-me-up moments. The only shortcoming, personally, was the pillows a bit too hard to my liking (Papa Bear's hard pillow hence he would appreciate it :) The breakfast buffet at Peppermint was sumptuous and we were spolit for choice; we were glad to be able to dine in the gigantic bird-nest cove and marvelled at the real life birds singing... amazing.The only shame is not having to swim in the pool which was crowded most of the time (even at night!). Overall, it was a gorgeous staycation and we would be back soon :)

Awesome experience for the kids when we booked the Gnome room! Mum and dad had some quiet time and the kids were treated like VIPs. Special shoutout to Mazziah who walked us thru the kids stuff and spoiled them with treats!The hotel facilities are great (including a kids play room) and it has access to the nearby shopping mall.

PARKROYAL COLLECTION Marina Bay, Singapo.review_title: A marvellous hotel experience that wont let me down
PARKROYAL COLLECTION Marina Bay, Singapo.review_content: This was my third time staying at this hotel designed by John Portman, one of my favourite architects. Previously named Marina Mandarin, I chose this hotel because of its huge atrium and the bullet lifts. Unlike previous stays, I booked its Signature Marina Bay Room due to its panoramic view overlooking Marina Bay Sands and the Merlion. The room also had a balcony too. The check in process was smooth and easy. The staff handling my check in and check out was named Ivan who was always sincere and helpful. Thank you Ivan for making me feel home away home. The hotel had been completely renovated just liked a garden inside a hotel with lots of greenery. The room was decorated in contemporary style. One thing to note that the hotel stopped providing bottled water as an environmental friendly measure, rather filtered water supply was installed inside the washroom and it was claimed that guest could drink water from it directly.

The food and environment was amazing. With $88/pax, we are able to try out a plethora of flavours, from sweet to savory. In addition, we are able to order a coffee, tea and alcohol. We enjoyed the good service from the team. Special mentioned to Princess that check in with us once in a while on the dining experience. Kudos to all.

The impeccable service at the Collection Club Lounge is truly amazing! The food variety is also awesome. Special thanks to the service crew Mr Bala, Mr Adam and Mr Yarik! You guys have made our stay here both pleasant and memorable. We will see you again very soon!

It's such a beautiful hotel with great service. We really enjoyed our stay here. The interior garden design is unique. I really loved the bar design. The staff were very welcoming and friendly. It's also in a great location, with very easy access to a mall - literally underneath the hotel as well as main attractions nearby.

We had a day in transit in Singapore (8am-9.30pm) and booked a daycation room and were just so glad we did! This hotel is stunning. Beautiful room, fabulous bathroom, stunning pool area and such friendly staff. Spacious, generous amenities with coffee machine, lovely rug, day bed, abundance of mirrors and light. So well located too. Close to Marina bay gardens (caught a taxi for $6) and walked to Raffles. Well worth every cent!

We held our intimate wedding in the Atrium Ballroom at ParkRoyal Collection Marina Bay during May 2024! We were extremely blessed to have Xina as our wedding coordinator - she often goes the extra mile to accommodate to our request!! She would also thoughtfully provide feedbacks based on her experience and she is always contactable (even on her off days ) !!We are utterly grateful for her dedication to ensure our big day is throughly planned! Additionally, the actual day team was on the ball!!! The Banquet Manager especially Darryl, made sure to always communicate with our wedding party on the March-Ins, alcohol availability, etc. He is also very experienced and know what to prepare for each segment of the wedding - every couple will be in good hands having Darryl as your Banquet Manager!! All in all, we would like to give thanks to the entire who made the day - the best day of our lives; - Wedding Manager: Xina - Banquet Managers: Darryl & Jayden- AV Manager: Tarimizi- Chef: Chef LeeNo regrets choosing PRCMB as our wedding venue - absolutely value for money for the wedding package we have signed & quality of service we have received!!!

We held our wedding banquet at the hotel in May and had the pleasure of having Xina as our wedding manager. We would like to extend our heartfelt thanks to Xina for her attentiveness and attention to detail in our planning process. Often, she would get back to us very speedily and ensure that our requests are met. We do sincerely hope that she would get a bit more rest when it's her off day, but it shows her commitment to maintaining her tip top quality of service. We would also like to thank Chef Lee for the scrumptuous food at the dinner! Chef really tried to make adjustments to accommodate to our comments from the initial food tasting.Apart from the fanfare of the banquet, we thoroughly enjoyed our stay in the hotel, especially the breakfast (whether served to our room or in the Peppermint restaurant). All the staff we encountered were also very helpful and friendly.

PARKROYAL COLLECTION Marina Bay, Singapo.review_title: One of the best hotel youll ever visit
PARKROYAL COLLECTION Marina Bay, Singapo.review_content: My first visit to Singapore was great with my family with small kids.. one of the best happend that I stayed in ParkRoyal Collection Hotel marina bay, it has great, kind and helpful hotel staff specially Mr.Yusri and a lady from concierge (forgot her name), and has great location, very near from malls and supermarkets. The hotel will be my first choice for next visit.

Chef: Chef LeeThe food was excellent overall, with my guests offering praise rather than complaints. They consistently complimented the quality and enjoyment of the entire menu.Banquet Managers: Apple & JaysonApple and Jayson were always available when needed. Apple, in particular, was attentive, constantly ensuring the bride and groom stayed hydrated throughout the event by providing water. These thoughtful actions made my bride and me realize the importance of small details.AV Manager: TarmiziTarmizi was very patient and helpful, assisting me with setting up my laptop and offering suggestions for the banner. He was a genuinely nice person to work with.Wedding Manager: XinaFrom the moment we met Xina, we knew she would be incredibly helpful. She guided us through the wedding planning process, offering timely suggestions and staying until the first march-in to ensure everything went smoothly. When I forgot to print the ROM certificate, she quickly assisted with printing it out. She was consistently available, both via WhatsApp and in person, to ensure everything ran smoothly. She also remained patient when some guests arrived last minute and others canceled unexpectedly, providing advice to help me stay calm and manage the event effectively.Overall, I am amazed by the level of service at the hotel, especially from Xina and Apple.I would like to take this opportunity to thank the staff of Park Royal @ Marina Bay!

PARKROYAL COLLECTION Marina Bay, Singapo.review_title: Amazing Stay! Special Thank You to Adam at the Collection Club
PARKROYAL COLLECTION Marina Bay, Singapo.review_content: The Parkroyal Collection Marina Bay, Singapore was fabulous. The hotel location was amazing. The hotel itself is beautiful. A special thanks to Adam at the Collection Club who was so wonderful to my mother and I. The service was impeccable and everyone was so friendly. We will return!

The hotel had a very classy and welcoming vibe. It was a real treat to enjoy Evening Cocktails in the lounge!
