While the ambiance, food and view was already spectacular, the service of Syed, Chaw and Lanee made the experience even more memorable and amazing! They were very attentive and made sure we were well taken care of. Kudos to the three of them!

Was at Portman's bar, staff is truly outstanding. From the friendly greeting at the door by Robee to the impeccable service at our table, every member of the team exudes professionalism and warmth. Special shout out to Princess, Timothy, Jane, Marcus and Alvin!!! It's clear they are passionate about what they do, making our dining experience exceptional. Thank you for the wonderful hospitality!

The Club Lounge is amazing, shoutout to Syed, Chaw and Lanee for the amazing service rendered. These 3 are definitely the superstars. Ambience was greatFood was greatStaff was awesomeView was fantastic (be it day or night)Will definitely be back again!

Fabulous garden hotel. Staff were so accomodating. We had the club lounge access and were so grateful for the amazing service by Sayed. Housekeeping staff were great. Nothing was a problem and Shafik was so helpful anticipating our daily needs.

PARKROYAL COLLECTION Marina Bay, Singapo.review_title: Awesome week. Spoilt by Club Lounge family
PARKROYAL COLLECTION Marina Bay, Singapo.review_content: Wow, what a wonderful week.Everything was beautiful at Park Royal Collection Marina Bay. A beautiful paradise. My friend had stayed before and recommended it for our girls weeklong getaway. We had 2 rooms on the 21st floor which you can imagine had incredible views. The rooms were lovely, spotless and spacious and oh the bed - heaven. The views from the Club Lounge on the 5th floor also were amazing. Hanging out on the 4th floor amongst the greenery and the birds was a treat where you could find a little nook and relax and keep cool.Collection Club Lounge Family go above and beyond and also Alice from housekeeping. In fact, everyone. Running into staff throughout the hotel, everyone was pleasant and helpful.Check in/check out was a breeze. Nothing was too much trouble for anyone. All the extra little touches during the week not only in the room but throughout the whole hotel.I had the pleasure of being spoilt by the Club lounge family I may not capture everyone here but you all know you did an amazing job of looking after the Aussie girls, and all of your guests. Me with the extra strong English Breakfast tea and salt for my scratchy throat before heading home !!Bala, Yarik, Syed, Lanee, Jenny and everyone. My apologies I have not listed everyones name but I dont wish to exclude anyone. You were all incredibly professional, welcoming, helpful, kind and worked so well together and made me laugh and relax. Not to forget to mention the beautiful food which changed daily for breakfast, afternoon tea and evening cocktail and canaps. Thank you Chef. Where to find my special orange juice now that I have left? Tasty drinks and delicious, beautifully presented food.Be sure to add Collection Club Lounge to your booking. Bala and the team will look after you. You will not regret it. It was hard to say goodbye. Until next time. Thank you so much from the Aussie girl.

My wife and I had a single night staycay for her birthday celebration and our 3rd Wedding Anniversary. It is also our first time staying and we were in dazzling-awe on how beautiful this hotel was. We had a pleasant stay and we thank you for the small arrangement, also grateful for a room upgrade. We hope we can visit again next time. Loved the vibes here. Thank you again.

Filipino staffs are very nice and accommodating. They making sure that everything are in order and they smiles a lot. Make sure to try booking here in Singapore when you go. The area is also accessible to all attraction and walking distance to gardens by the bay and esplanade.

PARKROYAL COLLECTION Marina Bay, Singapo.review_title: Wedding banquet & stay at ParkRoyal Collection Marina Bay
PARKROYAL COLLECTION Marina Bay, Singapo.review_content: Hotel feels new, well maintained and the ambience was great. Garden themed rooms and ballrooms were naturally lighted and felt peaceful and cosy. Special thanks to our wedding coordinator, Jodi, whom greatly assisted us in planning the dinner banquet even though she took over our case halfway as the previous staff left. Special mention to, Fiona, who assisted us on the wedding day. While some hit & miss on the actual day, the Team was swift and changes were made promptly. Banquet manager, Darrel, was proactive and constantly updated us the status on ground. Which gave us a lot of assurance. Only feedback we have were the location of the AV helper for level 5 Atrium Ballroom was not the best as visual to floor was blocked, otherwise the food were great and definitely a high valued package and excellent service provided by the team. Wedding coordinator: Jodi / Fiona Banquet manager IC: Darrel AV IC: Haziq

We stayed on the 21st floor and the views went on forever. The bed was massive and very comfortable. The breakfast at the ParkRoyal Marina Bay is delicious as well as eye catching. The staff were always helpful and professional a most enjoyable holiday.

Spent 6 nights here as part of a business trip. And Arrived to a warm welcome from hotel staff. The architecture of the building is amazing and clean throughout. Spacious rooms and the selection for breakfast is great with a wide range of options. The gym is also good. I would highly recommend staying here.

I had my wedding banquet with Parkroyal Collection Marina Bay on the evening of 14 June and have to say that all the staff serving us were consistently thoughtful, helpful and friendly. We were served by Elyn and Darrell - both of whom helped to manage the flow and operations of the banquet impeccably. Elyn, Darrell and their crew really went the extra mile to make sure we were supported well: passing us water to make sure we were hydrated, helping me arrange my big dress, checking in with guests to make sure they were ok, helping us turn our chairs around to listen to the speeches. My bridesmaids dress ripped during the banquet and Elyn even helped to sew the seams back on. I have nothing but praise for all the staff serving that night ! Their attention to detail and wonderful service allowed my husband and I to fully enjoy ourselves that night without worrying about the small things ! Kudos also to Chef Lee for the wonderful food - everyone said it was delicious, AV manager Wan who helped with our audio/visual needs, and thanks again to our wedding manager Xina, who was lovely and supportive as usual. The team really epitomizes the spirit of service and dedication to their craft- putting us at the forefront and anticipating our needs before we knew we even had them. Because of them, I have highly recommended the hotel to all my friends who are looking to get married! :) its been a wonderful time with Parkroyal Collection Marina Bay we are so thankful to have chosen this venue.

Warm and welcoming service by Assistant guest service manager Bala. Always ensure that we are well taken care of, attentive to our needs and took the initiatives to refill our drinks without asking! Ask for him to make you a cocktail! Its amazing!!

I recently held my wedding banquet at PARKROYAL COLLECTION Marina Bay. If any soon-to-be newlyweds are still deciding which hotel to hold your banquet at, PARKROYAL COLLECTION Marina Bay should definitely be one of your top considerations. Everybody knows how beautiful the hotel is, but what is not as obvious is how excellent their service also is. The process of working together with my wedding coordinator, Xina, was amongst the top few collaborative experiences I had ever had in my life. For planning something as daunting as a wedding, you want a coordinator that catches any balls that you have dropped, allays your anxieties and keeps a tight timeline without adding additional stress. Xina was all that, and much much more. I can only imagine how many times Xina must have managed wedding banquets to be as experienced and skilful as she is. At each critical decision-making point, she explained the overall plan as well as the details clearly, highlighting the important choices we needed to make, but also offering insightful recommendations that helped us decide. Over the course of the year of wedding planning together with her, Xina never failed to give prompt reminders for deadlines for the payments we needed to make or documents we needed to complete together. But the mark of a great wedding coordinator, which Xina is, is the manner in which they make you feel throughout this stressful process. In the whole year we worked together, Xina was consistently polite, authentic and warm at no point did I feel frustration, stressed or awkward about approaching her to clarify any of my doubts. If I had any requests, Xina was always a text message or a phone call away and she was almost always available. While I wish for Xina to get more rest for herself, her speedy replies speak to her dedication and work ethic. Nearing the wedding, Xina carried herself with the same grace as she did throughout the whole year. Any hiccups were smoothly handled, and she did her very best to cater to unexpected requests that popped up along the way. We are so so happy and so so fortunate to have had Xina be our wedding coordinator. She is professional, dedicated, warm and gracious. Just as PARKROYAL COLLECTION claims to be inspiringly yours, Xina was inspiringly ours. I would not hesitate to recommend PARKROYAL COLLECTION Marina Bay as the venue for your wedding banquet or events. Once more, I would like to express my heartfelt thanks to Xina, for demonstrating the ethos and love her organisation preaches for their guests. Please please reward her for her impeccable and excellent work she is such a precious coordinator and has given her all for her couples.

PARKROYAL COLLECTION Marina Bay, Singapo.review_title: Great venue and service for Wedding Lunch Reception
PARKROYAL COLLECTION Marina Bay, Singapo.review_content: We held our wedding lunch reception at Parkroyal Collection Marina Bay in Jun 2024.Our Wedding Coordinator was Jodi, Our banquet Manager in Charge were Apple & DarrellOur AV In Charge was ShamThe whole event went very seamless, smooth and very enjoyable for us event as wedding couple. They took care of all our needs, listened to our requests throughout our planning process and during the banquet itself. They helped and guided us through every step of the way so we dont have to worry too much during the event. Even kept us hydrated throughout the event.Parkroyal Collection Marina Bay, in particular the level 5 Atrium Ballroom has a very nice foyer area with natural lighting. Very good for pictures with the guests and family.Would highly recommend any couple getting married to consider this location.Thanks again to Jodi, Apple, Darrell and Sham for their service and dedication.

PARKROYAL COLLECTION Marina Bay, Singapo.review_title: Amazing architecture and lots to do!
PARKROYAL COLLECTION Marina Bay, Singapo.review_content: Amazing hotel, great architecture, Yusri the concierge and Robee at the bar were very nice and helpful. Great location with amazing views. Everything is very close. Restaurant buffet dinner was excellent as well. Gym is nice. Great view on the 5th floor.

Its a nice hotel with ample amenities and a pool, gym and restaurants. We upgraded to a bay view which is worth doing. The breakfast is very good and the staff are friendly and welcoming . Our shower was broken on arrival and it took two requests to get it fixed. Very comfortable rooms and bed.

PARKROYAL COLLECTION Marina Bay, Singapo.review_title: Not bad, not bad at all
PARKROYAL COLLECTION Marina Bay, Singapo.review_content: The facilities are immaculate. The reception staff were some of the best I have experienced... however my room, 1735.. ask for that (or a high 30 something)...higher floor the better. However, two double rum and cokes were 50! Singapore baby!!

Chose this hotel because we like the ambience of the central area and the convenience of the location for guests. Despite road closures due to national day rehearsal, most guests were able to reach on time via public transport.During tea ceremony, Elyn and her team were willing to go the extra mile to ensure the ceremony proceeded smoothly such as helping our parents with their boutonniere and guided us on what to do. They also reminded our bridesmaids who were in charge of collecting the angbao to write the names of the family members at the back of the angbao so that we know who gave the angbao. Elyn and her team made us feel at ease during the wedding lunch and they were very attentive to our needs, even after the banquet such as giving extra water to the groom when he's intoxicated with alcohol. They also gave clear instructions on what to do throughout the banquet. Our guests complimented the food and I love the whole atmosphere. The foyer was brightly lit with natural sunlight. We held our wedding at the Atrium ballroom and it's a very cozy space for family and friends to mingle freely. AV guy Sham was also friendly and handled the AV well. Not sure if Howard was the one who opened the door, but I like that they left the door slightly open for us to watch our childhood montage before the march-in. That actually made me feel less nervous as I got to enjoy the video with my guests.I would have preferred if the hotel could provide more assurance regarding early check-in for the bridal suite and our request to leave the photo table props at their concierge two days before the wedding for convenience. We have asked for early check-ins multiple times but were told that early check-ins could not be guaranteed until the day itself and were discouraged from leaving the props at their concierge due to concerns about loss. I don't understand how they are willing to allow guests to leave their luggage with them but were hesitant about our items. Other hotels manage to arrange early check-in for newlywed couples in advance, which is crucial as we need the space to prepare and unload our belongings. While I understand the hotel's need to protect themselves regarding the photo table props, it has felt like they only prioritize the hotel's interests over accommodating the couple for such an important event in our lives.Overall, a pleasant wedding experience with the team and I am satisfied with the wedding lunch ops team. Not forgetting Bala whom we met at the Club Lounge for breakfast. Good service from him as he recommended food items for us to try.

This was my second time staying at Parkroyal Marina Bay and it certainly didnt disappoint. I was travelling for business and although my visit was a short 3 days, I left feeling well looked after. All of the staff are so friendly and helpful, from being welcomed in the lobby, checked-in at reception and being greeted by the house keeping staff. I have to give a special mention to the staff in the collection lounge who are so wonderful. I will try to remember everyones name and Im sorry if I havent mentioned everyone - they go above and beyond to make you feel welcomed. Adam, Jenny, Chaw, Cherry and Bala were all so lovely and would stop to chat with me even though they were busy looking after everyone else. Thanks again and hopefully see you all again soon.

Parkroyal Marina Bay has been my to go hotel for my wife's birthday staycation yearly. They have never disappoint me and manage to always, always bring a smile to our faces. We were greeted by Zach and Aaron at the Reception desk upon check in, We were in a queue but Aaron gestured to give them a moment before tending to us. I feel this gesture has somewhat lost its way and its nice to see it being used. the dynamic duo of Zach and Aaron checked us in swiftly and managed to inform us oh the breakfast times, pool opening hours and location etc. Great to see their smiling faces and warm hospitality.As I was heading to the lifts and fumbling with the keycards and my wallet, a female staff patiently held the lift for us and assisted us with lift buttons. She found out that we were here to celebrate my wife's birthday and wished her a happy birthday! I later found out that the nice lady was actually the Rooms Div Manager Nadia.I would like to mention a special thank you to Cheah Yi who decorated the room and also arranged for the birthday cake for my wife. THANK YOU for the special touch.Overall, Housekeeping still top notch, Bell staff at level 1 attentive and helpful as always. Not forgetting the operators who had to endure our requests for ice! THANK YOU Ms Nadia and Team!

PARKROYAL COLLECTION Marina Bay, Singapo.review_title: Our Wedding Experience at Parkroyal Collections Marina Bay
PARKROYAL COLLECTION Marina Bay, Singapo.review_content: My spouse and I held our wedding banquet at Parkroyal Collections Marina Bay two weeks ago, and it was a decision that we absolutely did not regret! We almost immediately decided on the venue as soon as we entered the hotel for the first time for a site visit, we really loved the interior and aesthetics of the whole hotel, from the luxurious lobby and reception, to the grand and symmetrical stairway leading up to our ballroom, with a view of the entire hotel interior up to the roof! We were initially worried as we were not familiar with some of the processes and sequence of the wedding, however with the constant step by step guidance by the team throughout the solemnization, tea ceremony, and each segment of the banquet, the entire event became a lot less stressful for us! We are really grateful to our wedding coordinator Jodi, our banquet managers Elyn and Jayson, the AV in charge Aniq, as well as the chefs behind the scenes for making our entire wedding ceremony a smooth and successful one. Special thanks to Jodi for your quick responses and for being so accommodating to our all requests, even up to the very last minute! And not forgetting Elyn for hand holding us through every step of the wedding and allowing us to enjoy the entire ceremony with an assured and calm state of mind! We really thoroughly enjoyed ourselves, and our guests really loved the food! Would definitely not hesitate to recommend this hotel to anybody who is still looking out for a wedding venue!

My husband and I held our wedding banquet dinner here at Parkroyal Marina Bay, and had the best time! Thanks to the beautiful decor of the hotelthe amazing service by all the hotel staff. We also booked around 40+ rooms for overseas guests, and everyone had a great time as the staff were very responsive, helpful, and chatty. I would highly recommend the wedding banquet, and the hotel rooms, to everyone. Our banquet dinner was held at the Garden Ballroom (on level 1), with around 350 guests but it would fit 400 guests comfortably. We actually booked the hotel 18 months in advance because we were SO awed by the beauty, the natural light, and the birds in the hotel haha :) The food was delicious and we the chef was amendable to menu tweaks (like upgrading certain menu items to Iberico Pork, and adding on extra dessert). All in all, the staff really listen to you, and will do their best to make your vision come true.Shoutout to these staff members who made the wedding day extremely fuss-free and easy for us:Wedding Coordinator: Jodi & Fiona (both EXTREMELY responsive and helpful on WhatsApp over the past few months)Banquet Manager in Charge: Jayden (anticipated problems and helped provide solutions without us even asking) AV In Charge: Wan (very calm presence which helped us feel calm and grounded on the wedding day)Assistant: Vanessa (extremely helpful and constantly helped us with walking, with my gown etc, provided us with water, and non-alcoholic apple juice during our champagne toasting as we do not drink alcohol)11/10 service! Thank you for going above and beyond for us!

Amazing place to stay. Beautiful areas everywhere throughout the hotel. Gorgeous pool area with Collection club. Fantastic, friendly staff. Special thanks to Jenny, Bala & Lanee ( COLLECTION club )for organising a special birthday cake surprise for my sister-in-law.

Definitely a luxury hotel, with bar prices to match. The room was good, with great views of the bay and the aircon worked well. I would have given it 5 stars, but the breakfast buffet was expensive and did not have a great selection of food if you weren't Asian.

Perfect looking room, staff, location! Everything You need is here, access to mall, breakfast buffet with all the food. The receptionist knew my name, very polite! Pool area nice, open late for swimming. Huge hotel! Nice gym, cycle studio etc!

The environment was beautiful and well-maintained. It was my mom's birthday, and we were delighted to receive a wonderful surprise gift from the hotel. The front desk staff member, Greco, was incredibly helpful and took some very nice photos for us!

We had an amazing stay at Parkroyal Collection Marina Bay with access to the Collection Club Lounge and various facilities. On the first night I met Bala and some of his wonderful team (including Adam, Cherry, and Jenny). The level of customer service and genuine care and attention received by the Club Lounge team during our stay are some of the most memorable of my travel experiences in recent years. They really went above and beyond to make our stay so very special. To Bala thank you very much - you are doing an amazing job and your professional and experienced team are a credit to you and the Hotel. For anyone considering whether to stay as a collection club guest I have no hesitation in recommending it - you will be treated exceptionally well and not want your stay to end! Until next time.

Held our wedding banquet at the Atrium Ballroom and the experience was truly amazing. Guests enjoyed the food and experience, and the parkroyal team was really on the ball to support the event, guide the couple on what to expect, and accommodate last minute adjustments. Appreciate the help, flexibility and support from the team!!! Thanks to our wedding coordinator Jodi and Fiona, banquet coordinator Melissa, and AV in charge Haziq for the wonderful experience.

We really enjoyed our stay at Parkroyal. Their staff are super friendly, especially Ganesan who always gives us the warmest greetings whenever he sees us. The hotel has the best location. Close to everything. Big shopping centers downstairs. And Marina Bay is a few minutes away.

Chef: Chef LeeBqt Manager: Melisa & HowardAV Manager: HaziqWedding Manager: XinaFor coordination of every part of our wedding, the service from each and everyone of them was very self-initiative to help us with our big day!On top of that, because we book the family rooms for our family members to stay the night before, we are all very happy with the service throughout our stay as well.Could not thank Xina more than enough for journeying with us throughout <3

PARKROYAL COLLECTION Marina Bay, Singapo.review_title: Amazing team at the Club Collection Lounge
PARKROYAL COLLECTION Marina Bay, Singapo.review_content: Thank you to Bala and the team at the Club Collection Lounge. We have had an amazing few days visiting Singapore. Being welcomed to the lounge everyday and evening, with the most personable and professional level of service weve enjoyed a delicious selection of canaps, decadent cocktails. Our stay has been made extra special with the team of staff who have impressively coordinated and served beautifully prepared food and beverages. Thank you again Bala, Jenny, Adam and Cherry - youre all amazing people, its been lovely meeting you.

Had my anniversary stay here. Kindly received late checkout too as part of the GHA Discovery programme benefits.Mainly wanted to visit the Collection club at Lv5 again. Senior Guest Services Executive Mr.Bala was so great!! Super friendly and enthusiastic, helpful too. Had such a great experience at the collection club, with the high tea cakes and cocktails & Canaps.

PARKROYAL COLLECTION Marina Bay, Singapo.review_title: Best place to stay in Singapore
PARKROYAL COLLECTION Marina Bay, Singapo.review_content: Amazing hotel sitting right in the middle of the Marina Bay Area, Singapore. Great view, exceptional service from the staff, you can really feel the passion, creativity and hospitality. I was served by Bala, who always has a warm smile and knows your needs, definitely recommend this place.

Parkroyal Collection Marina was a brilliant location and all the amenities were lovely. It was so close to the shops and the food served at the motel was absolutely lovely.We had a challenging experience with a Grab taxi wanting cash when we had none and the wonderful Ravi saw how distressed my husband and I were and immediately came to help. He listened carefully to our story and then paid the taxi driver out of his own money without wanting anything back. I cant say enough how grateful my husband and I were for Ravis quick action and assistance. He made us feel safe again. Thank you Ravi.

Held our wedding in May 2024 and could not have asked for a better team (Wedding Manager: Xina, Banquet Manager: Jayson & Jayden, AV Manager: Haziq, Chef: Chef Lee) to accompany us through our journey. Right from our first consultation, Xina had provided us with valuable guidance and responded to all our queries promptly and succinctly. She had not only provided us tips and reminders on things we might have missed out on in the overall planning process for our special day, but went above and beyond to ensure all our requests were met. Truly a professional, and an exceptional joy to work with. We cannot thank her enough for her passion and dedication to make our wedding a seamless yet memorable one.On the day of, Jason, Jayden & Haziq executed everything impeccably, and saw to it that proper timekeeping and support were expediently provided. This is truly appreciated as it allowed for us to focus ourselves on enjoying the event.Food wise, Chef Lee had impressed us time and again from the menu tasting session to the banquet itself. Our guests thoroughly enjoyed the feast provided.Overall a stupendous effort from the team, and definitely a beautiful venue to that made our special day a memorable one!Highly recommended for anyone seeking to tie the knot.Wei Hao & Ivy

We had picked ParkRoyal Collection as the place to hold our wedding, and it turned out amazing! Kudos to the team of Jodi (Wedding Coordinator), Darrell (Banquet Manager) and Aniq (AV Manager), who meticulously led us through the preparation phase and also on the actual day itself! For such an important day, they definitely made it comfortable and easy for us, attending to our needs and giving us really good suggestions.

Been to this hotel several times in my life, but this is the first time in the club floor, and the experience was fantastic. The food of the club lounge as well as the service was fantastic. One person of note that was especially kind and helpful was Mr Yarik Gnatenko, who very gracefully catered to any form of service we required. Quite few serve with the grace he had, and I highly commend it. Being on club floor was definitely worth the pay.

Pan Pacific Singapore.review_title: The best hotel I ever stayed.
Pan Pacific Singapore.review_content: The best food I ever ate. Rose was the best waitress. She told us about everything in Singapore and she was very nice. Bedrooms was very big and there was very quiet. Singapore was very big, friendly and welcoming we saw gardens by the bay and much more we even bought a bag

My experience at Edge was exceptional thanks to the outstanding service provided by Rex. From the moment we were seated, Rex ensured that every detail of our dining experience was perfect. Rex's professionalism and attentiveness made us feel truly valued as guests. Combined with the delicious food and cozy ambiance, Edge and Rex exceeded our expectations. We will definitely be returning!

I got great experience at Pan Pacific SG, the hotel is close to the Marina bay Square and got a short cut to the mall on 2nd floor, pretty convenient. I got take care for my luggage at the hotel lobby, to my room, I got great service with the room maker Sandy. The Plume Bar at the first floor is also a great choice.

We have had the most amazing stay at the Pan Pacific! The staff have been so friendly, especially Melvin and nothing has been too much trouble! Very comfortable rooms with great room services and lovely pool. Thank you so much to Melvin et al.

Had our lunch at Hai Tien Lo celebrating my wife's birthday and were served by Mabel, Michelle and Frankie. The staffs were very attentive and friendly. Food was great tasting! Stayed at pan pacific for the night and the view frim our 30th floor was amazing. Everything went better than expected and we would definitely be back again soon!

Pan Pacific Singapore.review_title: A delightful business lunch made even more pleasurable with excellent service !!
Pan Pacific Singapore.review_content: We had a wonderful lunch in the hotel today that was made even more pleasurable by the excellent services of the catering staff at the hotel. Our lunch served in the Ocean's Meeting Room was nicely curated with an excellent starter accompanied by a most scrumptious Beef main course and a delightful cheesecake dessert.Kudos to the banquet team and especially Shirley who was most attentive as I had some odd requests such as only drinking a half cup of black coffee at each time as I always liked to have my coffee piping hot and so a full cup will not allow me that odd preference.The business lunch was served promptly by very attentive and courteous staff all throughout.This is definitely a hotel to hold your events at and we will return.

Today I went to the panpacific counter to get information about the suite prices. Benjamin was very friendly and recommended the room prices for different rooms. He said that if we book a suite, we can also go to the Pacific club to enjoy afternoon tea. We can also drink wine for free and enjoy the beautiful night view in the evening. I give him a thumbs up.

During my business trip, staying here has been a wonderful experience. Abhi provided exceptional service and warm hospitality, ensuring that my stay was not only comfortable but also truly enjoyable. I deeply appreciate the effort and care.

My family and I stayed at the Pan Pacific Club Studio from 10-12 June 2024. The service was excellent and personal. The room was spacious and our balcony had the beautiful view of MBS and the Flyer. The kids also enjoyed the Urban Jungle play area very much. The buffet spreads at the Pacific Club lounge during the champagne breakfast, afternoon tea and evening cocktail sessions were extensive and offered a range of different cuisines. Special thanks to Anil at VIP reception and Araya at the Pacific Club lounge for the exceptional service and attention. We'll definitely recommend this experience to our friends.

Pan Pacific Singapore.review_title: Drinks at Plume - Pan Pacific Singapore
Pan Pacific Singapore.review_content: 1st visit @ Plume. Excellent experience - interesting drinks consisting of names of birds :) As it was a wkend, there was a DJ in house. The whole ambience was really nice. Staff onsite were really friendly and helped with the selection of drinks .. definitely worth a visit

delicious birthday lunch with extremely attentive staff..special mention : mabel., lee Mee, michelle., apple and zeo .topping up my tea and I always have warm tea to drink ...beautifully presented dim sum abd yummy fried rice and tender beef plus such a pretty Peach longevity buns to end a most lovely meal

The ambience was par excellence and the service was impeccable especially the staff who served us. Special mention to the following staff who displayed professionalism and service : Kelvin , Patrick and Wei Jian. Highly recommend restaurant for my friends and family next time when I am in pan pacific.

We were at Hai Tien Lo for lunch and are very impressed with the high quality dim sum and excellent service by the team- Lee Mee, Kelvin, Wei Jian, Apple, Mabel and Michelle. The team was very attentive throughout our meal and made good recommendations.

Food was par excellence and service was impeccable. Special mention to Mabel who took care of us with great care and attention. good job! Keep up the good work and service.Ambience was good and food was well presented. The staff were all very attentive and provided excellent service

First time at the Plume, served by Putra and what a delightful experience it was, 11/10, fast, friendly, top tier, perfect.Highly recommend for those that enjoy cocktails and a beautiful environment, definitely will revisit the Plume and hopefully meet Putra again. Thank you

One word: Amazing!Thanks to the chefs for the fresh ingredients, food plating was top notch. Thanks to Apple, Zoe and Kelly for the wonderful service. My family and I really enjoyed our dinner here and will definitely come back again. Highly recommend!!

We were assisted by the helpful Anil and Midori during our check-in/check-out recently at the Discovery lounge. We had a pleasant stay and we're looking forward to our next stay with Pan Pacific. Highly recommended and special thanks to Anil and Midori.

The ANIL manager who checked in was very kind. The service and service were very satisfying, and I was very grateful for the quick work. Anil staff is the best.Also, I would like to express my gratitude to Fan Pacific for making a very good impression when I came to Singapore for the first time.

Manager Anil, thank you for your kind response It was my first time in Singapore and I felt very good. Manager Anil, thank you for your kind response It was my first time in Singapore and I felt very good. If I come to Singapore next time, I really want to stay in Pan PacificThank you, ANIL. If I come to Singapore next time, I really want to stay in Pan PacificThank you, ANIL

Really valued the service at the Pan Pacific Club, great views, great food and drink, very relaxing. I would like to thank Shine, Luther, Aldrin, Ramya, Sugu and Jason for making my visit so pleasant.The pool was good and I used the spa twice.

The service is really good in this hotel. The reception guy named Tan Zi Yuan was the best reception that I met in Singapore. The room was tidy and clean. The view is really beautiful out of the window. It was a nice stay in the hotel. I will recommend it to my friend.

The food in the Chinese restaurant is excellent .We always love the dining experience here . Frankie and Kelly are especially attentive and the service we receive here is excellent . We love the food here .The atmosphere here is beautiful and environment vety conducive for family gatherings Thank you so much

I would like to compliment the counter staff by the name of Abhi. I stayed on the 23 June 2024 for my birthday staycation and Abhi has offered a complimentry room upgrade and late check out. He is very attentive and also accommodative to my request. I am very impressed on his service rendered. Keep up the good work!

Exquisitely prepared dimsum which might be pricier than most, but you are paying for great quality. Service staff are well trained and attentive. Dropped a piece of chocolate cake on myself and the manager, Apple, came with wipes almost immediately. Nice and pleasant environment to dine in.

You should take a couple of cocktails in plum bar Kaylee, irlan, Putkap and Meor they are awesome. They are informative and friendly servers. All of the club staff are awesome as well. Book a club room you never disappoint. This hotel exceed my expectations.

Pan Pacific Singapore.review_title: Amazing(Meor and Putra thank you guys)
Pan Pacific Singapore.review_content: Well the plum bar was amaaaaaaazing. Meor was fun and very welcoming and putraMade my day with his great cocktails. Thank you for every single moment you made us have in this cozy seats with its cozy atmosphere. I ll recommend it to any one who asks for it.

We went to have high tea at the atrium of Pan Pacific on a Saturday [when they serve high tea sets with prawn noodles, crpe, laksa and rojak live stations.] The food was very good and the service we received from Trisha and her colleagues was impressive. The restaurant was also very generous in offering two rounds of tea/coffee for their customers. Overall, it was a very pleasant experience, which compares much better than that of my visits to the other top high-tea places in Singapore.

Pan Pacific Singapore.review_title: Wonderful stay in a Pacific Club Room
Pan Pacific Singapore.review_content: Just finishing 3 nights at the wonderful Pan Pacific Hotel Singapore. I stayed in a room that had Pacific Club benefits and must say it was an excellent decision - the team of Ramya, Sugui, Shine, Aldrin and Syiqin were absolutely fantastic in taking care of anything we asked. I would highly recommend the Pacific Club upgrade as it made our experience so amazing. Hope to see you again soon. 10 out of 10 !!

Pan Pacific Singapore.review_title: Best High Tea we have ever had!!!
Pan Pacific Singapore.review_content: The most amazing High Tea! So much food we took some of the cakes home with us!! The local inspired mix of sweet and savoury was just what my mother wanted coming from Australia as she got to experience traditional Singaporean delights! Would definitely recommend it!! Amazing service to top it off! Lovely and will come again

Delightful local inspired afternoon teaThere is a 3 tier pacific cuisine from Keyaki, gai tien lo and rang mahal selection & cold dishes , cheese n fruits buffet.We love the local stations with Penang Assam laksa, Char Kway Teow with crab meat, prawn Mee with big fresh tiger prawns, fruit rojak , D24 durian crepe. Service crew Sufian, JY and Cris are very attentive and professional. Two choices of beverages with each seating.Lovely ambience with privacy. Will definitely be back!

During my recent stay at Pan Pacific I had the pleasure of being assisted by Melvin at the check-in counter, and his exceptional service truly set the tone for my visit. From the moment I approached the desk, Melvin greeted me with a warm and genuine smile that instantly made me feel welcomed. His friendly demeanor was complemented by his efficient and professional handling of the check-in process.Melvin's attention to detail was remarkable. He ensured that all my preferences and requests were noted and accommodated, making the entire process seamless. He took the time to explain the hotel amenities, local attractions, and even provided some excellent dining recommendations. His knowledge of the area and enthusiasm for sharing tips enhanced my overall experience.What stood out most was Melvin's ability to balance professionalism with a personal touch. He remembered my name throughout my stay and always checked in to see if everything was going well. His proactive approach and willingness to go above and beyond made a significant difference.In a world where customer service can often feel impersonal, Melvin's genuine friendliness and dedication to guest satisfaction were refreshing. He is undoubtedly an asset to the Pan Pacific team and a key reason I look forward to returning.

Shariah provided the best service amongst the hotels which I've been to. She helped with the room upgrades and even gone out of her way to provide us with adequate choices before we made our decision. We are very appreciative of what you've done. Great job!

The hotel is STUNNING and everyone working here is wonderful! Anson was especially helpful while checking in and was able to get us into a room with an incredible view. As our flight was very early in the morning, he was able to arrange us breakfast to get delivered to our room before we leave which was so appreciative.

The vibe of the place is really nice !Although lower floor rooms are more better and spacious, never the less, rooms are nicely designed and comfortable.Thank you Melvin for making the stay even more pleasant !Decent breakfast spread and food is great !Good connectivity to central business district and has some amazing views of the harbour...

I heard that pan pacific near marina bay has the best view so i opted to go there with my husband for our 2nd wedding anniversary and we were surprised as we got an free upgrade for our hotel room by pan pacific staff Melvin! Such a great stay and the room was so beautiful thankyou Melvin for the upgrade! You made our day!

I went to PLUME the hotel bar with two of my other friends, it was a nice and comfy bar with many seats! I sat at the bar counter as my friends and I always loved to chat with the bartenders to find out more about the thought process behind their drinks. On that day Jun Han the Head Mixologist at PLUME was working. We had a great chat with him and he explained why and how they had an inspiration of birds and cocktails and combined them together! I had a total of 3 drinks: THE ORIENTAL PIED HORNBILL, THE CRIMSON SUNBIRD and THE BLACK-NAPED ORIOLE! All super delicious! Most of their drinks tend to be more fruity, sour and floral kind of based instead of full-on spirit-forward which is nice because I enjoy these kinds of drinks~ But they do have classic cocktails which are spirit forwards as well such as a GodFather, Martinis and Old Fashioned (my other friend loves classic cocktails and she ordered these 3 and they were super delicious as well!) But nonetheless, Jun Han was a fantastic host and he helped recommend us those drinks as well! Really really good job PLUME! My friends and I had a great experience in PLUME! I will be back to try out THE BANDED WOODPECKER! Please drop a visit to PLUME I highly recommend it as a bar! And of course please look out for Jun Han and amazing guy to talk to! P.s. I am so sad I forgot to take photos I was too busy talking and enjoying the drinks to T.T

Pan Pacific Singapore.review_title: Warm hospitality with stunning view from my room!
Pan Pacific Singapore.review_content: I had an excellent stay at Pan Pacific Singapore! Special shoutout to the staff member Abhi for making my experience memorable. The early check-in was a huge convenience, allowing me to get ready and head out without any hassle. The bed was incredibly comfy, and the room was very clean. Plus, the view was amazingI could see the Singapore Flyer from my room. From the moment I walked into the hotel, I was greeted with warm smiles from everyone. Ive never experienced such a welcoming atmosphere in any other hotel. I will definitely be coming back again!

Anil, Jennifer, and Cris from the club have been extremely helpful during my stay here at Pan Pacific. After a long night shift, I plan to surprise my family with a staycation. Anil and Jennifer instinctly feel my tiredness and have gone beyond to ensure that my needs have been addressed. I am really grateful to them and will definitely be back with my family soon.

Its an excellent experience always to visit Pan PACIFICs any outlet be it restaurant or bar or longeThe rooms are spacious and has one of the best lobby. Hai Tien Lo serves best Chinese cuisine in Singapore. Worth the visit to experience excellence.

Teppanyaki dinner at Keyaki was great, ingredients are very fresh and tasted really great. Really appreciate Chef Carson for always checking in with us and we love his specially handmade dessert just for us! He also made a salt anniversary for us, going out of his way to make our anniversary a very memorable one. Shout out to Chef Eric too for being so friendly, had a great chat with him.The service staff are great too, we were waited by Van and Sharon, they were very attentive and served us with a warm smile throughout. Would also like to commend Sharon for rectifying payment issue immediately and readily. We thoroughly enjoyed the dinner.

nice room, great view. was given a nice upgrade by anson after some delays in the check in process along with an additional bed for the kid. location of the hotel is great. kids club and pool for the kids. highly recommend this place for family getaways

Fantastic staff, really nice hotel best Ive ever seen. I recommend Melvin as he is ver welcoming and friendly. I think anyone should visit this hotel for a great experience. Should plan ahead but the staff will allow you to reserve and organize your trip.

We had a wonderful experience, thanks in large part to DM Roxanne. We had a booking issue, but Roxanne went above and beyond to resolve it quickly and efficiently. Her professionalism and care made us feel truly valued.The room was spacious with stunning city views, and the hotel's facilities were excellent. Breakfast buffet is exceptional with wide variety of choices. We highly recommend this hotel and will definitely return.

Pan Pacific Singapore.review_title: Graceful Luxury service for our dinner
Pan Pacific Singapore.review_content: I just wanted to say how much we appreciated the excellent service Hai Tian Lou provided today. The service went above and beyond to make sure we had a fantastic dinning experience especially this special gathered for us after 10 years we didnt meet each other . Your attention to detail and friendly demeanour truly made our meal Special. Once again thank you for the graceful luxury service you guys provided today. Specially thanks for Lee Mee, Mabel ,Wei Jian, Samuel, Zoe and Apple

I would like to extend my heartfelt compliments to the staff at the Pacific Club Lounge. Throughout my three-day stay, every meal there was a delightful experience. The warmth and friendliness of all the staff members were truly exceptional. Even my five-year-old daughter remarked on how happy everyone looked while working there, which speaks volumes about the staff morale.Thank you, Syiqin, Ramyah, Shine, Sugu, and Luther, for your wonderful service. You all made our stay memorable and enjoyable.

Went over for some drinks with my friends after dinner. Love the ambience and was intrigued with the interesting list of cocktails. Appreciate the great service by the bartenders, especially Jun Han. Would definitely be back here for more

The service at pan pacific is top notch. From the moment you step out of the vehicle to getting in your room, the whole experience is so seamless and easy. Dylan has also be extremely helpful and very hospitable and remembers to greet everyone he sees, even children! We had such a wonderful experience overall at the hotel and will be sure to return.

Had a few drinks at PLUME and was served by Jun Han as I was sitting at the bar counter. Excellent cocktails and a sizeable spirits collection of good quality.Looking forward to my next visit. I would recommend this space for office/networking events as well.

Bar plume was amazing with personal touches from Jun Han.He recommended and created special cocktails for us suited for our preferences.Cocktails looks stunning and Jun Han was very friendly and patient with us to recommend us cocktails

We loved our stay at Pan Pacific Singapore. The location was super central and well connected to malls which connected to the MRT which is what we often used to get around the city. The rooms are well maintained and clean. We had an issue on the first night where none of our backlighting in the room turned off, but that was quickly resolved by their services team. Even though our room did not have a marina view, we did have a lovely view up on level 27 overlooking somewhat towards the ocean, it made for the best sun rises views. The lifts always took really really long to get to the level we are on, but that may have been due to lots of people using it. Overall a really good stay.

Raffles Hotel Singapore.review_content: My partner and I booked a weekend stay as a birthday treat for me. We've been fortunate to have stayed a few times before and staying at the Grand Dame of Singapore is always a pleasure. We checked in early and checked out late the next day -- a nice touch by the reservations team. Thanks to Elina. And also to our butler Ancy -- the chocolate expert! We stayed in a studio suite in the main building, which has its own verandah overlooking the fountain courtyard. The suite, though small, is so quiet and relaxing, and a great way to unwind after a hectic week and to recharge for the next. Things we really enjoyed: -- Lunch at the pool bar, which is only open to in-house guests. Impeccable service by Arief and Hafiz at the pool bar, who looked after us on the two days we stayed. -- The Writers Bar -- an old favourite. Again excellent service -- attentive, friendly but not overwhelming. Apart from the polished performance of the staff, we just really like the cozy decor. It is a small bar but it's so comfortable and inviting. It's nice to just linger there and chat. -- Breakfast in the fountain courtyard. A nice way to start the day and the food selection (buffet or a la carte) is excellent. Service can be a bit slow at times -- not enough staff I suspect. It's also just nice to wander around the hotel, take in the history, look the famous people who've stayed over the years and to see how the hotel has changed with the times. Yes, Raffles can feel a bit commercial and capitalises heavily on its past. But service remains excellent and the hotel still retains an old-world charm, yet is up-to-date. And yes, it's pricey. But it's still a fab place to visit.

Our stay at Raffles was all that we hoped it would be. Our suite was luxurious, particularly the bathroom with its inlaid marble floor which was absolutely stunning. No attention to detail had been spared - there was even a pillow for the bath. The staff were all so friendly and made us feel very welcome. Particular mention should be given to Roslee Sukar, the hotel's resident historian, who took us on a guided tour of the hotel. Roslee's enthusiasm for Raffles shone through and we would recommend anyone staying at Raffles to take the tour with Roslee. Our suite came with its own butlers, Reena and Thyra, who left me a lovely card, balloons and a little birthday cake for my birthday which was a lovely touch. The breakfast buffet was excellent. We enjoyed drinks in the Long Bar and the Writers Bar and had a lovely dinner at the Chinese restaturant, Yi by Jereme Leung. Everything about Raffles was luxurious. Obviously, all this comes at a cost, but we felt it was worth it for the experience we had.

Raffles Hotel Singapore.review_title: Everything You've Ever Heard And So Much More!
Raffles Hotel Singapore.review_content: It may sound corny but a stay at Raffles is more than that, it's a life experience everyone should have at least once. Sadly, the only disappointment we experienced was having to leave! Our brief but wonderful stay was the result of lovely, attentive staff providing perfect service whenever needed in surroundings that are the perfect mix of understated elegance and modern efficiency.

Raffles Hotel Singapore.review_title: Everything in this hotel is worth to stay and enjoy
Raffles Hotel Singapore.review_content: Exceptional place to stay, amazing service, unique history!Would recommend to all my freind to experience the Raffels.The food is the best experience I ever had in the hotels. Everything was cooked as per my request, fresh juices, I dial stale, white omelette, steamed vegetables! The room service was perfect, very clean and spacious room, pillows and mattress are perfect. Butlers were very helpful and friendly. Gym clean and useful. Pool clean and comfortable. WiFi easy to connect. Check in/out very easy. Hotel staff is extremely friendly and professional.

Is such an iconic place, it is hard not to love. This is my 2nd time staying here and I just adored both times. The rooms are simply beautiful and you are in the heart of the city. Great for celebrating special occasions with the discreet luxury and attentiveness of the fabulous staff. Really surprised by the tranquility of the rooftop swimming pool and highly recommend afternoon tea.

From the moment you arrive and walk through the doors of Raffles Hotel Singapore, you are embraced into an oasis of calmness hard to describe in words. Every member of staff, is polite, courteous and friendly. The Butler system is amazing, Kartini became our butler, she was professional and friendly, with a can do attitude to any request. The other Butlers confirmed that all are well trained and do their job with a passion to make every guest feel welcomed and at home.We hosted guests for breakfast, they said it was the best breakfast they had ever had! Well worth enjoying the buffet & cooked menu, everyday of your stay.The rooms are fantastic, spacious suites, well equipped amenities in the bathrooms, efficient air conditioning and fans. The housekeeping team keep them immaculate during your stay.Thank you Raffles Hotel for making our trip to Singapore so enjoyable - we will be back!

We will meet again and again the motto of Raffles brand. Truly first class at every touch point of service & hospitality. Competitors in the luxury space can learn in how Raffles delivers on a very personal high quality service that leaves a warmth to come again. Superb!

Raffles Hotel Singapore.review_title: Lovely to be at this hotel once again
Raffles Hotel Singapore.review_content: Beautiful and iconic building - one of the most famous hotels in the world and deservedly so. Very good service overall although in some areas like the lobby restaurant there is an obvious lack o training. But the attitude is great and very easy to fix issue. The gym doesn't have towels at hand, no headphones although there's a drawer for them and the equipment is good.

Raffles Hotel Singapore.review_title: Exception hotel. All was first class
Raffles Hotel Singapore.review_content: Everything about this hotel was outstanding. The building inside and out, the welcome, the service, the spa. I could go on and on. A wonderful experience not to be missed. If you have the opportunity to go to Singapore, even if the hotel charges are outside your budget at least visit although I cannot recommend the Long Bar where visitors queue to experience it, residents can book a table, and a Singapore Sling in particular- bit rough and ready once you are inside

Only came to have a look around and look at the gift shop. Really lovely hotel. Staff were so polite even though we werent staying. Wasnt so easy to find the shop however it allowed us to explore the grounds and capture the beauty! Worth a visit and the gift shop is a plenty

Raffles needs to be visited in Singapore - the beautiful old building with the rich history. The High Tea in the Grand Lobby is a fantastic experience, make sure you do it with champagne. And cap it off with a Singapore Sling in the long bar - sure, it all adds up - but you are only here once.

The suit was an experience, comfortable stay. Location close to most attractions. Friendly and helpful staff. The butler allocated was helpful, approachable and friendly. The heritage tour about the hotel was illuminating. The experience was unforgettable.

Raffles was an incredible experience, and we wish we had stayed longer. At the Writers Bar, Suren and Kali Johare were friendly and welcoming and made us exceptional drinks. They spent time with us to explain the different drinks and give us background and history on Raffles. We had such a fun time! Book a history tour with Roslee, the resident historian. He is so energetic and full of knowledge, and we learned so much from the tour while having a great time. Must-do!Thank you to Kasim for always greeting us so kindly and making us feel so welcome at Raffles! Our experience was seamless from start to finis. Our butler was very friendly, knowledgeable, and helpful and made us dinner/drinks reservations and organized late a check out and hotel transportation. Thank you!

We had a staycay at Raffles hotel. Truly the best hotel in Singapore. The hotel staff was great from front office, butlers, food and beverage team and pool, they simply made us feel so welcomed. The hotel is so beautiful and quiet, we took so many photos! We hope to come back again.

On a business trip sadly only a night stay, raffles continue to maintain the standards of what luxury living is all about, found them pretty short handed at times but nevertheless the service and accommodation was flawless truly. Highly recommended to anyone who has not stayed in the raffles Hotel.

Raffles Hotel Singapore.review_title: A MUST do when visiting Singapore
Raffles Hotel Singapore.review_content: When visiting Singapore you must visit this world famous iconic hotel. The architecture is beautiful and the atmosphere is beautiful. A great place to grab a famous Singapore Sling and a meal. There are a number of inside and outside options to choose from. Great service too!!

Stayed for 5 days 4 nights, mix of business and leisure.Rooms, Food and Drinks, Hospitality at a very high level.High expectations - no disappointment.The hotel grounds are amazing, very central location and the customer service is excellent

Took me a while to find here, due to the fact I turned up at the rear of the hotel instead of the front, but there again that pretty much sums me up. After several directions, I found the famous bar. I was shown to the bar or table if I prefered straight away.. I took the bar, being on my own, I wanted to mix and chat to people.Service behind the bar was excellent, extremely friendly and quick serice. Had two slings and a cocktail. Threw my peanut shells on the floor as you do and enjoyed everything. Only reason 1 star removed was, ladly next to me asked me to pass her some coasters from where I was sitting. I did so and a waspy waitress told me off and said I had to ask for them. That would be fine if it had been for me, but I only passed them to the women next to me. Think the waitress soon realised what had happened and gave me two coasters and smiled!....Weired.

Raffles Hotel Singapore.review_title: Fantastic stay in an iconic hotel
Raffles Hotel Singapore.review_content: We have stayed at a lot of very nice hotels over the years but nothing could have prepared us for our stay at this iconic hotel. We were a little apprehensive that it may have felt pretentious but how wrong we were. From the moment the doorman meets you at your car and welcomes you by name you know this is a special place. Check in is so different to any other check in. It takes place in your suite with your butler and we were lucky enough to be upgraded to the John Wayne suite which was such a privilege. Breakfast in the Tiffin room is an event as are drinks in the Long Bar and Writers Bar. Staff at the Long Bar were so helpful in reserving a table for us to allow us to skip the queues. One of the perks of being a resident. The weather was kind to us during our stay and we therefore spent a fair amount of time at the pool area. Clarence who looks after the pool bar is one of the nicest people you could wish to meet, a true gentleman. When walking around the hotel all the staff know your name, we really dont know how they do this but it just adds to the feeling of being part of the Raffles family. Wonderful. Yes its expensive but this is Raffles, probably the best hotel we will ever be fortunate enough to stay in. The building is fantastic and attention to detail unparalleled but, without doubt, its the staff (each and everyone of them) that makes Raffles what it is. A massive thank you to all of them. Finally one last thing to mention is the history tour which is complimentary. You learn so much about the hotel and is well worth doing. Thank you Nazir, your tour was so enjoyable. If youre thinking of staying just do it, you wont be disappointed.

Raffles Hotel Singapore.review_title: Best hotel we stayed so far
Raffles Hotel Singapore.review_content: We stayed at Raffles hotel for 2 nights for our wedding day. Every single staff treated us with warmth, and were very attentive to our needs. They surprised us with lots of gifts and were constantly checking in to make sure that we were in good hands. Thank you for making our big day extra memorable.

Raffles Hotel Singapore.review_title: A Once in A Lifetime experience.....
Raffles Hotel Singapore.review_content: It is not a hotel. It is - at least for us - an lifetime experience. Before checking it at the Raffles, we had 12 nigths at Langkawi Islands. beautiful place, nice hotel, excellent food. For these 12 nights we payed less than for our "1-night-stand" at the Raffles. But it was worth every single cent. In the middle of a more than modern town you can enjoy a breath of the past. But it is not like a museum, because it is a relativly open space and not a strictly gated community. Staff is friendly, far away from stiff and more than helpful. And everybody we met was obviously proud of working at this place. We are very glad for this experience, even if we are not sure if we can manage to repead it. But anyway, when we will be in Singapore next March, we will definetly try to have a Singapore Sling in the garden of the Raffles....

Its not often that I write an online review, but after my recent two-night stay at Raffles, I feel compelled to :-)I have dreamt of staying at Raffles Hotel Singapore for many years, and my recent stay really was a dream come true.I was ecstatic that my room was upgraded to the next category - it was luxurious and spacious, with a complimentary mini bar, chocolates on arrival, an enormous bathroom and insanely comfortable pillows :-)My butler was wonderful, and after explaining the room features to me, took me on a tour of the hotels facilities, which finished at the Courtyard Bar where I had my first of many delicious Singapore Slings of my stay! :-) I wanted to experience everything that Raffles had to offer; my massage and facial were pure luxury, the high tea incredible, and throwing the peanut shells on the ground at Long Bar super fun! The Writers Bar was my favourite, where I could perch at the bar and speak to the wonderful bar staff and other guests.Raffles isnt just a hotel; its the destination. Ive stayed at many 5-star hotels, but none like this. Despite the high (but fair - its worth every cent) price point, there is no pretentiousness to be found at Raffles. The staff all have a genuine love for their jobs. Their friendliness is real and they magically seem to know all guests names :-) Their attention to detail and personalised dedication to going above and beyond is what makes this hotel truly special.I am already planning my next trip - thank you for the most spectacular memories that I will never forget :-)

Raffles Hotel Singapore.review_title: Amazing luxury hotel with a lot of history
Raffles Hotel Singapore.review_content: My husband and I stayed at Raffles for our honeymoon and we could not have chosen a better hotel. Everything about our stay was perfect. The room was spotless the service was impeccable. We especially enjoyed the hotel history tour with resident historian Roslee. That was our favorite part of the stay!

We were helped by Allen throughout our evening here. Helping us graciously to move around the property. Great welcome from all the staff and colleagues here at the Raffles.We went to the Raffles bar and then to chineses food at Jereme Leung.

We stayed for 3 nights, everything was amazing, all the staff, the building and room, the pool and grounds were all impeccable and beautiful. The location was great and close to MRT and shops, restaurants and bars.ALL the staff were so friendly and helpful.The breakfasts were delicious and a great variety of items - excellent quality.Yi restaurant was a fantastic experience.We enjoyed the long bar and the Writers bar - excellent cocktails!The hotel is beautiful and lovely to walk around and discover all the shops and gardens.We would love to be able to stay again!Highly recommend this experience.

Our recent stay at Raffles was so special and memorable.From the limousine collection at the airport, to the check-in and butler briefing, to the check-out and farewell by the doorman at the end of our stay, all your staff went above and beyond to make our stay extra special, particularly as it was my wife's "milestone birthday" celebration.Every day we enjoyed interacting with your staff, be it in the lobby, or at breakfast, or the historical tour.There are too many staff to name who gave us great service, but all of them were appreciated and made for a fabulous stay !

This is the most amazing, welcoming and peaceful hotel I have ever stayed in. A great location, helpful staff in the most beautiful surroundings. It's hard to believe that you are in the middle of the city.It is a must visit hotel, from the Long Bar and the well renowned Singapore Sling to the exceptionally clean space

What Can I say, the family and I have stayed many times at The Raffles over the past 20 years and it never disappoints. On this occasion i was celebrating my 60th birthday with my wife, children and grandchildren and they went way beyond making me feel very special indeed. We are fortunate to be in a position to travel extensively and have stayed at many wonderful properties around the world, but one thing is, The Raffles is by far our preferred property. From the front office staff who sort out our bookings, The Butlers who look after us during our stay, Housekeeping who do such a wonderful job which might I add cannot be faulted, keeping in mind my wife is very picky in the cleaning department, to the concierge department, they were all very professional and attentive.We had two Palm Court Suite's next to each other, which i would recommend if you have family with you, they are large and as you would expect are luxuriously appointed. The raffles have several room types and we have tried them all over the years and they are all very luxurious appointed, so it just boils down to preference. Location is perfect and is across the road from Raffles City shopping center which has many shops and dining options. That said, the inhouse restaurants and in room dinning cannot be faulted, as you would expect from Raffles. We highly recommend if you are looking at wanting a fantastic experience, I would always recommend The Raffles, don't even hesitate. Thank you to everyone at Raffles who made my 60th birthday such a memorable experience for not only myself but my whole family you made not only me but the whole family feel very special.

One of the best hotels I have ever stayed at! Beautiful rooms, outstanding service and amazing restaurants and the Long Bar for a Singapore Sling is not to be missed. We absolutely loved Singapore. A beautiful city and the Gardens on the Bay is unbelievable. A must see!

The hotel is luxurious, had great food, the staff was friendly and prompt. We liked the white colors of the walls. There was a harp player for lunch. It was fun to have a drink at the Long Bar. They had special restaurants for Indian, French and Chinese food. It was one of the highlights of our trip!!!

Very short stopover stay which ended our holiday on a high. Wish we had booked longer. We arrived and were checked in by the friendly and efficient reception team. Once shown to our suite. Steph our Butler arrived to explain the details to us and made us feel very welcome. A visit to the Writers Bar, again excellent service and an enjoyable pre dinner drink. Dinner at The Tiffin Room. Delicious meal served by charming staff, Departed early next morning supplied with a fantastic breakfast box. Our expectations were high and were exceeded on all fronts. a truly memorable stay.

A hotel that has been on my wish-list for many years. So we stopped in Singapore on our way home to the UK from Melbourne. The airport isnt far away and on arrival, the welcome is instant and perfect. We were shown to our room - an upgrade to the Noel Coward suite. In fact this room is rather smaller than the room I had booked but it is in a small wing of the old part of the building which was nice. The rooms are of course beautifully appointed. A/C worked a bit too well for us though - and the bed isnt the most comfy - but everything else is superb. The crowning glory of course are all the staff who are clearly trained to an incredible standard. Breakfast was delightful - I had the local breakfast of curry something on two mornings which was well worth trying. We had a morning by the roof-top pool and enjoyed that. A highlight for me was a tour around parts of the hotel by a Gentleman whose name I sadly dont recall - but hes been at the hotel forever and has plenty of good stories. The Long Bar is a must and we were told to walk past the long queue and announce ourselves as hotel guests - thank goodness as the wait time was boringly long. Mrs W loved the Singapore Sling - I thought it was horrid. But it was concocted for women! I loved the Writers Bar. Small and classy with killer cocktails. All in all, great fun. Reassuringly giant bill and Im sure well be back one day.

The Raffles is a beautiful and very well-kept hotel. But what would the best hotel be without good staff? Tonight the waiter Allen gave us excellent service when we came out of the Writers Bar. Thank you for that. We will probably stay here next time.

We went as a retirement present to each other. An absolutely beautiful hotel, 5 star plus!!Our Courtyard suite was amazing. The suite has a parlour, bedroom, bathroom. All the fixtures and fittings are top class. Exquisite detail and so luxurious. Beautiful and memorable.The staff are exceptional and knowledgeable, so friendly. Our breakfast was delicious and no hustle and bustle like busy hotels. The service again was perfect. We would definitely recommend this wonderful hotel and would love to go back.

Raffles Hotel Singapore.review_title: An unforgettable experience, iconic global property
Raffles Hotel Singapore.review_content: Our stay at this truly iconic global property was not disappointing. From check in to check out, service was impeccable. Never once felt like an inconvenience to staff, who were always eager to help with a smile and gratitude to serve. Vikram at the front door was especially amazing, recommending places to go each day. The rooms are spacious, impeccably kept, and full of amenities They even brought my wife a legitimate transformer so she could use her American hair dryer. Daily breakfast was also perhaps the very best hotel breakfast I have ever had.This is a legitimate five star property. Yes, it is significantly pricier than the other five star properties in Singapore, but worth every penny. It is a premium property well beyond the others.

Amazing place, there is so many different aspects to this hotel. Everyone knows about the long Bar and the 5start Hotel and restaurant but there are so many other areas. We had coffee and cheese cake on the cafe. Truly amazing well worth the inflated prices.

Best door man Harpreet Singh. He was very kind to us and helped us to get a feel of staying here. We wish him all the best. The atmosphere of the hotel is very calm and soothing. We enjoyed our time. The food was great and tiffin room was fantastic.

Excellent breakfast and spacious suite. Would suggest asking for 2nd floor (1st floor is ground level) room to enjoy best location. Food of good quality and staff ver attentive. Long bar over-rated but ask concierge to book rather than queue.

As part of our stay booked the history tour and really recommend it. Nazir (historian) was extremely knowledgeable and entertaining - we learnt lots about the hotel and even got to see (and have our photos taken) in the hotels best suite! Amazing to see the photos of all the famous guests the hotel has hosted over the years from Royalty to film stars gives a real sense of the iconic status of the hotel.

Raffles Hotel Singapore.review_title: Exquisite experience- both the hotel itself and the service were impeccable
Raffles Hotel Singapore.review_content: Raffles is an amazing experience. A destination in itself. From the gorgeous lobby to beautiful balconies, there are so many places to sit and enjoy. The gym and rooftop pool were exquisite. The service was impeccable. We loved getting to speak to the Historian, who was a pleasure to spend time with. The Afternoon Tea was exceptional. And dinner at Butchers Block was a once in a lifetime experience.

We absolutely loved it. We visited the Long Bar. The atmosphere was fabulous. We did, of course, have a Singapore Sling. It would appear that the dress code is anything goes. We saw jeans, flip flops, and really casual wear. Having said that, we did stick to the dress code we saw online. I really wish others had made the effort. Great experience, and I would recommend

Had high tea numerous times at the grand lobby but today was my best experience thanks to their staff Natasha. She was very polite, forthcoming and understanding of our dietary restrictions. What an asset to their team. Thank you Natasha..

This unique historical property is very special. The renovated hotels suits are a delight. A very smooth check-in (we received an unexpected upgrade) and a very helpful butler were just the start of the services provided. We indulged in afternoon tea in the lobby area which was superb with tastes of Japan.The buffet breakfast options were all one could expect to set one up to enjoy the tourist attractions of the city. Dinner in the Tiffin Room was special and none of the selections disappointed. Our only regret was the shortness of our stay. There are other luxury hotels in Singapore but nothing as special as Raffles. From the impressive doormen, the butler and other service providers all provided a faultless service which made the stay memorable. You have to work hard to provide this level of hotel hospitality and they do at 1 Beach Road.

We had High Tea at Raffles today. It was superb. CK our maitre D was so knowledgeable and explained the flavours we were unfamiliar with. So much food, and the presentation was second to none. Pastries, sandwiches, sweets and scones were amazing. The rosewater jam and clotted cream on the scones was beautiful. Worth every cent. Just wonderful.
This is one of the best hotel stays I ever experienced. Staff were so professional and friendly. Such a wonderful place which is steeped in history.

Raffles Hotel Singapore.review_title: One of the most fabulous hotels I have ever visited
Raffles Hotel Singapore.review_content: Only spent a single night here and I wished it could have been more. Centrally placed for Central Market the hotel was very opulent and maintained a lot of its original features. Great bars and the buffet breakfast was to die forSuch big beds very confortable. WiFi however wasnt the best but cant complain at such an amazing place

Raffles Hotel Singapore.review_title: Raffles Hotel Singapore. An experience to remember!
Raffles Hotel Singapore.review_content: From making the booking to checkout the staff of Raffles Hotel Singapore provided the most amazing friendly and professional service imaginable. I explained the stay was to celebrate my wife's birthday and they pulled out all the stops to make our stay a truly memorable experience!The hotel tour given by Mr. Roslee Sukar was an absolute highlight and thoroughly recommended. We had lunch at the Chinese restaurant Yi, a Singapore Sling (or two) at the Long Bar, cocktails at the Writers Bar, dinner at La Dame De Pic and breakfast in the Tiffin Room. All had amazing food, drinks and service.Thank you RHS for a wonderful experienc!

Raffles Hotel Singapore.review_title: A grand old lady of an hotel
Raffles Hotel Singapore.review_content: We werent guests booked into the hotel but visitors like so many of the others we saw whilst walking around.Fantastic building and grounds and all of the staff we met had a smile and a welcome.Yes we went to the Long Bar and yea we had Singapore Sling cocktails - all part of visiting Singapore.Just a great visit that lasted a couple of hours as we toured the shops and grounds.You dont get the enter via the main lobby unless you have a reservation but I dont blame the hotel - at $1500 per night for the cheapest room they dont want it full of tourists getting in the way of guests checking in but that doesnt stop your enjoyment of this grand old lady of the East

Raffles Hotel Singapore.review_title: Special shout out to our Raffles Butlers
Raffles Hotel Singapore.review_content: Raffles Singapore is an unparalleled hotel in Singapore. Its in a class of its own. What really makes it stand out is not just the physical location or the hotel facilities but the AMAZING staff. They truly make it a home away from home. We were pampered and looked after. The staff were like well-oiled machine. So THANK YOU VERY MUCH James Tan and Yu Xuan, our super star butlers. Also last but not least, wed like to extend our appreciation to the front desk staff, the doormen, the dining team, the pool team, the housekeeping team and the chef who prepared our beautiful supper. Oh, dont forget the join the history tour with Mr Nazir, hes walking encyclopaedia of the Raffles Hotel. We will be back !

Raffles Hotel Singapore gets everything absolutely right. The building is astonishingly beautiful architecturally, the recent revamp, masterfully executed. The rooftop pool has the perfect temperature water and the loveliest staff taking care of you. All was perfectly appointed with every detail perfect. And its user-friendly. Rooms are equipped with iPads that do all the mechanics of the room simply and effectively. Food is excellent too. I think this one of the most beautiful hotels in the world. The level of taste is very high

Shangri-La Singapore.review_content: We stayed last month with family and it was awesome from check in (in our room) to checkout! From service, facilities, staff, food and room. But there is a staff who stands out! Shoutout to WENCY VENTURA from Guest Relations who took good care of us. He never fails to give good suggestions, informations about hotel, Singapore and good food. Everyday in the lobby, he is a face and a smile of Shangri-La. Wency even gave us small gift and handwritten card. So simple but very sweet gesture. Thats why we made sure to meet him before we checked out. Indeed, Wency is the Best Guest Relations Staff we met so far!We will definitely comeback and looking forward to see Shangri-La again soon, especially Wency!

Beautiful hotel and exceptional service. We loved our stay here and cant wait to come back! The kids club, buds, is brilliant and our girls were desperate to go each day. There is also a splash park which was a hit and the overall pool setup works really well for younger children.

The staff was super friendly and helpful, particularly Warren who was my room attendant and the folks who helped me get a taxi during a really busy season to the airport. Breakfast buffet was nice to have a variety of options before a busy day, but otherwise would just take the close walk to Orchid Street to get a variety of food in their basement level.

Shangri-La Singapore.review_title: A high end hotel well situated for shopping and botanical gardens
Shangri-La Singapore.review_content: This was our first time in Singapore. Could tell as soon as we were dropped off at the entrance that the Shangri La was one of the better hotels, in fact a top notch hotel. Our heavy cases (we'd just had over 6 weeks travelling round Australia) were efficiently whisked away. The first sight of the foyer was pretty impressive. The reception staff were professional and pleasant. Our spacious room was in the garden wing which suited us.
