Plenty of comfortable chairs and balcony furniture although it was so hot and sticky we didn't sit outside for too long. The bathroom was well set out with a convenient washing line over the bath. Loads of storage for clothes. Spotlessly clean. Just took a long time for the shower to warm up but as its a hot climate maybe a hot shower wasn't a good idea. The range of breakfast food was incredible, catering to both Western and oriental tastes. And to have our eggs freshly cooked was a luxury as most places we stayed on our travels served less than hot food.The gardens were beautiful and well tended. There was always someone tidying up or cleaning inside and out. We didnt use the pool but it was big and well set out with lifeguards on duty.As we only had the internet to find out about places to visit we would've welcomed some leaflets and maps and also information about the hotel services. Very handy for someone who doesn't know their way round.Saying that though, the Shangri La is a stylish, well run hotel.

Shangri-La Singapore.review_title: Overall good experience and excellent service
Shangri-La Singapore.review_content: Stayed at pan pacific for the night and the view frim our 30th floor was amazing. Everything went better than expected and we would definitely be back again soon!

So.... we have been coming to Shangrila in Grange Road since 2022 every Jun and Dec school holidays.. what can i say... Simply Wow!!! The staffs are so friendly and really make us feel at home everytime. Therr is a staff by the name of Jega.. he really made my daughter the happiest. He will spend time to talk to her and asnwering her millions questions. Staff like Jega is one of the reasons why we kept coming back to Shangrila! The facilities are so children friendly. My daughter spent 4 to 5 hrs at the pool and making new friends. Guess who will be back in Dec??? Yes we are!!!!

Best experience from Shangri-la. My experience at Shang over a 3D2N stay was excellent. The services provided at the hotel was remarkable. Notably to commend the sharma and vijey from the bell desk,Hassan and Rajiv from Concierge and Jasmine from the FOH.Thank you for the hospitality and care.The hotel is definitely a go to for families with kids.will be back again

Shangri-La Singapore.review_title: ADA friendly, luxury, great for families
Shangri-La Singapore.review_content: Great for families, beautiful, light- filled, ADA friendly. We had a fully accessible room. I love the garden side with hanging gardens outside the rooms, none of the stuffy feel of a traditional hotel with dark corridors. Full pan Asian breakfast every day, great for the kids with so many options and quantity! Accessible ways to get everywhere, the gym, pool, restaurant. Lovely lobby and bar, very classy.

Shangri-La service excellence starts from the time the doorman opens the taxi door to our last day in Singapore. Everyone is friendly, polite and efficient. Special thanks to Wency, guest relations. Wency never fails to greet and asked how our day was going. The restaurants recommendation was on point, we enjoyed the breakfast buffet at the Line. Because he was off on the day we are leaving, he took time to say goodbye and wishes us well. We enjoyed the cookies and tea treats. Thank you, Wency for being thoughtful. I will miss your smiling face and friendliness! Special thanks to Carlo (he wears the Tibetan costume) good with providing walking directions to surrounding areas. In addition, thank you for telling us about the shuttle service to ION Mall. Thanks for being attentive and friendly.

We had such a great time staying at the Shangri-la for the weekend. Made particularly special by the service of Ravi and Navin! The pool is a great relaxing environment. Huge breakfast selection and the staff are always on hand to help out with whatever you need.

Shangri-La Singapore.review_title: Clean and plenty of everything for a family
Shangri-La Singapore.review_content: The hotel is perfect for everyone. You need to stay 2 weeks to eat all the food available for breakfast buffet. Staff and facilities were awesome. The hotel is very clean and the service from our man Warren, from housekeeping was outstanding. The only reason I didnt give it 5 star, its just a long way from major attractions. In saying this, $10in a taxi doesnt really bend a holiday budget. Would definitely recommend this hotel with kids.

Always a good return which the staff recognized, greeted and respected well. This is reflection of staff taking an interest to know and remember the guests including the General Manager John and Hotel Manager Xavier who were seen everywhere in the hotel.It's a comfortable and satisfied staycation with comprehensive facilities and in particular the good services provided by friendly, helpful and served with passion and smiles staff.Indeed, I would be back and for more.

Everything (almost) is perfect, room, customer service, amenities, food quality, alcohol selection...(Prices are on the higher end)Special mention to Ravi @ poolside bar. Have known him for as long as I've been a regular here. Thank u for the hospitality Ravi and team!Will be back!

Shangri-La Singapore.review_title: Excellent Service Experience at Shangri-La Orchard Singapore
Shangri-La Singapore.review_content: I am staying at Shangri-La Orchard Singapore from June 17th to June 21st, 2024, and I must commend the exceptional service provided by Ms. Jas, the Front Desk Supervisor. Her dedication and efforts truly made our stay memorable.Ms. Jas went above and beyond to ensure our comfort, displaying exemplary hospitality throughout our visit. Her personal touch and attention to detail were evident from the moment we checked in. Not only did she accommodate our requests with efficiency, but she also surprised us with a thoughtful upgrade that enhanced our experience significantly.Her professionalism and genuine care for guests like us reflect greatly on the standards upheld by Shangri-La Orchard Singapore. Ms. Jas is undoubtedly an asset to your team, and her exceptional service deserves recognition.Thank you once again to Ms. Jas and the entire staff for making our stay remarkable. We look forward to returning to Shangri-La Orchard Singapore for future visits.Warm regards,Girish Gianchandani

We had a wonderful experience at the Shangri-La Hotel. The staff go above and beyond to make your stay special. Beautiful gardens and a great pool added to the experience. The best hotel I have stayed in in Singapore and I will certainly stay again.

I had an amazing five-day stay experience at the Shangri-La Hotel. The staff was very attentive and welcoming. The hotel is situated in a very peaceful and green environment. I also secured a great deal, making the luxurious experience even better.

5 star service as usual. Right from the welcome by Mr Jega and his team at concierge to the relaxed and hospitable poolside staff. This is a wonderful property if you are travelling with a family, they have thought of everything. Looking forward to next time.

My wife and I would like to say a huge thank you to Cherry from the Origin bar. She is so passionate about her craft and was an absolute joy to be around and chat to in the evenings. Cherry really made our trip a great experience. Thank you so much and see you agin!

Our good experience started when we arrived early at 8.30 am after a late night sleepless well before check in time. Although we were unable to get an earlier than the standard check in time, Irfan, the receptionist who dealt with us, did offer a complimentary breakfast. Due to his good interpersonal skills and his advice we decided to pay extra for a Horizon Club room for the three nights stay which did allow us immediate access to our room as well as the other club amenities. Every aspect of our room worked perfectly. The rooms are well designed, made of quality materials, fully resourced and comfortable. The Horizon club lounge provided a substantial evening cocktail buffet which meant that we did not need to leave the hotel for dinner. The staff there are very professional and well trained. Special mention to Viola, Milan, Gary and Paul for their friendly and efficient service. The location is quite close to Orchard street shopping centres within a reasonable walking distance, and the hotel provides an hourly shuttle service between 11.00 am and 4.00 pm. Regarding the hotel location, it is more situated in the business area rather than the more typical tourist locations. As we have been travelling for about 7 years, this was not a problem for us. Anyway, there is good and cheap public transport to any and all tourist areas. The only detraction is that we feel that the air conditioning in the public areas such as the downstairs lobby was a bit too cool if you wanted to sit there for an extended period. We would highly recommend a stay in this beautiful hotel.

Great atmosphere Great setting Great service Looked after by Riavi Mumar and the team Both both accomodating for the kids Very well looked after by all stall Even when you get hurt the staff are there and prepared (band aid provided)They are caring and compassionate

The hotel service in general is very good. I would like to say in particular that Warren from housekeeping was outstanding. It seems like he was constantly available and would quickly address any service or question I may have had. I am truly grateful for his efforts. He was working the 19th floor of the Shangri-La Singapore. Thank you so much, Warren!

We were very happy when we entered the themed suite we availed. Thank you so much for the Guest Relations Officer named Wency Ventura. He is absolutely outstanding staff of this hotel. He managed to assist us until check out. I appreciate a lot when Wency gave us letter and small treats. The kids are very happy to meet him. Buds and Splash are amazing!!! Perfect for our vacation.We will definitely come back. 10/10 rating!

Excellent family hotel with wonderful facilities and friendly staff, especially Jega! The childrens bed and pantry which contained everything you could possibly need for a small child was a godsend! Would definitely also recommend Buds and the pirate pool!

Almost 5-star experience Extremely kid friendly hotel. Highlights: extremely courteous, professional, approachable staff. Some stand outs were Ravi and Wency. Very kid friendly with a wonderful kids club/playroom and water park, and thoughtful welcome bag. This included a fun scavenger hunt activity sheet, which required the kid to explore the hotel grounds and speak to staff to fill in the answers. Great way to get familiar with the hotel. Breakfast buffet - one of the better breakfast buffets. So much choice! Staff were a little slow with clearing tables though. Same at lunch time, it gets busy and they seem a bit understaffed in the main restaurant. Lobby lounge - had lunch there. Beautiful and comfortable decor, massively high ceilings. Food was beautifully presented. The bak kut teh was delicious. Great service. Gym - one the better hotel gyms Ive been to! Its huge! 7 treadmills, 7 elliptical, 3 bikes and all the usual weights and cable machines. There were also kettlebells, fit balls, and resistance bands. And even has a zero runner machine. Never seen one of those before. And a designated stretch area. Really appreciate how spacious and clean it was. Pools - great for kids and families. The pool towels have a little hood to go over the lounger. So clever. The water park for the kids was amazing for younger kids. Kids club buds was amazing. There is a huge ball pool and obstacle course/climbing frames, music room with piano, drums, cymbals and karaoke machine, and a big art room for painting (inc painting on the walls). Theres also a kids kitchen for cooking classes for ages 5+Minor annoyances: Tried to do the mobile check in but frustratingly wasnt able to scan the passport page. The wardrobe sliding door came off the hinge but it was repaired within the day. Check in was a bit slow, but courteous Upon arrival, the safe battery was faulty (unable to lock) but the staff dealt it with it promptly. Within the same day, it started to constantly beep. The technician arrived quickly and was able to fix it within 30 mins. However by day 4, we had to call for repair 3 more times. In the end we asked that it be replaced as it was clearly faulty, but it never was. Very frustrating that there was no follow up. Room: spacious and clean. Hotel grounds. There is a fruit, herb and vegetable garden. It was a great activity to explore it with my kid, especially for educational purposes. Theres a lovely koi pond and waterfall garden, and The Orchid was very pretty.

As a Singaporean who lives abroad, Shangri-La Singapore is my first choice whenever I come back to visit friends and family. I have stayed at many of the other 5-star hotels in Singapore, and have found the majority of them to be either hilariously small for a supposed luxury experience, generally inconsistent with their room quality, or experiencing teething issues from a constant turnover of employees. While I primarily collect loyalty points at the other major hotel loyalty programs, I stay at Shangri-La Singapore often enough to qualify for a Shangri-La Jade membership entirely from my stays at this hotel alone.My favorite thing about this hotel is how dependable and consistent it is: their spacious rooms are always sparkling clean so I never have to worry about any nasty surprises when it comes to bed-linens, and its seasoned staff always know exactly what to do and how to handle any situation. This is a 5-star hotel that actually knows how to provide a 5-star experience.A special shout-out to Jega from the concierge team, who always receives me with a warm welcome home whenever I arrive late at night from my flight! I had a bit of an issue with my booking during my last visit, but it was handled graciously by the reception staff as well and for that I am very appreciative. Already looking forward to my next stay!(Added bonus of the hotel: the gym is 24 hours! I love being able to fit in a workout at the end of my day without any rush.)

Beautiful resort, well maintained gardens, and spacious rooms. Great kids facilities, however the additional fees for buds seemed a bit too high- would be great for it to be included or discounted for hotel guests. Our room attendant, Warren was particularly lovely and attentive.

Shangri-La Singapore.review_title: The most luxurious place to stay!!!!
Shangri-La Singapore.review_content: The most luxurious experience of my life!!!I had this hotel booked as a birthday treat for me from my boyfriend and the room attendant Warren made my birthday stay super special giving me a complimentary chocolate birthday cake with a lovely written birthday message from the Shangri-La hotel wishing me a lovely day and stay with them. At breakfast the ladies sang happy birthday to me and made me feel really spoilt whilst taking a Polaroid picture of me that I can keep with me when I go home.When asking the concierge if they had any merchandise that I could have as a keepsake for my stay here he went out of his way to find me Shangri-La pens and the most beautiful flower printed envelopes with free ice tea drinks.All in all the best experience, especially on my birthday!

Shangri-La Singapore.review_title: Amazing facilities, lovely staff and convenient location (special mention of Splash and Buds!)
Shangri-La Singapore.review_content: We stayed for 6 days in the Tower Wing of Shangri-La and loved every minute of our stay. We were travelling with a toddler and an infant and had asked for a quite a few customisations (extra toddler bed, late check out, birthday celebration, etc.) all of which were fulfilled. Splash and Buds were probably the highlights of the stay for my toddler. The staff were friendly across the different facilities, starting from the main entrance to the reception and every amenity / restaurant. The Line got busy between 8:30 to 10, but had a good buffet spread while the evening tea in the Horizon club lounge was very enjoyable. Location was convenient with the busy part of Orchard Road being in close proximity, though MRT is slightly far. Overall, we would definitely recommend this place!

Very nice hotel with a robust breakfast buffet. The customer service was excellent and the room was nice. The swimming pool was welcoming and worth a swim. The only challenge is it is a bit of a walk to the train station, but they do offer a shuttle during certain time of the day.Singapore is hot so trust me youre gonna wanna take that shuttle

Shangri-La Singapore.review_title: Top 1 hotel to recommend to family and friends
Shangri-La Singapore.review_content: Shangri-la Singapore is the true meaning of a 5-star hotel. We were awed since we entered the building. The architecture and sculptures around the lobby already made our eyes feast. Our stress instantly gone the moment our eyes saw, our noses smelled and our skin felt the air in that lobby. That itself was already a grandeur experience. So my husband and I said to each other, okay that was a 5-star experience. We were greeted by a staff, too bad I forgot her name who instantly took my kids attention so I can complete all the check-in formalities. My kids got the goodies bags, packed with all things nice for my little ones: colouring book, colouring pens and pencils, toothbrush, toothpaste, kids shampoo, kids baby wash, cookies, kids slippers, and the bag itself can be coloured! The staff also made sure my kids got entertained while I was settle the check-in stuffs. In the level where our room was, had a family corner where guests can loan strollers, toys, get diapers, do bottles washing, microwave food, baby chair, feeding table literally EVERYTHING YOU NEED for kids below 12! We loaned some toys and chessboard, which the kids totally enjoyed.We also got complimentary cake for my sons birthday. This was a very kind, sweet and thoughtful gesture. We very much appreciate it. And the mothers day room package that we took came with self-care box and a bouquet of flowers! The bouquet was super pretty and smelled so good so I highly recommended getting the mothers day package to my friends.We were surprised to see our room immediately get cleaned in that same evening we went for swimming. Usually for one-night stay, hotel staff will not do housekeeping. So we were amazed! My kids loved the Splash and Buds! Splash is free for all guests while Buds came free because we took the family room. The buffet breakfast at the Line was also great. I can highly recommend the waffles! Our Guest Relations Officer, Wency, was super nice! He made sure we were nicely settled in, he personally delivered the bouquet which was super sweet. He also made sure all our questions were answered as it was our first time staying at Shangri-la. He was so thoughtful and very friendly. So I took his business card and will make sure to contact him on our next stay.Overall, it was an amazingly unforgettable experience! The kids wanted to come back as it was the best hotel for them. Even for me and my husband. The hospitality, warmth, the room, amenities, foods, everything were all outstanding! We will surely come back and this will be our top hotel to recommend to all our relatives and friends.

Shangri-La Singapore.review_title: Best Family hotel for kids with dietary requirements
Shangri-La Singapore.review_content: Best family hotel in Singapore. We stayed at Shangrila Orchard 4 years ago with our son, and now coming back again but this time also with our daughter for her first time. The hotel is just as good, if not better than the first visit. We stayed in the family floor with access to laundry and dryers, ensuring the kids had clean clothes (to get dirty again) when we go out. The rooms were impeccably clean and well thought out. Amenities for the kids and a canopy bed which my older son loved. Food was delicious and options plenty. My Daughter has a number of food allergies and finding food for her was the biggest worry for us on our trip. For breakfast, we were thankful the chef came out to speak to us about what she could and couldn't eat. Chef Jaya also personally cooked my daughters meal to avoid any cross contamination. We also visited the Italian restaurant (Waterfall) and the chef also cooked a beautiful pizza and pasta for her free of her allergens. We did have a medical emergency due to our stay and the hotel was so accommodating, and looked after us while we were going through a very stressful time. I would like to thank Nick L (F&B) and Ash (front desk), as well as the rest of the hotel staff for looking after us and really turning around a stressful couple of days due to the medical emergency into something magical for my daughter. She felt like a princess and that means the world to us. Highly recommend Shangrila Orchard for anyone with families or special requirements. The hotel will treat you like family. My kids didn't want to leave, and neither did we!

Shangri-La Singapore.review_title: Always a delight to return to.
Shangri-La Singapore.review_content: We have stayed here many times over the years and it is always a pleasure to be here again. Hotels in Singapore (indeed, world-wide) have been hit extremely hard by Covid and its aftermath and struggle to maintain standards, but changes at this hotel are barely discernable - the food is extremely good and the staff are welcoming and helpful. Govan, a bellboy, went out of his way to help me with my halting Malay, willingly and cheerfully. On the verge of leaving again, we can't wait to return.

We stayed in two large and well appointed interconnected rooms in the Valley Suite with 2 kids aged 5 and 2. Impeccable service from the start to the end of our stay and you could not ask for more from a hotel.Excellent breakfast and afternoon drinks on the Terrace. Great main pool and seperate kids pool with a pirate ship as well as a seperate kids club. Really good range of restaurants particularly Waterfall. Great gym. Short walk to Orchard Road. Special mention to Raja and Dinesh who made our stay very memorable!

We had the most wonderful stay here twice over the course of April. Wed been before in 2009 on honeymoon and it didnt disappoint. The service was impeccable and the breakfast buffet the best weve ever had! Our daughter had food allergies and the chefs couldnt do enough to help out including making her dairy and egg free breakfast pancakes. We stayed in both the tower wing and garden wing, both lovely but the garden wing was our favourite due to the balcony and amazing atrium just outside. The kids were given gift bags and nice touches in the room throughout the stay. We hope it wont be so long until we come back again!

Great services , enjoy so much our stay here. Amazing gym facility. Amenities are good. Recommended. Warren took great care of us on our stay we had zero to complain about. The breakfast serve wide range variety of food . The laksa is must try.
Shang Palace offers not only delicious food but also exceptional service. I was particularly impressed by a server named Rebecca, who was very attentive and responsive to my needs.Dr David Leong

I m on the hospitality desk with the Oceania Cruise, I have great experience with the bellman team, especially with the bell captain Siva Sharmah.He answered all the questions that I needed to know. The team handles the baggage at an efficient pace.

Shangri-La Singapore.review_title: Modern luxury in an old fashioned, gorgeous hotel
Shangri-La Singapore.review_content: Stayed in the Valley Wing and had the best hotel stay of my life, everything was great with special mention to the afternoon high tea service. I would recommend this hotel to anybody staying in Singapore, you wont regret it and I will be back!

Entering the hotel, we were greeted by the cheerful doorman. We made our way to the front desk where we were warmly welcomed by Devan who made us feel at home right away. Thanks for giving my child the kid's bag and showing us to the Garden wing!We had booked a family terrace which was large enough to fit 4 pax. Things we liked about the room - sofa bed was comfortable and had a fan above. The bathtub was great too. The whole room was kid friendly with amenities and a nice teepee tent. The garden terrace was lovely, but there was too many mosquitoes to have a proper tea outside. We wished there was a bidet in the toilet and free water and some minibar drinks. The weather was hot n we were too tired to sort out the water dispenser.The kids facilities - Buds and the pool were the main highlight. My child had a great time in the painting room. Too bad we did not get to try Splashes. For food and coffee, we really enjoyed the Shophouse. Highly recommend getting some bites from there.Would we come again? Its a 50/50 for us. The hotel is beautiful for sure and kids friendly but at that price point, we did not feel that wow factor that will pull us back. It was a nice anniversary celebration though and kudos to the staff who assisted with the cake!

Wonderful experience! Particularly enjoyed our time by the pool. Ravi Naveen from the pool bar was a most gracious host. Highly recommend staying here with family. Lots of fun for kids - young and old. Thank you for helping our first overseas family trip so memorable.

Shangri-La Singapore.review_title: Tropical hotel in the centre of Singapore.
Shangri-La Singapore.review_content: This is our go to hotel for Singapore every time we go to Singapore. The hotel is very convenient located, there is a shuttle service all day to Orchard Road, save the guests the hassle of taking a taxi. Due to the large amount of guests passing through, some area of the hotel is a bit dated. The rooms in the Horizon building were renovated a couple of years ago but already showing age. We stayed in the Horizon club rooms. The staff were always kind and lovely. We had an issue with the renovation started on the floor a day early. Zoe, the manager of Horizon club sorted it out for us. Thank you so much. She provided excellent care and service. There was a large group staying at the hotel for a weekend conference, all the lifts to the rooms had long queue. One of the guest services saw us and was so kind to escort us to the back lifts so we wouldn't have to wait. The pool area is what we loved the most. The hotel pool feels like you are in a tropical resort instead of a city centre hotel. It's very spacious, with lots of greenery, great staff. It's one of my girls' favourite hotel pools. We wished it would open a tad later to 8pm instead of 7pm. We went to the pool everyday at golden hour. It was just so pretty and peaceful. Thank you Shangri-La, see you next time.

Stayed in Valley Wing - room was somewhat dated (hence overall 4 rating) but spacious and very comfortable. Breakfast in the Valley Wing was very good as were the complementary canopies and drinks in the evening. Service was outstanding at all times.

Visited the hotel buffet at level 1. However, family got lost in direction but the wonderful receptionist at the counter Shammel, helped and assisted us in locating the buffet and was very friendly and welcoming. Definitely made our visit here much easier.

Shangri-La Singapore.review_title: Pool bar is a great spot to relax
Shangri-La Singapore.review_content: Poolside bar is fabulous. Naveen and Ravikumar looked after us with excellent cocktails and fabulous pizza from the waterfall restaurant. Friendly, helpful and always greeted us with a smile. Fabulous spot to wait out the lightening warnings when we had to leave the pool.

We booked this hotel based on all the reviews saying it was great for kids and it did not disappoint! Our son was obsessed with the soft play area (truly amazing) and the swimming areas. Made it very difficult to leave the hotel and explore Singapore! We stayed in the garden wing and had probably the best sleep of my life thanks to the huge waterfall beside us (white noise of my dreams). What is really clever is how this manages to be both a perfect hotel for business and solo travellers and also for families by keeping the kids activities away from the lobby/main area. Everyone wins. Also absolutely adore the way they check you in in your room after a long flight so your little ones dont cause havoc in the lobby. We will be back!

Shangri-La Singapore.review_title: Definitely choose the Valley Wing for service excellence
Shangri-La Singapore.review_content: The Valley Wing is an absolute oasis of understated, attention to detail. Butlers Sammy and Raja, together with Peggy in the breakfast room and Elvis at reception provide personalised, exquisite service. Ive stayed at the Shangri-La before but the Valley Wing is 11 out of 10.

This is a wonderful hotel. I stayed 5 nights in February 2023 and had a very enjoyable experience. The room was spacious and comfortable. The buffet breakfast was outstanding. Everyone should try the laksa, it is delicious. I would gladly return.

Excellent and hospitable service always. Outstanding service from long-serving Doorman, G. Kumar. Thank you very much!A pleasure to dine at Shangri-La Singapore. Appreciate the attention to details as well as prompt response to requests.

We stayed at the Shangri la Hotel in Singapore for two days prior to embarking ona cruise. After more than 24 hours in flight, it was a great experience to be able to check in a little before the official check in time. Our room was on the upper level and a magnificent view of the city. The room was spacious and very well appointed. The room was very modern and up to date. The location was perfect, as it was within a short walk for the shopping street Orchard Road. We booked our room with the inclusion of breakfast. The menu selection was excellent and there were choices for all nationalities. We truly enjoyed our two night stay at this wonderful luxurious hotel.

Shangri-La Singapore.review_title: Thoughtful service, nice design, too many children in the hotel
Shangri-La Singapore.review_content: Hotel is located in a residential area, very quiet but a long 20 minutes walk to Orchard Rd, not always pleasant in the humid Singapore climate. They have a free shuttle bus to the metro a few times daily though. Thoughtful service, spacious room, good breakfast. Free and well equipped gym also has a sauna and steamroom. Too many children in the hotel to our liking though, didn't expect that.

Sofitel Singapore City Centre.review_content: Have a great evening at the bar Special thanks to Kris, Ben, Wenz, Jules :)The ???? cocktails were great The mixologist have a good understanding of the cocktail and have a nice chat ??Menus are extensive and have a great variety.Order the Singapore Unsling and ???

We were extremely delighted with the service provided by the club team, especially Olivia. She offered a selection of drinks as we were not quite familiar with the menu and was super helpful in navigating miscommunications with the luggage location. We are also greatly appreciative of the other team members on shift today, Irene, Marc, Myra and Ayuni for their hospitality throughout our time in the club. Amenities were also amazing, we even received a super thoughtful handwritren letter. Super happy with the overall experience (to say the least) :) thanks a lottt sofitel team

Nice ambiance. Quiet and spacious space. This is a great place to chill out whether u have business meetings or with close friends. Cheese is good with nice red wine. Chris - Tip top service, attentive, heart warming smiles and services. Will come again

We stayed in the prestige suite which was quite spacious and very well kept. Our room was in the 19th floor and the city views from the room were wonderful. Breakfast was ok, club mellisme lounge is a small space but in general was never crowded during our visit so it wasnt an issue, the canaps and drinks offered in the lounge were good and the high tea as well had some very nice plating of snacks to eat. The downside was the hotel dosent have a spa and In room dining is not 24 hours. The dining options as well are limited including the IRD menu. But whatever food we had at the hotel we were happy with it. As Accor silver plus member we got complimentary welcome drinks but the selection of drinks to choose from were limited as well when compared to fairmont/ swissotel which offer the entire cocktail menu in the welcome drink selection. The best part of our stay were the really welcoming staff who always greeted us with a nice warm smile. Really felt welcomed with their hospitality.

Sofitel Singapore City Centre.review_title: Happy Moments at Sofitel on Birthday
Sofitel Singapore City Centre.review_content: We would like to thank John, Benson, Chris, Wendy, April and Jules for their wonderful services. Special thanks to John for arranging a special birthday cake and the special birthday sing along for our friend. Really appreciate all the efforts and good services!! Keep up the good work.

Sofitel Singapore City Centre.review_title: An enjoyable birthday high tea experience at 1864 The Bar
Sofitel Singapore City Centre.review_content: High Tea at 1864 The BarHad a great time at 1864 The Bar. Apart from the nice variety of light bites, the staff were very warm and welcoming, service was top notched. I would like to thank John and teammates, (Chris, Ryan and Ben) for the exceptional service and impromptu birthday surprise. Love the lovely cake and nicely written card. Definitely made my day today.

Especially 1864, in particular, stood out for its inviting atmosphere and impeccable service. The staff in 1864 were friendly and accommodating, ensuring a relaxing experience with prompt service and a wide selection of refreshments. It was a central point of relaxation and enjoyment during my visit, contributing significantly to the overall positive impression of Sofitel Hotel. Special thanks to Chris, Ben, Wenz, Ryan and John for the exceptional good service ??

The ambiance is sophisticated yet relaxed, food delicious, and service top rate! I chatted a bit with our waiter, Chris, about a life transition I'm going through then enjoyed high tea with my friend. When I went to make payment, Chris, Wenz, Benson, and John surprised me with a special cake, bumble bee stuffed toy and a beautifully written heartfelt card with words of encouragement regarding my situation. They were so warm and kind, it took me all I had to not cry on the spot haha. I want to thank and commend them for making our visit such a magical one. Their wonderful gesture really reminded me that life is good and the world is full of kind people :)

I came here with church friends and adults to explain about church. even thought we are little bit nonisy as we are roughtly 15 people,they offered excellent service for us to stay in comfortably. That is wht i wanna recommend this place for my friend and neighbor

Sofitel Singapore City Centre.review_title: Great good, great time and amazing hospitality
Sofitel Singapore City Centre.review_content: Always great hospitality shown by the team at Racines . They go out of their way to make your experience a beautiful one. They surprise us every single time we dine there with the props, balloons, bears and etc for celebratory purposes Thank you John, Wenz & Rey!

Sofitel Singapore City Centre.review_title: Thank you for giving my friend the happiest birthday??
Sofitel Singapore City Centre.review_content: I want to express my gratitude to the wonderful staff here at the hotel restaurant. They went above and beyond to ensure my friend's birthday celebration was perfect. From the attentive service to the delicious food, everything was exceptional. Thank you Osborn, Jason, Rey,Jules and Yuvan for making this occasion so special. They even sang 3 birthday songs in English, mandarin and even French ???? ??

Nice food and environment. The local dish is top notch and portion size is good. Price point is reasonable. Rey, Jules, Gab, Ryan is very attentive to make the experience memorable.Very good experience as the executive chef wong came to recommend the dishes.Will definitely be back again.

Nice french restaurant, stunninf food and, excellent service, and with a good hospitality, service great with rey, jules, gab and ryan. expecially food was good the, pork coller was super stunning, and restaurant location is very easy to find thank yoh sofitel.

Our team met at Cafe 1864 for a grouo discussion. We were so fortunate to be served by a team of friendly, polite & professional staff namely Wenz, Guil and Julien this evening. The food and ambience at Cafe 1864 is good and we had a pleasant and happy gathering on 25 June. Thank you.

Greetings Tripadvsior, My wife and I are writing to compliment the outstanding service that was rendered by Sofitel on our wedding dinner in June 2024. Both of us would like to thank the banquet team during our wedding and we have received positive feedback from our guests about the staff and food. We would like to extend our deepest and most sincere appreciation for the following two;Agnes Teo (Senior Sales Manager) Yi Ping (Banquet staff)Agnes is hardworking, efficient, passionate and accommodating. She listens attentively to our wants and promptly replies to our queries even after her working hours. Her sincerity and positivity made us feel at ease with our wedding planning. She went out of her way to facilitate our requests and personally ensured everything ran smoothly on the day of the dinner. Thank you Agnes, we truly appreciate you! Yi Ping provided us with outstanding and genuine service during our banquet. Her initiative and attentiveness towards my wife and I was heartwarming. She was well prepared and took very good care of our welfare by offering us water and even helping to calm our nerves prior to our march in ceremonies. Overall, my wife and I are so happy with choosing Sofitel City Centre to host our wedding dinner. The service was top notch, facilities were amazing and we felt that we had nothing to worry about with a solid and dependable team to work with. Thank you for making our special day ever so memorable!

Great hotel with excellent amenities and a wonderful staff. I was in and out on business a few days and found easy to navigate the city from this location. Tunnels to Frasers Tower were fantastic. Special thanks to Louise who was extremely helpful with some priority documentation I needed in the business center.

Sofitel Singapore City Centre.review_title: Memorable happy stay at Sofitel city Centre, Singapore
Sofitel Singapore City Centre.review_content: The room was fantastic , great view of city, very clean and quiet. Totally a very happy enjoyable stay. Will stay again. Had dinner of Prawn briyani rice and Ginseng Chicken soup. Delicious with awesome view of the skyline as sitting at window seats.Excellent friendly and wonderful service by Osborne , Jules and Rey. So had a beautiful dining experience

Did not stay at the hotel, but went for high tea with my girlfriends for a hens party. The team John, Kris, Ben and Julien were so hospitable! they wrote such a sweet card with their congratulatory wishes to our bride-to-be, and even gave her a complimentary tart with amazing writing on it too! The staff was extremely attentive as well, making sure that we always had enough water or anything else required for us to enjoy our time. The high tea spread was also very good, with very unique sweets. The brides favourite was the one with lychee cream. Overall, such a wonderful experience!

Kashmira was very lovely and made us feel very welcome. She is the best and is always happy to serve us and make us feel at home. The hotel is very clean and well kept. We never felt unwelcome, displeased, or not looking forward to spend anothe night at the hotel.

Pros -1) Booked a Luxury room and got upgraded to a Premium room (same room but higher floor with great views). Room was sizable, clean and comfortable and could easily accomodate an additional rollaway bed (no extra charge).2) One time minibar consumption is included in the room, which is rather generous imho.3) Service was friendly and polite throughout.4) Located just above the MRT (Tanjong Pagar) and close to many restaurants/cafes in the Duxton/Amoy area.5) Buffet breakfast spread and quality at Racines was decent and slightly better than Kwee Zen's at Sofitel Sentosa.6) Kids amenity kit (toothbrush, toothpaste, shower gel and shampoo) provided, which was a pleasant surprise.7) Complimentary parking up to 24hrs (based on $ value I believe. So if you park on weekends, you can do 48 hours like me with no issues).Cons -1) Pool is rather narrow (probably only 2 people can swim abreast).All in all, a great stay.

The bears in the lobby are the cutest!!!!! Nice atmosphere. Nice drinks!Served by Chris, John, Wenz, Ben. Nice chairs, high ceiling, nice evening vibes. Convenient location in town, very accessible. This place doesn't really close for guests.

This is my 3rd time visit . Nice environment . Friendly staff. thanks Chris for helping us take photo. Also, Their satay chicken so nice must try ! This place quiet and a lot of nice corner for you to take nice photo :) definitely will visit again.

The service was exceptional, especially Wenz! The coffee and the drinks were excellent as well and the vibes here are refreshing too. Shout out to the bartenders who made the delicious coffee and tea too, Kris and Guil. Thank you for making the experience memorable and great :)

Had the best service and dining experience in 1864! Wenz, Kris, Gvil, John, Julien made me really comfortable and valued! The ambience, the decor coupled with such quality services from them made it memorable! First time here and from the get go I already know it's not gonna be my last!

Sofitel Singapore City Centre.review_title: Im always liked after when I stay here.
Sofitel Singapore City Centre.review_content: Reception very welcoming and accommodating. Breakfast team very good- Kashmiro particularly helpful.Housekeeping team super, with requests for items and upkeep of room that went above and beyond. Five stars to this team! Really miss the old fab club lounge overlooking the pool, the new one, compact and feels like sitting in a shopping mall, but always enjoy the food and beverages provided.

Lovely hotel with great service. The housekeeping staff went the extra mile to make my stay lovely (thanks, Qin!). The hotel is well equipped, has a great pool, is in a convenient location for business and in a pretty part of the city. Would easily stay again.

Amazing place! The cocktails are fire, the room is really cool. You can drink or eat in a chill but still luxurious atmosphere. Me and my friend met the bartenders Guilhem and Wenz were really professionals, and kind. It was an amazing experience i cant wait to come back soon!

The ambiance is really nice and cozy, delicious cocktail special mention for the sidecar which was surprising. Our bartender Guilhem was really sweet and took really good care of us :) The story of the menu is fascinating and diverse, I recommend

Amazing drinks, good ambiance, good products, everything was perfect. Special mention to Guilhem, the bartender who advised us to choose the drinks. Also, the teddy bears pillow brings a great decor that is really perfect for a chill night drink.

We recently stayed at the Sofitel for three nights, and we couldn't be happier with our experience. The hotel's location is excellent, but what truly made our stay exceptional was the outstanding service provided by Harvey from the Concierge department. From the moment we arrived until our departure, Harvey went above and beyond to ensure our stay was perfect.Harvey's attentiveness and dedication to his role were evident in every interaction. He provided invaluable recommendations of local attractions, assisted us with all our needs, and always did so with a warm and friendly demeanor.We were pleasantly surprised by the high standard of staff training at Sofitel. Harvey exemplifies the level of excellence that makes this hotel stand out. We are grateful to have encountered such a dedicated and professional team member.Because of Harvey and the wonderful service we received, we will definitely choose Sofitel again for our future stays. Thank you for making our visit so memorable!

Nice and friendly staffs made our mini-post bday celebrations memorable. A little gesture from the front desk and housekeeping staff are more than enulf for us. We were served by Chris, Wenz and Julien were excellent at 1864. They were attentive, detailed and friendly. The pastries sold at 1864 are great too!! =)

Sofitel Singapore City Centre.review_title: Great experience at the restaurant, Racines
Sofitel Singapore City Centre.review_content: Ate at Racines on a Sunday evening, attended by Osborn, Jason and Ryan. The waitress was very jolly and attentive, and gave her 110% to helping us with our orders. Food wise, the cod, iberico pork and souffle are fantastic, well cooked. There is complimentary parking, 1 vehicle/$100 spent, nett.

You make us more happier after our wedding vows. You make us heart more love for the ambience of the restaurant and most importantly you feed us the most delicious food we ever had. Thank you chef Wong we really enjoy the food. We order the chef special from its words it's really really special. The exceptional service that we had from Jason, Miss April and Jules our friends and love ones really enjoy. Thank you so much we definitely celebrate more important events in our lives with you ??????

Excellent customer service from the team and special mention Osborn, who is busy serving many customers on a busy Saturday night and always with a sweet smile. Food and drinks were serve promptly and light snacks while waiting for the meal. We had enjoyed ourselves tremendously dining at Racines.

Our server-Ms Osborn services was very good ?? Food, drinks and deserts were great, really enjoyed our evening. Ambient was also great and outside views overlooking the Shenton way area. Other servers-Rey and Loise services were also great.??

Sofitel Singapore City Centre.review_title: Great food and Excellent Customer Service
Sofitel Singapore City Centre.review_content: The food was really good and the ambience is really wonderful. Kudos to the excellent customer service by Osborn Rey Loise, my family really enjoyed the service and food. Ordered the Duck Confit and Laksa it was really good. Overall, it was a great Father's Day Dinner!

Had a wonderful dinner experience at the Racines. Wonderful service from Osborn Rey Loise. Very attentive and obliging. 5* service. Would definitely come again. The service received here has definitely enhance our Father's Day experience.

Sofitel Singapore City Centre.review_title: Great food, even better service at Racines!
Sofitel Singapore City Centre.review_content: Food was excellent. Was served by Osborn Rey Loise. Extremely attentive, friendly and such fun to be around! 5/5 stars! The souffle in particular was amazing. Smooth and full of flavor. Quite interesting asian / french fusion over here. Will be back again.

The Club lounge was a pleasant place to relax in the morning or unwind at the end of the day. The excellent service and knowledge from the staff, especially Hadi with his knowledge of places and his to best travel around was much appreciated. Thanks to all.

Waiters and waitresses have excellent customer services. Thank you Osborn for your service! Keep up the good work and keep your smiley face! Food was great, except steak a little dry. Love the desserts, ordered a souffl and Pavlova. Great environment!

Service was beyond words. Thanks to Wenz and team for the cosy and cheerful session. We were in awe and felt great with the food and drinks.A very nice place to chit chat.Wenz had provided tip top service. Kudos! We will definitely be back again. A very well recommended place.

Having a best hightea floral fantasy experience with my sister. The food presentable is beautiful, the 1864 lobby lounge have cute teddy bear everywhere make everything is soo friendly and instagramable. The most important part is wonderful exlperince that we received from the 3 staff Guil, that making a nice drink, John that help and patiently taking professional picture from us , and Wenz that have very friendly, helpfull and nice to us. It is really five star experience. Will be coming back again for others high tea event

Sofitel Singapore City Centre.review_title: The Most Memorable & Lovely High Tea
Sofitel Singapore City Centre.review_content: The Petal High Tea Set Up with Cute Teddy Bear is very lovely & sweet and The Most important is the wonderful experience that I have received from the three staff far Sofitel by providing the Best Class of Service from Wenz, John & Giul ???????????? Thank You for the memorable experience at Sofitel ?? Definitely will come back soon ??

I went with a group of colleagues.What i like is the nice ambience. And definitely the good and warm service from the team, especially Osborn. I needed hot water and she took the trouble to get me some. Thank you!I would definitely return here with my family soon!

We spent a few days in this very nice hotel prior to going home. The hotel location is very handy to transport and quite close to 2 local street food outlets offering many choices, the services from front desk Alison and Michael from concierge provided were excellent ,that helped our short stays very enjoyable. We definitely will come back again.T D

Went for afternoon tea to celebrate birthday. Was very warmly received by Wenz, Kris, Guil and Ben. They were very friendly and provided excellent service. Food was good and was even surprised by a lovely birthday cake along with very enthusiastic singing by the staff. Overall really enjoyable experience, with comfortable sofas and great ambiance.

Special thanks to Wenz, Chris, Julian, Ben and Guil for the very special memorable meal. Food was excellent and service was absolutely amazing. Another amazing time at the lobby bat. Will definitely be back again. ????????????????????????

Perfect hotel very good location (central), great breakfest and option to also do a take away breakfest for early travel. Next to this really helped by shafiq and sonja when I lost my phone in the cab. Great service by the concirge and night shift !

Best hotel ever, especially Irene,Alisan, Olivia, Harvey and Terence are the best stuff I ever had. Very nice service and very good view. Very good turn down services. Club milescime is good as well although the very nice breakfast. I will come back for sure.

We stayed here for couples of weeks, all the lounge crews were so lovely to us, Irene, Olivia, Marc & Marj. They always welcome is with a big smile and made sure everything went well every time we visited the lounge. One of the evening, they even made us lovely couple bracelets, which we like the color so much. As well during breakfast at the main restaurant, April always made sure that we had a good coffee to kick start our day. I appreciate her care of recognizing us and our preferences. Hope to be back soon!

The Fullerton Bay Hotel Singapore.review_title: Excellent staff and delightful anniversary experience!
The Fullerton Bay Hotel Singapore.review_content: Came back to The Fullerton Bay after a year for our first wedding anniversary and the experience was as delightful as we remembered! The hotel staff were so welcoming and thoughtful with celebrating our special occasion. High tea at The Landing Point was both visually pleasing and very delicious. Asel was also so kind when she realised it was our anniversary and made our high tea/stay even more memorable with her attentive service and bright attitude! We would love to return again and highly recommend a stay here with the F&B experience too!

The Fullerton Bay Hotel Singapore.review_title: La brasserie: Excellent service, great food and ambience
The Fullerton Bay Hotel Singapore.review_content: Had a 3 course dinner at La Brasserie with my husband. Service was excellent, ambience was pleasant and food was good as well. Particularly, the foie gras was very well done and tasty. On the lumina lamb, we feel that it will be great if the the portion could be bigger. Had indicated the dinner was a bday celebration when I booked the table. We were pleasantly surprised when they presented us a complimentary slice of cake and gift us a postcard with our photo as memento. It certainly made our day!
Kylar was the best!!!!!! Thank y soooooooooo much! Dont know how to express my feeling in 200 charactersReally enjoy the time in Lantern Cant wait to be here again :)

From the moment we stepped to the entrance and front desk to check in, we felt like royalty. We were escorted by the bell team all the way to the check in counter. Wow very nice touch. I would like to express my gratitude for the overall excellent service and high-quality facilities during my recent stay at your hotel. All staff member Lucy, Jason, Lisa and few more forget the name asl .. halib .. kler sorry if I spelled wrongly. The concierge provided recommendations for our dinner that night and they were perfect for our budget and atmosphere we had in mind. thanks to Ali & shamsah. Housekeeping was incredibly thoughtful, including leaving personalised notes of their name. Thank you for your services.They truly went above and beyond to make out experience memorable. I will definitely be coming back to the Fullerton Bay hotel again. Luxurious ambience, attentive staff - everything you could want with lovely views over the Bay view and within easy walking distance from the raffle to Marina Bay. Excellent food and very helpful, friendly staff team. The la braserie cake counter was superb and we loved the swimming pool and gym looking over the bay view. Thank you!

The place was amazing with beautiful view.The staff was very hospitable and Agnes was extremely sweet and helpful in finding us a table.The food quantity was good.The food was also good in taste and staff was helpful in helping us understand the menu as our requirements was vegetarian food.

Yusuf hosted my 30 ppl cocktail party and made it a huge success! Kind, very professional and made sure everything run smoothly- made my event!!My guest loved the service, drinks and food Thank you so much guys - it was a really memorable evning with great feedbacks!!!

Visited Lantern on 25th June during my family holiday. All Lantern teams are very kind and smiling to us. We are very much happy with Magnificent view and great sling and foods. Especailly thanks for "John"(staff) who care of us at that time, appreciated your serve indeed and I, my wife and my duather could enjoy time and bring your warm heart.

My husband booked this restaurant as a surprise for our 30th Wedding Anniversary whilst we were visiting Singapore . We chose from the Chefs set menu and each course was culinary excellence. Alan was friendly yet professional and all of the staff ensured we had a very memorable experience, even gifting us a souvenir photograph. We would highly recommend dining here, it was superb
The food and service was so nice. Special thanks to Kate.The live was great as well! Im definitely going this place again. Highly recommend this place! Cheers

The Fullerton Bay Hotel Singapore.review_title: Come to Lantern if you wanna chill with amazing service with a stunning view!
The Fullerton Bay Hotel Singapore.review_content: Service was impeccable and food was sublime. The view was second to nonemake this your must-visit if you ever visit!Ask for Yusuf - he made sure our glasses were topped up, we were well taken care of, tried to shift the large fans towards us coz the air got still and the humidity got to usHe also sung a birthday song to celebrate my birthday!

The spread was amazing! Loads of options to choose from from campers to meats and seafood. A whole room dedicated to desserts..a dream for all sweet lovers! For the price point its definitely worth it for their Saturday and Sunday brunch. Will revisit!

The young waitress Kylar was exceptionally warm and hospitable. She is a credit to your establishment. Her knowledge of the wine we chose was very helpful in making our choice. The decor was luxurious and the setting perfect for our guest. Many Thanks

We went to this restaurant to celebrate our anniversary and were served by Fairoz and Ally. They were super friendly and introduced us some of the popular dishes. Personally, my favourite mains are the duck confit and poisson du jour (halibut fish). The citrus dessert was also super refreshing and I loved the complimentary mini croissants with butter (not sure what was added in the butter but it was rich in flavour and tasted better than usual!!). They even gave us a free cake for our anniversary and printed out a photo for us. Will come back again next time!

First time visiting a French Restaurant in Singapore and was pretty satisfied with the level of service here. Special thanks to Fairoz and Ally for the recommendation and assistance in photo taking. Was served a complimentary cake when asked what occasion we were celebrating. The poisson du jour and duck confit are highly recommended.

We were here for our anniversary and did not put in any special request but Ally & Fairuz took amazing care of us and were super attentive to us as they noticed that we were dressed up. Food and drinks were amazing as well and 10/10 would return given the choice!
Thank you, Kylar! We had a great time at Bar Lantern.MBSKylar

The Fullerton Bay Hotel Singapore.review_title: Thanks for MK and Yusuf named as well as Sherzod bartender for smooth service
The Fullerton Bay Hotel Singapore.review_content: Service and the staff attitude, atmosphere furthermore the dj playing so cool, the cocktails are really something u cant find anywhere else, best experience ever had before at rooftop bar, probably will visit again, strongly suggest to visit to see the beautiful sunset through Marina Bay iconic hotel .

I went to the Lantern Rooftop bar for a drink and to enjoy the view over Marina Bay - lived up to the hype and the staff were brilliant. Kylar made sure I was well looked after. Will definitely visit again next time Im in Singapore. Highly recommend

Lotha and Alan were attentive toward us. The meal was great, especially the le steak recommended by Alan. The chef tasting menu was also well portion. Great gesture from the restaurant to give us complimentary cake and photograph. Enjoy my anniversary and my wife birthday celebration at the restaurant very well

Ambience was great and tasting menu was well proportioned! Well worth the price! Special compliments go to Lotha and Alan for their exceptional service and attention to detail! Complimentary cake was given as we were celebrating our wedding anniversary here!

My wife and I had dinner and cocktails at Lantern bar where we were looked after by MK who was the kindest, most professional guy we have met, nothing was too much trouble for him. In fact all the loges and team Preetha were brilliant. Highly recommended.

The Fullerton Bay Hotel Singapore.review_title: Catered to with supreme attention and care!
The Fullerton Bay Hotel Singapore.review_content: Loges and his team went above and beyond! With a dairy allergy, they helped us find some wonderful plates and the service was second to none! They went back and forth with the chef on food and recommended some fabulous happy hour drinks. The ambience, light show, and service were impeccable. Will definitely be back!

The Fullerton Bay Hotel Singapore.review_title: The Lantern at Fullerton Bay Hotel Experience
The Fullerton Bay Hotel Singapore.review_content: The staff at the Lantern are accommodating especially Preetha, who took a very pretty photo of us. The ambience of the place is nice and it is accessible to children as well. The food and service of the place is great, with superb selection of music. Thank you so much for the amazing experience!

The Fullerton Bay Hotel Singapore.review_title: Gorgeous Hotel, high end customer service.
The Fullerton Bay Hotel Singapore.review_content: Gorgeous stylish hotel with the most amazing attention to detail and customer service. This is a hotel that ensures you have the best possible stay. Sensational high Tea. Fabulous location. Best hotel in Singapore by far. I have stayed in many! Diana looked after us and it was greatly appreciated.

We were celebrating our wedding and had dinner at La Brasserie restaurant, and was met with great service from Fairuz and Ally! They recommended wonderful dishes and gave a little surprise to make our night a bit more memorable. The food was deliciously mouth-watering and were so happy to have a great night and experience here!

Great staff and impressive teamwork at both Fullerton hotels in Singapore. The staff at the Lantern rooftop were prompt and hard working each night we were there. Two of the staff particularly stood out, Yusuf and Agnes. They were attentive, took initiative, and were great team players with leadership skills that inspired teamwork.

We had the buffet lunch at the Brasserie. I tasted a range of food which was all excellent.This is good value for money if you choose the non-alcoholic option. The service was also good. Special mention to Esther who was very accommodating with everything. Thank you!

The staff here were so lovely. Anything we needed they organized and nothing was ever an issue. I would highly recommend staying at The Fullerton Bay Hotel. It was a lovely experience and I will definitely be back! Plus, the breakfast buffet was amazing.

One of the best hotels Ive been to overall. It is my second time staying in the bay view room and I highly recommend it. Very relaxing and amazing view. It has a spacious balcony too. Rooms are clean, great food and the smell of fresh flowers everyday are the best. Thank you very much to the best and professional concierge, Mike, Annie and Kyle. We will be back with the whole family

This is our second time here and still have an amazing experience! It's like our home away from home. The bay view room is highly recommended. Service is superb. Thank you so much to the amazing concierge, Kyle, Mike and Annie. We will definitely be back very soon.

The Fullerton Bay Hotel Singapore.review_title: Excellent ambience with a great service and hospitality
The Fullerton Bay Hotel Singapore.review_content: Excellent ambience and it became more pleasent by the service from Yusuf...he patiently answered all the questions and suggested the best one in the category..this is my 2nd time visit and definitely coming back for many more.A special thanks to customer service to help with my last minute reservations.

Great stay, great view and great customer service experience by Frontdesk Indra and room service employees.It was a birthday staycation and totally an enjoyable one!Room is clean & comfy. In-room diningware is flawless.Thank you for the wonderful stay!

The Fullerton Bay Hotel Singapore.review_title: Great view and ambience. Good service ans food.
The Fullerton Bay Hotel Singapore.review_content: Had dinner at La Brasserie. The colonial architecture and ambience was amazing, with a great view of the marina bay. Service was attentive. We had the four-course dinner set with options for course. Food was great. Highly recommend for date nights.

Great experience at the La Brasserie restaurant. The food is great and value for money. The service is top notch as the waitress keeps checking on us to make sure we are satisfied with the food. We really enjoyed our dinner here as we celebrate our anniversary.

The Lantern Bar is in my opinion tbr Best rooftop in Singapore and service by Kyla and the team was amazing!Great views, lovely ambiance and music always playing Great rooftop to relax and bring out of town guests as well as celebrations :)Food and drinks good too! Bit on the pricer side but the view is worth it

The Fullerton Bay Hotel Singapore.review_title: Memorable day with family at Fullerton Bay Hotel
The Fullerton Bay Hotel Singapore.review_content: Perfect place to stay for a great experience and easy for going out for a walk in the evening around places like merlion, mbs etc. Hospitality from the staffs are amazing. We loved the hotel room which had a bay view from our room. infinity pool is the best part where we can have a great view around while swimming. We went for my wife's bday, they did take a special care by setting up surprises, cakes which is really touching. Surely recommend for people to try/choose. Looking forward to visiting again!

The Fullerton Bay Hotel Singapore.review_title: A memorable wedding experience at Clifford Pier
The Fullerton Bay Hotel Singapore.review_content: My son's wedding dinner at Clifford Pier went extremely well beyond our expectation. The food, table arrangement, service and ambience are just great, a perfect venue for a memorable wedding. Every dish served is delicious and beautifully plated.

Love the vibe of the bar!! Drinks were amazing, and music was good. And we also loved the view!!!!!!! Best experience I had in Singapore. Also the waitress Kylar was so kind! Thank you for the great time! We would love to come back when come to Singapore again! :D

The food was excellent and the service was fantastic! Kylar's service was wonderful! She went above and beyond to serve us, making sure we were happy with the food and service. She deserves a raise! The scenery was amazing as well with wonderful music.

The Fullerton Bay Hotel Singapore.review_title: Poor service but still a great place to stay
The Fullerton Bay Hotel Singapore.review_content: I love this hotel, but the service has gone downhill. Overall, I still really enjoyed my stay and would recommend the hotel if youre not focused on staff service. When I arrived around 7pm there was no one at the check in desk, and two other guests waiting there told me theyd been waiting for a while. I ended up waiting probably 12-15 minutes total not ridiculous but not what Id expect from a hotel like this. When I went to check out a few days later, around 6:45am, there was again no one present. While I waited, I tried the mobile checkout link but it did not work. I hopped in my Uber and tried calling them on my way to the airport, but no one answered. Finally got through on the phone when I was through airport security, and the woman who answered told me to check out at the front desk. When I told her that I had tried to do just that and had also been frustrated at the non functional app and the lack of anyone to answer my call, she was a little rude and defensive. I filled all of this out in a customer service questionnaire they sent, but no one ever cared to follow up. In summary, still a great hotel, but the staff and management may not live up to what youd expect in Singapore.

Gorgeous hotel with the best view of the Marina. We stayed in the Premier suite and had a balcony.Staff were lovely and went the extra mile to make us happy.Breakfast buffet was amazing, so much choice for every taste and diet.Beds were firm and comfortable, rooms were spacious including 3 way bathroom.Only fault was our TV never worked. Despite reporting it to staff and leaving notes in the room it was never fixed.Otherwise this has to be one of the best hotels in Singapore.Special mention to Diane who bought us up a birthday cake and teddy's as she knew it was our birthdays. So nice, thank you!Would highly recommend and would definitely return!

The Fullerton Bay Hotel Singapore.review_title: great date night for our anniversary
The Fullerton Bay Hotel Singapore.review_content: very attentive staff, ambiance was perfect, and the food didn't disappoint! had the perfect night out here for our anniversary dinner and the staff even surprised us with a complimentary cake and postcard with a printed picture of us. very grateful to Esther for the top-notch service!

Had an excellent experience from the landing point. enjoyed the afternoon tea set and it was wonderful, we had the best staffs (special thanks to Esther!!) and the best service. The view was amazing and the tea set was great too, had the chocolate earl gray tea and it tasted good would recommend 10/10 experience

We came to celebrate an early Father's Day. Wonderful and excellent service from the group of service personnel who served us today. We were wowed by their service and attentiveness. Thank you so much for the great service. Yummy food too. Thumbs up and will definitely be back again. Great initiative from the team too. Really love the family photo taken and thank you so much for the complimentary Happy Father's Day cake. Will be back again.

Thank you Le Brasserie ...Good food and ambiance..in addition our special thanks to Mr Fairuz and Ms Ally for the wonderful service provided during our dinner...we enjoyed our wedding anniversary celebrations very much Highly recommended

The Fullerton Bay Hotel Singapore.review_title: Wonderful dining experience at La Brasserie
The Fullerton Bay Hotel Singapore.review_content: Fairuz and Esther was very friendly, thoughtful and attentive. Dinning experience was wonderful and they prepared complimentary cake and photo for our anniversary. Favourite dish was the duck confit (hidden menu item) Much appreciated !

The Fullerton Bay Hotel Singapore.review_title: Hotel stay, wine and dine @ FBH
The Fullerton Bay Hotel Singapore.review_content: The room is nicely set with extra bed for my son. We love the fragrant of room spray which elevate the relaxing mood of our family.. We tried their afternoon tea at The Landing Point. The service provided by JJ, Kate and Josephine is excellent and we will definitely be come back again. Also made our dinner reservation at La Brasserie for my other half birthday celebration

My hubby and I enjoyed our Anniverary celebration dinner very much! It was a memorable evening with excellent food, ambience and service- Special thanks to Chuah and Esther for the surprise celebratory cake and photo-card specially prepared for us!

Came for my anniversary with my husband and 2 kids. Love JJ service, very polite and extremely friendly to my kids. Best high tea around. Yummy dessert with fragrant tea. They also offered complimentary carpark coupons for diner here.

The Fullerton Bay Hotel Singapore.review_title: Wonderful Birthday at Fullerton Bay Hotel
The Fullerton Bay Hotel Singapore.review_content: I am writing to express my heartfelt gratitude for the exceptional dining experience my child and I had at La Brasserie to celebrate my birthday. The ambiance, food, and service exceeded our expectations and made our celebration truly memorable.I would especially like to commend our waitress, Esther. Her warm and attentive service added a special touch to our evening. She was not only professional but also genuinely kind, ensuring that every detail of our meal was perfect. Esthers dedication and positive demeanor significantly enhanced our dining experience.Amy Thairueang

The Ritz-Carlton, Millenia Singapore.review_content: I came here for movie promotions the staff here named murali rajendran (laundry staff) service was very kind amazing very good hospitality very friendly and didnt even take a tip which i gave this made me feel like i should come here with family again

Excellent choice for another home feelMy experience at The Ritz-Carlton, Millenia Singapore was nothing short of extraordinary. The hotels location is perfect for exploring the city, and the facilities are top-notch. The staffs professionalism and friendliness made me feel right at home. As a staff I was very proud to be here in this family

The Ritz-Carlton, Millenia Singapore.review_title: We went there for a short vacation.
The Ritz-Carlton, Millenia Singapore.review_content: The food at the colony was very delicious and look good.Me and my friends admire the indian station food which cook by chef's originated from India.I will highly recommend this place who which to experience a memorable stay.one of the best hotel I have ever visit.Thank you for the warm welcome.

What an amazing experience we had during our recent stay! The service was first class, the room was amazing with a spectacular view of the Marina. Everybody we came into contact with at the hotel provided a first class service and it was a pleasure to stay there. The club lounge facilities were one of the very best I have experienced and the location of the hotel was amazing for seeing all that Singapore has to offer. I would not hesitate to stay again!

Apart from this being a beautiful hotel, perfectly located near the Marina Bay Sands Hotel, shopping precinct and convention centre (it overlooks the F1 track too), the attention to detail to delight guests is something to behold. The trouble the team went to, to make my stay feel so very personal, was nothing short of amazing. Thank you so much to the hotel team - you are all awesome!!!!

The Ritz-Carlton, Millenia Singapore.review_title: Couple Massage in a beautiful well equipped spa
The Ritz-Carlton, Millenia Singapore.review_content: Had the best couple massage for a long time here. The spa is beautiful. When Mia my therapist heard we were celebrating our wedding anniversary, she gave us 2 glass of champagne with chocolates. Try their signature Nasi Lemak tea... it has a lovely aroma. All round wonderful experience!

The Ritz-Carlton, Millenia Singapore.review_title: An absolutely excellent hotel - highly recommended
The Ritz-Carlton, Millenia Singapore.review_content: We stayed in a Club level harbour view room on a high floor, which was truly stunning. Even the bath had a wonderful view across the Bay! The large windows gave the room a very spacious aspect. The room was very quiet. It was cleaned every day, at a time to suit us and was left spotless at all times. The staff were the most helpful and pleasant I have experienced in any hotel, with no queues to check in or out, or at any other time. We arrived early, but our room was made available and our luggage (many cases and bags) was waiting for us when we got to the room. The Club level dining area was really convenient, being close to our room and offering a quieter area to eat than the restaurant. It would still have been good if there had been a choice to have breakfast either in the Club level area or the restaurant without incurring an additional charge, but this is the only suggestion for improvement that I have. This would certainly be my choice of hotel on any future visit to Singapore.

The Ritz-Carlton, Millenia Singapore.review_title: Consistency at its best: A Top-Notch Hotel Experience
The Ritz-Carlton, Millenia Singapore.review_content: I'm absolutely thrilled with my stay at this exceptional hotel! The amenities are top-notch, and the stunning view of the bay is breathtaking. Despite the nearby construction site, the hotel's excellence shone through.I've had the pleasure of experiencing their outstanding service twice - once during the COVID-19 pandemic in 2020 and again recently. Both times, they exceeded my expectations. During a challenging time, they provided a safe and comfortable haven, and this time around, they continued to impress with their high standards.Special shoutouts to Sandeep, our room cleaner, and Katie Soh Zhi Ying, the guest service agent, who went above and beyond to ensure our stay was seamless and enjoyable. Their professionalism, enthusiasm, and personalized service made a lasting impression on me.From the immaculate rooms to the outstanding staff, the hotel's commitment to excellence is evident in every detail. I'm grateful for the wonderful experiences and look forward to many more stays in the future! This hotel truly is a gem, and I can't wait to return!

Its impeccable experience! We love this hotel. The room was spacious and the view is amazing! The staff are very friendly and accommodating especially Nikko from the pool. He took care of us and we love him. Cant wait to come back next year!

A beautiful hotel with a perfect service in a fantastic location....The room was spacious, the windows large and all amenities availableAt their restaurant they had a daily buffet, very diverse and generous, and at an affordable price . Also we asked the concierge to arrange for us a guided tour and we were very happy to spend 4 hours with a highly competent lady: Mrs VickyFor once, there was nothing negative about this hotel!

This is our second time staying here and it felt so good to be back! All the staff were friendly and helpful! We took our daughter with us and the team at The Ritz Carlton totally spoiled her! She was sad when we checked out. Thank you for a wonderful stay and the restaurants (breakfast buffet and Summer Pavilion) were delicious! We cannot wait to revisit again!

The staffs are very hospitable and friendly especially Nikko. He immediately accommodate us when we went to the poolside area. Also, the food and drinks are superb! me and my friends really enjoyed our staycation! definitely will be back again!

Nikko and Juno are super accommodating. Immediately attended to us once we got at the pool area. Super friendly, kind and nice despite the Singapore heat. Creates yummy drinks as well. I stayed together with my friends. Made our stay very fun.

This review is coming in late before my third stay and its a long one because everyone mentioned here deserves an award. I opted for the exclusive club lounge with absolutely no regrets. Whilst the views of the Singapore Cityscape are unparalleled, it truly is the service that takes the cake. Their genuine care and concern for us allowed them to anticipate our needs toward making treasured memories for us. I arrived in true annoying Singaporean-style, early so the room was obviously not ready but were nonetheless warmly welcomed to the club lounge by Firdaus and Diyan which ended up being a real treat with thoughtfully curated canaps. Being a club room, we were assigned a room on the upper floors where we had a spectacular view of the Kallang- we really got the best of both worlds with the view of the marina at the lounge and the Kallang in our room. Id like to extend my heartfelt thanks to Naren on the laundry team as well as TK from Engineering. I had a dress that needed to be pressed by dinner and Naren took it upon himself to make sure that that was done in a mere hour. Similarly, TK magically installed a bidet within 15 minutes of my request (and I say magical because other hotels have sadly failed in this regard). Denish, Devan and Kanna at Guest Services made it possible to surprise my fiance when Id forgotten to bring a blindfold to pick him up from the airport and speedily suggested and handed me a black face mask. I think what was really amazing was that they remembered and when we arrived back at the hotel, they wordlessly took our bags and escorted us all the way back to the room. This continued at the club lounge where Javier, Satish, Sam, Aiman presented us with a cake Id left them earlier and gave us a great, quiet table to celebrate. They even took a Polaroid against the magnificent view (so cute!) to give to us as a gift on check-out. Javier and Satish took the initiative to let us know the buffet would be closing and gave us a quick tour of the food and their personal recommendations so we could get something to eat. I say buffet because this is unlike any evening cocktail presentation Ive experience with a live hot food station. Needless to say, we cancelled our dinner reservation.
