We received the same excellent service at breakfast and had the pleasure of meeting Firdaus again and Alwyn who remembered and somehow communicated our preferences across the team from the day before and went above and beyond to prepare a beautiful eggs Benedict which was not available at the lounge for my fianc. We spend the rest of the day at the lounge, enjoying and observing the way the team worked in concert and interacted with us as well as other guests. They engaged us with excellent conversation without being intrusive. I had

Fantastic thanks to John and Mr Firdausi They were simply fantastic I hope their boss Mr Peter sees this to pass on our thanks and praise for a wonderful time. Very accomodating especially with my gluten free friend they went that extra mile to ensure we had a great time

The Ritz-Carlton, Millenia Singapore.review_title: Exceptional Club Level Service and Inclusions
The Ritz-Carlton, Millenia Singapore.review_content: This was our third stay with The Ritz Carlton, Millenia Singapore, previous stays in May 2023 for two nights and August 2022 for seven nights. Each of our stays have included Club Lounge access and benefits, and each stay our experience has been amazing thanks to the exceptional customer service provided by the Club Lounge Management Team (Jithra and Chuckie). The Club Lounge inclusions are extensive, and the quality and presentation of food is at the highest of standards, the five daily offerings of menu choices are planned perfectly to ensure different selection of dishes every day of your stay. The day always starts well with fine French Champagne with breakfast, followed by amazing culinary delights offered each day. Each and every stay at Ritz Carlton Millenia Singapore has been exceptional, and we look forward to returning soon.

The Ritz-Carlton, Millenia Singapore.review_title: Fist time in Singapore and The best hotel "Ritz Carlton"
The Ritz-Carlton, Millenia Singapore.review_content: We very happy and surprised for the location and service of this hotel. All attendant are polite, knowledgeable and attentiveMr. Kamin our receptionist guy, him very friendly and make us feel first class and happy to stay this hotel. all process for check in very fast. Thank you Kamin!Colony restaurant is the best. Our lunch buffet still make us can't forgot it. And this restaurant aslo operate for breakfast. Mr. John the guy taking care our area we sit, Him very friendly and always smile even in the morning very busy but him did a good job.The view of our room is Marina bay view, It make us surprised for amezing view. Thank you our In room attendant "Xihai" for make our room very nice.Thank you all for make my first time in Singapore and in this hotel was an unforgettable experience.Natdanai & Rolf

Anjo the bar tender is an absolute legend, made our bar experience one that we will never forget! Such a legend!!! Sue is amazing, so grateful l for all her hospitality!! 2 humans that deserve a giant pay rise!!!! Its the little details that make a difference and these two people delivered

What a great hotel. Fabulous service, awesome views and location. There are a number of highlights from our family trip. 1. The rooms with a bay view are perfect to unwind after a long haul flight. The bed is super comfortable and the views over the bay were fantastic. We had interconnected rooms as we were travelling with 12 13 year old boys. Access to the pool was also great and its great to have a dip after a long flight.2. The breakfast buffet is the best weve experienced anywhere. Quality, variety and freshness of the food was outstanding. Coupled with the ambiance of the room and attention to detail from the staff, made breakfast a really enjoyable experience.3. The staff and their attention to detail was first class. Polite, knowledgeable and attentive all delivered with a genuine smile in interest.We genuinely didnt want to check out. and will definitely return.

The first thing you notice is that is smells amazing inside. We had club lounge access which had great breakfast and the friendliest staff making eggs in the morning. Drinks for happy hour and end of the night plus loads of snacks all the time. Slept well each night on a comfy king bed. Location is great, easy walk to Marina Bay, busy bus stop, and metro. There is a new higher end version of a hawker center nearby. Great pool but poolside service was slow, 15-20 minutes to get a cocktail. Excellent spa. They let us use the shower there while waiting for check-in. The Colony buffet was an eating highlight and worth a visit. My one complaint was I asked for a suit to be pressed, but they dry cleaned it instead and charged me for it. I dont like paying for things I didnt ask for but didnt want to waste time arguing about it.

Saw online that the best facial and spa in SG is the Ritz Carlton Spa. Gave it a try and the ambience, the mood was fantastic. Mia and Ann were our masseuse and they were amazing. Keep making sure we felt comfortable and kept adjusting to our needs and wants. Afterwards, provide us tea and some champaign as it was my anniversary with my partner.I do recommend leaving extra time in your schedule to enjoy their facilities !!

Amazing views and friendly staff, special shout out to Lavin and Nanako, who were helpful with a smooth check in process and shared great tips for the area. Also had a great experience at the spa - Ann was wonderful and would recommend to anyone.

A truly amazing stay! Amazing staff & service, amazing breakfast choices, amazing views, amazing location and an amazing room! Worth every penny. We didnt want to leave. Thankyou to everyone at the Ritz for giving us the stay of a lifetime (although hopefully well be back!)

The Ritz-Carlton, Millenia Singapore.review_title: Dreaming of going back as soon as possible!
The Ritz-Carlton, Millenia Singapore.review_content: We were completely blown away with our experience at this hotel! Waking up to floor to ceiling views of marina bay in the suite which continued into the expansive living room, the study and the bathroom. All we could say is Wow. Every little detail has been thought of from the furnishings to the kids pack provided upon arrival! Our son loved his night time bath routine with the sensational views of marina bay at night. The hotel has a wonderful breakfast with every option you could want. The gym has very good quality machines. The pool is large and was well utilised by my family. The hotel hosts an impressive amount of fine art and a wander through the hotel to see them all is a must. The service was of the highest calibre. We were kindly upgraded which was greatly appreciated. Whilst waiting to check in (a very short wait) we were offered drinks and refreshments. They even accommodated our late check out caused by our airline. We have stayed in many luxury hotels all over the world and I must say that this is probably in the top 3 for service. We cant wait to come back again! If you are visiting Singapore soon, dont hesitate, book this hotel. You wont regret it. The location to marina bay, the gardens, the market is 10/10.There is also a playground a short stroll away for those with children.

The Ritz-Carlton, Millenia Singapore.review_title: A memorable stay, in a first rate hotel with amazing staff!!
The Ritz-Carlton, Millenia Singapore.review_content: As expected, the Ritz Carlton goes above and beyond in service. This was no exception in Singapore. We booked the Deluxe Suite, which was quite spacious and very well-appointed, with great views of Marina Bay. Theres a Nespresso machine for the coffee lovers. The bathroom is very large, with a double sink, walk-in shower, bathtub and excellent bath robes. The staff is super friendly and helpful, be it for tips around the city, restaurant reservations or even little local spots to visit. The housekeeping staff were really wonderful, with an eye for detail. They had left a couple of surprises in the room, which were a delight and appreciated. The Republic Bar in the lobby is a must-visit. The ambiance is magnificent, with amazing cocktails and super friendly staff. Its a great spot to enjoy a pre-dinner drink or simply spend the entire evening there. All that said, the highlight of our stay here was having met Anjo - the mixologist/bartender at Republic. This young gentleman went above and beyond at every possible occasion!! He is attentive, gracious, polite and hospitable. He is the definition of exceptional service, quick to engage in conversation and knowing when to give us space to relax. Always smiling and always happy to see us pop in for a coffee or a drink, he truly made the difference between an ordinary stay and an extraordinary one. He even went out of his way for the birthday celebration, offering up drinks and even a cake! When we had friends over for drinks, he arranged a special cocktail for all of us. I would recommend dropping by just to meet this wonderful human being, even if youre not staying at the hotel (of course, I do recommend staying here too, as it is a really great spot)! Anjo, a huge thank you for making our stay memorable!!

The Ritz-Carlton, Millenia Singapore.review_title: What I've come to expect at the Ritz
The Ritz-Carlton, Millenia Singapore.review_content: Great service during our stay. Attentive staff, well kept rooms, and nice bar. Couldn't ask for more. The view from our room was simply awesome. Our thanks to the concierge team in making some reservations that made our stay very memorable.

The Ritz-Carlton, Millenia Singapore.review_title: Excellent service, superb facilities, a real 5-6 star experience. (THANKS KAY!!) Treat yourself!
The Ritz-Carlton, Millenia Singapore.review_content: High level personalised service. Above and beyond what to expect. Highly competitive. Great pool, superb modern gym with all new equipment.Rooms quiet (don't believe what you read on other reviews - there is very little muffled traffic noise, especially up high, and virtually zero after 9pm). If you have a Marina facing room no traffic at all.Breakfast had a massive array of options. And service there was exceptional also.Staff are very, very well trained here at the Ritz. Dixon at the front counter, Kay at concierge was exceptional (she even undertook research and delivered a hand-written note to the room!!) Only small critique - no "real" coffee to be enjoyed anywhere in the hotel!!! No Italian coffee making facilities or barista, not in the breakfast room even in the high-end bar adjacent. You have to walk to the mall next door for a proper good tasting coffee.

I stayed in hotel for 2 nights and the rooms are very specious. I did not pay for upgrade to view of Marina Bay, just facing river and highway. The vibe of hotel is very good. Its not a chill style but its spectacular and impressive. The girl who assist us in front desk, Nana, delivered excellent service, kind, polite and very helpful. She is nice and cheerful as well. Room is clean and decent. Amenities are good and very enough to us. One thing is the TV does not work very well but it does not really matter as I did not spend time on watching TV. Housekeeping staff Prink and He Qing gave me a surprise that they gave me a make up mirror on the working table as they found I did make up on the table. I was shocked and feeling so happy about this. Thank you very much!I also went to the bar of Republic and their Cocktails are absolutely good! You must try a drink of cocktail over there! Republic is top 50s bar in Asia!

The biggest room I've ever stayed at and perfect relaxation after a long day of walking and exploring the sights of Singapore. Such a well designed room. The service was amazing as soon as we arrived, everyone was super friendly and anything we needed was no trouble for the hotel. The housekeeping staff did a fantastic job of making our visit very special. The breakfast was fantastic, a huge variety of food available so a great start to the day.

Our 9-day stay at The Ritz was amazing and they made us feel like a part of the family! They arranged for Jet Quay to escort us through the immigration process and arranged for their transportation to pick us up at the airport. Upon arrival, we were greeted by several staff and escorted straight to our Marina Bay room on the 21st floor, where check-in was conducted privately and stress-free. Waiting was a birthday cake for my mom to celebrate her birthday. Throughout our stay, we met so many friendly and helpful staff, giving us all kinds of recommendations for what to do and eat in the city. Housekeeping and in-room dining did an amazing job of addressing any requests, and keeping the room in exceptional condition. The food was excellent, and the hotel was located in such a convenient location making it easy to get to attractions, food, and for walking. Every day we out and came back, we were greeted by the staff, making us feel very welcome. I look forward to our next stay and would recommend this hotel.

We have just stayed at the Ritz Carlton Millenia Singapore. We chose the Club King Kallang room. From the minute we checked in, everyone made our stay spectacular. Special mention to the Club staff, Chuck, Jonathan, and Jasper. We can not thank them enough for the special attention and first class service. We have stayed many times before, and the exceptional service is what brings us back. Excellent hotel.

The Ritz Carlton Spa. An overwhelmingly pleasant experience.I was recommended by my friend, Joy, who was a masseur at Ritz Carlton Spa, to come try their spa, and I have to say it was 100% worth the try.The moment we entered, we were greeted by a group of pleasant looking and friendly counter ladies. They patiently explained to us their products and brough us to amenities section.Sauna, steam room and jacuzzi were available.Afterwards, went to massage room to start the session. Room ambience was awesome. Room lighting, music, smell etc, were all on point. You will already expect the massage session to be good when the bed was soft but provided good support. Sheets were silky smooth. Most importantly, the face rest was at the perfect angle.My masseur was Orca. Very Friendly and professional. No unnecessary conversation. Techniques and strength were on point.Had the best 90 mins massage/sleep in my life.Conclusion:The Ritz Carlton Spa will set your massage expectation to a whole new level. It will pamper you, spoil you, and leave you wanting for more.Sen.

We went for a Spa today, it make me feel so warm on how the Spa staff treat us, The staff are so professional, so friendly and so kind to us especially Ms Rosalin, Joy, Yo Chan, Yani and Orca It worth of money spent, the Spa facilities are so clean and our spa treatments 90mins deep massage went so well. The massage was so great and the therapist Yani and Orca has very professional skill that help to relieve my tense muscles, we are so enjoyed the best service there and I can say that It was a Fantastic Spa experience ever! Thank you for making our day. We definitely to come back again.

Everytime I am in Singapore, the Ritz Carlton is the hotel of choice! The best accomodation, food and most importantly people! The hotel staff are always friendly and welcoming. I happened to be celebrating my birthday on this particular trip and they made me feel even more special with cake, champagne and a hand written card. The hospitality didnt stop there- they also wrote a welcome note and cake for my parents.Thank you Ritz Carlton Millenia! Im looking forward to my next holiday back!!

So great! Good laundry by Murali and Chengwei! Thx! Since we check out tomorrow but my t-shirt got dirty today. They were doing the laundry tonight on time. Your friendly willingness to assist were greatly appreciated.your warm smile and helpful attitude made the entire experience pleasant and stress-free.

We had an amazing stay here recently with my parents and daughters. The concierge level is incredible-wonderful food and views. It was so nice to have the ease of this on site. The hotel location was incredibly convenient, the staff friendly and the pool was nice. Highly recommend this hotel. No complaints and made for a wonderful trip.

The Ritz-Carlton, Millenia Singapore.review_title: service second to none in an amazing hotel
The Ritz-Carlton, Millenia Singapore.review_content: an amazing hotel in a great location. i would definitely go back here. after 1 day at MBS, we moved here for 3 nights. from the first minute, we knew it was going to be a great stay. the service was second to none, and the rooms were incredibly well furnished and thought out. the internal artwork and pieces were inspiring, but the thing we will remember will still be the attentive and friendly service.

Great staff and well appointed rooms. Pool and gym are fantastic, as too the dining options. Only downside is that they do not participate in Bonvoy, so no points or perks on your stay. Location is close to Marina Bay and the Sands Casino (across the bridge).

The Ritz-Carlton, Millenia Singapore.review_title: Top notch hotel with excellent hospitality
The Ritz-Carlton, Millenia Singapore.review_content: We stayed at room 2719. Staff service were excellent from the front reception to housekeeping. Our room and bathroom are really spacious for a normal deluxe room. The view out the room is spectacular as our room is the Kallang precinct view - overlooking the highways and river. Room amenities are complete with quality branded toiletries. The gym is one of the best I have been which has complete equipment and facilities. As we were there for my birthday, I was given a complimentary cake to celebrate the occasion. Location is just a walking distance away to Marina Square and also to other landmarks such as Marina Bay, Singapore Flyer and The Esplanade. Definitely a stay to remember.

We were greeted with the utmost warmth by Sarah and Dickson, who kindly escorted us to our room and introduced us to all the amenities. As part of our celebration, they went above and beyond by preparing a special decorations for us, along with an array of delectable desserts curated by Chef Sagong! My wife and I thoroughly enjoyed every moment of our stay, thanks to the exceptional hospitality and thoughtful gestures from the entire team.

My partner and I booked a room at Ritz Carlton to celebrate our wedding night. Upon arrival, we were pleasantly surprised by the warm welcome and the meticulous decorations arranged by Dickson, Sarah, and Chef Sagong. The room had an excellent view, and we were impressed by the delicious desserts provided. We extend our heartfelt thanks to the entire team for making our wedding night truly unforgettable.

Special thanks to Dickson, Sara and Chef Sagong for assisting to arrange a memorable stay for my newly wed friends at Ritz Carlton!!Their services were impeccable and they even hand crafted posters and decorated the room with balloons just to congratulate the couple. They also prepared desserts that were not only pleasing to the eyes but also tasted amazing!Kudos to the team and we definitely will keep them in mind for our upcoming stays!

The Ritz-Carlton, Millenia Singapore.review_title: #RCMemories - Fantastic Stay at the Ritz Singapore
The Ritz-Carlton, Millenia Singapore.review_content: I brought my girlfriend with me to Singapore for a surprise proposal and the staff at the Ritz were super accommodating. Upon arrival, Dickson Soon, had already made it a memorable experience as he provided some great suggestions for the best local dishes. Everyone was very friendly and we even had a few surprises. One of the days on our stay, Chef Yong Wei, Katie Soh, and Dickson gave us the opportunity to celebrate the Chinese New Year with a traditional dish known as Lo Hei. This stay was one for the books and we will definitely be staying at the Ritz every time we come back to Singapore!

Perfection. I need really say no more. The best hotel we have ever stayed in. Service was fantastic, our Marina Bay Sands view room was wonderful..Highly recommend Club access, where they insist on refilling you glass with champagne whatever the time of day. Nothing was too much trouble..I was on a birthday holiday which started and ended in Singapore with Australia and a cruise in between.Ritz Carlton provided a lovely birthday cake for me too.

Laundry service was outstanding! They noticed that I was missing a button off my sports coat and fixed it. Great initiative!! Got my clothes back in just a few hours. They even picked them up while I was away from the hotel and returned them to my room on their own.

The Ritz-Carlton, Millenia Singapore.review_title: There Really Is No Where Better In Singapore
The Ritz-Carlton, Millenia Singapore.review_content: My wife and I, our son and his partner have just returned home from The Ritz Carlton, Millenia, Singapore.For my wife and I, this was our 9th visit and our 3rd in the past 12 months. This truly is our home away from home.We always stay in a Club level room and the benefits are almost endless. The 5 food presentations daily are always exceptional, the views amazing, the access to the Club cars so convenient.Though what makes the Club access here stand head and shoulders above anywhere else we've ever stayed are the wonderful Ladies & Gentlemen that make up the staff there.We must thank the amazing Chuck De Guzman for organizing our stay, he epitomises the word 'Gentleman' in every aspect.We also must thank Jasper & Moira who everyday made our time special with lots of laughs, local suggestions and their gracious service. It was fun celebrating Lunar New Year with them. No review can be written without mentioning Chefs Sundar, Benson & Bernice who all guaranteed that we never went hungry with their delicious food and that we left far heavier than when we arrived!A special thank you to the wonderful Lam from the laundry department who has looked after us for 9 years, greeting every phone call with her cheery disposition and always remembering us year after year. Simply amazing!Service this good is rarely found and this is why we always return here and will continue to do so, our only disappointment is having to leave.

The Ritz-Carlton, Millenia Singapore.review_title: The epitome of service and satisfaction!
The Ritz-Carlton, Millenia Singapore.review_content: The first time we chose to stay at The Ritz Carlton and boy did we pick a good one! My husband and I needed a short getaway and chose Singapore to see the sights. I didnt intend to stay somewhere fancy, but my husband insisted we try The Ritz to witness the hype. What did we find? - A staff greeted us at the front door (at 10:30pm) to guide us to the lobby and give us a briefing of the hotel. - An instant room upgrade to the 29th floor, just because. - Exceptionally friendly service by the front desk attendant Nadia (who later wrote us a handwritten note that made me cry). - Excellent food and beverages at Colony Restaurant and Republic Bar.- Another room upgrade to a corner suite because of some repair works to another room on our floor. Also some chocolates and desserts sent to our room for the inconvenience.What made it memorable for us was not just the million dollar views, amenities, lavish hotel interiors and the hotel generosity in their giveaways, but the exceptional service we received. Each and every staff member made us feel like royalty, as if we were the Prince and Princess of Wales. Always asking if they can do better, as if customer service is core to their values. Ive experienced quite a few amazing hotels in my lifetime, but none quite as memorable as The Ritz-Carlton Millenia Singapore. We left our 6 day stay making friends with the staff that have shown us what customer service is really about. My 20 photos and their captions highlight The Ritz-Carlton Millenia Singapore in every way. Quality and care. We cannot wait to come back.Special shout out to the incredible staff at Colony Restaurant, Kristine the hostess, Frecel at front of house, Firdausi and Tessa the Assistant Managers, Carmela the supervisor, chef Ganesh (for all the laughs at breakfast) and one very kind human, John. We miss you all. Also shout out to Camila at Republic Bar and Nikko at the pool for contributing to our amazing experience.

The staff at all levels are superb nothing is too much trouble best all round staff experienceBreakfast choices endless and great quality Cocktails and snacks are a great experience Our room overlooked the bay the view at night was stunning

An excellent experience. Everything about our stay at the Ritz was wonderful. The breakfast buffet, the room, the location, the view, the concierge, the gym, the pool were just perfect. We only wish we could lower the construction noise but Singapore always undergoing construction. Thank you to the staff at the Ritz for a great stay.

The Ritz-Carlton, Millenia Singapore.review_title: Incredible experience and the absolute best staff!
The Ritz-Carlton, Millenia Singapore.review_content: What an amazing hotel with an incredible staff. From the moment we walked in we were greeted by a handful of staff members and checked in shortly after. Though we didn't know this at the time but Dickson, the staff member who checked us in, was the hotel's VIP services director. Throughout our stay, Dickson treated us like true VIPs, with personalized printed restaurant suggestions, directions to the places we were hoping to go to, arranged for us to us to use the shower and spa facilities between when we checked out and our flight and even organized a complimentary car to bring us to the airport. The hotel, the service, the staff, and our entire experience was truly one of a kind and special. I would recommend staying at the Ritz-Carlton, Millenia 100%. And a very very special thank you to Dickson!!!

YOTEL Singapore Orchard Road.review_content: Very nice experience stating at the heart of orchard. Surely we'll be coming back soon if the rates are the same or lower.

YOTEL Singapore Orchard Road.review_title: Comfortable, central location in the heart of Singapores shopping district
YOTEL Singapore Orchard Road.review_content: Handy accommodations but tiny bedrooms and bathroom. Handbasin outside shower cubicle, which is fine, but hardly room to turn around

YOTEL Singapore Orchard Road.review_title: Great stay at the center of Orchard Road
YOTEL Singapore Orchard Road.review_content: Perfect location, easy access to MTR, great food and shopping around. Great for kids to have bunk bed. The room is a bit small so for family of 4 with lots of luggages might be a struggle to find space to open luggages. May not be great with babies and toddlers but great with 5 yrs old and above.
the ambience of hotel is very clean, modern, and very sophisticated. the staff also helpful and bring more service i expected

YOTEL Singapore Orchard Road.review_title: A fun concept of a hotel
YOTEL Singapore Orchard Road.review_content: This was our first visit to Singapore and we picked this hotel for price and location reasons. Meeting the robots was cool. Overall a great hotel with a nice pool and restaurant. We got the breakfast option which was great with lots of good local and western options. Rooms are small but space is used efficiently. Easily located near transit which made exploring Singapore really easy.
Great location easy to access everything in Orchard road. The room is quiet , clean and comfortable. Worth the price you pay for .
Good position, good staff and good breakfast. Small cabin but ok for few days. Very close to MRT and shops
our stay at yotel was very comfortable. the room was cleaned every day. The service was fast. The staff were nice

YOTEL Singapore Orchard Road.review_title: Great pod hotel in convenient location
YOTEL Singapore Orchard Road.review_content: Family of 3 stayed in triple room with bunk bed set up. Stayed 2 nights which is perfect time in a pod hotel. Room had everything you needed and yes it was small and getting dressed was an entertaining challenge but it was fun! Hotel was quiet and great location with short walk to MRT and Ion orchard shopping mall. Staff were helpful and bar/restaurant on Level 10 had great drink deals and lovely live music on a Friday night.

Fantastic stay, lovely clean rooms, amazing views, best location, great pool. We had 3 rooms for our family of 6, we were located close together and staff were extremely helpful & accommodating. Loved being so close to everything. Would stay here again.
It is a pleasant stay. The room is clean although it is really small and have no chair to sit. And the wifi is very weak. Overall is good and I will come again.
Very unique hotel, I was so surprised with the environment and the services are providing I will come back again because the Yotel is the first choice in Orchard road

I stayed at Yotel Singapore for two weeks. This was a fantastic hotel to stay at the heart of Singapore, in Orchard Road. Staff were fantastic from start to finish. I requested a room with a view and was giving a room on the 29th floor overlooking Orchard Road. Every morning for breakfast staff were very friendly and attentive. For dinner, staff at the restaurant were always friendly and quick with my order.The room was the perfect size for me, for my two week stay, as it has space for all your clothes, a place to store suitcases, and a mini fridge were a stored soft drinks and milk.I used the gym a couple of times and the facilities are good, having all the basic equipment.The pool is fantastic to just relax and order a drink to enjoy by the poolside.I would recommend this place to anybody going to Singapore.

Was attending a conference in Singapore. Yotel is centrally placed. Bus 36 goes direct to the airport terminal 1. Stop Royal Thailand Embassy. Also on orchard Station MRT, within 5 minutes walking distance. Major shopping area.Excellent and helpful staff.
the hotel is very close to MRT and bus station. Everything is tidy and clean, house keeping service is excellent.
Location is very convenient for commuting Nice staffClean Room but it's a little bit small For business purpose, there is no working desk in the room.
The location is very perfect, staffs is very friendly & supportive, services & facilities is more than perfect
I personally believe that the hotel quality is good, and I really like the gym. But the room is a little bit too small

Yotel was a very well priced stay and we appreciated how eco friendly and well thought out its concept seemed to be on emphasising efficiency over a bombastic display. It was in the ideal location in town, right next to the best cinema in the country and right smack at the beginning of the orchard shopping district
be better than before. Very excellent, Very clean, strategic, unique room concept. Im so happy to stay here. Recommended Hotel
Tle location is perfect. It is very near the mrt station and shopping malls. So many food choices. Staff were so helpful. I would stay here again.

YOTEL Singapore Orchard Road.review_title: Great location, comfortable room with city views
YOTEL Singapore Orchard Road.review_content: Only stayed for a night after our cruise trip. We were allowed to check-in early and the process was fast and easy with the help of a staff. At first, we didn't expect much from the room, I mean, it's Singapore and hotel stays are expensive and mostly with smaller spaces. But at Yotel Singapore Orchard, they really know how to utilize compact spaces without making it feel cramped. You can enjoy city view from the bathroom (toiletshower, the sink is outside the bathroom), instead of the room. Of course, there are double curtains for your privacy, but it's still a unique layout. The room was provided with a desk with wireless charger, kettle with coffee & tea, ironironboard, and TV with various channels and Chromecast option. The bed can be inclined and reclined so you can watch the TV comfortably. Those who stay for business would appreciate the facilities provided in the room. Unfortunately, since we only stayed for a night, we didn't get to experience the pool, gym, even the robot service. But, we will definitely put this hotel on top of our list to stay the next time we're in Singapore.

YOTEL Singapore Orchard Road.review_title: location at a reasonable price with friendly staff
YOTEL Singapore Orchard Road.review_content: The hotels location is excellent, offering convenience and accessibility. Moreover, the reasonable price makes it an attractive choice for travelers. The staffs friendliness adds a welcoming touch to the overall experience. Highly recommended!

YOTEL Singapore Orchard Road.review_title: Great affordable capsule hotel - Amazing quality
YOTEL Singapore Orchard Road.review_content: Staff amazing, room cleanliness amazing, happy hour amazing. Modern - up to date, REALLY comfy beds. Just does it all for the right price. Great view over the city.

Good value for money - The location was right on Orchard Road so there was plenty of options for shopping and dining. There was convenient MRT station in the neighborhood so I could take MRT from Changi to the hotel. The room was clean and modern. My only issue was that the entrance to the hotel was difficult to find. The entrance was not on Orchard Road but Claymore Hill.
Good hotel at great location next to Isetan department store and many other big names.It is also close to many restaurants and food courts and Orchard Road underground station.

I love the smell when we enter the hotel. The team is really very pleasant. The rooms are comfortable. I used the new renovated in-room desk and it was really convenient. I used the dryer and the ironing fairy. Breakfast is even more diverse than last November. Congratulations to the whole team.

3 nights with kids. Compact, modern and very clean and compact. Small rooms but neat. They have baggage space. Bathroom is comfy, not too small. And it is at orchard. sevel and cheers nearby, close to the malls.
Yotel Hotel is the best choice!Please try it then you will have experience. Very good place, reasonable price, hospital welcome, Mission team is always cheering, smile and ready to help any time.
Great stay ! will come back again ! Location is perfectfriendly staff and check in / out was easy ! highly recommended !
Had a pleasant experience with Yotel at Orchard Road. The staff was amazing, rooms were compact and functional, the amenities were very good. Had a good time!

YOTEL Singapore Orchard Road.review_title: Wonderful and caring staff - terrific hotel
YOTEL Singapore Orchard Road.review_content: I am so grateful to the staff at this wonderful hotel - my wife was stranded in singapore and sick, and the staff went out of their way to help her and my kid, e.g. walking her around the local pharmacies to find the right medicine in the middle of the night and generally making sure they were ok. And it was clear that the night staff let the day staff know about her needs when the shifts changed - amazing dedication. This exceeds the service you'd expect at all hotels, including luxury brands. The rooms are surprisingly spacious due to clever design, e.g. bed which turns into full-size sofa, and bunk beds. Normally 14 square meters is a pigenhole, but in this hotel clever use of space means its comfortable for 2.Thanks again and we'll be back.
Beautiful, simple, easy access hotel in the middle of busy city.my friend is so easy to find also everyone in the hotel very friendly and helpful
Great Location and great service Nice bed and gym is perfect really happy stay and will return! Highly recommended

YOTEL Singapore Orchard Road.review_title: Awesome location, great beds, friendly staff.
YOTEL Singapore Orchard Road.review_content: I really enjoyed my stay at the perfectly located and managed Yotel. The bed and mattress were quite comfortable which improved my sleeping quality. I also enjoyed the breakfast, the view, and my interactions with the friendly staff.

YOTEL Singapore Orchard Road.review_title: Pretty much perfect for a stay in Singapore
YOTEL Singapore Orchard Road.review_content: Really enjoyed our stay in Yotel. While the room we stayed at was quite compact it was comfortable and clean. Really only minus was lack of counter spaces, but we managed well.The staff were very helpful and the robots really brightened our evenings when we run out of supplies. Yolanda especially was amazing, Yoshi could have his own funny line.Breakfast was good and had lot of things available also for special diets. Some variety with foods would have been fun, but everything was good never the less. The pool area was nice.Location is truly perfect for a stay in Singapore. We were able to travel anywhere from near by bus stops or metro stations and a lot of things were only a short walk away.

I had a memorable stay during 3 nights at YOTEL, the check in experience was nice, it was quick and the hotel was allowing us to check in before 3 PM. The over all experience is good, the bathroom was awesome, they also have bidet next to toilet bowl which is extra point for my personal review. The room is compact and functional. every edge has its own function.The bed could be adjusted, either up and down for our comfort. Overall, it was an amazing stay for me, will definitely come back there.

YOTEL Singapore Orchard Road.review_title: Good to be back the second time around
YOTEL Singapore Orchard Road.review_content: Its our second time staying here and still, the experience is worth it. What we love in this hotel is we can do self check in without having to wait or line up, they have money exchange machine, and free bottles of water everyday. Their robot assistants, Yoshi and Yolanda, are really what makes this hotel unique. You can really feel the techy vibe just by entering. Would highly recommend this to friends who will visit Singapore.

YOTEL Singapore Orchard Road.review_title: hotel in center of city, good service and food
YOTEL Singapore Orchard Road.review_content: hotel in center of city, good service and food,good service. Little lobby, beautiful restaurant good clean

Very cool and trendy hotel, perfect location near MRT and Orchard road. As a business traveller and runner perfect as botanical gardens is very close. Staff is exceptional, always helps and rooms are compact and offers all you need combined with cool look. Restaurant offer good food and has many daily promotions.
Perfect location, shower and bed!Room a bit small, but very clean!Close to MRT! Not a suitable location if youre looking for a pool vacation.
The location is fabulous. Comfortable bed, clean, sound proof walls, everything looks rather new. Excellent staff !!
good location, a bit small but had everything. the bathroom door is too transparent, not good for staying with colleague

Yotel Singapore offers a contemporary and stylish stay in the heart of the city. With its prime location along Orchard Road, guests have easy access to shopping, dining, and entertainment options. The hotel's modern design and efficient use of space create a comfortable and functional environment for travelers. The cabin-style rooms feature smart technology and thoughtful amenities, catering to the needs of today's tech-savvy guests. Additionally, their two robots Yoshi & Yolanda are sure to win your hearts. While room sizes may be compact, the well-designed layout ensures a comfortable stay. There is complimentary water & amenities and the breakfast buffet was really amazing and a great add-on. My stay overlapped during my birthday and they were kind enough to send donuts to my room Yotel Singapore Orchard Road earns my highest recommendation by offering convenient and trendy accommodation option for those who looking to explore Singapore's vibrant urban scene.

The navigation from MRT Rrchard station and YOTEL did not very clearly. MRT entrance at front of ION was opposite to YOTEL but we were unable to across the road. We reluctantly find the way to YOTEL with MRT tunnel. We lost the way to TANG plaza. Finally, we knew that the true way was used the Scott road tunnel. For these reasons, I want to YOTEL to improve the navigation to YOTEL from MRT station.
Yotel Orchard locates very strategic, walking distance to both bus and Orchard Station. The room is nice and have good city view.

YOTEL Singapore Orchard Road.review_title: Great hotel in Singapore very good located
YOTEL Singapore Orchard Road.review_content: Great hotel that leaves nothing to be desired with an excellent price-performance ratio. We will come back!
Everything you needGood facilities Good location near the main attractions and near shopping malls recommend it

Yotel Singapore Orchard Road has two big things going for it. One is the location, just off Orchard Rd and a few minutes' walk from Orchard MRT station. There is plenty of shopping and eating nearby, and it's a great base or exploring Singapore. The other big thing is the rooms. My room was very compact, but also very functional - panels in the walls hide a fold-down desk and an ironing board, and there's a tiny fridge and a safe. The bed is super-comfy. The bathroom arrangement is unconventional, but a big winner - one wall is the window facing on to the street, which provides a great view and plenty of light into the room. The hotel has a fun vibe to it, with its purple-coloured theme and robots to deliver items to rooms. Would definitely stay there again.

YOTEL Singapore Orchard Road.review_title: Nicely located at the centre of orchard and somerset
YOTEL Singapore Orchard Road.review_content: This is a simple, nice and clean hotel if you are just looking for a nice place to rest at the end of your day, the room is small and just enough for 1 person with a small cabin luggage, it would be a little bit too small and cramped to fit 2 people with a big suitcase. the only downside of the room is that it is not that soundproof, you can still hear people outside of the room, but generally, it is not too bad.The bed is comfortable, love the urban jungle conditioner.
